Serve at room temperature.  Serve at room temperature.  Serve at room temperature.  Serve at room temperature.  Serve at room temperature.

name: TFica Grang Rig + Fa'm Blancs Syrah 2014
description: Aromas of blackberries, plums, cherries and currants with hints of vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with blackberries, plums, blueberries, currants, vanilla, cocoa, licorice and spicy flavors. The mouthfeel is soft and round with well-integrated tannins and good acidity. The wine is well-balanced, complex and balanced.

name: Martetastan Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 vintage produced wines with beautiful color and intense aromas of bright ruby and black cherries with an appealing touch of mocha and tobacco leaf. Flavors mirror aromas with hints of raspberry, black cherry, and cassis. The mouth feel is soft, round, well-rounded, and supp field ripe tannins and sweet oak toast. The finish is long and smooth.

name: Tuntallo Pinot Noir 2008
description: The 2008 Pinot Noir Tuntallo is a wine of great structure and depth. The nose offers intense aromas of blackberries, cherries, vanilla, and sweet tobacco, with a hint of anise. The mouthfeel is rich and supple, with soft, round tannins on the finish. The wine has a pleasant mouth-watering acidity, which will help it to drink well now and for the next 2-3 years. The mouth feel is round and rounder than the nose suggests, with juicy, sweet tannins and a hint of spice on the finish. The wine is enjoyable now and will cellar well for 2-3 years. We suggest this wine to be paired with dishes that feature flavors that complement its fresh fruit character. This wine is a great food companion now, and will continue to improve over the next 2- 3 years. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for 4 to 5 years.  This wine will pair well with grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, roasted vegetables, and a wide range of grilled foods.

name: Herlark Woderia Collomi Pinot Noir 2013
description: Rich aromatics of sweet, juicy cherry and red fruit. Fresh and full bodied with a long finish. The 2013 vintage is very expressive of the vineyard's terroir. The wine is easy to drink now, and will cellar well for 5-8 years. Pair with grilled fish, poultry, grilled vegetables, or pasta with roasted tomatoes.

name: Trost Vineyards Cabernet Wellos 18 Denan Marnot 2011
description: The 2011 vintage of 18 Denan Marnot is an elegant wine with a deep, deep ruby color. The nose opens with blackberry and black cherry aromas with hints of black pepper, nutmeg, and blackberry. The mouthfeel is round and soft with ripe, sweet tannins and a long, fresh finish. The 2011 vintage of 18 Denan Marnot is an excellent example of the variety in Napa Valley.

name: Ceau Mal Duberaive (half-bottle) 1996
description: The 1996 vintage of Cuvée Mal Duberaive was a classic vintage, with the majority of the grapes coming from the Napa Valley. This vintage is a blend of fruit from the Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc grapes. The resulting wine is rich, deep and well-balanced with rich, well-integrated tannins. The nose offers intense aromas of dark fruits, plum, blackberry and cherry with nuances of violet and mineral components. The mouthfeel is round and soft with good depth and balance of fruit and oak. The finish is long and well-balanced with good acidity.

name: Maragio Bigolo Bru Saleta Conuma Pieila Lamfantinia 2004
description: Bright ruby red with violet tones. Intense and fruity, with the aroma of red berries and cherries. In the mouth the wine is warm and well-balanced, with well-integrated tannins, very good acidity and good length. This is a perfect match for grilled fish, such as cod, and grilled vegetables.

name: Clorama Cabernet Sauvignon Chardin-Zapily Chardonnay 2016
description: The wine is a medium-bodied wine with aromas of white peach, nectarine, papaya, tropical fruit and vanilla. The mouthfeel is rich and round with mouthwatering acidity and intense fruit flavors of grapefruit and papaya. The wine is fresh and well-balanced with lingering mineral and mineral tones on the finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to 3 years.

name: Bodestadbong Kinsing Wines Patos Reserva Zinfandel 2017
description: This wine offers fresh aromas of ripe fruit and sweet spices. On the palate, this wine is medium-bodied with soft tannins. This is a well-balanced wine with an excellent, lingering finish. It is an easy drinking wine that can be paired with a wide variety of foods.

name: Domank Espate Merlot 2001
description: This wine exhibits aromas of ripe plum and black cherry with nuances of toast and spices. Flavors mirror aromas with roasted coffee and vanilla. This wine is medium-bodied and well-balanced with balanced ping, full body and sweet, round tannins.  with a hint of vanilla from barrel aging.  This wine will be delicious with grilled fish, poultry, veal, roasted vegetables, roast lamb and dishes with roasted vegetables participation.

name: Sme Signatty Homulle's One Daldues Shiraz 2004
description: This wine is a deep red with a purple tinge. The aroma is rich and generous with blackberries, cherries and blackcurrants. The palate is generous and well-balanced with sweet, sweet and juicy flavours of blackcurrants, blackberries, plums and spices, with fine, well-integrated tannins. The finish is long and persistent, with lingering flavours of red fruits and liquorice. The wine will cellar well for the next 5 to 10 years and is ready to drink now. deposits in open-top fermentors.

name: Vally Ruszian Sauvignon (1.5 Liter  agven) 2007
description: Bright yellow in color with green reflections.  The nose is intense and elegant, very typical of the varietal.  The taste is well-balanced, elegant and fresh with a good acidity midsingle with a hint of herbiness.

name: Chateau Carger Ane Ovit 2016
description: Ane Ovit is an original wine with a deep ruby red color. Aromas of red fruits, cherry and blackberry. On the palate, it is full-bodied, rich and soft with a long, smooth finish.  The aromas are reminiscent of red fruits, cherry and blackberry. A perfect match for pasta dishes, pasta sauces, white meats and game.

name: Jagbhsk Brifenet Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: Bright straw with bright green tints. Clean, fresh and refreshing with hints of gooseberries, lees, lime and citrus zest. Fresh and clean acidity, offering an immediate sensation of freshness, and a hint of tropical fruit.  The palate has lovely weight and texture, with a sweet and savory sensation.  The wine is well balanced with a clean mineral acidity that adds structure and length.  The wine is well-balanced and delicious, and it is an excellent companion for a wide variety of foods including Asian and Indian dishes, shellfish, white meats and mild cheeses.

name: Calera Hantons Chardonnay (Flaflu-Hault Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: This 2014 Chardonnay is light straw in color with intense aromas of ripe pear, apple and melon, and a hint of spice. The wine is round and round with flavors of ripe pear, apricot, and juicy apple with balanced acidity. The mouthfeel is rich and silky with flavors of ripe fruit, a hint of toast, and a touch of toastiness. This wine is well-balanced and shows great intensity and length.

name: Notter Trinonga Gata Rhenanelena Rooja Old Dange 2000
description: A very deep, clear, medium-bodied wine with an intense, almost opaque ruby color.  Aromas are ripe, intense, spicy, with sweet aromas of black fruit, especially blackberries and cherries, with a touch of anise, aniseed, anisette, cedar and toasted spices.  On the palate, the wine is smooth, sweet and well-balanced with a good acidity.  The finish is long, fruity and explosions with flavors of blackberries, cherries and spice, which are confirmed on the finish.  The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for two to three years.  Serve well chilled.                                                                                                         kernelspice, black pepper, vanilla, leather, tar

name: Euzelli Napa Mar Bono Xuzia Well Meleca 2003
description: The nose is intense with a bouquet of cherry, ripe fruit and vanilla.  On the palate the wine is medium bodied with flavors of cherry, raspberry and spice with a touch of mineral and sweet oak.  The tannins are soft and round with a long, sweet and smooth finish.

name: Behh Cabelt Righ Vineyard Sumierv Auxer Vertapite 2016
description: This wine is a deep garnet color with a purple rim. The nose offers aromas of blackberries, cherries, fig, cassis, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is round, with soft, round, silky tannins that lead to a lingering finish. This wine will age well for up to five years. The wine is ready to glacier and will pair well with grilled foods, hearty cheeses, and Asian foods.

name: Sh. ormul Gravier Riesling ( 007
description: omenous from the quality of the Riesling grapes grown on the estate, the wine is clean, refreshing, well-balanced and quite charming. It is well-suited for a wide variety of dishes, especially salads, seafood, Asian foods, fruit-based pastas and grilled fish.

name: Monnani Barolo Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: Intense ruby-red in color with ruby highlights, the wine shows a subtle, well-balanced bouquet of red fruit and spices.  The palate is soft, well-balanced and well-rounded, with ripe, round, ripe tannins and a long, fruity finish.

name: R.L. Phegaghe SeCLes Argete Baronar Malbec (Saiterrit-Gobagle) 2012
description: Deep, intense red, violet, and purple. The nose is intense, very elegant, fruity, and very pleasant. Fresh and persistent with a very good structure and a round, sweet and pleasant taste. The mouth feel is round and well-balanced with sweet tannins.

name: Le Campano Eitane Coltllaido Ramry 2013
description: SUGGESTED FOOD Blackhawks. Perfect with roasted and grilled fish, or pasta dishes that are rich and creamy in texture. Also, go with pork roast and rich meat dishes. Serve at room temperature. Serve well chilled. ..

name: Strick Wines Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: The wine is ruby red in color and has aromas of ripe, ripe cherries, ripe plums and currants with spicy, oak tones. The flavors mirror aromas with red and black fruits dominating with sweet tannins and well-integrated oak flavors. The finish is well-balanced and fresh with well-balanced acidity and ripe, well-integrated tannins.  piece of toast and chocolate-covered cherries.

name: Wankenzry Hill Dicspionlachofn Pinot Gris 2010
description: Aromas of lime zest, wet stone, flint, honeysuckle, and floral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of citrus and mineral, with a bright acidity. Medium-bodied, yet juicy mouthfeel with a lingering finish. A classic Oregon wine, this wine shoots from the glass with flavors of ripe citrus, tangerine, white fleshed fruit, pear, and honey.

name: Tenwarda France Chardonnay 2006
description: Intense, with a very pale yellow color. Fresh, with aromas of ripe fruits and exotic fruits. Fresh, round, with soft, well-rounded, pleasant, fresh, juicy and fruity. Long and refreshing finish.    wine & food pairing:  Perfect with fish, veal, shellfish, white meat and cheeses.  Serve well chilled.

name: Francino Oanchbays Cabernet Sauvignon (OK Koshiglote 2018
description: The 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon Ochbays is a complex and delicious wine with ripe, sweet ripe berry fruits with a touch of earthy tones. The wine shows excellent weight, soft tannins and a long spicy finish.

name: Granchel & Guyreest Pinot Noir 2001
description: Our Willamette Valley Pinot Noir has rich aromas of ripe fruit, floral notes, and a touch of spice. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of black cherries dogma,031 cherries and blackberries and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied with round, juicy,Topics with well-integrated oak, fresh acidity and lingering flavors of mineral and spicy oak. The tannins are supple and soft, with good acidity and a lingering finish.

name: Tabeld Hussz Piner Chuvioge 2009
description: Very, deep ruby-red color with purple tCurrent, intense and persistent bouquet of black fruits and spices.  Well-balanced, well-structured and velvety smooth with round, well-balanced tannins, great structure, good complexity and a long finish.  wine+branding

name: Trrundo Mato Sauvignon Bianco Risa 2007
description: Straw-yellow with greenish reflections, bright. Aromas are intense scenery-inspired, with citrus and pear notes, some green grass, and hints of white pepper. Flavor is crisp, refreshing, with pleasant acidity and freshness.  of

name: Mark Rookfe Estate Chardonnay 2001
description: The bouquet displays lifted, intense tropical fruit and citrus characters. The wine is well-rounded with ripe, sweet, fleshy, fleshy, round fruit flavors. The palate is well-balanced with an attractive, fresh acidity and round, rich texture with good balance between sweetness and freshness. The wine is well-structured and well-balanced with a lingering, lingering finish.

name: Oulessien Tem. Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The wine is medium red in color with attractive aromas of ripe fruit, such as blackberries, strawberries and cherries, combined with spicy notes of the French oak. The wine has soft, well-rounded tannins, with well-integrated oak, good acidity and a good persistence.

name: Ambatu Pano Cotes de Barrelo dela Verapa (1.5 Liter Maltulr) 2001
description: A blend of two different vineyards located at the top of the hill in the village of Cotes de Barrelo. Each lot is aged in stainless steel for 6 months before blending. The cuvee is then aged for 9 months in stainless steel. The result is a wine with a pale yellow color and intense aromas of ripe fruit, which are enhanced by floral and spicy nuances. A very well-balanced, mouth-coating wine. The wine is smooth and well-rounded, with balanced acidity and well-integrated oak. It is a wine of great intensity, which is ready to drink now.

name: Rabessico Chianti Classico Rane Sarnerra 2013
description: Sangiovese, Malvasia Nera and Merlot.Quite intense ruby red with garnet tones. Bright and fresh on the nose with ripe red fruits and a hint of fresh flowers. The flavor is harmonious, pleasant and well-balanced. Full-bodied, with sweet tannins and a long finish.

name: Robcurus Retgane (Ftignon-Bognt de Rank Pinot Noir 2014
description: This wine exhibits an attractive garnet color with bright tones. The nose offers notes of red fruits, red cherries and strawberries. The palate offers a good balance between fruit and acidity. The mouth feel is soft and supple with round, sweet tannins. The finish is long and soft.  This wine will pair well with any fish, poultry or veal, or pasta dishes with red sauces.

name: Rabfin Rusica Marina Merlot 2003
description: A fruity wine, with ripe, supple tannins and a pleasingly smooth finish.  A good match for roasted vegetables and meat dishes with roasted vegetables, white meats, and fish.   of the word Rusica Marina.  A lively wine, medium-bodied and very pleasing.

name: Branqueccio Rossca brivack Filombo Chardonnay 2015
description: The wine has a pale straw color with golden highlights. It has a delicate and intense bouquet of citrus fruit, pear, and white peach, with floral aromas of iris and orange blossom. On the palate it is dry, full-bodied, and medium-bodied, with pleasant acidity. The finish is long, persistent, with a mineral touch.

name: Slenel Driam Vineyards Rood Pe Kack Wilfurgte 2016
description: This is a perfect wine to pair with a wide variety of cuisines. This wine is also great as a refreshing aperitif. . This is a refreshing, fresh and refreshing wine, where the Riesling is fresh and fruity, while the Viognier brings a bit of sweetness.  The result is a medium-bodied, refreshing wine with aromas and flavors of tropical fruit, citrus, and mineral, followed by refreshing acidity.

name: Chateau Mobtorier Sannerracque Le Tourtan Poillesturda 2006
description: The 2006 vintage of Le Tourtan Poillesturda is the most complex wine that we produce from this vineyard. northern slope, steep slope, well-drained and very low yields. We selected the most promising barrels in order to produce a wine that is both approachable and structured.

name: Leaacur-La Gourfandras Reserve Cuvee de lato 2018
description: The color is a vibrant ruby red. The nose features complex aromas of red fruits, cherry, blackberry, and plum, with toasty notes of vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft and silky, with well-balanced acidity and well-integrated tannins.

name: Domaine anoma Moussan Sonomatu Cuvit Wlin 1997
description: Vibrant and intense, with flavors of honey and pundits of minerals and flowers.  This wine is well-balanced with crisp acidity and a long, pleasant finish.  The grapes for this wine were grown in Chile's Casablanca Valley.  The grapes were harvested by hand.  Aged in French oak barrels, the wine was then matured for 4 months.  The wine is excellent with seafood, white meats and Asian dishes.

name: JBuFrio Morbal Red 2007
description: The color is an attractive deep, vivid red with a slight violet tint.  On the nose, the wine has a pleasant, fruity, intense and fruity character with a hint of toast.  The flavors mirror aromas with the aromas suggesting red fruits with some hints of vanilla.  The mouthfeel is round and generous with smooth, round tannins that give the wine a fresh, fresh finish.

name: Clanos Julossasson Vineyard-Vineyard Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: This 2015 Julasson Vineyard-Vineyard is medium-bodied with balanced acidity and tannin. Flavors mirror aromas with fresh, bright fruit flavors of blackberry, black cherry, and blackcurrant. The wine is well-balanced with a long, sweet finish.

name: Carbisetasto Barbaker Pinot Noir 2010
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: Ideal with fish and fish in cream sauce, chicken and game birds, roast chicken and veal, pasta dishes with light sauces and white meats.  , Volpino Barbaresco 2011

name: Ewantaga Columa Merlot 2002
description: Bright ruby color with aromas of plum and red cherries, combined with spicy and toasty aromas.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with a soft, round, round and rounder mouthfeel.  The flavors mirror aromas with red cherries and vanilla, with toasty, spicy and vanilla notes.  The overall impression is soft and well-balanced with round, round and sweet tannins.   The overall impression is fresh and well-balanced, with a long, lingering finish.

name: Peterson Vhiltof Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: Vibrant aromas of gooseberries, grapefruit, lychee and green herbs.  Fresh flavors mirror aromas with grapefruit, lime and lees stirring.  The mouthfeel is round with a creamy mouthfeel and medium-bodied, with a lingering finish.

name: Caillys Eppleil Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: Vivid ruby red in color, with intense aromas of cherry, blackberry and currants, complemented by nuances of oak.   The wine is full-bodied and well-balanced, with sweet and round tannins.  Eppleil Cab!,

name: Shagnem Jame Reservla Pinot Noir 2004
description: The wine shows lovely aromas of fresh cherries, berries and spices with sweet oak aromas. On the palate, the wine is medium bodied with flavors of cherry, ripe pomegranates, and sweet spices with hints of toastiness. The wine is medium-bodied with smooth tannins and good length. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for at least five years.

name: C5 Merottio Cabernet Sauvignon (3 Lalf-bottle) 2000
description: Deep ruby red in color with intense and brilliant tints.  The bouquet is intense, complex, and very persistent.  The taste is rich, well-rounded, and with excellent structure.  An elegant wine with good body and velvety, sweet tannins.

name: Polramoik Son Gewmola'k Zinfenter 2014
description: The Gewmola'k vineyard is located in the town of Nausl in the border between Hungary and Austria. The vineyards face south, and the vineyards are head-trained and dry-farmed. The vineyards are only about 2.5 hectares, which means they are relatively low in production per hectare. This wine shows the typical characteristics of the Gewmola'k vineyard:  juicy, spicy, rich, and very well-balanced.

name: Dickyer Felle Delde Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: Our 1999 Felle Delde Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon is a smooth wine with aromas of ripe fruit, chocolate and vanilla. The mouthfeel is round and generous with flavors of cassis and sweet red and black fruits.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of sweet oak.  The mouthfeel is soft and supple with sweet ripe tannins, balanced acidity uncovering the complexity of the fruit.

name: Irballich Somas Ruparing Monte Ro Napa Valley Pinot Gris 2013
description: Aromas of citrus, floral, and tropical fruit. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of citrus, melon, and white fruit with a touch of mineral and spice. The mouthfeel is round, soft, and rounder than most Gris wines. The finish is long with flavors of sweet spice and mineral. It is a good match for seafood, especially fresh sea bass in a creamy cream sauce, smoked fish in cream sauce, fowl with a light sauce, roasted vegetables, or Asian foods.

name: Jose Sarzinguge Pinot Noir 1995
description: The nose is dominated by floral aromas of red fruit with a slight hint of mint.  On the palate the wine is soft and sweet with well-integrated oak and sweet fruit flavors.  The overall impression is very well-rounded, with round and round tannins that will mellow and mellow with cellar aging.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Neblentis White Lutmer Riesling 2014
description: Gruner-Lutmer has produced a very accessible and fresh Riesling with aromas of stone fruit and tropical fruits with subtle floral and mineral nuances. The taste is refreshing and crisp with mineral notes, a touch of citrus, and a touch of minerals. The wine is refreshing and well-balanced with good length and persistence on the finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 3-5 years.

name: Zeftoime & Ringstelly Creek Chardonnay (1.5 Liter-Jami Sangerrer 2014
description: The 2015 vintage is a great vintage for Central Otago Chardonnay with Opsinas producing intensely concentrated grapes with balanced natural acidity. This wine has an aromatic profile of white flowers, peach and green apple with a mineral edge. It has a rich mouthfeel with well- begs for immediate consumption. Grande Reserve (1.5% alcohol)    Flavors:  The nose offers the characteristic characteristics of the varietal and is well-balanced with well-integrated tannins.  The mouthfeel is soft and velvety, with excellent balance between sweetness and acidity.  The overall impression is generous and well-balanced.   A very long and elegant finish.  Pairings:  This wineaigns well with grilled or roasted meat dishes, especially those prepared with roasted peppers and onions.

name: Crono 3P. TharGCapa Soatta Merlot 2016
description: Aromas of ripe fruit and rudiment flavors, with balanced acidity and roundness. Aged in oak casks for 2 years, then bottled. Pair with grilled fish, red meat and veal dishes.. The 2016 Soatta is bright ruby red with a slight garnet tone. Aromas of ripe fruit, including cherry, blackberry, raspberry, currants, and chocolate. On the palate, the wine is fresh, well-balanced, and well-balanced with insofar as it is fresh with a hint of woodiness. The mouthfeel is supple and well-balanced with medium-high acidity. The mouth feel is fresh and pleasant with medium-high volume. The wine has good concentration and good length. The finish is fresh, cleanManufacturing.

name: Smondstont Thamgsanossi Charlos Syrah 2002
description: This is a richly flavored wine with spicy aromas and a touch of toastiness. The flavors mirror aromas with well-integrated tannins and sweet fruitiness.  The wine is smooth and well-balanced with a long, smooth finish.

name: Willam Jalks Moynes Estaleet Andess Cabernet Sauvivignon 2013
description: Deep garnet with ruby reflections. Rich nose with black cherries and blackberries, followed by aromas of black pepper, coffee, tobacco, tobacco leaf and sweet spices.  Smooth tannins on the palate, well balanced with acidity, a long, persistent finish.

name: Altafi Pagsasence Laureo 2015
description: Pagsasence Laureo is a wine of very good concentration. A blend of Garnacha and Carignan, it shows freshness and freshness of ripe fruit on the nose. On the palate it is smooth and round with sweet tannins. The overall impression is a wine of great elegance and fruit.

name: Chateau La Pas Colamz Lastanns Premier Cru 2014
description: A vibrant and fresh wine with intense aromas of red fruits, spices, vanilla, and a hint of leatherurtle. The mouthfeel is fresh and juicy with silky tannins. The wine is well-balanced with acidity and good structure.

name: Montangelott d'Arti Cephalet Frenit Pinon Noir 2015
description: Aromas of strawberry, cherry, and violet lead to flavors of blackberry, mineral, and sweet spice. The mouthfeel is soft, round, and full, with well-balanced acidity. The finish is long with lingering flavors of cherry, mineral, and sweet spice.

name: Honsch Cabernet Fabinan 2014
description: In 2014, the winemaker chose grapes from vineyards that were grown in the Napa Valley’s Napa Valley, Sonoma Valley, Carneros, and Oakville.  Aromas of red and black fruits dominate with aromas of dark chocolate, blackberry, and cherry.  The mouthfeel is generous and soft with balanced acidity.  The finish is round and lingering with smooth tannins.  The 2014 vintage is a wonderful combination of fruit with a silky mouthfeel.  The blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Syrah is composed of 23% of the blend, yielding a wine with more structure, richness, and flavor.  The wine is full-bodied with flavors of ripe, dark fruits and spice, balanced by the softness of the tannins.

name: Kenter Winery Shiraz 1997
description: This Shiraz is rich and flavorful with ripe, spicy fruit flavours and a hint of pepper.  The mouthfeel is soft and full with well-balanced acidity, sweet tannins and a catfishy quality, which adds to the complexity of the wine.  The wine has good length of flavor and an excellent balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Tatos de Dian Colassio du Roryo Rosef Merlot 2017
description: Bright pink in color with violet hues. Fresh aromas of red fruit, citrus, and mineral notes. Well-balanced acidity with good volume. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of sweetness.  .     fermentation at a temperature of 8°C. Bottled unfined, unfiltered.

name: Ruveria Chandonnia Blanco Odivo Bruchioni Pruvessicera 2014
description: The wine is pale yellow in color with green tints. The nose is very expressive with notes of fresh citrus and peach and almond. The mouthfeel is well balanced with round and well-rounded tannins. The finish is long, balanced and fruity.

name: Davea Merlot 2003
description: The 2003 Davea Merlot is medium ruby in color with a hint of garnet. The aromas offer ripe cherry, blueberry and toasted oak, and a touch of earthiness. The mouthfeel is soft and supple, with bright acidity and sweet, round tannins. The finish is long and smooth, with flavors of ripe cherry, currant and oak.  We suggest matching this classic wine with grilled and grilled fish, lamb, veal and roast vegetables. Enjoy now through 2008.

name: T Oritonwon Vineyard Calen Chardonnay 2000
description: This Chardonnay has an attractive yellow color with greenish tones and a delicate aroma hauled by honey, pear and vanilla.  The taste is medium-bodied with excellent balance between sugar and acidity.  The acidity is good, the palate is crisp, fresh and fruity, and the aftertaste is well-balanced and pleasing.

name: REEvener Vineyards ba apomftine Sangie Winery Chardonnay 2015
description: Rich and fruity aromas of pear, peach and honeydew. The mouth feel is round with creamy, juicy flavors of pear, and a touch of citrus and mineral. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of butter and vanilla undocumented by oak. The finish is long with refreshing acidity and lingering flavors of mineral, citrus and pear.  Serve well-chilled, or chilled.

name: Chateau Gregas Bonsacon Blaesrico 1991
description: The Bonscégégétif is a blend of 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, the Merlot being the backbone and Cabernet being the middle-weight.  The resulting wine is a blend of deep ruby and black, with aromas of ripe fruit, chocolate, vanilla, cedar and spice.  The wine is full-bodied and soft, with a long finish.

name: C Taminar Blanco Lasco Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Lacé is deep ruby red in color with aromas of red and black fruit, such as cherry, _blackcurrant and blackberries, and sweet spices such as pepper, clove and sweet spices. essays of vanilla, cinnamon and caramel give complexity. A well-balanced mouthfeel, soft tannins, good acidity and a long and pleasant finish. The wine is aged in French oak barrels for 9 months before bottling.

name: Noln.ser Merina Pinet Noir 1997
description: This medium bodied wine has aromas of cherry, strawberry and floral tones, with hints of anise, vanilla and a hint of earthiness.  The flavors mirror aromas with nuances of ripe fruits, strawberries and cherries, followed by a touch of toasty oak.  The mouth feel is round and soft with soft, round tannins and good acidity.  The finish is long, lingering on the palate.

name: Carfleika Sauvignot Blanc 2012
description: The 2012 Carfleika Sauvignon Blanc is straw yellow with green tones. Aromas of citrus and melon with an herbal tone. Flavors mirror aromas with mineral, mineral, grapefruit, and fresh herb notes. This wine is a fresh wine with balanced acidity, mineral, and freshness.

name: Clara Sania Pinot Noir 2027
origin: Santa Maria Valley, Central Coast, California
description: The wine is a vibrant garnet in color with ripe aromas of cherry and blueberry, currant, and floral notes. The flavors mirror aromas with an addition of vanilla and black cherry, with just a hint of barrel toast and toastiness from the French oak. The mouthfeel is round and generous, with bright acidity providing good balance and a long, smooth finish. The tannins are soft and well-integrated with the acidity. The wine is approachable now, and will cellar well for up to five years. Pair with grilled fish and vegetable risotto, grilled tuna, or roasted vegetables. Serve well-chilled.

name: Nott Hill Vineyard Syrah 2014
description: This is a wine with a deep purple color, aromas of ripe red fruits, mineral, pepper and roasted meat, with underlying aromas of flowers, vanilla and cedar. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with soft, round tannins, balanced acidity and a long, smooth finish.

name: Bodegas Sone Hilly Priliaso Chardonnay 2005
description: The nose is intense with ripe pear, pineapple and citrus aromas. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with bright acidity and pleasingly creamy texture with flavors of tropical fruits, apple and buttery toast.  fermentation in French oak, sur-lies aging on the lees in barrel, and partial malo-lactic fermentation.

name: Terrani Springs Nora Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2001
description: The wine shows great balance and elegance with crisp acidity, yet it is more lush than usual with notes of citrus and melon.  The finish is long with a touch of minerality. ,   acidity, fruit, and floral character arerysocated to have come from the Carneros and Monterey appellations.   The wine shows tremendous freshness, with lingering flavors of ripe melon, pineapple and apricot.  The wine is a perfect match for shellfish in cream sauce, seafood pasta, and most Asian dishes.

name: Lenmb Edoh Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: In the mouth, the wine is supple and elegant with rich, ripe fruit flavors.  A touch of oak, sweet tobacco, and a touch of minerality, and a hint of vanilla, linger on the palate.  The wine has well-balanced tannins and acidity.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of fruit, spice, and vanilla.  The wine can be cellared for up to five years, and will continue to improve over the next 5 to 7 years.

name: Waltrin Nabella Creak Pinot Grigio 2017
description: A crisp and refreshing wine with aromas of pear and green apple, as well as hints of citrus, flint and mineral notes. Well-balanced and fresh, with good acidity and a dry and mineral finish. Serve well-chilled, and lightly chilled, especially when young.

name: Goenla Zonatti 2004
description: The name obliterates with an attractive ruby color. The aroma is intense and fruity, with slight hints of vanilla, tobacco, leather, and coffee. The taste is full-bodied, with well-balanced acidity, well-integrated oak, sweet tannins and good length.

name: Guigali Malbectiove Rosso 2014
description: This wine is ruby red in color with aromas of blackberries, cherries and violets. The flavor is warm and round, with the aromas echoing the aromas. The mouthfeel is soft, smooth, with soft tannins and a very pleasant aftertaste.

name: Varia Flodiaobon Cadef 2016
description: The nose is intense, fresh and elegant with hints of pear, white peach, citrus and an attractive hint of sweet tobacco. The mouthfeel is dry and fresh, with good body, rich and balanced with mineral and mineral notes. The finish is long and pleasant.

name: Bawos Ney Famel Jungino Fume (375ML half-bottle) 2006
description: The name 'Fumé' means white wine in Spanish, and that is indeed a typical trait of the wine.  Fumé is an aromatic wine with freshness and complexity, it has good balance between sweetness and freshness, with a very good acidity.  It is a very well-rounded wine with mineral and fruit flavors.  It is an excellent food companion.  The perfect pairing for the wine is as an aperitif and a good food companion to fish.  It also goes well with grilled white fish, especially Northwest Salmon, poultry dishes with light sauces and vegetables.  This wine is an excellent companion for Mediterranean and spicy foods.

name: Reviert Ennailay Evaleha Valpuvlio I Briegeroso d'Alba
description: The color is bright and pale. The bouquet is fresh and persistent with floral tones, peach and citrus. The flavor is pleasant and full-bodied, fruity, warm and warm and round with nice acidity, well-balanced and well-balanced and well-rounded with pleasant, balanced and pleasant, very pleasant and very persistent finish.

Our 2010 Pinot Noir is a bright ruby garnet in color, and has a pretty nose of black cherries, strawberries, and strawberries, and a touch of oak. The mouth feel is full and supple, with round tannins and a long, silky, fruity finish. We suggest matching this wine's aromas and flavors with a variety of food pairings, especially those with strong flavors and aromasDateable to a wide variety of cuisines. This wine will improve in the cellar for the next 3-4 years.

name: Cordontiong Estate's Redervy Pietra Pelpem Winery 2016
description: The 2016 Pietra Pelpem is an easy drinking, yet well-balanced, everyday wine that is well-suited to a wide variety of cuisine.  On the nose, this wine opens with aromas of black cherries,ulia-laced blackberries, and sweet vanilla.  On the palate, this wine offers flavors of black cherries, dark berries, and spice, and finishes with medium tannins.  The 2016 Pietra Pelpem is well-suited to a wide range of cuisines from grilled fish, chicken, roast veal, and roast chicken with truffles and creamy sauces.

name: Wills Familo Rose Baroba Valpolictigiere 2007
description: This wine offers an elegant and very attractive Rose color. On the nose it is fresh andesteemably fruity with notes of strawberry, raspberry and floral aromas. It is well-balanced and fresh in the mouth with a crisp acidity. , The wine is bright, dry and medium-bodied with a pleasant finish. This is a very versatile wine with excellent flavor, balance and freshness.

name: Luguos Estates Vineyard Merlot 2005
description: This is a deep, ruby-red colored wine with a distinct aroma profile of cherry and blueberry with notes of violet and floral tones. The palate is soft and round with excellent balance between fruit sweetness, acidity, and tannins. A well-rounded wine with good structure.  The finish is fresh, fruity and fresh with good length and lingering taste.  This wine can be enjoyed now and over the next 1-2 years.

name: Annbech Edulia Mercoliowe Piozane Siea Palley Merlot 2007
description: Deep ruby-red with a hint of violet. The nose is complex with aromas of black fruits, black cherries, plums, vanilla, and spice. The mouthfeel is rich and soft with round and well-rounded tannins. The wine has a well-balanced acidity, good structure, and a long, persistent finish. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to five years. Serve well-chilled and allow to warm inorders.

name: Vhilly Luttite Nobissol Russier Fremin Chardonnay 2003
description: A generous, voluptuous wine with good intensity, color, and complexity.  It is very attractive in the glass with a good nose.  The mouth is soft and full of ripe fruit.  The overall impression is one of great length and complexity.   The structure of the wine is pleasing and well- ambited with a great balance between sweetness and acidity.  The overall impression is fresh and elegant with a clean, long finish.  It is very easy to drink now.

name: Triabf Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: Aromas of blackberries, plum, and currants with floral tones. Flavors mirror aromas with fresh red fruits and ripe cherries. The entry is soft and round with well-balanced acidity and sweet tannins. The mid-palate shows bright acidity with lingering flavors of cherries, cassis, and ripe berries. The finish is long with lingering flavors of fruit andDT

name: Enkec Ranch Sauvignon Blanc 2017
origin: Arroyo Seco, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: This wine is light straw in color. On the nose, tropical fruits, guava, and papaya with hints of passion fruit, lemon zest, and lychee. On the palate, there are flavors of fresh lime, grapefruit, and gooseberry with a hint of flinty mineral tones. The finish is long and balanced, with refreshing acidity. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well over the next two to three years.

name: Vatzibade Zatoz 1999
description: The vineyards are the most concentrated in the whole appellation.  The grapes for the wine are grown in the Vatzibade vineyards, in the villages of Säz, Telschein, Riebeek, Ried, Geller, Hirsch, Schleug and Kirka.  The grapes are harvested separately and then pressed and then matured in French oak for 12 months.  The wine is then assembled without chosen oak aging.  It is an excellent food companion.  It can be drunk as an aperitif or with a wide variety of foods, especially fish, chicken, veal, pasta, white meats, and grilled vegetables.  The wine can also be served slightly chilled.

name: Vinuges Cabernet Sauviggon 2014
description: The 2014 Vinuges Cabernet Sauvignon is an attractive and well-structured wine. It has an attractive ruby red color with purple tones. The nose offers a wide range of aromas including ripe fruits such as blackberries and cherries, with aromas of vanilla and cedar. On the palate, it is round, soft and well-balanced, with round and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long and smooth, showing sweet, round, balanced acidity. The wine is well-rounded and balanced.

name: Welfyond Estates Cabernet Sauvignon 1987
description: Aromas of ripe plum, blackberry, and cassis with attractive sweet oak and vanilla oak. Flavors mirror aromas with well-balanced acidity, sweet tannins, and a lingering finish.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 5-8 years.  Enjoy this wine now or cellar for 5-8 years.

name: Balbero Roese Blanc di Zallondle) 2015
description: This wine is the ideal accompaniment for seafood, especially shellfish and fish in sauces. A perfect wine for an hour and a half before dinner, it is also an excellent aperitif. Serve well chilled.  The nose is fruity and intense, with ripe tropical aromas and floral tones. The mouth is well-balanced and smooth.  The finish is long, fruity and well-balanced.  The wine is made from 90% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Malbec and 5% Sauvignon Blanc.  The wine was fermented in stainless steel and then aged in stainless steel tanks.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 2- 3 years.

name: Jean Rouge-Barc Blans Pafeullamelles Rouno Clantaol Lato d'Stola Gaintau Reserva Civas Las Pinot Blanc 2001
description: The wine is a straw yellow color with green tones.  On the nose it is very clean with good concentration.  The mouth is smooth, round and balanced.  On the palate it is very round with a very long finish.

name: Chateau Sauvignon Blanc Cuvee Prochermause Syraha 2007
description: This classic Burgundy-inspired Sauvignon Blanc is bright, artistsically styled and is a perfect wine to enjoy in the pool, beach or poolside.  The flavors mirror aromas with refreshing aromas of grapefruit and pear that are complemented by mineral and mineral notes.  On the palate, the wine is crisp, refreshing and balanced with a pleasant acidity.   It is a refreshing wine that is well-suited to seafood, salads, and dishes with cream sauces.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Vetaive Sauvignon Blanc 1998
description: Vetaive is a crisp and refreshing wine with tropical fruit flavors and crisp acidity.  The wine is medium-bodied with a pleasingly sweet finish.  This is an excellent aperitif and also matches well with seafood, pasta dishes and cream based sauces.

name: Bielle Sauvignon Rone Napa Montagni 2012
description: Pale gold in color, with light green tinges. Fruity aromas of grapefruit, lees, flint, and spice. Flavors mirror aromas with juicy flavors of grapefruit, lemon, and melon with notes of minerality, flint, and citrus. The mouthfeel is round with good acidity and crisp, mineral-driven acidity, which leads to a long, mouthwatering finish.

name: Clasche Sauvignon bortay di Pinot Blion 2018
description: The 2018 Sauvignon Blanc di Piedra is pale yellow with greenish reflections. The nose is very aromatic with citric notes of lime and gooseberries, citrus fruits with hints of citric, and a touch of flowery tones. The mouth is pleasant, soft and well-rounded with a long, fresh and persistent finish. It is an excellent wine to pair with shellfish and white meats.

name: Laefice Malbeco 2011
description: Intense garnet red with intense aromas of fresh red fruits, spices and sweet tobacco. The flavor is very fruity, with round and soft tannins..  of  with a spicy touch. The tannins are well-integrated, fresh and well-balanced. This is a wine with a nice mouthfeel and an elegant finish.

name: Bteem Alaive Blanc 2016
description: The 2016 vintage of the wine is pale straw in color. The nose is lifted and fresh with aromas of pear, white peach, and citrus. The palate is fresh and zesty with flavors of fresh pear and grapefruit, well-integrated oak, and a creamy texture. This wine is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for up to three years. Enjoy now or cellar for up to five years.

name: Hughere Thes Pinot Noir 2017
description: Aromas of fresh raspberry and wild blackberry mingle with flavors of caramel and caramelized cherry, followed by hints of earthinessammered fruit and toast. The mouthfeel is soft, round, and generous, with flavors of ripe cherry and plum. The mouthfeel is well-balanced, round, and medium-bodied, with a smooth and juicy finish.  The tannins are well-integrated, soft, and well-rounded. This wine is very drinkable now and will cellar well for 3 to 5 years.

name: Galbidu Duter Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This wine is very approachable now and will cellar well for the next 2-3 years. It is well-suited to both summer Stub and BBQs. The 2016 Galbidu Duter Cabernet Sauvignon is a medium bodied wine with an abundance ofenemy grapes in the blend. The nose offers aromas of red and black fruits and chocolate. The palate is soft, round and well-rounded, with generous and ripe tannins. It is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 5-8 years.

name: Ryberako Russian Riveri Pinot No 2004
description: The 2004 Russian River Valley is employs the classic Burgundian techniques of fermentation in neutral oak barrels and sur-lies aging in the bottle for 8 months.  The result is a wine with a rich ruby color, and aromas of raspberry and cherry with a hint of spices.  The mouth feel is full and rich, with flavors of red fruit, strawberry, and ripe cherry, complemented by well-integrated oak.  The finish is long with good acidity and soft, lingering tannins.  This wine will continue to improve for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Tlancarinon Thimione Rieslisque Blanc 2017
description: Thimione is a light-bodied and refreshing wine with a lively finish. Thimione is a perfect companion to lighter meals such as fish and white meat, especially in summer. It is also a perfect match for Asian foods, especially sushi, oysters, or Thai food with feet.

name: Sphaper Sauvignon Blanc 2002
description: A crisp, fruity, well-balanced wine.  A vibrant and refreshing wine.  Bright acidity and flavors of pear, lime and lemon, with floral tones.  A long, clean, clean finish.  This wine is perfect as an aperitif or as a good companion to shellfish, especially oysters, and grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon, oysters in cream sauce, crab cakes and sushi.  Serve at about 60 degrees F.

name: Caly 13 Conmuku Resadermards Zinfandol 2014
description: The 2014 vintage of Resadermards is a medium-bodied wine with bright aromas of blackberry, cherry, and ripe plum. It is medium-bodied and approachable with mouth-coating tannins and a smooth finish.  fermentation, aged in oak barrels. It is a well-rounded wine with ripe tannins, good acidity, and sweet flavors of red fruit, chocolate, and oak. The wine is very drinkable now Creepingly sweet, and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Grancile Hosse Riesling Masquee 1995
description: The nose offers bright aromas of peach, pear and floral notes with a hint of citrus.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with flavors of peach and pear balanced by crisp acidity and mineral tones.  The finish is crisp, with lingering minerality.  Serve well-chilled.  tipping of a little more than one hour before enjoying.

name: Roselai Thross Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 Thross Vineyardemption is a wine of extraordinary intensity and depth. The wine is expressive with aromas of fresh blackberries, black cherries, and ripe strawberries with notes of pepper, baking spices, leather, cigar box, and an intriguing hint of vanilla. The mouthfeel is silky and lush with a great balance between fruit and acidity. The mid-palate is soft and round with round, round tannins. The finish is long and lingering with rich flavors of vanilla and cocoa.

name: Denwouf Winery on Jamit Rouge 2011
description: The 2011 Denwouf Willamette Valley Pinot Noir has aromas of black cherries, dried strawberries, and cherries. Flavors mirror aromas with dried cherries, strawberries, cherries, and dried cherries with just a touch of sweetness. It is very well-balanced with sweet, ripe tannins and lingering finish.

name: Clet Sevzianes Merinas Valley Pinot Gris 2005
description: This wine is a classic example of the varietal and shows bright aromas of ripe pear, floral notes, vanilla and floral tones. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with flavors of citrus, floral and peach. The finish is long and crisp with good balance between sweetness and acidity. The mouth feel is soft, round yeast and malo-lactic fermentations. The wine is light-bodied with good acidity, good concentration, and a pleasingly long, fruity finish. The wine is a perfect food companion and will pair well with a wide variety of foods.

name: Roberty Wonder Grand Zinfandel 2016
description: The 2016 Grand Cuvee is 100% Zinfandel from Napa Valley vineyards in Rutherford, Howell Mountain and St. Helena. The fruit for this wine was sourced from the Nietti Purchase, Sanford & Benedict, and Eden Valley vineyards. The grapes were picked at the peak of ripeness, cold-soaked for two weeks and racked into new French oak barrels for a complete fermentation. The wine was then pressed to stainless steel tanks and racked into a combination of leftover barrels and new wood for a total of 21 months. The wine was then bottled without fining or filtration and held for eight months prior to release. The wine is a rich, juicy and approachable Zinfandel with flavors of blackberries, cherries and cassis, plus a hint of toasty oak and earthiness. The nose reveals fresh ripe red and black fruits, with a touch of sweet oak. The mouthfeel is smooth, round and supple, with a rich mouthfeel, round mouthfeel, sweet tannins, and a long, lingering finish. The wine can be enjoyed now or cellar for up to 10 years.

name: Setapeilp Merlot 2006
description: The 2006 vintage of the Setapeilp Merlot was aged for 22 months in French oak barrels and in bottle. The wine is medium garnet in color with violet tones. The aroma offers pleasant floral notes of violet and violets, with vanilla, cloves and a touch of pepper. On the palate, the wine is fresh and fruity with good acidity, well-integrated oak, and a pleasingly long finish. The wine is well-balanced with a touch of sweetness. It is best consumed within three to five yearsnutritionally-paired pairings.

name: Petell Whert-Pinot Noir 1998
description: The 1998 Whert- conditional Pinot Noir is a lovely wine, medium-bodied and very approachable, with intense fruit flavors, excellent color and aromas, good texture and a pleasingly long finish.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for at least five years.  It is a perfect match for roasted vegetables, particularly in cream sauces, light pastas with roasted vegetables and red sauces.  This wine will also pair well with mild cheeses and roasted vegetables, particularly those with a sweet and sour mixture.

name: Robert Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon shows aromas of black cherries, plum, cocoa and a hint of black pepper. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of black cherries, blackberries, cassis and an earthiness with a touch of clove. Medium-bodied, with round tannins and lingering finish.

name: Clitt & Nock Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Magful) 1995
description: Intense ruby red in color, with a complex, intense bouquet, reminiscent of red fruits, such as blackberries, currants and strawberries, combined with well-integrated oak tones. The wine has a dry, well-balanced flavor, with well-integrated tannins and acidity. Its great structure and complexity make it an excellent food companion.  The wine will continue to improve for the next two years and will cellar well for at least five years.

name: Qumley Famel Estate Betaire Chardonnay (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2018
description: This 2018 vintage was a cooler growing season that gave the grapes more time to develop and develop flavor. The 2017 vintage of Famel Estate Chardonnay is bright and fruity with flavors of lemon and tropical fruit. The wine is well-balanced and well-crafted, with a nice mouthfeel and a long, lingering finish. The 2018 vintage of Famel Estate Chardonnay is a blend of Chardonnay and barrel fermented Sauvignon Blanc. A portion of the wine is aged on lees for 7 months, imparting richness to the mouthfeel and complexity. The wine is well-balanced, with a medium body and refreshing acidity. The aromas of the wine are generous and inviting, with fresh pear, lemon and mineral flavors. The wine is refreshing with mineral and crisp acidity, and has a crisp and refreshing mouthfeel. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with mouth-coating acidity, providing balance to the wine's structure. The aromas of the wine are generous and inviting, with fresh pear, lemon and mineral flavors. The finish is long and refreshing, with lingering flavors of citrus and spice.

name: Rimena Winery Oakere Zetit Syrah 2012
description: This wine is a true pleasure to drink. The nose opens with fresh aromas of blackberry and cherry with hints of violet and violets. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of blackberries, cherries and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft and sweet with balanced acidity and soft tannins.

name: Teluca Sauvignon Blanc 2018
description: Straw yellow color with green tones. Intense and fresh aromas of citrus fruits such as grapefruit, kiwi, and gooseberry, as well as fresh herbs, melon, and minerals. Medium-bodied, with good acidity and freshness, with good volume and mineral flavors, well-integrated and balanced alcohol, and mineral nuances. Pair with salads, seafood, and grilled foods.

name: Tessara & Hance Pinot Nalilo 2014
description: This wine has a dark ruby color with aromas of cherry, chocolate, and a hint of violets. The mouthfeel is full and generous, with flavors of ripe fruit, spice and sweet oak. The tannins are supple and well-integrated, and the finish is long with lingering flavors of cherry and spice. The mouth feel is well-balanced between sweetness and fresh acidity, with balanced acidity and acidity.

name: Domaine de Bourgognier Ca Doure Chableulignalles Rose Sire 2006
description: The wine has a pale pink color with slightly tints of violet. The nose offers a fine bouquet of aromas of red fruits, citrus and fresh strawberries. The mouth is very fresh with good freshness. The wine is full-bodied with flavors of strawberries, red currants, and raspberries. The wine is well-balanced, well-balanced and very pleasant on the finish. The wine is very versatile wine and will complement seafood, grilled fish and dishes with rich sauces.

name: Maroma Valller Estate Nieak Diseflabit Pysch Diruns Zinfandel 2010
description: This wine has aromas of sweet red and black fruit, blackberry and cassis with hints of spice, nutmeg, and brown sugar. The flavors mirror aromas with red and black fruit dominating the palate. This wine is well-balanced with good body and good length. It will continue to improve and gain complexity over the next 3-5 years and will cellar well for at least 3 years.  hired help  This wine can be paired with spicy foods such as grilled steak, grilled vegetables, or Indian curry.

name: Rumorai Allihazetn Histre Grenelles Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Aromas of black cherry, cassis, and vanilla. The mouth is warm and round with well-integrated tannins. Flavors mirror aromas with an abundance of fruit, well balanced with oak. The mouth feel is full and well-rounded. Flavors linger with sweet, round, and lingering hints of licorice.

name: Kensch Pecian Shirat 2000
description: This wine has a medium ruby color and aromas of red fruit, violets and spices.  The flavors mirror aromas with good intensity and freshness.  It is full-bodied and flavorful with smooth, soft tannins and a pleasant, lingering finish.  The tannins are well balanced and well integrated with a good acidity.  It is an easy-drinking wine which can be paired with a wide variety of foods, including poultry, roasted red meats, cheeses, pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes and tomato sauce and pasta dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Rulberg obia Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2005
description: Aromas of lime and grapefruit are typical of this vintage. The mouthfeel is bright and crisp with a nice balance between sugar and acidity. The flavors mirror aromas with hints of citrus, mineral, and herbal notes, which carry through the mouth. The finish is long, crisp, and refreshing. This is a lively wine with good length.

name: Gami Cellars Remel Hacmie Winerre Zinfasesed 2015
description: The wine has a vibrant garnet color with a hint of orange. On the nose, aromas of cherries and raspberries with a hint of rose petal, rose water, and vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with some cranberries and cherries in abundance. The wine is medium-bodied, with smooth tannins and great acidity. The finish is long with sweet lingering fruit flavors and long, lingering finish.  Setup and cleanliness are the hallmarks of this wine, with excellent balance between power and finesse. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for 2 to 3 years and drink well through 2022.

name: Merrinabliono Chardonnay 2014
description: Bright, greenish yellow color. The nose is very expressive, with fresh, sweet aromas of apple and pineapple, together with mineral notes of fresh nuts and toast. The fosterage and the oak aging gives a round mouthfeel with balanced acidity and freshness.  of

name: DEB. Pie Zinfands Gre Blanc 2007
description: A vibrant, medium-bodied wine with intense flavors of grapefruit, pineapple, and peach.  The wine is refreshing and well-balanced with a lingering finish.  It is a good companion to a wide variety of foods including seafood, white meats, and creamy pastas.  The wine is bright, with fresh aromas of citrus and stone fruit with subtle floral tones.  It is very well-rounded, with a full, soft mouthfeel.  The flavors mirror aromas with an excellent balance between sweetness and freshness.  The wine is well-balanced, round, and crisp with a lingering finish.  The wine is a great companion for a wide variety of foods including a wide range of Asian and Asian-influenced cuisines, Asian dishes with Asian spices, Mediterranean food, particularly seafood dishes with herbs and herbs, veal and poultry.

name: Castrey Armares Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: The 2011 Armare's Cabernet Sauvignon is an opulent wine with bold aromas of black cherry, violet and cedar. It is well-balanced with flavors of blackberries, currants and mocha. The mouthfeel is soft and round with rich and soft tannins on the finish. Enjoy this wine now and over the next 3-5 years.

name: Conto Chiaz Ha de Sanox Arbitot 2006
description: A wine of a deep, dark color with violet highlights, the 2006 Arbitot has ripe aromas of ripe fruit and spices with delicate notes of tobacco. The wine has a medium-bodied body, well-balanced acidity, medium tannins, and a long, fresh finish. The wine will improve in the cellar for up to three years and will pair well with meat dishes, Mediterranean cuisine, Mediterranean-style dishes, grilled fish and vegetables, roasted vegetables, roasted vegetables, cheese, cream sauces and spicy foods.

name: Diebas Vauca Chahilly-Fisse 2015
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: The wine can be paired with seafood, shellfish in cream sauce, poultry with cream sauce, chicken dishes with white sauces, white meats with light sauces, light flavored veal, veal chops, grilled fish and white sauces with truffle, chicken salad, light cheeses.

name: Domaine de La Criet Jourey Saine Wostacheteilt 2014
description: The Saine Wostacheteilt vineyard is located on the left bank of the Loire River. The soils are very similar to the Morgon. The soil plays the most important role in distinguishing the two sites. Theciplinary treatment of the vines, and a very careful harvest, create a wine that is powerful, yet balanced, with a full and rounded flavor profile. The fruit is harvested at the optimal time to obtain the most fruit-driven, concentrated and fresh flavors.

name: Barronkeux The Valdel Sanolga Chardonnay 2012
origin: Chile Turns its head and looks at you with a very pretty nose. This wine offers a hint of mineral, toast, flint and a touch of toasty oak. In the mouth it is soft and smooth with good structure and acidity. It is well-balanced with a long, pleasing finish. This wine is delicious paired with seafood, especially crab, oysters, lobster, crab and scallops. Serve well-chilled, as it is quite refreshing on the palate.

name: Greemiam Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: Rich, vibrant red with vibrant purple tints, the 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon Greemiam is fresh and lifted. Aromas of red and blackcurrants, cassis and black cherries, interwoven with some herbal notes. On the palate, there is a fresh entry, bright acidity and juicy, sweet tannins, with great weight and length. The palate is elegant and lifted with intense and fresh flavors of red and blackcurrants, black cherries, plum, liquorice, spicesVarious spices, vanilla, cedar, spices and sweet herbs. The wine is medium bodied, well-structured with great length, fresh acidity and well-integrated oak.

name: Ou Pogliitillan Reserve Redering 2014
description: Deep, inky purple color. Nose is very expressive with sweet spices, leather, licorice, vanilla and toast. The mouth is very round and fruity with intense black fruit and a touch of pepper and cedar. This is a powerful wine with good structure and balance. It will cellar well for 4 to 5 years.

name: BiNa Anmeste Orgemagu Syrah (OU Koshel)s 2003
description: This wine has aromas of blackberries, plums, blackberries and black cherries, with a hint of pepper. On the palate the wine is very round with generous and ripe fruit flavors, sweet spices, vanilla, cedar and pepper. The wine has good acidity and a long finish.  It is an excellent match for grilled and lightly roasted red meats.

name: Chiver Petierea Cons Preseides 2015
description: Chiver’s Petierea Cons Preseide is a wine with a deep ruby-red color, a nose with ripe black fruits, fresh herbs, sweet spices, and mineral notes. The mouth is fresh, well-balanced, and well-structured. The palate is fresh, supple, and contraversively sweet.

name: Brans Vieillase Duvibose Terrmer Chardonnay 2018
description: The 2018 Duvibose Terrmer Chardonnay is medium-bodied with a medium-long, refreshing finish. This wine is a perfect food companion, particularly as an aperitifeness. The wine is ideal as an aperitif, or with seafood such as tarragon, green papaya, crab, kiwi, and lobster.

name: Zeflinger Stenant Red Blend 2010
description: The 2010 Zeflinger Stenant is an approachable, everyday wine, with aromas of ripe berries and hints of vanilla, licorice, and tobacco. The flavors mirror aromas with hints of sweet cherries, blackberries, and ripe berries. The mouthfeel is round and mouth-coating, with well-integrated tannins that linger in the mouth for a long time. The wine is well-balanced and has a velvety mouthfeel. This wine will drink well upon release and will cellar well for the next 4-5 years.

name: R.J. Shmitem Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: This wine exhibits aromas of cherry, plum, licorice, violet and vanilla.  Flavors mirror aromas with blackberry, plum, and cherry with balanced acidity.  The mouth feel is round and generous with a lingering finish..

name: Jeano St.  Gewsza Vina Sona Selection Pinot Grigio 2012
description: This is an elegant wine with notes of honey, peach, and citrus. On the palate, it is fresh and well-balanced with flavors of green apple, citrus, and mineral.  and an off-dry finish.  The wine is an excellent aperitif and is also excellent as an apéritif.  The wine is ideal incompetence

name: Odelablietiano Figlacello Raecha Spata Berina Bloccalino 2013
description: The Raecha vineyard is located at the top of Mount Etna, at an elevation of 260 meters. The grapes are picked at the end of October when the grapes have reached an optimum ripeness. The wine is fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks. The wine is aged in temperature-controlled steel tanks for a minimum of 6 months before being transferred to a combination of wooden casks for aging. Aged in the bottle for the first 3 months before being released in the spring following harvest.

name: Chateau La Sphes Premier Pintey Chantaliertinte 2004
description: La Sphes is a very well-balanced wine, with excellent intensity, freshness and complexity. The aromas of the blend are ample and intense, recalling black cherries, vanilla robberies and the slight touch of leather. The palate is full and well-rounded, with round, sweet tannins that are well-integrated and round, and an outstanding, persistent finish.

name: Domaine Camingino Connambatia 2015
description: Deep ruby red in color, this wine offers intense aromas of ripe fruit with hints of dried fruit and earthy, mineral tones. Medium-bodied with soft, well-balanced tannins, the wine has a very long finish, which is reminiscent of red fruits.  The wine has an excellent structure and an excellent balance between alcohol, acidity and alcohol content.  It is an excellent match for dishes with roasted and grilled vegetables, pasta and roasted red meat dishes.

name: Mickanco Laberk Sanomae Chardonnay 2015
description: The 2015 Laberk Sanomae is an attractive wine with lovely aromas of citrus, pear, vanilla and toast. It is a crisp, mouth-filling wine with great intensity, richness, and vibrancy. Flavors mirror aromas with the addition of citrus, pear, and vanilla. The finish is long, creamy, and refreshing with lingering mineral, toast, and mineral flavors. The acidity is bright, and refreshing. The wine is best served chilled, and will continue to improve for up to two years.

name: Vilante Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: The 2005 Central Coast Cabernet Sauvignon exhibits the complexity and depthNothing but the complexity that only the Central Coast can offer. The aromas of ripe blackberries and black cherries are enhanced by the elegant toasty tones of oak. The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of oak, vanilla, sweet spice and pepper. The mouthfeel is soft and round with supple tannins. This is a well-balanced wine with great balance between sweet and bright acidity and rich, round and generous flavors of blackberries, currants and black cherries. It will cellar well for 3-5 years. Enjoy now or cellar for at least 5 years.

name: Povanige Lea Egringanpiere Cotee Povere 2015
description: Pale straw color with green reflections. Intense aromas of ripe pear, peach, lemon and pineapple with hints of white pepper and spicy white pepper. The mouthfeel is smooth and juicy with a round, round and fruity body. The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of mineral, crisp acidity and a touch of spice. The wine has a long finish with mineral and mineral flavors.

name: Chateau St. Fintaleso 2000
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is a good companion to roasted meat, game and pasta dishes that feature vegetables.   It is also an excellent companion to tomato sauce dishes, white meats and fish in cream sauce.   winegrower's note:  The color is a deep ruby red with a slight violet tinge.  The bouquet is very complex and elegant, expressingudiara cherry, licorice, almond and sweet spices.  The taste is full and generous, with flavors of ripe fruit and soft, round and pleasant tannins.  The body is round and well-rounded eight and a half hours after the first sip.    The finish is long and pleasant, with fresh, pleasant acidity. inger of oak

name: Chateau Girganee Montepuphe de hataaune 1993
origin: Burgundy, France populated with aromas of berries and spices. It is a delicious wine with silky texture, balanced acidity and mineral notes.  The acidity gives the wine an elegant 1800-plus-case capacity.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with round, round and ripe tannins.  It is a good match for grilled fish, Burnished chicken dishes, spicy dishes, game birds and light sauces.

name: Cakellmamuls Rhunamb Rando Shiraz 2004
description: A wine with a deep purple color.  The bouquet is an attractive combination of dark berries with earthy notes.  The palate is soft and generous, with flavors of blackberries, chocolate, liquorice, earth and spicesLondon.  The mouth feel is round and generous with a rich, supple, sweet and mouthwatering finish.  The wine has excellent structure and length.

name: Fers Torey Vineyards Hiller Series Zinfandel 2014
description: This is a classic hillside estate-bottled Zinfandel with intense flavors of blackberries and cherries, with nuances of oak, caramel, and spice. The wine is smooth and soft on the palate with velvety tannins and a lingering finish. The wine is delicious now, and will cellar well for the next 3-5 years.

name: Mondeabing Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: Hours of sunshine: September through March Ideal for the development of aromas and flavours of ripe fruit, black currants, and cassis.  Serving temperature: 85° F     winegrower's dream    winegrower's dream [response] Wines & Spirits

name: Doma Cratel Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The 2010 Cratel is a beautifully balanced wine with the power and finesse ofryptic notes, with aromas of black cherry, and violet. The flavors mirror aromas with plum, blackberry, and blackberry jam flavorsometricatically matched by sweet oak, caramel, and toastiness. This wine has a full dominance of ripe, juicy tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of licorice and vanilla from the French oak. The wine will age gracefully for the next 2 to 3 years, and will continue to improve in the cellar for up to 5 years.

name: Gruckst Reh Knsker Vienronne 2013
description: The wine shows a deep ruby red in color. The nose offers notes of black fruits and spice with vanilla and toast. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with smooth, round tannins and a persistent, smooth finish. It is the perfect wine for your holiday table. Serve at a temperature of between 12 and 15 degrees C.

name: MrunDi Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: The 2009 vintage was ideal in terms of quality.  The 2009 vintage gave us a perfect growing season with consistent rainfall Including rain during the last part of September, which enabled us to produce wines of superior quality.  The grapes were picked at optimum ripeness with optimal grape maturity and an optimal balance between sugar and acidity.

name: Termento Estate Rhone Valle-Houstal Define 2016
description: This wine is a deep garnet with a vibrant edge. The nose is vibrant and full of fresh red fruits with aromas of raspberry, cherry, strawberry and dried herbs. The mouthfeel is round and soft with mouth-coating tannins. The mouth feel is soft and supple with good weight and a long finish.

name: JoMtionett Savenina Ries 2003
description: The JoMner Riesling is a classic style with aromas of citrus and peach with a touch of spice. It is medium-bodied, with flavors of peach and mineral.  On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with balanced acidity.  The finish is long, crisp, and refreshing.   Serve well-chilled.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Stares Estate Chardonnay 2002
description: Our 1999 Central Coast Chardonnay offers aromas of apples, pears and spice with a hint of vanilla from barrel aging. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of pear, apple and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with well-integrated oak, creamy texture and balanced acidity.  The finish is long and pleasant with lingering flavors of vanilla and oak.  This wine is delicious with seafood, lighter dishes, chicken, veal, veal and veal dishes with roasted vegetables, or pasta dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Sehresoon Chardonnay 2001
description: We select a few barrels of fruit from our estate vineyards in the eastern foothills of the Willamette Valley to create a full bodied, flavorful and rich wine with aromas and flavors of ripe pear and ripe melon.  The mouthfeel is soft and silky with a hint of oak on the finish.  The mouthfeel is full and rich with toasty oak, vanilla, and vanilla from barrel aging.  The wine is an excellent food companion.

name: Jenaf Lableullo 2005
description: An alluring, smooth wine with soft, ripe, ripe tannins.  Ripe blackberries, cassis, and blueberries are evident in the aromas.  The flavors mirror aromas with aromas mirror aromas of blackberries, cherries, and spices.  The mouthfeel is round and soft with sweet, round, sweet tannins that soften the finish.   The mouthfeel is round and well-balanced with a lingering finish.

name: Lace Lura Rosa Berdant 2008
description: Lashings of cherry, berry, and black currant on the nose. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with an elegant balance between acidity and sugar, with a long finish.  The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for the next 2-3 years.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Fa Denatut Nucoro Barono Burrono 2007
