Well-structured and smooth with soft tannins, good acidity and a long, lingering finish.  A great companion for red meats, game, roast, and medium-aged cheeses.

name: Centone o Piavier Reserde Wisquo Marzanoi 2014
description: Deep ruby red with hints of purple. Fruity nose with intense aromas of ripe fruit, cherries and cherries with hints of violet and anise. Elegant and balanced with pleasingly soft tannins. The overall impression is pleasingly fresh and pleasing.

name: Aesca Barulanja Pinot Gris 2018
description: Pale yellow with greenish reflections. Fresh, fruity and floral on the nose, with delicate floral notes. Fresh and well-balanced, with a pleasant aftertaste.  The wine is easy to drink, well-balanced, very fresh and well-rounded.

name: Sigharii Barano Selettu Zinfandel 2003
description: The color is deep ruby red.  The bouquet is very complex, with aromas of blackberries, cherries, strawberries and raspberries.  The palate is soft and pleasant, with excellent acidity and balanced sweetness, very typical of the varietal.  The finish is soft and pleasant with good, well-integrated tannins.  The wine is best consumed chilled and is an excellent accompaniment to grilled meats, game, cheeses and dishes prepared with tomatoes.  It is also excellent as an aperitif.

name: Hermord Mcar's Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
origin: Napa Valley, California  crystals-clear in color with bright violet hues, the 2015 vintage produced a classic vintage with intensely concentrated fruit aromas of cassis, blackberries, and black cherries, complemented by touches of vanilla and coffee. The aromas follow through to the mouth with ripe flavors of black cherries, blackberries, and sweet plums and balanced acidity, winging the mouth with juicy flavors of cherries and plums and finishing with hints of vanilla, leather, and cedar. The tannins are ripe and supple, which lend a mouthwatering, mouth-coating structure. The overall impression is one of balanced and harmonious blending of fruit with oak. The finish is long and soft with a lingering impression of oak. This wine is a beautiful match for grilled meats and hearty dishes, and will continue to improve for at least another 5 to 10 years.

name: Bellass Santa Pinot Noir 2009
description: The wine is deep garnet in color with bright clarity. The nose is full of ripe red cherries and violets, with delicate spicy oak and spices. The palate is rich and generous with flavours of red cherries, plums, and raspberries. The wine has good balance between the sweet and savory elements, the finish long and smooth with lingering sweet ripe tannins. The wine has a lingering sweetness and soft acidity.

name: Domaine Jano & Joclumin-Barol 2009
description: A red blend of 60% Garnacha and 40% Cariñena. The grapes are harvested by hand and crushed to ensure maximum extraction of flavor. Fermented in stainless steel. The wine is then aged in neutral oak barrels for 12 months, followed by 12 months in bottle before release. The result is a full-bodied wine with great complexity, balance and personality. Aged for 12 months in stainless steel. Blend: 40% Garnacha, 30% Cariñena, 20% other varieties. Arcane																																																																																																																																										 doses

name: Chateau Les Malbec 2012
description: This is a classic Malbec, with rich, deep black and violet tones. The nose offers an explosion of ripe fruit aromas with flavors of blackberries, plums, cherries, and spiceash. The mouthfeel is round and velvety, with excellent balance between fruit and oak. The tannins are soft and well-integrated, providing a smooth, round mouthfeel with great length. The 2012 Les Malbec is an outstanding wine that can be paired with traditional foods such as steak and pork tenderloin, as well as grilled vegetables, pasta dishes, and mild cheeses.

name: Ped'Arte DrNithate Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 vintage of Dr. Ned has aromas of ripe cherries, cocoa powder, and ripe strawberries with undertones of sweet oak. The flavors mirror aromas with a rich, round mouthfeel with soft, round tannins. The finish is long and supple. The 2016 vintage of Dr. Ned is an approachable wine that is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 2 to 3 years.

name: Bongheriemino Estate Bolleca Heytare Henal Reserva 2014
description: Cherry red with violet tones, with a touch of blue. Complex and deep aromas with notes of black cherries, spices, spices, black pepper, and earth. It is medium-bodied with a good structure and well-rounded, fresh tannins. The wine is full-flavored and full of flavor with lingering, fruity aftertaste.

name: Clos Canbert Hogu Frunelline Carneros Pinot Griagio 2015
description: The 2015 Pinot Gris is bright, lively and refreshing with flavors of lemon, pineapple, and kiwi. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with refreshing acidity and a mouth-watering finish.  wine on release date, but will cellar well for 3 to 5 years.

name: Santa Ra Vale Zinfandelo 2001
description: The nose offers aromas of cherry and plum with hints of pepper and spice. Flavors mirror aromas with juicy flavors of cherry, raspberry, and raspberry with Supremely sweet, supple tannins. The finish is long and smooth with lingering flavors of black cherry, plum, and mineral tones. The wine is very approachable now and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Louis Baires Carmeganiole Prierres 2014
description: This wine has a ruby red color with intense aromas of red fruit, cherry and plum with hints of licorice and spice. The flavors mirror aromas with cherry, plum and violet. The wine is soft and supple on the palate with balanced acidity. A full-bodied wine with an attractive finish.

name: Domaine-d'Ap Grancublinvel Somanchet Crassiano Reserve Chardonnay 2016
description: Golden yellow with greenish hues. Vibrant aromas of citrus and white fruit with toasted and toasted nuances. Fresh and pleasant taste with a pleasant and pleasant acidity. Good balance between sweetness and acidity. Well-balanced and pleasant.

name: Chateau de Malberlos Santo 2012
description: Vibrant red with a touch of violet.  The nose is intense and complex, offering an attractive hint of spice.  The mouthfeel is soft, fresh and well-rounded, with good acidity and well-integrated oak.  The overall impression is of a fresh and fruity wine with good length.

name: Vina Micholia Coppallo di Montalcine 2014
description: Deep ruby red in color with violet reflections. Complex nose with hints piemon and red fruit, complemented by floral tones, spices, and vanilla. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced, harmonious, with a good structure and long finish.

name: Mornesore Vineyards Chardonnay 2000
description: The wine is a medium-bodied wine with flavors of pear and green apple, along with an attractive creamy texture. The mouthfeel is rich, supple, and creamy with medium weight, but with lingering flavors of vanilla and butter.   The finish is long and well-balanced with lingering flavors of pear and apple.

name: Bollanti Rose Tosel Rats Sigrate 2013
description: An excellent accompaniment for Mediterranean foods such as smoked tuna, grilled fresh vegetables, roasted vegetables, vegetable salad, vegetable and eggplant soup and dishes featuring herbs.   Serve well-chilled and decanting for optimum enjoyment of aromas and flavors. The wine is bright, with a slight color change.  The bouquet is floral with notes of fruit, strawberries and raspberries.  The mouth is warm and smooth with a persistent, fresh finish.

name: Schth Chardonnay 2017
description: Vibrant aromas of pear, apple, grapefruit, citrus, honeysuckle and floral notes with undertones of vanilla, nutmeg and caramel. Medium-bodied with flavors of pear, citrus, vanilla, honey, almond and lemon, with bright acidity and lingering minerality on the finish. The wine has a lively balance between its mouthwatering acidity and generous weight. The mouth-filling flavors mirror aromas with sweet, round, mouth-watering mouthwatering acidity.

name: Rydge Dorent Malbec des 2014
description: Bright ruby red in color, with violet tones. Aromas are intense and fresh with red and black fruits, red cherries, and strawberries, along with the sweet spices (black pepper and clove), spices of vanilla, leather, and leather. The mouth is well-balanced, soft, and round with ripe, round tannins and a pleasant acidity. The overall impression is fresh, well-rounded and full of life.

name: Domaine de L'R Covue Merlanc Mourmiain (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2010
description: Lavish, spicy aromas of black cherry, dark chocolate and sweet oak, with bright acidity and soft, round tannins.  Very well-balanced, smooth and delicious on the palate with an abundance of flavors including ripe red and black fruits, sweet spice, and a touch of minerals.

name: Borgerszi Estate Silt Horet Kesie Pinot Grigio 2008
description: Silt Horet is the estate's most serious wine. It is made from 100% Pinot Grigio grapes. It is produced from fruit picked from vineyards in the area of Brussel. The wine is then aged in steel tanks and bottle aged for three months.      The wine is a wine of exceptional quality, combining rich aromas of tropical fruit with a touch of vanilla, peach and citrus. It is full-bodied, yet well-balanced on the palate, with a long finish.

name: Tenolataso Valley Pinot Noir 2013
description: This Pinot Noir displays a brilliant ruby red color. The nose features aromas of red fruit with notes of cherry, currants and sweet spices. The mouth feel is soft and round, with flavors of blackberry, strawberry, and spicy oak. The mouth feel is well balanced, with nice acidity and soft, round tannins. The mouth feel is rich and round, with good length and flavor intensity.

name: La Cruponny Marook Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
origin: Santa Ynez Valley, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: This wine is a bright wine with bright aromas of pear, citrus and floral tones. On the palate, it is bright and refreshing with flavors of green apple, lemon, lime, pear and citrus. This wine is well-balanced with round acidity, with a finish that lingers with balanced, bright, lingering acidity. This wine is delicious with seafood, shellfish, crab and light pasta dishes with light sauces.

name: Txidanm Blenche Blanc Shiraz 2004
description: The bouquet is lifted with rich, ripe fruit aromas. The palate is generous with juicy, ripe fruit flavors balanced by oak characters. The wine displays a velvety, juicy mouthfeel and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with fresh, spicy and well-integrated oak flavors.

name: Rooxemous Wonery Willenter Wharet Palerz Chardonnay 1998
description: The Willamette Valley is the most recognized appellation for wines of exceptional quality. The winemakers have created a style that is both food-friendly and elegant, with a distinct Wharet character.  The result is a wine of great complexity and depth, with aromas and flavors of pear, citrus, and apple, with a creamy mouthfeel.  The wine is a great companion to food, especially fish, poultry, veal, chicken, pork, veal, veal, vealCommerce, cheeses, Asian foods and spicy foods.

name: Yardalinita Granercy Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: The wine is very dark ruby-red in color, with a vibrant, fresh nose, reminiscent of cherries, raspberries and blueberries, followed by floral notes and delicate toasted oak. The mouthfeel is very well-balanced with round, silky tannins and a good level of acidity. The finish is long and refreshing.

name: Bea Sneosse Pinot Noir 2016
description: A youthful wine with vibrant aromas of ripe, red berry fruit, spice, blackcurrant and earthy tones. The palate is medium bodied with good weight and structure with black cherry and berry flavors. The finish is long and generous, with lingering flavors of spice and subtle toast.

name: The Toszone Chardonnay 2000
description: Clear, bright yellow in color with golden tints. The nose is intense with aromas of ripe fruit and buttery, butterscotch tones. The palate is round and fruity with great balance between sweetness and acidity. The finish is long and refreshing with lingering flavors of hazelnut, vanilla, and toast.

name: Favenking Chardonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Chardonnay has aromas of citrus,Returning to the rich golden straw hue of this vintage. The aromas mirror the aromas of the aromas of the wine’s barrel. The aromas are layered with bright citrus, orange peel and mineral notes. The flavors mirror aromas with juicy ripe flavors of fresh pear, apricot, apple, lemon and lime. The mouthfeel is Bermifting and pleasing with round, creamy mouth-coating flavors. This vintage of the Chardonnay shows great depth of flavor and balanced sweetness with well-integrated oak. This wine is well-balanced and well-crafted, which is a testament to the wine’s heritage and vintage. The wine has a round mouth-feel with mouthwatering acidity, which leads to a refreshing, lingering finish. This vintage of Chardonnay will cellar well for up to 5 years and will be an excellent companion to seafood and lighter white meats.

name: Dusbas Edpet Chardonnay 2015
description: Straw yellow in color with green hues. Rich aromas of ripe fruit, such as pineapple, and almond with an underlying hint of mineral notes. On the palate, the wine is round and soft with balanced acidity, very well-integrated oak, and medium-long-lasting finish.

name: LMtaeide Winery Ponde Sitley Vellage 2019
description: Sourced from the very best blocks in the appellation. Pangea, blackberry, and cassis with elegant floral tones and a hint of sweet oak. Sweet, sweet tannins that are silky and sweet. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of cinnamon. With great balance between sweetness and bright acidity.

name: Galmivaison Laning Winery Shracerio Vineyard Zinllanes 2016
description: This wine is a wine of great personality. The grapes are sourced from a special vineyard plot in the heart of the Shracerio Vineyard in the southern part of the Lago Hills AVA. This vintage shows the classic varietal aromas and flavors of this wine, with notes of black cherry, vanilla, and black tea. The palate is full-bodied and mouth-coating with flavors of dried fruit and sweet oak, with mouth-coating tannins adding grip and structure. This wine has great balance and concentration, with great length and vibrancy.

name: Domaine Jachon Drunina 2014

The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Semontinok binfandel Montelours Red Blend 2017

The wine finishes with a slightly softer acidity and lingering tannins. The overall impression is a smooth and elegant wine with a good acid balance.

name: Clirey Les Turtinyas Schoare Chardonnay 2004

The wine can be served slightly chilled.  Serve well-chilled.

The finish is long, with flavors of honey and pear, lingering on the palate.

name: Oseno Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The trash-can and pencil lead aromas are immediately appealing, but will develop with additional time. The aromas are reminiscent of fresh fruit with hints of anise, blackberries and cassis.  The mouth feel is soft and round, with flavors of vanilla, cinnamon and a hint of chocolate and ripe fruit.  The finish is long and soft, with lingering flavors of cherries, spices, and vanilla.  The wine is ready to drink now and will continue to improve for at least the next 5-6 years.  We recommend that you serve this wine now or cellar it for 2- 3 years.  We suggest opening the bottle an hour before enjoying this wine.

name: Carolo Vinos rrosnottary Reservie Reserva 2006
description: This wine has a lovely purple-red color with light purplish highlights. The nose reveals attractive aromas of blackberry, chocolate, pepper and smoke. The mouthfeel is soft and fruity with supple, well-balanced tannins. The wine has a very pleasant finish with lingering acidity and sweet, ripe tannins.

name: Canlarica Malbece Spallettia Santasello 2004
description: Deep ruby-red in color, with violet tones.  Aromas of fresh red fruit with hints of floral and sweet spices.  On the palate it is well-balanced with soft, well-integrated tannins and well-rounded acidity.  Its structure and balance are well-known from the bouquet and the taste.  A suffers from mild, round, ripe tannins and a very good acidity.  It is very pleasant with traditional Tuscan dishes such as pizza, pizza with roasted tomatoes and with meat dishes with soft sauces.

name: WCAre Sta. Stomank Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 WCAre Sta. Stomank Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant, supple wine with black cherry, blackberry, currant and chocolate flavors and a hint of mint, spice and earthiness. The palate is generous and silky with juicy tannins that lead to a long, smooth finish. This wine can be paired with grilled and roasted vegetables, barbequed ribs, grilled vegetables, roasted poultry, eggplant, roasted vegetables, pork chop, fettuccini Alfredo, and roasted vegetables with roastedihilator.

name: Ravana Chardonnay 2002
description: The wine has an intense golden yellow color with greenish tones. The aromas offer attractive floral aromas of pear and green apple, complemented by subtle notes of toast and butter. The mouthfeel is well-balanced, elegant and velvety with a well-rounded mouthfeel and a pleasant aftertaste.  The overall impression is a pleasant, fresh, well-structured wine with good structure and good acidity.  The flavor of the wine is fresh, fruity and full of ripe fruit.

name: Calys Bricher Olad R3Stionve Chardonnay 2016
description: A very nice nose with aromas of green apple, banana, citrus, grapefruit, and fresh honey. Medium bodied, it has good intensity with a nice balance between its fresh acidity and a very pleasant mouthfeel. The wine is very round with a good volume, good length, and freshness.

name: Chateau Pas Mussanca Stutione 2009
description: Chateau Pas Mussanca has created a blend of Carmenere, Carmenere Gris, Carmenere Syrah, and Carmenere Tannat. The wine is a deep, intense purple color. The aromas are rich and complex with notes of ripe fruit and spices. It is well-balanced with sweet, soft tannins that are well integrated into the wine. The mouth feel is round and full with well-balanced acidity. The aftertaste is long and well-balanced with good intensity.

name: Bigelas Jadr & Baamre C017,Lignas Arbater DEsry-Bolledon Salterraine Granes Chianty Chardonnay 2015
description: The 2015 Jadr & Baamre C017 is a perfect balance between intensity and freshness. It is a wine that is very accessible now and will cellar well for the next 5 to 7 years.

name: Gomaiuestaine Mondali Malbec Blend 2014
description: This Malbec is an attractive wine with ruby color and aromas of strawberries and cherries. The flavors mirror aromas with sweet fruits like plums, and cherries and blackberries, and well-integrated oak flavors. The wine is well-balanced, soft and elegant, with good rotational intensity and good body.

name: Boucagas Lada Vents Red Reserve Caballe Melreres Istaze Rose 2015
description: Pale, intense and bright. Aromas of fresh strawberries, strawberries and raspberries with hints of citrus fruits. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of ripe fruit, like strawberries, strawberries and cherries, with citrus notes. Fresh and clean with a good balance between acidity and sugar. The overall impression is of a lively and refreshing wine. It has a good balance between fruit and sweetness, a good freshness and a good acidity.

name: Domaiett Vineyards Emarinas Colflay Gelpeugio Pinot Noir 2018
description: Eminas Colflay is a lovely and lusciously approachable wine that is well-balanced, well-balanced, and well-made. This wine is 100% Colflay from the Domaiett Estate. The grapes were harvested at the end of October and early November. The grapes were gently whole cluster pressed and immediately racked into temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks for a cold fermentation. The wine was then aged in neutral oak barrels for 9 months before bottling.uvian											 PHP

name: Edomes Gosciead Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: In 1997, the winemaker, Chris Mondavi, had the opportunity to travel to the historic Napa Valley of Napa Valley and to meet the most acclaimed growers in the region. With their help, he was able to create a wine that truly reflects the characteristics of this vineyard site. The result is a wine with ripe, velvety tannins, elegant aromas and flavors of ripe fruit. The result is a wine with complexity, finesse and elegance.

name: Sayne Sp. Leam Re Flick Russian Rivet Esatates Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Esatates Cabernet is a dark and lush wine with aromas of black cherry, currants, blackberry, cocoa powder and baking spices. The palate is rich with flavors of cherry, blackberry and blueberry with well-integrated oak and sweet vanilla from barrel aging. The tannins are soft and round and the acidity is well balanced. The finish is long with flavors of dark fruit and spice.

name: Cloquitt dier Elpettes Reserva Cabelet Pinot Noir 2014
description: Pairs well with grilled fish, such as turbot, tuna and sashimi, as well as red and white meat dishes.  fermentation, aged in French oak barrels, barbequed meats and spicy dishes. fashioning a refined wine with finesse and elegance. Ideal with pork, veal and poultry.

name: Hawn Sonfar Russe Montaria Chardonnay 2012
description: This wine is a golden straw yellow color. It has a very elegant and complex nose, with hints of tropical fruit, pineapple, mango and pineapple. The mouthfeel is round, soft and creamy with a nice touch of acidity., with vanilla, vanilla and citrus flavors.  Its fresh, full-bodied and well-balanced.

name: Weniltoliy Gourgenvo 2001
description: This is a wine that offers up a generous, fruity and easy drinking style. The Gouramba vineyards are in the northern part of the Vosne-Romanee appellation, on the border with Alsace. The wine is made from a blend of Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Riesling and Viognier.  The grapes are hand-harvested and gently pressed. Fermentation takes place in stainless steel tanks. The postpones malo-lactic fermentation for the final product. The wine is then aged in stainless steel and is released as an ungrafted, unfiltered wine.

name: Cererla IVpmamiteri 2018
description: An easy-drinking, fun-loving wine with a very good nose and good body. Fresh and fruity, with aromas of cherry and blackberry, a hint of vanilla, toast and spice. A nice fruity palate, balanced and fresh, with good length.

name: Stellia Caberane Ranchhe Zinfandel 2002
description: The nose offers spicy, toasty aromas with vanilla and clove.  The mouthfeel is smooth and rich with ripe, round fruit flavors of cherry and raspberry, and toasty, sweet-spice, oak, vanilla and nutty oak.  The finish is long, spicy, smooth and well-balanced with soft, sweet tannins.  The mouth feel is excellent with pasta dishes, roasted vegetables, or grilled fish.

name: Feminge Astrench Canmaresco Gigbericolo 2001
description: Deep ruby-red correctly identified by its violet hue. Fruity bouquet, well-balanced with intense notes of violet and fruity, round, with a sweet, lingering aftertaste.. Astute, subtle, very well-integrated, full-flavored, with very round and pleasant tannins. Perfect for grilled, roasted, and roasted meat dishes.

name: Arra Tacaca Shirazza 2011
description: The 2011 Arra Tacacá Shirazza is full of ripe fruit flavors of raspberry, blackberry, and black cherry. The mouth Meter is full of blackberries and cherries with hints of vanilla, mocha, and spices. The finish is rich and lingering with a lingering toastiness and creamy texture. The wine is approachable now and will cellar well for 3 to 5 years.

name: Domaine Pinkessie Pinogoore Reserve 1993
description: This Pinogoore Reserve is a wine with aromas of fresh fruit and spices. The wine is very elegant with smooth, round and well-balanced tannins.  The wine is well-made with a long, pleasing finish.   Itimmigration of the best barrels, the wine is then aged for eight months in French oak, where it is aged for five months before bottling.  The wine is not too approachable now, but will cellar well for up to five years.  We suggest matching well with white meats, grilled fish, pork, veal and pasta dishes with a light cream sauce.

name: Chateau Facantee Russian Rose 2012
description: Beautiful aromas of fresh strawberry, red currant, and mineral, with a hint of nutmeg and mineral undertones.  The flavors mirror aromas with aromas of fresh strawberry, red currant, and mineral undertones.  This is a medium-bodied, dry rosé, with bright acidity and a creamy mouthfeel.

name: Chateau Froehe Rosas Riesling Reserva 2015
description: Pale yellow in color with greenish tones. Fresh aromas of grapefruit, tangerine, involvement and mineral tones. Fresh and juicy with an intense flavor profile and a good acidity.  potential.  apropos of lime and grapefruit flavors, plus a hint of lemon zest, as well as a nice touch of sweetness. Smooth, well-balanced and fresh in the mouth with a persistent finish. A nice balance between sweetness and acidity. Pair with fresh dishes, seafood, white meats, fish, shellfish in cream sauce, and roasted vegetables.

name: Femmo Crest Chateau Peligu Arbaniere 1997
description: Pale straw-yellow color with greenish reflections. Aromas of ripe pear and white peach.  The taste is soft, warm, with rich and ripe fruit flavors and hints of oak.  The wine is full-bodied with a crisp, refreshing finish.  The wine can be paired with seafood, salads, white meats, white cheese.

name: Stan Grywer Jry Pinot Grigier 2000
description: This wine shows a beautiful pale color with some green highlights. The aromas are very complex with a very intense bouquet of grapefruit, peach, floral tones, vanilla and spices. The flavors mirror aromas with mouth filling flavors of pineapple, citrus, floral tones and mineral tones. The mouthfeel is very well-balanced with good weight and length. The mouth feel is soft, round and medium bodied with excellent structure and acidity.   The mouthfeel is very good now and will cellar well for up to five years.   The wine shows very good quality now and will continue to improve over the next two to three years.  The wine will pair well with most foods.

name: St. hapato berey Chandonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Central Coast Chardonnay has an appealing aroma profile with aromas of white flowers and ripe pear. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe pear, citrus, and citrus flavors framed by crisp acidity. The mouthfeel is soft and generous with flavors of fresh pear, citrus, and mineral notes on the finish.

name: Wiramt Napa Sauzel Oasc Chardonnay 1999
description: Aromas of ripe pear and crisp green apple with an aroma of buttery oak, vanilla and vanilla cream.  On the palate, it is medium-bodied with flavors of ripe pear and butter with a long finish.  The wine is well-balanced with a crisp acidity, medium viscosity, and good balance between sweetness and minerality.  The mouthfeel is soft, round, and well-rounded with a lingering impression of vanilla, caramel, and toast.  The wine is an excellent companion for grilled fish, shellfish in cream sauce, light pasta dishes, and lightly sauced dishes.

name: Wintana Mastoresturo Ritbords Red 2004
description: Intense ruby-red color with garnet tones. On the nose, the wine is very expressive with aromas of ripe fruit such as cherry, blackberry, and blackcurrant, followed by subtle herbal and vanilla tones. On the palate, the wine is very round and well-balanced, with silky tannins and good acidity.

name: Joyed Oaks di Boulles (half-bottle) 1997
description: Aromas of blackberry, plum and mineral. On the palate, it is full-bodied, with black cherry and sweet, ripe fruit flavors, and a slightly sweet finish.  Serve well chilled and allow to warm in your glass for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavor.  Serve at an optimal temperature of about 64° F.

name: Spxph Chardennas Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: The 2018 vintage of Chardennas has aromas of black cherries, cocoa, licorice, and hints of lavender. On the palate, flavors of black cherries, chocolate, coffee, coffee grounds, tobacco and leather are highlighted. The mouth feel is soft, round, and juicy with good acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long, balanced and lingering with lingering flavors of coffee, vanilla, and sweet oak. The 2018 is a beautiful wine that can be enjoyed now, or cellar for up to 2 years.

name: GranI Rarno Shiraz 2012
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: The wine displays intense dark red with brick red tones. The bouquet is lifted with floral aromas of ripe plum, blackberries, black cherries, chocolate and licorice. The palate is generous with rich plum and black cherry flavours, complemented by well-integrated French oak oak spice and mocha oak. The wine is well-balanced with soft tannins and balanced acidity, resulting in a long, spicy finish.

name: Turlecoo Probaras OaPletti Pinot Noir 1998
description: A wine with good color and ripe red fruits.  The taste is soft and round, with fresh red fruit.  The finish is long and balanced.  It is a good wine for consumption young.  potential to age well.  The wine shows great varietal character, with good intensity and vibrancy.

name: Rosnea Kave Wineranas Reserve Pinot Noir 2016
description: The 2016 Rosnea Reserve is a blend of two vineyards, one located on the west side of the Dundee Hills and the other located on the east side of the Willamette Valley. The 2016 vintage was cooler than average and yielded smaller berries with concentrated flavors.

name: Vodes Reboult Ret 2014
description: This is a blend of 60% Mourvedre, 20% Syrah, 10% Grenache, 5% Carignan, 5% Cinsault, 5% Counoise and 5% Counoise Syrah. The name Vodes Reboult, meaning grandfather of Vines, refers to the village where they are grown. The name comes from the traditional Latin word re-blaufrank, meaning re-blaufrankis (strawberry, cherry, raspberry) and is an homage to the father of Vode Reboult. The Grenache is aged in neutral oak for 18 months, the Syrah in small oak barrels for 12 months, the Counoise for 9 months and the Cinsault for 12 months. The resulting wine is very deep ruby in color with a slight garnet rim. The nose reveals rich aromas of blackberries, black cherries, spices, coffee and vanilla. The mouthfeel is rich, round and juicy, with silky, round tannins and a long, juicy finish.

name: Spago Terry Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 Terry Pinot Noir displays attractive aromas of blackberries and cherries with hints of clove, vanilla and cinnamon. The mouthfeel is soft, round and juicy with ripe tannins and flavors of raspberry, currant, and blackberry with a touch of spice. This wine will drink well now and will cellar well for up to three years.

name: Scunassi Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: The 2011 Scunassi Cabernet Sauvignon is an attractive and approachable wine with medium ruby-red color and intense aromas of ripe red and black fruits. The flavors mirror aromas with some nuances of coffee, chocolate and toast. The mouthfeel is round with medium weight and round, well-integrated tannins. The wine callback										 double																																																																																													 genital

name: St. Iiverach 2012
description: The St. Iiverach is a refreshing wine, very characteristic of Alsace with vibrant aromas of grapefruit and lime and a hint of white pepper. A pleasant drink now and will cellar well for 5 to 8 years. Serve at between 50 and 58 degrees F. Serve as an aperitif, or as an accompaniment to seafood and white meats.

name: Grandiew Sonomurh Zinfandel 2008
description: We were looking for a vintage of Zinfandel with bright, forward aromas and flavors of cherry, strawberry and berry. We also wanted to make a wine with an attractive, approachable profile, and a hint of sweetness, which is why we selected the most intense fruit from our own vineyard. The aromas are very complex and approachable, with cherry, raspberry, floral and spice aromas. Flavors mirror aromas with some sweet and juicy fruit, while still keeping the wine fresh and fresh with well-balanced acidity. This vintage of Sonomurh is a wine of great complexity and balance.

name: Worettiew Treok Syrrgin Coast Pinot Noir 2015
description: Aromas of rose petal, black cherry, and sweet barrel toast with mineral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of fresh strawberry, white pepper, clove, and nutmeg. The mouth feel is soft andBinds with medium weight and good texture. The finish is long and lingering with soft tannins.

name: Marslossauloner Serkon Napa Vapaglie Pinot Noir 2017
description: Bright aromas of strawberry, pomegranate, and baking spice. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of red fruit, spice, and toast. The mouthfeel is soft and juicy with a balanced acidity and sweet, round mouth feel.

name: Barfordor Marjontanas Caperes Chardonnay 2007
description: The wine is a brilliant yellow color with green tones.  The aromas are intense and elegant, with fruit notes of green apple and pineapple, and citrus fruits with notes of fresh butter.  The mouthfeel is full and sweet, with good volume, good acidity and a nice long finish.

name: Chateau Lorn Cotes Slos Blanction Eestat Lamitian 2009
description: Eestat Lamitian is a deep and elegant wine, expressing aromas of fruit and spices, complemented by mineral notes. The mouthfeel is full-bodied, with round and silky tannins. The finish is very long, and carries notes of black fruit and mineral undertones.

name: Sanna Patot Merlot 1988
description: The name Sanna is an informal reference to the hillside vineyards that surround the winery in the Valle de San Rosa, one of Chile's premier regions for grape growing. The grapes for Sanna are grown in the Casablanca Valley, a region famous for its well-drained sandy soils.  The grapes are harvested by hand and crushed into temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks before being transferred to the winery for fermentation.  The wine is then matured in stainless steel and new American oak barrels for 12 months, and then in the bottle for 6 months before being released.   The result is a classic California style wine with rich, ripe, mouth-filling fruit and good acidity.

name: Brenithe Giboterdor Glanzer Riesling 1999
description: As an off-dry wine, the wine is particularly suited for lighter meals, especially appetizers, but also seafood, veal, poultry, pasta and spicy Asian dishes..    .  The wine is an off-dry, dry-cured, medium-bodied wine.  It is also an excellent companion to Asian foods.  restrooms, tables, fish and shellfish in sauces with fresh fruit, and white meats.

name: Arnituray Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is a deep ruby red color with an aroma of red fruits with hints of vanilla.  It has a well-rounded, well-structured mouthfeel with sweet tannins.  It is a well-balanced wine with excellent acidity, well-integrated oak, and a long finish. wildly drinkable now.

name: Barazhit Gewichedin Riesling Rougioux Pinot Noir 1999
description: A beautiful ruby color with aromas of ripe fruits.  The flavors mirror aromas with good acidity and good body.  The finish is long and pleasant.   Serve well chilled.  The wine is also very good with grilled or roasted red and white meats, as well as fish dishes with light sauces.  A perfect match for grilled fish, especially those that have been marinated in sauces.  Serve at an optimal temperature of about 55 degrees F.

name: Guher Chardonnay 2016
origin: Willamette Valley, Oregonuncharacterized by a bright acidity and supple mouthfeel, this Chardonnay offers notes of pear, peach,ippi almonds, and honey with a hint of nuttiness..  by Johnathon Ritchie, Winemaker  , Johnathon Winery Willamette Valley Vineyards Chardonnay 2016 [response] The 2016 Willamette Valley Vineyards Chardonnay offers aromas of peach, lemon zest, vanilla and green apple. The mouthfeel is mouth-coating and well-balanced with good viscosity. The mouthfeel is bright with flavors of juicy peach, citrus, and citrus. The finish is long and pleasant with lingering acidity.

name: Clos de Campagne Hossiel Orignoor Granchs 2007
origin: Burgundy, France Transported with no fewer than two or three bottles of wine in a normal day. It is a wine that shows intense freshness, intensity and finesse, with great complexity. It is balanced, well-integrated, with a good acidity.

name: Nueru Deczu Beag Blenchesciani Rieglumta's Estate Riesauja Riuva 2014
description: The Deczu’s Estate Riesaujo is an homage to the founder rcut by the winery’s growers, Deczu and Riuva, two of the original founders of the estate. The wine shows deep ruby color with purple tints, a fragrant bouquet, intense and ripe tannins, good balance and length on the palate.

name: MAy Hillani Masranas Walpera Barulo Leelmila Jadon, Gewrs Termerla 2016
description: Intense ruby red with orange hues. On the nose, it has a sweet bouquet of red fruit, ripe fruits, and notes of spices. On the palate, it is full-bodied, with rich, rounded tannins and a long, pleasant finish.

name: Trefania Celles Pesectresie Moscata Sauvignon Blanc 2008
description: Intenseaired with a fresh fruity aroma, very characteristic of the varietal, with an appealing presence of herbaceous and mineral notes. A fresh and well-balanced wine. A nice wine with a pleasant freshness and good structure.  Perfect for fish, shellfish and white meats.

name: Collicanty Estate Chardonnay 1998
description: Rich, creamy, and sweet on the palate, our Estate Chardonnay exhibits flavors of peach, pear, and melon with hints of citrus and vanilla.  The mouthfeel is soft, round, and generous, with flavors of fruit and oak balanced by toasty, sweet oak on the finish.  This wine is delicious with lighter fish and shellfish, or as an alternative to a classic white Burgundy.

name: Stageipls Laga Reserva Pinot Noir 2000
description: This wine is a medium bodied, well-balanced, well-balanced and well-balanced wine, with a deep, bright ruby-red color.  It is fresh and well-balanced, with pleasant aromas of ripe fruit, spices and toasted oak.  The taste is full, fruity and pleasant, with smooth and pleasant tannins, and good length.aran

name: Edle Winery Estates Vineyard Pinot Sauvignon 2002
description: The Estates Vineyard is a very unique wine that delivers very good varietal expression.  The aromas feature a combination of the spicy characters of the varietal and the flavors of the varietal itself.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with mouthwatering acidity and good balance between sweetness and crispness.  The finish is long with fresh, refreshing acidity.  This wine can be paired with a wide variety of foods including Asian food, white meat, fish and light cheeses.  The wine is also a great companion to lighter-flavored pasta dishes.

name: Kenboteras Oak Elainia Pulaso 2015
description: Deep ruby red, with violet tones. An intense and complex nose, with fruity notes of red fruits, spices, and hints of wood. Medium-bodied on the palate, with ripe and round tannins, excellent acidity, and good length.,

name: Hawin Banre Jean Cabernet Sautigonnan Red Nost Chardonnay 1997
description: This classic wine is an excellent accompaniment to grilled steak, game, and particularly hard cheeses.  The tannins are soft and round and the wine will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years.  Enjoy this wine now or cellar for 2- 3 years.

name: Bodega Alanba Conta Blullio Vintagelli 2007
description: This wine is a deep garnet red with hints of purplish tones.  The bouquet offers fresh aromas of fruit, cherries and plums, blackberries, and notes of coffee, coffee and sweet spices.  The mouthfeel is soft,coni-grained, soft and silky.  The taste is full-bodied and well-balanced.  It is well-balanced between tannins, acidity and sweetness.  The wine is long-lasting in the mouth.  The finish is pleasant, pleasant, long and persistent.  This wine is an excellent accompaniment for roasted red and white meats, grilled fish, cheeses, truffle dishes and game.

name: Rodedoore 4Vignani Carmefare Pinot Noir 2002
description: The Carmefare vineyard is in the center of the Willamette Valley AVA. The vineyard sits on a gentle north-west facing slope and faces southwest. The vines are head-trained and dry-farmed, planted in soil that is predominantly limestone and silica with some clay. The wine is a classic Oregon style with fresh cherry, raspberry and raspberry flavors with hints of spices, nutmeg and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, round, supple and very pleasant. The flavors and aromas of the wine are consistent with the aromas, with hints of vanilla and toast from barrel aging. The finish is soft, supple and pleasing with round, ripe tannins. This wine is best paired with grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon, veal chops, poultry, veal dishes with roasted vegetables and poultry dishes with light sauces.

name: Prome Creek Pinet Noir 2012
description: Rich aromas of cherries, strawberries, and violets with hints of vanilla and spice. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe flavors of red fruits, sweet plums and cherries with a hint of anise. This is a well-balanced, full-bodied wine with firm, round tannins and balanced acidity. The finish is long, with lingering flavors of cherry, plum and spice. This wine can be enjoyed now and will cellar well for up to five years. Enjoy now through 2018.

name: Caderres Robes Zinfandel 2008
description: This Central Coast classic is full of rich, ripe fruit flavors with aromas of red fruits and spices. The mouth feel is medium to full-bodied, with round, well-balanced tannins, and a smooth finish. It can be paired with spicy food, especially Thai foods, grilled foods, pasta with a spicy sauce, and barbequed meats.

name: Preeque Landel's Secure 2005
description: This wine is a deep ruby red color with purple edges. The aromas are rich with colded cherries, raspberries, red cherries, red currants and ripe plum, black currants and cherries, cherries and spices. The mouthfeel is smooth and silky, with well-balanced and very soft tannins. The wine is well-balanced with roundness and sweet 2008

name: Vagn Walley Vines Cabernet Sauvignon 1996
description: The 1996 Vines Vineyards is an elegant wine with lovely aromas of black cherry, currants, and plum, with notes of toast, clove, nutmeg, and cocoa. The wine is full-bodied and well-structured, with concentrated flavors of blackberries, currants, and a touch of oak. The finish is long and velvety with soft tannins and lingering sweet oak.

name: Lassamb Chardonnay Minleulis Chardonnay 2011
description: Bright yellow with greenish highlights. Aromas of pear, apple, pineapple and vanilla. Fresh mouthfeel with PETERONIC acidity and softness, ripe and full-bodied flavors of pear, apple mobilization, and mineral notes. A long and smooth finish.  fermented, sur-lies aging in French oak barrels.

name: Lan Dey Blick Duminnos (375ML half-botte) 1998
description: Lan Dey Blickuminnos is a blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Syrah, 10% Grenache Blanc, citizens of the Andes and indigenous varieties.  The result anybody will see it as the jewel of the estate, a wine which is the symbol of the appellation and the quality of the wines, not just a delicious dessert wine, but a wine that will keep your attention on the wine longer than most wines.  The result is a wine that is more complex and will age more.

name: ClineNol Messon Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 Messon Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with aromas of ripe cherries, red berries, vanilla, cedar and sweet vanilla oak. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of blackberry, black currant, and raspberry with flavors of toasty oak, caramel and roasted coffee. The mouth feel is rich and round with sweet ripe tannins on the finish, which are well balanced with the acidity. The tannins are velvety and approachable with a lingering finish. This wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for the next 3- 5 years. The 2012 Messon Cabernet is an excellent food companion gastro					 optimus

name: KendelafaBne Faichay Riesling 2013
description: Vibrant and explosive aromas of quince, grapefruit and honey. Full-bodied mouthfeel, juicy, juicy, and spicy with a long, juicy finish. It is well-balanced between sweetness and acidity and it is fresh and fresh with lingering minerality. It is delicious on its own as an aperitif or with fish, shellfish, grilled, roasted or roasted vegetables.

name: Arrozion Riverzetti 2002
description: Aromas of ripe fruit, spices and toast with a hint of vanilla.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of toastlike qualities, with a soft mouthfeel.  The finish is long and refreshing with well-integrated tannins..

name: Zavilonottelta Barbarossig Vertera I Filent 2011
description: Intense and bright red, this wine offers fresh red fruit aromas and ripe, ripe fruit flavors. The palate is round, soft, well-balanced, and well-structured. The wine is a great match for grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, as well as grilled vegetables.

name: Dubgneri Vineyards Vineyardss Arry Cru Red Greadino 2007
description: Aromas of cherry and strawberry, with spicy notes, and a touch of vanilla. On the palate, very soft, round, with good structure and round and pleasantaced flavors of cherry and plum,with mineral tones.  The overall impression is fresh, well-balanced, fruity, smooth, well-balanced, pleasant, pleasant, fresh, well-integrated, pleasant and pleasant. name: Nool Palberzet Sainna Chardonnay 2002
description: This wine has a wonderful golden yellow color and an aroma with intense, sweet oak flavors. The mouthfeel is rich, smooth and very well-balanced with a long, pleasing finish.. The wine has a beautiful, intense, ripe flavor profile with plenty of richness. The wine is very well-made with a very subtle, mineral, and mineral tone on the palate.

name: Riomborton Chardonnay 2001
description: The wine has a pale straw colour with green tints.  The nose offers attractive floral aromas with hints of citrus and citrus, with underlying oaky and spicy oak, which adds complexity.  The palate is full-bodied and soft with flavours of citrus and apple, with a long, crisp, well-balanced acidity and pleasingly toasty oak complexity.  The finish is long with a mineral note and pleasingly well-integrated acidity.  This wine is an excellent accompaniment to chicken dishes, fish and shellfish, particularly those fish with spicy sauces.  It is also an excellent accompaniment to rich pasta dishes with cheese sauces.  Serve well-chilled, in a good cellar temperature.

name: Gain Grand Bayf Grand LobantE The Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with aromas of ripe cherries, blackberries, vanilla and liquorice. The palate is fresh and juicy with blackcurrant] flavors, finishing with well-integrated tannins.

name: Stoneiy Valley Albino 2014
description: The 2014 Albino is a refreshing wine that is both intensely floral and fruity with aromas of ripe fruit and spice. On the palate, it is bright and crisp with flavors of tropical fruits, pear and peach and balanced by fresh acidity. The wine is a perfect match for seafood, poultry, shellfish, lighter fish and pasta with a light cream sauce.

name: ginmard Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: This is a lush wine with rich flavors of blackberry, cassis, and spice. The mouthfeel is round and soft with flavors of blackberry, cassis, and cocoa. The finish is lingering with smooth, round tannins and a hint of leather. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for up to two years.

name: Bolfares Pinot Grigio Buras Garvolo 2016
description: A bright, medium-bodied wine with a fruity and floral nose. The wine is well-balanced and well-structured with a fresh, clean, fresh, mineral finish.

name: Michardo dy OvaniRo 2015
description: This vintage is an excellent match for roasted vegetables, grilled meats, pasta dishes with proud sauces, poultry dishes with grilled vegetables, and lighter fish dishes.  with garlic cream sauce, roasted poultry, and pasta with roasted vegetables.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Bodegas Encia Hoccie Hircio Pinot Grigiano 2004
description: Grenache in color with light green tones. On the nose the wine is very fruity, fresh, and well-balanced. It is pleasant and refreshing on the palate with mineral and herbaceous notes and well-integrated oak. The wine is well-balanced with a pleasant and pleasant acidity. The overall impression is fresh, fruity, and pleasant.

name: Tormono Chardonnay 2015
description: This wine is medium-bodied with ripe fruit flavors of peach and pineapple and creamy overtones of butter. The nose is full of ripe fruit and balanced by a slight minerality. The mouthfeel is fresh, smooth and medium-bodied with an acidity that is not harsh. The finish is long, fresh and clean.

name: Kent Afberello Ilenbourtmo Rose 2015
description: The color is very pale pink with light shades of rose. The nose is very fresh, very fruity and floral. On the palate the wine is fresh, pleasant, fruity and fresh. The wine is well-balanced with a delicate finish. Serve very well chilled.

name: Arnobalen Thamazera Clardonett Cabernet Sauvigney 1995
description: This wine is the perfect balance between richness and elegance. The nose offers a complex and well-rounded bouquet with ripe fruit and vanilla tones and aromas of toasted coffee and toasted bread. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with round, well-balanced tannins. The long finish is fruity with pleasant, long-lasting fruit flavors.

name: Kegliona's Sonoma Countranina Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 Sonoma Countranina has Editing potential of 5-10 years and should be cellared for at least 4-5 years. The wine's aromas of ripe, fresh blackberries and cherries are followed by flavors of red cherries, cassis, and coffee, with an undertone of nutmeg. The mouthfeel is soft and sweet, with flavors of ripe fruit, strawberries, and spice with a touch of vanilla. The tannins are soft and well-integrated, and the finish is long with soft, silky, round, and well-balanced acidity. The wine is well-balanced with acidity and supple tannins. The wine will continue to improve for the next 2-3 years and age well for the next 2-3 years from now through 2022. Enjoy now or cellar for 5-8 years. Pair with grilled steak, barbequed ribs, or roast lamb.

name: Rooduwlich Winery Chardonnay 2017
description: From the Rooduwich “Hochbenn” estate vineyard, the winery’s Riesling is a delightfully versatile wine that pairs well with a wide range of foods. The wines are a perfect match for Asian cuisine, Mediterranean cuisine, Asian flavors, Asian foods in cream sauce, pork, pork with vegetables, and grilled chicken.

name: Burge Bland Riose 2017
description: The 2017 vintage of Riose has a dark ruby-red color with aromas of ripe fruits such as plums, cherries and strawberries with sweet floral notes and an earthiness. It has a juicy and fresh flavor with good concentration of fruit, sweet tannins, good acidity and a touch of minerality. This wine is an easy to drink red wine with good structure and good acidity.

name: Bonvrameya Carolo Pinot Noir 2015
description: Aromas of cherries, raspberries and spice. The palate is medium-bodied with flavors of blackcurrant and plums with a hint of white pepper, earth and sweet tobacco. The mid-palate is soft and generous with fresh acidity and long, spicy finish.

name: Trickefler Chablis Valley Pinot Gris 2014
description: The wine shows lovely aromas of fresh citrus, crawlley pear, apricot, peach, and mineral. On the palate, the wine is fresh and crisp with ripe flavors of grapefruit, grapefruit, pear, and mineral. The finish is long with lingering acidity.

name: Spyam Cepaltino de Pinot Noir 1995
description: Our Estate Cépaltino de Pinot Noir is a full-bodied wine with rich aromas of blackberries, cherries and spices. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of earthiness and a touch of toasty oak. The mouthfeel is full-bodied with supple tannins, well-integrated oak, and a long, lingering finish. We suggest matching the aromas with a dish of fresh cheese, hearty vegetables and pasta with roasted tomatoes. We recommend this wine to be served chilled.  pertinent

name: Tuach Reserve Pionot 2014
description: Deep garnet with intense aromas of ripe red and black fruits. This wine is full bodied with bright acidity and a lingering finish. We suggest serving this wine at a temperature of around 70-75°F.  winegrower’s tip: Pair with roasted lamb chops, filet mignon, grilled fish and white meats such as chicken, duck and grilled vegetables.

name: Mtaiigtion Tartan Napanboll 1997
description: An excellent companion for fish dishes with the bitter taste, such as mussels, crab, crab and scallops, shaved and grilled fish.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve with crustaceans, roasted, lightly grilled, and with Asian dishes with ginger and white pepper.  Serve at a temperature of 16-18°C.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve with crustaceans, roasted, lightly grilled, and with Asian dishes with ginger and white pepper.  Serve at a temperature of 16-18°C.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve with crustaceans, roasted, lightly grilled, and with Asian dishes with ginger and white pepper.  Serve at a temperature of 16-18°C.  Serve with crustaceans, roasted, lightly grilled, and with Asian dishes with ginger and white pepper.  Serve well-chilled.  Serve well-chilled.

name: de Konnent The Colfit Bie 2014
description: The Colfit is a lively wine that offers fresh fruit aromas of cherry, raspberry and redournals. The mouthfeel is juicy and fresh with round, ripe fruit flavors with a juicy, soft and round, balanced acidity. The finish is fresh and clean with lingering and pleasant tannins.

name: Fronat's Marbere) 2013
description: Vibrant, ripe, concentrated flavors of red and black fruits, black cherries and raspberries. Hints of spices, cocoa, and vanilla are nicely balanced by a hint of sweetness. The palate is generous and generous, with a smooth, silky texture and good length.

name: Car Resand Cameret Soulin-Famillier Meblon 20(mil-bottle) 2005
description: This wine is a deep, dark, intense ruby-red color. The nose is full of very ripe, fresh fruit aromas: cherry, blackberry, raspberry, black currant, and a hint of cinnamon. The mouthfeel is round and pleasant, with very good structure. It is well-balanced with good acidity, round and very soft tannins, and a long, round and lingering finish.

name: Colbo Ados Dey Avelbo (1.5 Lotord Barffert 2007
description: The wine is deep ruby red in color. The nose offers intense aromas of blackberries and spices with hints of mint. The palate is soft and round with ripe tannins and an attractive minerality..  mineral notes and a touch of cedar.  It has a very long finish with great balance between fruit and tannins.

name: Labaszees Re Marieres Chardonnay 2016
description: Bright yellow-green in color with greenish highlights, this wine offers aromas of pear, lime, and honey with notes of vanilla, nutmeg, and caramel. It is rich and viscous in the mouth, with a balanced acidity. The finish is long and smooth, with well-integrated oak, good length, and lingering flavors of citrus.  Giving the wine a soft and rich mouthfeel, this wine has ripe fruit flavors, with excellent acidity.

name: Villampo Chiant Cuvee Perres Blend Rose 2012
description: The 2012 Villampo Rose is pale pink in color with a delicate pinkluck. The aromas feature fresh strawberries and cherries with hints of spices and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is fresh and fruity with a good concentration and good acidity. The finish is long and balanced.

name: Domaine de armeunes des Peppieret Hautpieltabernes Pumiaing 2002
description: Pumia is a blend of Piedmontese grapes with the grapes from vineyards of Italy.  The name Pumia means earthy and is the origin of the local griping by the vines.  The wine is a pale yellow-colored wine with a fresh bouquet, reminiscent of flowers and citrus fruit.  On the palate it is dry, full-flavored and well-balanced with a long, pleasant finish.  It is an excellent companion for antipasti, pasta dishes with fresh, light sauces and fish.

name: Chateau Jal-Firis Deriak Strachate Cuvee Grones Reserve l'Oritez 2010
description: Rich, intense ruby red in color. Aromas of black cherry, red berries, plum, cedar, vanilla and sweet spices. The palate is juicy, well-rounded, well-structured and medium-bodied. The wine has excellent balance and balance between acidity, fruit, tannin, and wood.

name: Hants Estate Pinot Noill 2016
description: This Pinot Noill is deep garnet in color. On the nose there are aromas of red fruits, cherry, blackberry and blueberry, with subtle floral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of sweetness, spices and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft and juicy, with bright acidity. The finish is medium-long, with lingering flavors of blackberry and raspberry. The tannins are soft, round, and well-integrated, which adds to the complexity of this wine. The finish is balanced,etus

name: Sangio Sagre Holl Sauvignon Blanc 2006
description: Bright yellow color.  Excellent as an aperitif and ideal companion to fish and shellfish dishes with light sauces.  Excellent companion to Asian dishes.  with an excellent acidity, well-balanced with a good sweetness, and Federaline (cold-climate) climate.  Serve chilled.

name: Te Stastian Rose 1977
description: This wine is pale salmon color with orange tinges.  The aromas are delicate, fruity and fragrant.  On the palate, it is fresh, dry, pleasant, and refreshing with crisp acidity.  This is an excellent companion to Mediterranean food, particularly pasta dishes with fresh herbs, fish in sauce, salads with tomatoes and walnuts, white meats and white sauce pasta dishes.

name: 3t. Molasson Inozitto Cenera Rodofa 2003
description: Inozitto is a perfect match for roasted, grilled and barbecued meats, particularly those with strong flavours, and dishes that feature mushrooms and mushrooms with flavours such as herbs, herbs with truffle and roasted tomatoes. This wine is also great with hearty dishes such as stews, grilled vegetables and white meats.

name: Mambino Gamo 2011
description: An intense ruby red color.  The nose is very expressive with floral notes, red fruit and light vanilla.  On the palate it is soft, with very round tannins.  The mouthfeel is full of ripe fruit with soft, round and smooth tannins.  It is a well-balanced, well-rounded wine with a long and persistent finish.

name: Quantila d'Oma Valleyard Son Merlot 2004
description: Intense ruby red in color.  The nose is elegant with ripe fruits, with hints of minerals, spices, and toast.  The mouthfeel is rich and generous, with round, well-rounded tannins and a long, balanced finish.  A fresh, versatile wine that can be paired with a wide variety of foods including red meats, game, grilled fish, and pasta dishes with red sauces.

name: Borengues Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of the Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black cherries, blackberries, strawberries, and red currants with notes of vanilla, toasty oak, and toasty spices. The flavors mirror aromas technically with flavors of ripe cherries, blackberries, and strawberries, followed by flavors of cedar, leather, and cigar box. The finish is long, well-rounded, and round with well-integrated, sweet tannins and lingering flavors of toasty oak.

name: Kig Na CCMerat Reserp Red 2011
description: This wine offers up aromas of vanilla, blackberries, black cherries, and a hint of coffee. The mouthfeel is soft, round and mouth-coating with round, well-integrated tannins and a long, lingering finish.

name: Hontas Somata Red Red Merlot 2006
description: Deep red color with a slight purple hue. The nose is fruclamationuated with aromas of red fruits, cherries, plums, blueberries and blackberries with notes of vanilla and sweet spices such as nutmeg, black pepper and tobacco vicinity.  The palate is soft, pleasant and well-balanced with round and soft tannins.  The finish is long and well-rounded with pleasant notes of vanilla, sweet spices, a hint of pepper and sweet fruit and a touch of vanilla.

name: Campelios Sachannin Pinot Noir 2018
description: This Pinot Noir is a vibrant wine with bright and vibrant aromatics of cranberry, strawberry and raspberry, all supported by a slight mineral component. The mouth feel is gamingly smooth with fresh flavors of strawberry, raspberry and cherry followed by well-integrated acidity. The finish is fresh, round and balanced with well-integrated oak.

name: Thram Sunazuchecti Pinot Noir 2017
description: The Thram Sunazuchecti Pinot Noir is a classic expression of Pinot Noir, an ideal companion for chicken, grilled fish, or barbequed ribs. A very versatile food companion, it also goes well with Asian and Indian dishes, as well as vegetarian, chicken costume, and mild cheese.

name: Aar Veletpo Malbec 2013
description: Straw-colored with violet hues. Intense and complex nose with ripe fruit aromas, blackberries, cherries, strawberries, plums, violets, nutmeg, vanilla, licorice, sweet spices, vanilla and chocolate. Medium bodied with good structure and a long finish.

name: Dr. Haghb Pe Ferghe KaDlello Chardonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Pe Ferghe KaDlello Chardonnay has a pretty and vibrant nose with notes of pineapple, honeysuckle, and lemon zest. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with medium acidity and bright minerality. 321 cases produced.

name: Frektowoln Clards Bickellen Symah Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of our Estate Cabern thesis’s flagship wine is a delicious wine of balance, complexity and a superbly structured structure. It is a classic expression of Bickellen with an abundance of aromas of sweet black cherry, red currant, plum, and cassis, as well as subtle oak notes. The flavors mirror aromas with fresh cherry, strawberry and blueberry, plus a touch of vanilla, spice and cedar. The tannins are ripe, silky and smooth, providing the mouthfeel with roundness and weight. The finish is long and round, with a touch of sweet oak and toastiness. This wine will cellar well for up to 5 years. It will be ready to tionable now and will cellar well for the next 3 to 4 years.

name: Wind Lacieze Merlot 2000
description: This Merlot has aromas of dried cherry, violet, cedar, coffee and vanilla. The wine has a soft, round mouthfeel with juicy flavors of cherry, plum and spice with lingering toasty oak on the finish. The wine is best enjoyed now and will cellar well for 2- 3 years.

name: Groisew Pinot Bourf-Done Gardecgot 2015
description: This Pinot is the perfect accompaniment to hearty grilled fish, chicken, pork and veal dishes with creamy sauces, as well as game birds with meat sauces and vegetables..  The 2015 vintage has produced a wine of great complexity and elegance. The aromas are ripe with blackberry, blueberry, and blackcurrant, complemented by some spicy oak. The palate is generous, soft and soft, with some fine-grained tannins. The mouthfeel is well-balanced and pleasant, with good volume and a nice acidity. The finish is long and pleasant, with nice minerality.

name: Delia Hilveck Fromanc N'Albo Majacio Glade Vongsano 2016
description: A deep red color with purple hues. The nose offers a wide range of floral aromas, such as violet, rose and violet. On the palate, this wine is full-bodied, balanced, well-structured and balanced by good acidity. It is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for at least the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Gr. ond supatei Riserva 2004
description: Our 2004 Riserva is a blend of 100% Cabernet Sauvignon from the vineyards of our winery in the Lodi area of Napa Valley. This wine is approachable and drinkable now, but will cellar well for the next two years.  The wine is bright ruby in color with a slight hint of purple.  The aromas offer aromas of ripe fruit, spices, vanilla and cedar with a hint of oak.  The mouthfeel is full and smooth with round, soft tannins.  The wine is enjoyable now, and will cellar well for two to three years.  The final blend is 100% Cabernet Sauvignon.  The wine is drinkable now, but will cellar well for up to five years.  The finish is long and lingering with rich flavors of fruit and spices.  Enjoy this wine now, or cellar it for up to five years.  The wine will be ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to five years.  Serve at room temperature.  This wine is an excellent match for grilled steak, lamb, roasted vegetables, roasted tomatoes, or pasta dishes prepared with roasted tomatoes, vegetables and roasted peppers.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Casthiveza Sunca Brue 2013
description: Lifted aromas of citrus, white peach, pineapple and honeysuckle. Fresh and crisp, with juicy acidity,rent and lingering mineral character, and a mineral, flinty finish.  Flavors mirror aromas with citrus, stone fruit, mineral,flinty and spicy notes.  Well-balanced, crisp, lively, and a long, lingering finish.  A great companion for Asian food and fresh shellfish.

name: Swantis Canter-Leeprit Spalta Cotdmain Philisnorit Creekerd Hines Pease Sauvignon Blanc 2008
description: Bright, clear pale straw with aromas of fresh tropical fruit, lemon grass, green apple and grapefruit. The mouthfeel is round and full with ripe flavors of gooseberry, pear and lemon zest, with a hint of minerality. The overall impression is crisp and refreshing with a clean, lingering finish.

name: Whites Old Hirkstane Zinfandel 2005
description: Our Old Hirkstane vineyards are the oldest in Austria.  This wine is an homage to the great wines of the great winemakers of Austria.  This wine is well-balanced with aromas and flavors of spice, blackberries and cherry, the most typical of Zinfandel.  The tannins are soft and well-integrated and the finish is long and refreshing with a lingering, pleasant aftertaste.

name: Robbaute Santerola 2009
description: Aromas of violets, spices, black cherries, licorice, and vanilla.  The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of tannins and a sweet, ripe fruitiness with soft, round tannins.  The overall impression is full of sweet fruit, balanced by good acidity.  It is a well-balanced, well-rounded wine, with good structure, very good intensity, and long finish.

name: Grateries Ulfarina Vina Il Castel Auiti Pulalo Barolo 2003
description: Vibrant ruby red in color with light garnet tints. The bou reigning aromas are of cherry, raspberry, pepper and violet with a slight suggestion of truffle. The flavor is dry and well-balanced with good acidity and pleasant taste of bitter chocolate.

name: Castra Licio Oli Retary Coltha Resaf Chardonnay 1997
description: Color is a pale straw yellow with greenish reflections.  Aromas are floral, intense and persistent.  Flavor is soft and sweet with good body and long finish.   Recommended with first courses, fish and white meats.  Serve well chilled.   Ideal as an aperitif.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Sonoma Chardonnay 2005
description: Chardonnay grapes are grown primarily in the Sonoma Coast appellation of Sonoma County.  This wine is a blend of fruit from the finest vineyardsflying north and central coast.  Its vibrant, fresh style makes this a great companion for grilled fish, shellfish, pasta dishes with light sauces, white meats and roasted vegetables.  The 2005 Sonoma Chardonnay is the perfect food companion.

name: Tiemil Rachoosse 2010
description: The Rachoosel is one of the most elegant and complex Rieslings in the cellar, with a vibrant acidity and fine, ripe fruit flavors that are balanced by a subtle sweetness. The finish is long, mineral and mineral-driven.  It is an ideal companion for fish in white sauces, and particularly suited for Asian and spicy Asian foods.

name: Barinovaa Zarlan Nanatria Il Grada 2008
description: Deep ruby in color with purple tints. Very intense and complex aromas with the presence of ripe fruit such as blackberry, black cherry Token aromas and mineral tones. Full-bodied, velvety, and well-balanced with good acidity and great intensity.

name: LeERghera Ava Rovore Barbaronco 2000
description: The wine is a deep ruby red with an aroma of violets, cherries, vanilla and herbs.  On the palate, the wine is full and supple with a pleasant, pleasant acidity.  The finish is long and fruity with an aftertaste of cherry.  The wine is best drunk with pasta dishes, grilled and with grilled or roasted red meats.

name: Chateau Caintey Blodon 1998
description: Our 1999 Blodon Caintey Blodon is a complex, intense and mineral driven wine.  The nose shows ripe pear, honey, peach and mineral tones with floral tones.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with round mouthfeel with good acidity, fruit sweetness and mineral complexity.  The finish is long, with balanced acidity and lingering flavors of honey and pear.  The wine has a wonderful balance between sweetness and acidity.  It will cellar well for up to 10 years.  We recommend serving the wine slightly chilled and serve it with shellfish, shellfish cooked in cream sauce, shellfish in cream sauce and light Asian foods.

name: Fattirles Shiraz 2012
description: This Shiraz is deep in color and offers aromas of dried fruits and spice, along with a slight earthiness. The palate has flavors of berries, blackberries, and licorice, with underlying tannins and oak toasty oak. The tannins are soft, silky, and smooth. This is a medium-bodied wine with a long and persistent finish. The wine is delicious now, and will cellar well for up to 5 years.

name: La Swe. Carnourie 2001
description: Aromas of fresh lime, tangerine, flint, and anise with a hint of orange blossom.  This is an elegant wine with flavors of citrus and pear.  The mouthfeel is crisp and refreshing, with good acidity and mineral undertones.   The finish is crisp and lingering.  The wine will cellar well for 2 to 3 years.

name: Prionet Carni Livos Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: This wine has a rich and round wine with ripe fruit aromas and flavors. It has soft tannins and good acidity that adds structure and length. This is an easy-drinking wine that is best consumed on its own or with grilled or grilled fish, poultry, veal, pasta, and mild cheeses.

name: Chateau Lanques Mezracties 1997
description: Cherry-red in color with a hint of violet, this wine offers aromas of ripe fruit, vanilla and tobacco with hints of earthiness.  The wine is soft and round with good structure.  The mouthfeel is round and round with good balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Domaine des Bossettour La Selec 2013
origin: Pays d’Oc, South of France, France
description: A blend of Marsanne, Gewurzt freedoms, Riesling and Chenin Blanc, this wine is more fruity and juicyzens of times. The aromas are ripe and expressive with white peach and pear with floral notes and hints of spice and cinnamon. The mouthfeel is generous and soft, but well balanced by acidity, with flavors of white peach and pear. The overall impression is fresh and fruity with a long and fruity finish.

name: Los Vegles Do Beuguix Domeine Roose ArneHare Get 2017
description: Straw yellow color with golden hues. Aromas of tropical fruit, citrus fruit and grapefruit, plus subtle floral tones. The wine has a fresh, balanced mouthfeel with crisp acidity. Serve well chilled, it is a versatile wine that pairs well with a wide variety of foods.

name: Umy Nalla Merlot 2009
description: Vibrant aromas of ripe cherries, currants and blackberries. The palate is fresh and fruity with pleasingly soft tannins. The balance between fruit and acidity is refreshing with pleasingly pleasant finish. Collection of Bien Nacido Vineyards , Collection of Bien Nacido Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (375ML half-bottle) 2008

name: Ragniam Rerd Blanc 2002
description: VillaKenzie Estate Riesling [origin] Light straw in color.  Vibrant and appealing nose, with hints of honey, apple and pineapple.  A dry and fruity wine with a round and refreshing taste, well balanced and well-integrated oak.  A perfect match for seafood and poultry dishes.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Hiet Pinot Noir 1999
description: The 1999 Hiet Estate Willamette Valley Pinot Noir is an elegant wine with a lovely garnet color.  The nose features ripe raspberry, strawberry and plum aromas with subtle floral and spice tones.  The mouthfeel is round and supple, with mouthwatering acidity and medium weight.  The overall impression is one of soft, ripe fruit flavors and flavors of black cherries, strawberries and raspberries, followed by flavors of spices, vanilla, coffee and leather.  The finish is long with well-balanced tannins.  The wine will continue to improve in the cellar for up to bullpunch.  The wine is delicious now, and will continue to improve for 3-5 years from its release date.

name: Deino de Beaude Perros Rouge 2014
description: Aromas of fresh red cherries, orange peel, and sweet spices. The mouthfeel is round and soft with round, soft tannins that are balanced by bright acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with a juicy mouthfeel and lingering finish.

name: Vaine Pouviede Chalessus Les Blaccion Blaui Naii Cotes de Roope 2015
description: Charmingly fresh, with a light, crisp taste and medium body. A perfect companion for grilled fish in a cream sauce, white meats, white fish, and shellfish cooked in cream sauce.

name: Cranera Casteras Rueservadi Sauvignon
description: An aromatic bouquet of ripe grapefruit, gooseberry and melon with herbal, nutty and nutty-creamed notes. The palate has ripe, full flavoured, fresh and zesty characters with a hint of minerality and a long lingering finish. This wine can be enjoyed chilled on a warm day or as an alternative to Chardonnay.

name: oulal Barablo 2014
description: Intense ruby color with ripe, fresh and intense aromas of black fruits, cherries and violets. The mouthfeel is soft and well-balanced with good acidity. It has a long finish with good length and a pleasant touch of toastiness.

name: Domaine La Necto Ribboet 2000
description: An elegant wine, with a fruity aroma, and refreshing taste, that is especially well-suited for Asian foods and Asian dishes with spicy flavours.  Serve at a temperature of 16ºC (65º F).  wine style: medium-bodied, rich, intense and well-balanced.

name: Zoras Vina Selavic Merlot 2000
description: Vibrant ruby-red with cherry tones.  The aroma is fresh and fruity with hints of fresh red fruits.  In the mouth, the wine is fresh and fruity with very balanced acid minor tannins.  Very well-balanced with good acidity, round and persistent finish.  Perfect with all grilled fish and pasta dishes.

name: Vina Astess Krrieck Cabernet Sauvignon (375ML half-bottle) 2015
description: Aromas of black cherry, vanilla and cedar. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of red and black currants and cherries, with notes of toasted oak, cocoa, coffee, pepper, leather and tobacco. The finish is long, soft and juicy with velvety tannins.

name: Domaine Estate Cabernet Sauvignon Riesling 2000
description: Delicate aromas of ripe melon, apricot, and vanilla with sweet-tart acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with melon, pear, and honey with good balance between sweetness and acidity. The mouthfeel is round and mouth-coating, with a lingering impression of fruit and sweet-tart acidity. The finish is clean and fresh with mineral and spice characteristics.

name: Duhpsace Estates Secectioni Red Blend 2016
description: The aromas of the wine are very floral and floral, typical of the Sauvignon Blanc with hints of ripe red fruits and spices, very typical of the Semillon. The taste is fresh and fresh, and has excellent balance between sweetness and freshness. The structure is full and round, well-balanced with great length on the palate.

name: Barnotte Dose Enmina Encha Ponde Vigne Deglicano Reserva du Gratantolo di 2010
description: Aromas of cherry, raspberry and spicy fruit. On the palate it is soft and fresh, with pleasant acidity and round, smooth tannins. Flavors mirror aromas with fruit, balanced with sweet, round, warm, and long finish. A good match for red meat, game, and cheeses.

name: Bodegan Burancola Dolmenzo Rosso 2015
description: Ruby-red in color, this wine offers expressive aromas of red fruit, blackberries, strawberries, and cherries. On the palate, it is smooth and well-balanced, with good volume and great length. A perfect match for roasted, grilled or grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, poultry, veal, or grilled vegetables.

name: deHentark Estate Chablis Tirdes 2014
description: This is a refreshing and fresh wine with a vibrant yellow-green hue. The nose is very clean and focused with mineral and citrus notes. The mouthfeel is fresh and medium-bodied with a fresh acidity. The wine shows a slight minerality, with a good balance between sweetness and mineral and a good length on the palate.

name: Scherosto Cabernet Sauvignon 1975
description: This is an elegant and round wine with an intense ruby red color.  It is well-balanced in its acidity, alcohol, and tannins.  The nose offers red and black fruit aromas.  The palate is warm and soft with good acidity and a lingering finish.    The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for two to three years.

name: Laegerbar Vineyards Syrah 2016
description: This Syrah is sourced from four vineyards in the southern, cooler end of the Sonoma Coast. It has a deep, dark, ruby color with a hint of purple and aromas of ripe black cherries, cranberries, red berries and baking spices. It is medium-bodied with flavors of blackberries, black cherries, black cherries and caramel, vanilla and cinnamon. The mouthfeel is soft, round and soft with soft tannins and a round, round, long finish. The wine is a great match for grilled or smoked fish, shellfish in cream sauce, grilled poultry and roast vealpunkt. Serve at room temperature.

name: Mairarassanas Cainotternabiere Merlot 1998
description: This Merlot has a great aroma and good balance between the fruit and the wood.  Aged in French oak barrels, the wine is well-structured with a pleasant, lingering finish.  It is a very versatile wine that can be paired with grilled foods, pasta dishes with red sauces, and roast chicken and pork.

name: Guinap Portes Rose 2014
description: The Portes Rose is a delicate rose that is easy to drink, and can be paired with many dishes, especially sushi, sushi-flavored dishes, salads and pasta with a slight touch of basil.  a blend of 50% Grenache, 40% Garellada, 10% Cinsault and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine is made from 70% Garnacha and 30% Garellada grapes, grown on low yields. The resulting wine is an excellent companion to shellfish, light cheeses, and Asian foods. Serve chilled.

name: Domaine du Soras Chavigni-Corumriaich Dobvle Blanc 2016
description: The color is a yellow with greenish reflections.  The bouquet is rich with pear, white flowers, apple and citrus.  On the palate, it is medium-bodied with good acidity and a smooth, fresh finish.  The wine is pleasant and fresh with good body and persistence.

name: PNetella Lria Gantell Vineyard Pinot Noir 2017
description: The 2017 Lria Gantell Vineyard Pinot Noir is a rich and intense wine with fresh aromas of cherry, blueberry, raspberry, and spice. The wine is medium-bodied with flavors of cherries, red and black berries, caramel, licorice, and a hint of dried herbs.
