This is a well-balanced wine with ripe, round tannins that are very present in the mouthfeel and length of the finish. The 2017 Lria Gantell is an excellent match for grilled fish and chicken dishes, as well as dishes with mushrooms, vegetables, roasted vegetables, and roasted vegetables.

name: Caillond Ormehellon Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: Carrick greenish tones, a hint of salinity, mineral and herbaceous notes, gooseberries, lees and herbal undertones. The palate is bright and fresh, with juicy flavors of gooseberries, gooseberries, and citrus, with a hint of mineral and minerality. The palate is full of fresh acidity and long, juicy, juicy mouth-watering finish.

name: Idoma Ridgsalo Vineyard Threer Anting Pinot Noir 2004
description: The 2004 vintage was another fantastic vintage for the Willamette Valley.  The grapes were harvested at the peak of ripeness, and the grapes were hand-harvested at the winery in the cool of the night.  The fruit was destemmed and crushed into temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  After pressing, the juice was racked into stainless steel tanks where it was racked onceGRAND.  The wine was then cold-fermented for three to five days at a low temperature to preserve the fresh acidity of the fruit.  Aromas and flavors mirror aromas with sweet, ripe cherries and raspberries on the nose.  The mouth feel is soft, round, and supple.  The finish is long and lingering with sweet oak, mineral, and spice elements.

name: Wildsrey Beaujo Reserva Evaterio Resaro 2004
description: Vibrant ruby red in color with a vibrant and intense bouquet of red fruits, spices, leather, tobacco, toast, vanilla, mineral and toasty oak. On the palate the wine is well-balanced, well-structured, soft,backbone and well-balanced, fruity, with a good body, soft and smooth, well-balanced, with good acidity, great texture and a long, pleasant and persistent finish.

name: Canora Brane Ste. Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: Pale straw in color, with bright green tints. This wine offers intense aromas of citrus and gooseberry with an underlying mineral edge. The palate offers concentrated flavors of stonefruit, gooseberry and grapefruit, with a good weight and mineral-like grip. The palate is mouthwatering and crisp with good weight and a lingering mineral-like finish.

name: Wax Vinavile Heir Syrah 2001
description: Vibrant and aromatic, with ripe black cherries and spice aromas, with a slight oakiness. A very easy-drinking wine, a good accompaniment to grilled fish, poultry and mild imposing cheeses.  Perfect with Mediterranean cuisine, game and cheese.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Tochorelva Vineyards Barero Riserva 2005
description: Vibrant, ruby red in color, this wine offers an ample bouquet of red fruit and spice. The flavor is warm and PRESSING with soft tannins. A long, pleasant finish.  The wine is best enjoyed now or cellar for five to eight years.,

name: Arnoymaht Red 1998
description: The colour is a bright, intense ruby red with a slight purple rim. The nose is very expressive, with aromas of red and black fruit. The taste is full and balanced, with a sweet and juicy sensation that is well-balanced by sweet and round tannins. It is an elegant wine, well-balanced and with a long finish.

name: Racio Broak & Thenahech Vineyard Pinot Noir 2017
description: This wine is a combination of Oregon and New World style wines. It is very aromatic, full of fresh strawberries and raspberries with just a hint of red pepper and earthy aromas. The mouthfeel is very soft with round anduda fruit, great acidity and flavors of raspberries and cherries.

name: Tata Bara de Eubles Pinot Nali Marozaine Vineyard Zinfandel 2005
description: This wine is a great match for the exotic foods, particularly Asian and Thai dishes, as well as cheeses, prawns, crab and other shellfish.  Serve at room temperature, or temperature will be a better option.  Serve well chilled..

name: Tarlisstlett Starit The Sauvignon Blanc 2008
description: The 2008 Starit The Sauvignon Blanc has intense aromas of grapefruit, gooseberry, gooseberry and grapefruit with an underlying tropical fruit character. On the palate the wine has vibrant, refreshing flavours of tropical fruit, gooseberry, and grapefruit with subtle herbaceous notes. The palate is soft and well-rounded, with an overall impression of rich, ripe fruit with excellent acidity, soft, well-integrated acidity and a lingering mineral and citrus finish. The wine will continue to improve for up to 5 years and can be served slightly chilled.

name: Merra Vina Classico Arlamescio 2011
description: The 2011 Arlamescio has a deep ruby color. The nose offers blackberry and blueberry fruit with notes of white pepper, spice, and tobacco. On the palate, the wine is rich and generous, offering flavors of blackberry and cassis with a touch of pepper. The mouthfeel is soft and well-balanced, with sweet tannins that are well-integrated and well-integrated acidity. The finish is soft and long, with sweet fruit and spice and ripe, well-integrated tannins. The mouthfeel is round and well-balanced with silky and round, round tannins and a hint of anise and nutmeg.  The wine has good acidity, with good structure, and a long, lingering finish.  Enjoy with roasted and grilled meats, lamb, veal and roasted vegetables.

name: Wenth Serepun Ridge Syrah 1998
description: The wine is a deep ruby-colored wine. The nose is bright with aromas of blackberry, pepper, and spice. The flavors mirror aromas with notes of black cherry, currants, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied with flavors of cherry and spice and supple tannins. The finish is long and balanced with well-integrated oak. This wine is an excellent companion to Mediterranean foods, grilled fish, chicken and lighter meats.

name: Arrieta Co Vertinotge 2002
description: Inky black, with aromas of blueberries and black cherries, spices, and anise.  The flavors mirror aromas with a spicy, smoky character, a touch of coffee, and hints of cedar.  This wine is supple and round with supple tannins.  The finish is long and persistent, with hints of spice and toast.  The wine is an excellent match for roasted vegetables, Mediterranean foods, and Mediterranean foods with roasted vegetables.  This wine is best drunk now and will cellar well for 5 to 8 years.

name: Rigell Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: Deep garnet in color with aromas of red and black cherry, tobacco, leather and spice.  The mouth feel is soft, round, with silky tannins and a lingering finish.  This wine pairs well with grilled and roasted foods, pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes, and lighter dishes such as salads and roasted vegetables.

name: Jascetapet Riesling Syrah 2006
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: Excellent as an aperitif and a great prompting to try and pair it with grilled fish and shellfish with a bit of chilli. Also a good companion for roasted vegetables and vegetables in a tomato sauce.  wine

name: Rodd Br Caberes Zinfiney 2001
description: Deep ruby red in color, aromas of fresh blackberries and cherries mingle with the spicy aromas of vanilla, cinnamon, clove and nutmeg. The mouthfeel is round, soft, and generous, with flavors of blackberries and cherries, and some spicy flavors of vanilla and nutmeg. The finish is long with flavors of fresh berries and sweet spices.

name: Jobert Rants Sarsa Vineyards Pinot Noir 2015
description: This Pinot Noir is an elegant wine with bright acidity and soft tannins. The nose offers aromas of black fruits, licorice, and chocolate with underlying notes of white pepper. The mouthfeel is round and juicy with round, juicy tannins and bright acidity. The finish is long and fruity with balanced acidity and lingering fruit flavorsLOS

name: Domaine Espia F. voly Santere Valley Chambolles 2016
origin: Chambolles, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: The Chambollé wine is a well-balanced, round, fresh wine, with mineral notes and fruity aromas. It is fresh and supple, with round, round and ripe tannins.

name: D. Loy Cabernet Saivignes Blancied Vineyard Chardonnay 2004
description: The aromas of this wine mirror the aromas of the aromas of the grapes: rich, ripe, complex, and creamy, with sweet-ripe fruit, floral and spicy aromas, as well as slight mineral components. The flavors mirror aromas with pear, tropical fruit, citrus, melon, and sweet-ripe apple dominating. The mouthfeel is very well-balanced with bright acidity and juicy, well-integrated tannins. The finish is very long, and lingering with flavors of toasty oak antivailing the overall impression of sweetness and balance. The overall impression of this wine is rich and powerful, yet elegant and refined. The mouthfeel of this wine is very balanced with bright acidity and juicy, well-integelfth-ripe fruit, floral and spicy aromas. The overall impression of this wine is rich and powerful, yet elegant and refined. The finish is long, and lingering with flavors of toasty oak and ripe fruit.

name: Compia Amferrol Shiraz 2001
description: The colour is deep, almost opaque. The aroma is lifted, intense and spicy with the typical ripe bandonette characters of Shiraz, typical of ripe wines in the region. The taste is soft and round, with very fine tannins that are well integrated into the wine. The overall impression is one of richness and smoothness, with subtle oak maturation adding complexity.  The finish is long with lingering flavours of sweet ripe fruit, such as blackberry, chocolate, vanilla, nutmeg, truffle and earthy flavours.  This wine can be drunk now, but will cellar well for 3-4 years.

name: Canpini & Ly Alabla Cropboldinel Riesling Reserve Papusitra 2009
description: The wine is very versatile, as well as being a great companion for fish and shellfish, poultry and other foods with light sauces. It also goes well with Asian dishes, Asian foods, Asian food dishes, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods, Asian foods,

name: Bodegas Peyrard Careros Montre d'hive 1998
origin: Nap proceeded by the use of a small percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend.  This wine is medium to full bodied, with very good depth of color and intensity of flavor.  The aromas are classic, with ripe fruit aromas of black cherries and strawberries and floral tones of violet and violet blossom.  On the palate the wine is well balanced and well structured, with soft, round tannins.  The overall impression is balanced and pleasant.

name: Stalz Bruy Zinfandel 1998
description: This wine is a great companion to hearty dishes, especially those that feature peppers, sweet peppers and tomatoes. This wine will continue to improve and gain complexity for a number of years. Serve at room temperature. ..   of the American Tradition of Crafted Wine Cellars by Charles Dehrler, Winemaker

name: Poeue Ama Gyurtane Valley Zinfandol 2012
description: Aromas of red fruit, raspberry, blackberry, black cherry, and chocolate. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with flavors of cherry, raspberry, blackberry, vanilla, and toasty oak. The mouth feel is round and well-balanced with medium-long finish.

name: Nentonowa Zinfancel Classiano 2011
description: The nose offers aromas of ripe fruit, currants, strawberries, cherries, currants and blueberries, with notes of mint, tobacco and spices. On the palate, the wine is round and soft, with velvety, well-balanced tannins, sweetly spiced with cloves and sweet spices, and an outstanding, persistent finish.

name: Fegrin Saint-Nelling PaIUcoina Sastalve 1996
description: Straw yellow in color Trayvon with a delicate bouquet of ripe fruit and floral tones, elegant and refined. In the mouth, it is well-balanced and mellow. It is a well-crafted wine which is refreshing with an excellent finish.  It is the perfect wine to accompany shellfish, and also a good companion to roasted fish.

name: Terruito Genadiona Touco Na Rastitola 2013
description: It is a great match for a wide range of foods including chicken, poultry, veal, pork, veal, chicken and goat cheese. Serve well chilled... . , Mike McGrath

name: Loui Saint-Odo Allarine Rooberne Villages 2007
description: The 2007 Loui Saint-Odo Allarine Rooberne Villarie is a beautiful, dark ruby-purple colored wine with purple hues. It has aromas of raspberry and black cherry with hints of spice. The flavors mirror aromas with red fruits dominating, followed by notes of cocoa and sweet oak. It is full-bodied with sweet, sweet tannins and a long finish. The wine is approachable now, but will cellar well for up to 10 years. It is a great match for grilled fish, roasted poultry, veal and roasted vegetables.

name: Matey Urmans Lauret Fragu du Road Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: A deep ruby red with an aroma of plum, dried cherries and blackberries. The palate is fresh and lively with a complex and fresh mouthfeel. The tannins are well integrated into the ripe fruit flavors with lingering sweet flavours of sweet black cherries, and dried berries.

name: Antorie Chianti Classico d'Vine Zinfandel 2007
description: Chianti Classico d'Vineyard Selection Chianti Classico DOC 2007 exhibits intense, intense aromas of ripe fruit, cherry, blackberry, currant, spices and coffee. Full-bodied, with ripe, round, full-flavored flavors and a long, velvety finish. Ideal as an aperitif, and also pairs well with Mediterranean dishes and hearty cheeses.

name: Sainta Luna Penasecti Pinot Noir 2005
description: The 2005 vintage of our 2005 Pinot Noir Sainta Luna is an exceptional wine. The aromas are vibrant with ripe strawberry, raspberry and a hint of spice. On the palate, the wine is full of flavors of ripe Cecilberries, raspberries and cherries with a hint of orange zest. The mouth feel is round and soft, with round tannins and a long finish.

name: Joseph Emitueres Rothettere Barr Sharino 1999
description: Rothettere is a classic Alsace blend, a wine of finesse, elegance and finesse, of great character, with flavors of melon, pear and fruit.  It is a wine to drink young, but can age well for 4 to 5 years.   It is an excellent companion to Alsace-style dishes, especially dishes prepared with fish and shellfish.

name: Ranvo Sya Rie Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: Aromas of ripe, juicy red and black fruits, cherries, and blackberries, with notes of cedar, vanilla, and nutmeg. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of cherries, blackberries, and red currants with well-integrated, round tannins and good acidity.

name: Ken Rewati Orerataldi Marbioking 2023
description: Maranton, a blend of 60% Sangiovese, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Franc, 20% Syrah, 10% Malbec, 5% Merlot, 5% Syrah, 5% Merlot, 5% Barbera, 5% Barbera, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Barbera, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, 5% Merlot, 5% Barbera, 5% Barbera, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Barbera, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, 5% Sangiovese, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Barbera, 5% Malbec, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon, 5% Merlot, 5% Barbera, 5% Merlot, 5% Barbera, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Syrah, 5% Barbera

name: St. Family Yrupph Gamenarie Vineyard Pes Sechetty Trige Pinot Fris 2008
Jean Santa Jaye Napo 2007
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This is a wine that will pair well with a wide variety of foods, from roasted lamb to grilled salmon to beef tenderloin.  The wine will also pair well with roasted vegetables, grilled vegetables, and vegetables stuffed with roasted tomatoes and roasted eggplant.

name: Attiio Dualba Rosso Ca Coulles de Arnitonta Classico Fr. Famila Syraha 2015
description: Intense ruby-red with violet tones. Bouquet of red fruit and spices with hintsclad in mineral, especially graphite, reminiscent of the typical aromatic profile of this variety, with a touch of truffle and mint. Tannins are well-integrated, pleasant and supple. On the palate, the wine is full-bodied and well-balanced, with good acidity and round, sweet tannins.

name: Concela di Arrenzeau Canpono Anvmaye Orgetra 2007
description: Anvmaye is a blend of the local grapes of the area of Barolo and Cabernet Sauvignon.  The name AnvMaye is an informal reference to the ancient hills where the vineyards are located.  It is a wine with an intense ruby red color and a pronounced bouquet of red fruits and violets.  It is full-bodied and with a pleasant tannic structure.  The flavors mirror aromas with hints of red fruit.  The structure is pleasant and round.  The overall impression is of a wine that is fresh, pleasant and well-balanced.

name: Marcinon Montela Sinch Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: The bouquet is intensely fruity with ripe aromas of black cherries, plums, and raspberries and a touch of leather. The mouthfeel is soft and well-balanced with round, juicy tannins that carry the aromas through the long finish.  The wine will benefit from a few months in the cellar.

name: Grandrio Rossowa Roscia Scostovaine Resolnve 2011
description: Deep ruby red with violet tones.  Full bodied, with ripe fruit flavors, rich texture, pleasant acidity and good persistence.  Rich and elegant.. .    wine-making techniques:  First, a typical wine, slightly sweeter in color, showing good complexity.  Aged in oak barrels for an average of 18 months.  The wine is fresh and fruity, with a good balance between sweetness and freshness.

name: Oasto Kamondabernamig Reserve Selbers Diaminti Chardonnay 1999
description: This wine is a classic example of the style of a great Chardonnay.  Its varietal character is unmistakable, with intense aromas of peach, pear, and citrus, followed by subtle notes of toast, butter, and toastiness.  The mouthfeel is rich and round, with well- Initial, round, well-balanced acidity that contributes to itsasked foods.

name: Barrer Hewinta Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: Deep ruby in color with intense aromas of black cherries and plums, and hints of minerals, herbs, and chocolate.  The flavors mirror aromas with supple, well-integrated tannins, with an appealing, long finish.  and is an excellent match for grilled or roasted red meats, especially steamed or grilled vegetables.  Serve at a temperature of 15-18 degrees C.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Torrosol Cote de Follerola Zapa Blanco Reserva Il Checinino TelaVe
description: The wine is characterized by a bright yellow color and a fruity nose. Its aroma is characterized by green apple, white peach, green apple, and citrus fruit notes. In the mouth it is dry and medium bodied with good acidity, good balance between sweetness and freshness, and good length.

Fiddlestix Vineyards Pinot Gris 2003 [response] Grigio is the most widely-distributed grape variety in the Willamette Valley.  The aromas are vibrant, yet floral and fresh, with aromas of pear, grapefruit and honeysuckle.  The mouthfeel is crisp, lively and refreshing with refreshing flavors of melon, tropical fruit and mineral notes. clouds, beeswax and mineral notes are evident on the long, smooth finish.  Our favorite food wines are those that are crisp, with the acidity being low and the alcohol being moderate, making them very food-friendly.  The wine is an excellent companion for a wide variety of foods.  The wine is best consumed chilled and is best enjoyed chilled on a warm day.

name: Eisen de Vineyards Family ZinlaGe Downel Riys Lesp Syrah 2015
origin: Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Aromas of blackberries, lavender and black cherries with hints of vanilla, vanilla, and clove. The flavors mirror aromas with blackberries, blackberries and blueberries dominating the mid-palate. The mouthfeel is juicy and fresh with great mouth-coating structure and a rich texture. The finish is long and lingering with flavors of spice and chocolate, as well as fine-grained, soft tannins.

name: Willhand Laneaf Colrs Banbard Russian Felangh Vineyard Pinot Noir (375ML half-bottle) 2011
description: The Colrads is a classic example of Oregon style Pinot Noir, combining intense aromas and flavors of ripe cherry, blackberry and black pepper with aromas of spice, toasted oak and sweet earth. The mouthfeel is full-bodied and supple, with rich, sweet, round and juicy tannins. This is a great match for roasted andarkin vegetables, grilled fish, veal and hearty dishes with meat sauces.

name: Bodegas Winery Vineyard Syrah 2001
description: This vintage is very unique and varietal, and will cellar well for the next two to three years.  The aromas of ripe black fruits and spice are present in the aromas and flavor profile.  The wine is soft, round and supple, with flavors of ripe cherries and plums with a touch of vanilla.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced, supple and full-bodied, with firm but supple tannins.  The finish is long, pleasant and pleasing.  The wine will drink well now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 situated years.   This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.  We suggest matching the aromas and flavors of this wine with grilled meats, poultry and spicy foods.

name: La Campolle Mendoor Barrolo Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2015
description: Sauvignon Blanc with a pale yellow color. Aromas of citrus and melon, with delicate notes of honeysuckle.  The palate is fresh and crisp, with pleasant flavors of citrus and mineral.  Well-balanced acidity and roundness, the wine is well-balanced on the finish.

name: Parima Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: Rich aromas of cassis, boysenberry and blueberry. Flavors mirror aromas with a sweet entry, round mouth feel, juicy mouth feel and sweet mid-palate, balanced by silky, round tannins. This is an elegant, well-balanced wine with great balance and a long, refreshing finish.

name: Dom. Yanbeltor St. Ama Parnet Vriero 2012
description: This wine has a deep, ruby red color and a touch of violet. The nose is typical of Parnet, with black and red fruits, pepper and floral aromas. The mouthfeel is full and very pleasant with good balance between fruit, acidity and alcohol. The tannins are very well integrated, silky and elegant, providing a nice round mouthfeel.

name: Ailamiere Chateau Savery Cote de la Terieure 1994
description: This classic blend of 90% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 10% Cabernet Franc, has a deep ruby-red color.  The nose is very complex with aromas of black fruits, spices, mineral, and toast.  The mouthfeel is well-rounded with soft, round, and well-rounded tannins.  The aftertaste is long with spicy flavors of oak and caramel.

name: Woltan Albass Esteteau Roose 2016
description: This wine is a blend of all the lots of our estate vineyards in the Napa Valley. Our goal for Albass Esteteau Roose is to produce a wine with depth and complexity with aromas of cherry, black currant, vanilla, and cocoa. The wine opens with aromas of dark fruits, red cherries, and blackberries. The mouthfeel is soft and round with nice fresh acidity and lingering flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Righers Temogno Branh Sangovasera 2011
description: Straw yellow in color with light greenish hues. Intense and complex bouquet with mineral and floral tones with floral hints and citrus aromas. Fresh, clean and dry, it is a full bodied wine with nice weight and a pleasant acidNH acidity. Pair with seafood dishes with flavors of citrus, bananas and pineapple.

name: Ince Montera de lova Rayner Cras 2016
description: The wine is deep ruby red in color, with a nose of ripe fruit, violets and chocolate. It has a soft, round mouthfeel with excellent volume and roundness. The tannins are round and sweet with a hint of vanilla.  and Good structure, long and fresh on the finish. It can be paired with a wide variety of foods such as beef, lamb, pork, veal, and pasta dishes. Serve at a temperature of 18-20ºC.

name: Beyner Oles Albey Chardonnay 2000
description: Pale yellow color. Fresh aromas of tropical fruit, citrus and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, with great acidity, a firm and well-balanced structure and a long, fruity finish., by Patrick J. Woodman, Winemaker

name: Cakesserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: Intense ruby red color with ripe plum, black cherries and a touch of dried fig and pepper. In the mouth, the wine is well-balanced with pleasant and round tannins. A very elegant wine with a long and persistent finish.,  winegrowing and cellaring suggestions

name: Faliery Vineyards Zinfandel 2013
description: This classic Zinfandel offers up intense aromas of dark fruit, cherry, currants, and toasty oak with vanilla tones. The wine has big, juicy flavors of blackberry, dark cherry, and cranberry with hints of toasted vanilla, baking spice, and sweet oak. The finish is soft and supple, with lingering flavors of dark chocolate, mineral, and sweet oak. It is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for 3 to 5 years.

name: Redfonsassen-Pinatres Whitee Treseementan Rieslogn 2036
description: Lively and juicy, this wine shows excellent balance between sweetness and crispness. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of spicy notes. An easy-drinking wine with an appealing mouthfeel. Serve slightly chilled. Whitehall apple tart

name: Habardi Chardonnay 2016
description: The wine shows its freshness and fruitiness with mineral and mineral notes, with a hint of toasted notes. The aromas on the nose are floral and fruity, with green apple and pear, complemented by subtle citrus notes. On the palate it is medium-bodied with good concentration, freshness, and crisp acidity.

name: Alble Roblia Coasta Somaese Chardornay 2009
description: The 2009 Alble Chardornay is a blend of all estate vineyards. Aromas of blackberry, ripe raspberry, and blueberry with floral and spicy elements. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet and ripe fruit, hints of toast, sweet spice, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft and round with silky smooth tannins. This wine is a perfect food companion for grilled or lightly roasted vegetables and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes and tomatoes, especially with dishes that include roasted vegetables, roasted tomatoes and garlic, and rich sauces with cream sauce. Serve at room temperature or warmer with a cheese plate. Serve at 50 degrees F.

name: Hens Road Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Our 1999 Cabernet Sauvignon, from our Estate vineyards, is a classic wine with a deep ruby/purple color and a nose of currants, blackberries, cherries and toast.  The mouthfeel is soft and full, with sweet and silky tannins.  The Exposure is relatively high with the result of a cool growing season and great early ripening in the grapes, resulting in a wine with intense fruit flavors of blackberries, cherries, and blueberries with a touch of chocolate and oak.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of fruit, vanilla and sweet oak.  The wine will cellar well for five to eight years, and will benefit from decanting an hour or two before serving.

name: Janencad Rouvist Dury Wines Merlot 2004
description: This wine is a blend of 80% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Sauvignon.  Aromas of juicy plum, cherries, vanilla, and toast.  Rich flavors of black cherries, currants, and chocolate.  Well-rounded tannins on the finish.  The wine is best enjoyed chilled and will continue to improve in the cellar for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Aive Cellars-Asano Vineyards Cabernet Merlat (AU Ill Labal) 2009
description: The 2009 vintage is a blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, and Malbec. The wine is made in the classic Bordeaux style with a small percentage of the blend being barrel aged in French oak for 11 months. The nose offers complex aromas of vanilla, chocolate, and cedar with cherry and berry notes. The mouth feel is rich with flavors of black cherry, chocolate, and toasted oak. The wine is soft and supple with good balance between the acidity and tannins. The finish is long with lingering fruit and spices. This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 3 to 4 years. The wine is enjoyable now, and will cellar well for the next 3 to 4 years.

name: Sayne Ji Salots Palfack Hiltstur Yallack Vineyard Zignot 2015
description: The 2015 Sayneji Salots Palfack Hiltstur Yallack Vineyard Zignot is an intense wine with aromas of ripe blackberry, vanilla, and brown sugar, and a hint of toastiness. The mouthfeel is smooth and rich with juicy flavors of dark fruit, cherry, and cocoa with smooth tannins and good acidity. The wine is medium bodied with a long finish. We suggest opening an hour before drinking this wine.

name: Willum Carneros Pinot Grigigo 1999
description: sometime before the arrival of the great Burgundy wine regions of the Côte de Nuits, Italian immigrants from the Carneros region of California sought to make their own unique interpretation of the varietal.  These wine regions were known for their terroir, with each contributing a distinct element to the overall impression.  The Nero d'Avola vineyards, which are farmed by the Winery, are one of the oldest in the region, dating back to the early 1950s.  The vineyards are located in the San Pablo Bay, Marin and Santa Maria Valleys.  The winery is located at the top of a steep ridge in the Santa Maria Valley.  The soil is mostly loess with some alder.  The climate is cool and steady throughout the growing season.  The winery practices an open-top fermenter that allows for maximum extraction of flavor.  The wine is then pressed to stainless steel tanks for the malo-lactic fermentation.  The wine is racked off the lees and bottle aged in stainless steel.  The finished wine is medium-bodied, with flavors of fresh pear, citrus and honeysuckle.  This is an excellent food companion.  The

name: Folardun Kpreis Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The wine has aromas of cherry and blackcurrant, ripe blackberries, plum, blackberries, blueberries and black cherries. It has a medium-bodied flavor profile with well-balanced acidity and well-integrated tannins. The wine is well-balanced and has a good, long-lasting finish. It acetates well with grilled foods, roasted vegetables, chicken and roasted meats.

name: Tourmoneise Gries Seglingne Welan Ungio Montoi delba 2013
description: Intense ruby red in color with some green hues. Fruity, elegant nose with cherry, berry and floral aromas. Fresh and easy to drink, a good balance between acidity and sweetness. The flavor is well balanced, fresh and balanced. It is a nice fresh and balanced wine with good structure. It is a good match for Mediterranean and Mediterranean dishes with Mediterranean herbs, Mediterranean foods in sauces, roasted vegetables, grilled meats, poultry and roasted vegetables.

name: Vioteli Farlico di Vinea Moncal Grane Chardonnay 2008
description: The color is pale straw with greenish tones. The nose is very intense with ripe fruit, especially apple, citrus, pear, and pineapple with subtle hints of toast. The palate is balanced and full of fresh fruit, rested in barrel for a year and a half before bottling. The acidity is perfectly integrated and the mouthfeel is well-rounded and round, with a round, lingering finish.

name: Chateau de Rioja Cormet Bouusgot etsett Granie-Redel Dengioflas Cuveen PaKlium Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The color is a brilliant and bright yellow with bright green reflections. On the nose, aromas of fresh fruit, citrus and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is fresh and balanced, with pleasant acidity, well-integrated and mineral notes. The mouth-watering and persistent finish leaves an impression of ripe fruit, mineral, and fresh herbs.

name: Arri Oaken Pinot Noir 2009
description: Opaque and garnet in color with aromas anticipated by aromas of cherry, currant, strawberry, and red fruits. Flavors mirror aromas with aromas of cherry, cranberry, strawberry, and pomegranate with a hint of orange zest and spices. The mouth feel is medium-bodied, well-balanced, and medium-fresh. This is a medium-bodied wine with well-integrated tannins and good length. The finish is long, clean, and crisp with good acidity. It will age well for the next 5-10 years.

name: Forgela Evaramino Vineyard Cabernet Meretante Voit Kulbead Chardonnay 2008
description: The 2008 Estate Chardonnay is a complex wine with ripe, bright acidity. On the nose, there are aromas of pineapple, citrus and mineral. On the palate, it is a fresh, juicy wine with a pleasant and pleasant finish.

name: Litelly Disinnia Colsano Posquo Mecco Cavettia Marega Hastianno 2006
description: This wine offers an elegant, fruity and well-balanced wine with pleasant aromas of cherry, raspberry, currant, and sweet spices. The taste is smooth and well-balanced with well-balanced acidity, soft tannins, good persistence and a fruity aftertaste.

name: Taista Fa Chia ordsnary Laboccia Ca lare L'Avem) 2004
description: The colour is a deep garnet red with good intensity and intensity.  On the nose, the wine is very typical of the varietals:  Aromas of red fruits, particularly cherries, plums and spices.  On the palate, the wine is well balanced with good body, round and well-integrated tannins and a long finish.

name: Stigey Metzain Cabeok Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: The wine is deep ruby in color with aromas of ripe berry, spice and licorice. The palate is full-bodied and full of flavor, with well-integrated oak and ripe, well-ripened tannins. The wine is well-balanced, with a well-balanced acidity, good balance and a long finish. The wine will continue to improve for 4-5 years and is ready to drink now.

name: R'Elpovarrit Setres Cabernet Staric, Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: We feel that this wine is one of the best expressions of the vintage. The blend is comprised of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Franc. The result is a blend of fruit that is ripe, soft and flavorful with a lingering finish. The wine is a perfect match for grilled meats, game, poultry, lamb, vegetables, and Mediterranean dishes.

name: Conqyoma Estate Brownes Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: Intense ruby red color with violet tones.  Aromas of black fruits and blackberries.  The mouthfeel is full and well-rounded, with soft, round tannins, well-balanced acidity and pleasant, lingering finish.

name: Tredel Nolle Patciianes Rieslinge Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5L Magnum) 2013
description: This wine is a great companion for shellfish, sushi, white meats, chicken, fish in cream sauces, and grilled vegetables.  It also is an excellent accompaniment to Asian foods, sushi, Chinese food and white sauces.

name: Domaine Jas Chastbio San/Vegruges Cote de Stiamit 2015
description: The color is a brilliant ruby. Aromas are fresh, vibrant, fruity and spicy. On the palate, the wine is fresh, balanced, and very pleasant.   with good concentration, and a touch of bitter red fruits rightly characterized by red fruit, currant, and raspberry. A long, fruity finish.

name: Chateau Fromrath aodnryurus Presed La Beput 2015
description: Vibrant and fresh, this wine offers the most fresh and appealing expression of the variety with fresh and spicy flavors of pear, white flowers, grapefruit and grapefruit, followed by mineral and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is full-bodied, fresh and well-balanced with a pleasingolean																		IR																																												 Stur																																																																										 Xavier   The

name: Chateau St. MeaKed-Brainione 2014
description: Intense ruby red color with aromas of ripe fruit and spicy notes. The palate is soft, round and well-balanced with round and rounder tannins. Ideal for Mediterranean cuisine, game, grilled, roasted, roasted vegetables, white meats, pasta, rice, rice and pasta dishes with red sauces.

name: Domaine Merlot Redt Cailloiro La Nevra Rozovo Nodra Oncico Vina Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: A ruby red wine with a slight greenish tint, a very aromatic wine with vinous and sweet tones. Medium bodied, pleasant, soft and well-balancedESA																												 deterrent  V																								olean 																																																												wright

name: Fata Paramoldy Horte Nes Vineyard Malbere Zinfandel 2002
description: This Malbere is a delightful wine that delivers aromas of spicy cherry and cranberry fruit with sweet oak and oak spices. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of spice from the oak and round and silky tannins. The wine finishes with a lingering finish of soft fruit and vanilla.

name: Ehney Pinot Noir 2017
description: The 2017 Pinot Noir Estate Pinot Noir offers up an expressive nose of dried cherries, strawberries and sweet spices. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of dried red cherries, red fruits, and a hint of floral tones. The mouthfeel is generous and soft with fresh acidity. The finish is long and pleasing. The wine will pair well with lamb, duck, and game.

name: Franinmard Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The wine has a deep ruby red color and a very intense nose, with black fruit and floral tones. The palate is soft and well-balanced, with round and soft tannins. The wine shows good complexity in the mouthfeel, with a long and lingering finish.

name: Balo Rucema Wire Pardeagnaita Grone Elles Syrah 1999
description: Deep ruby-red in color with light brick hues.  The bouquet offers classic varietal aromas of cherry and plum with a touch of anise.  The taste is full-bodied with balanced acidity.  On the palate, the wine is soft and fruity, with velvety, round tannins.  The ceases-mineral character is well-balanced with an agreeable, long, fresh finish.  This wine is ready to drink now, but will continue to improve for the next 3-5 years.  Recommended with grilled meats and red-sauced pasta dishes.

name: Pophino Chardonnay 2005
description: The 2005 Chardonnay has intense aromas of fresh ripe tropical fruit, apple and pear with hints of vanilla and oak. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of toasty oak and toast. The mouthfeel is well-balanced with well-integrated oak on the palate, and a long and smooth finish. This wine is a great match for grilled fish, shellfish in cream sauce, chicken in cream sauce, and soft cheeses.

name: Kiuge Laggy Rosha Vhichit Reserve Chardonnay 2002
description: Laggy Rosha Vhichit is a versatile food companion. The wine is well-suited to dishes with fish and shellfish in cream sauce, and to chicken, veal, and grilled vegetables.  Serve slightly chilled..  wine  wine

name: Challe Ttabond Welles Valley Mellui Blancio Riserva 2013
description: The well-drained, sandy soils of the Riserva Mellui are the main source for the production of this wine. This is a dry, rich wine with aromatic intensity and great finesse. The color is light yellow with greenish reflections. The bouquet is typical of the Riserva, with notes of citrus, mineral and a slight mineral touch. On the palate, it is round, fruity and well- recipented, well balanced and elegant, with a lingering finish.

name: Hanssiet Cabernet Sauviognion Sanonzhingarc Rouingnaneserve Cabernet Sauvignon (375ML half-bottle) 2000
description: The aromas of the wine are intensely fruity with intense notes of cherry and currant. The wine is well-balanced and well-structured with ripe, soft tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Heul Cabernut Sauvignon 2011
description: The 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon from the Languedoc Valley of South of France is the perfect match for grilled meats, game and dishes prepared with roasted vegetables. A good match for a wide variety of cheeses.

name: Castona di Moncyurtranes Chardonnay 2014
description: Enjoy this wine as an aperitif or with a wide range of seafood such as grilled sea-shells,26 to 32 degrees Fahrenheit, or baked lobster. It is also a good companion to white meats, such as poultry, veal and veal in cream sauce, white veal chops, chicken on the grill or in a light, creamy sauce.

name: Geyalborn Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine will pair well with grilled fish and flavorful vegetarian dishes such as braised vegetables, vegetable eggplant, roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables. This wine is also an excellent match for grilled and lightly smoked meats such as veal chops, lamb chops, eggplant and roasted vegetables.

name: Fradichi Hill-Gupiano 2016
description: Intense ruby red in color, this wine offers fresh aromas of fresh cherries, plums, blackberries, cherries and strawberries with hints of coffee and vanilla. On the palate, it is a well-balanced wine with balanced acidity, sweet tannins and good body.

name: Pinerre Rose di Montollie 2011
description: Pale pink color with ruby highlights.  Intense and fresh aromas, ripe and fruity with notes of red berries, strawberries, cherries and raspberries, accompanied by delicate mineral tones.  Fresh and pleasant taste, with well-balanced acidity, minerality and excellent persistence.  It is an excellent summer aperitif, it also goes well with shellfish, poultry and soups.

name: Angello Canaroraia 2014
description: Annie’s Vineyards Petite Sirah, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Malbec - Merlot brings a slight earthiness and aromatics while the Cabernet Sauvignon adds structure, sweetness, and roundness. The Malbec adds a hint of red fruit flavors, the Cabernet Franc adds floral tones, the Merlot adds richness and roundness, and the Petit Verdot adds aromas of spice, and the Cabernet Franc adds a touch of earthiness. This wine is an excellent pairing with grilled steak, roast lamb, veal chops, roast turkey, roast pork chop Military style, and grilled steamed vegetables.

name: Bonfen te Shenas Coter 2005
description: We believe that the best wines are the ones that have the most personality.ENSEESTERED FOOD PAIRINGS: Our winemaker likes to pair our Chardonnay with a wide range of foods including fish, chicken, and pasta with fresh and bright sauces, creamy and mild cheeses, and Asian foods UFC

name: Granvionnas Gren Valley Kny Rose Estate Alvest Serua 2007
description: Straw-yellow with light pink reflections. Intense aromas of red fruit and citrus. Fruity and fresh on the palate with good acidity and freshness., New York, July 14, 2010  aromas of red fruit, spices, honey, and rose petal. Fresh and bright, with good acidity, full body, and lingering finish. A great wine to Understanding of a great vintage.

name: Grunmiellier Chardonnay 2000
description: The wine has a pale golden color and intense aromas of white-fleshed fruit with hints of vanilla.  On the palate, the wine is round and creamy with flavors of ripe fruit and a touch of spice.  The wine is well-balanced with a long, clean finish.  The wine can be paired with a wide variety of foods including fish, shellfish, poultry, light pasta dishes, white meats and Asian dishes.

name: Wentswott bonder Vineyard Pinot Noir 2000
description: The wine shows great color and intensity, with the aromas of ripe fruit and spices typical of the varietal. The flavors mirror aromas with the mouth filling mouth feel is soft and well balanced. The finish is long with good acidity. The wine will cellar well for up to five years and will pair well with lighter foods.

name: Freront Mary Cabernet Sauvignon Bencs-San Gilae Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: Vibrant ruby color with orange tones. The bouquet is clean, fruity, with a hint of chocolate and toasted oak.  The taste is soft, supple, pleasant and well-balanced, with ripe, round tannins.

name: Closse Charsonnay Valley Pinot Grigiu 2014
description: This wine shows a light straw color. The aromas are aromatic with tropical fruit and citrus with hints of flint and minerals. The mouthfeel is full, with ripe, soft and round mouth feel with great balance between alcohol and acidity. The wine is well-balanced and elegant with a crisp acidity. The finish is long with citrus and mineral notes.  Serve well chilled.

name: Turrazs Widerremery Resarde Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: With deep red and black color with intense aromas of ripe cherries, strawberries and dark chocolate. Medium-bodied with good acidity. Smooth tannins and a long and fruity finish.  fermentation, aging in French oak for 8 months, and with 8 months in bottle before being released.

name: Ro Tem. Ensantiks Chardonnay 2012
description: The 2012 vintage was ideal for quality fruit with exceptional concentration. The wine displays classic aromas of stone fruit, fresh-cut flowers and tropical fruit with a touch of buttery, toastiness. The palate is fresh, crisp and well-balanced with juicy and lingering flavours of citrus and fresh melon.

name: Kiladi Rieslign Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: The wine is a deep ruby red color with intense aromas of black fruits with nuances of toasted and ripe spices. The mouthfeel is soft and round with ripe, sweet tannins, which give good length and persistence.  wine. The wine is a blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% Merlot, and 10% Cabernet Franc.  The blend of grapes for the wine is 50% of the blend being sourced from the estate vineyards in the Colchagua Valley.  The wine is aged for 24 months in French oak.  The blend includes 11% of the wine being matured in stainless steel tanks and 12% in a mix of neutral oak barrels.  The wine is a blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 12% Merlot, and 10% Cabernet Franc.

name: Fessroui Valley Cabernat Sauvignon 2014
description: This is a bold wine that will pair well with roasted meats, charcuterie, rich sauces and cheeses.  It will also pair well with game, chicken, veal, pork tenderloin and mature cheeses., the 2014 vintage of this wine will cellar well for up to five years.  The 2014 vintage of this wine will cellar well for up to five years.  The 2014 vintage of this wine will pair well with roasted meats, charcuterie, rich sauces and cheeses.

name: Schith Lares Vialos Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Vialos Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of cherry, blueberry, vanilla, caramel and leather with fresh black pepper and sweet tobacco leaf notes. On the palate, the wine is full bodied with juicy blackberry and blueberry flavors with a hint of leather. It is balanced with sweet tannins and good acidity. The finish is soft with lingering sweet tannins and soft acidity. This is a very approachable wine with a well-balanced acidity. Pair with grilled fish, poultry, and pork. Serve well-chilled or at room temperature.

name: Soreno Wintre Led Riesling 2017
description: The 2017 Wintre Led Riesling has a pale straw color. It is bright and clear with green tints. The nose is fresh, fruity and very elegant. The mouth is balanced and fresh with a slight sweetness. The wine is well-balanced and well-structured. The acidity is fresh attaining a balanced and fresh taste.

name: Robash Ridge Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: A blend of gooseberry and grapefruit flavors with a fresh acidity, great intensity and great length. It is crisp and refreshing with refreshing acidity and mineral, ripe stonefruit and citrus flavours. Serve well-chilled, between 56 and 58 degrees F. Serve at cellar temperature, and enjoy within 1 to 2 hours.

name: Owewito Colatours 2015
description: Complex aromas of cherry, blackberry, violet, and leather. The palate features flavors of blackberry, black cherry, and raspberry, with spicy notes of clove and cinnamon. The wine has soft and round tannins that are balanced by a mouth-coating acidity.

name: Teruta Ne 1 Orri Pinot Grigio 2007
description: Straw-yellow color with golden highlights. Aromas are of pear, peach, pineapple, mango and citrus, combined with hints of floral and sweet-ripe notes. The mouthfeel is round and soft with sweet-ripe, honey, fruit and fruity flavors, balanced by pleasant acidity. The wine is full-bodied, well-balanced, and pleasant to drink.

name: AuGoin Shirez Verdel 2015
description: Shirez Verdel is a blend of Tempranillo, Grenache, and Merlot. It has a dark garnet color with aromas of ripe red fruit and cherry, with a touch of spicy notes. The mouthfeel is soft, round and fresh with good structure and a pleasant, round and well-rounded finish. A very versatile wine that can be paired with a wideookie range of foods.

name: Brickack Mongainy Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Mongainy Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep, deep ruby red color. The nose is lifted by blackcurrant, spice, black cherry and toasty oak. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with a silky mouth feel and a long finish. The wine is approachable now, and will cellar well for 2- 3 years.

name: Buringa Malbec Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (3 Lithlos 1999
description: A deep garnet red in color, with a touch of violet.  On the nose, there is a fine, round mouthfeel, which is characteristic of Malbec.  The aroma is fresh and intense, with an excellent combination of fresh fruit and toastiness.  The mouth feel is medium-bodied, with good balance between the wine's acidity and the sweetness of the fruit.  The finish is long, pleasant and persistent.

name: Bocksasepulee Estate Mogrand Unenzs Pinot Noir 2017
description: An approachable wine with ripe flavors of red fruit, especially strawberries, cherries and red cherries, and mineral notes with a touch of licorice. Medium bodied with silky smooth tannins and good acidity, with a long, round finish.

name: Alewallo Riserva Merloti 2001
description: This wine shows the complexity of the varietal and the personality of the grapes with a delicate cherry-red color and an intense bouquet of ripe fruit and toast, with a touch of vanilla and spice.  The wine is full-bodied and well-balanced with a long and lingering finish.  A good companion for red meat dishes, poultry, and pasta with rich sauces.  It can also be paired with rich dishes such as cheeses, pasta dishes with tomato sauces and spicy foods.

name: Leishard Paruan Criai 2007
description: Vivid and vibrant ruby-red in color with attractive violet tones, Leishard’s Paruan Criai is a blend of 100% Carmenere and aged in a mixture of American and French oak.  Its intense fruit and floral aromas are complemented by hints of toastiness from barrel aging.  On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with juicy, well-integrated, ripe tannins.  The finish is long, fruity, and well-balanced, with a touch of oak and a touch of sweetness.

name: Cliileai Lato Fontanna Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Lifted aromas of ripe cherries, cassis, blackberries and plums, with spicy and mineral tones. Inatonably supple, with a mouthwatering attack and a spicy and sweet finish..  with ripe and balanced tannins.  The 2012 is well-rounded and smooth, with good acidity.  The wine has a very long and persistent finish.

name: Ardol Wines Binandi Vineyard Stocchont Esofa Palco 1998
description: A very dark garnet color, with aromas of fresh cherry, blackberry, vanilla, clove and toast. The flavors mirror aromas with hints of ripe cherry, blackberry, sweet oak, vanilla, spice and oak vanilla.  The mouthfeel is round, soft and generous, God only knows what they did to this wine!  The finish is long and pleasing, full of flavors and aromas.

name: Betoo lian Duscant Malbec 2015
description: Aromas of ripe cherries and blackberries. The wine has an intense mouthfeel with mouth-coating, soft, round tannins and good length. The tannins are present but well integrated. An excellent companion to Mediterranean cuisine such as grilled vegetables, vegetables and roasted peppers.. An excellent companion to grilled vegetables, fish, game and lamb.

name: Fevilleyard Merlot/Fuill Pinot Noir 2014
description: An inviting garnet color, this wine has aromas of ripe cherry, raspberry, pomegranate and a hint of violet. On the palate, this wine offers flavors of ripe cherries and red currants, with a touch of dried herbs. The wine has medium body, soft tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Chateau de Bourge Paury Lesin Grand Clio 2017
description: In the glass, this wine shows deep red color with purple and black tones. Aromas are fresh and delicate with black fruit, licorice and floral tones. This is a fresh wine with pleasant and soft tannins..

name: Chateau Ja Rouge Viigle Robbo 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of the Viigle Robbo is very expressive and complex with aromas of black cherries, red berries and a touch of vanilla. brilliantly complex with layers of flavor that mirror aromas with black cherry, dried fruit, spice and mineral tones. Rich and round with sweet and spicy flavors that mirror aromas with an elegant, velvety mouthfeel. The mouth feel is round and generous with a nice balance of sweetness and firm but supple tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of blackberry and cassis, hints of toasty oak and toasty oak. The wine is drinking well now but will cellar well for the next 3 to 4 years. The Viigle Robbo is an ideal match for roasted game, barbequed steak, lamb or grilled steak with a cherry sauce. It is also a great companion to hearty pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes, roasted vegetables, roasted tomatoesoints and roasted vegetables and even with roast chicken with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables.

name: Sait CaCramRel Barbertereck Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: A deep garnet in color with a light purple rim, the wine has lifted aromas of blackberry, blackcurrant and fresh leather with underlying notes of vanilla and cocoa. The palate is rich and generous with the same flavours with a touch of spice and vanilla, supported by soft, yet supple tannins. The wine is approachable now and will cellar well for at least 3-4 years.

name: Kentotson Cabernret Mongane Pinot Noir 2015
description: This wine is an exceptional wine with classic aromas of cherry, rose petal, cedar, and orange blossom. It is very approachable now, but will cellar well for the next 3 to 5 years. The mouthfeel is soft and round with flavors of blackberry, plum, currant, nutmeg, and a hint of fresh earthiness. The finish is long, soft, and juicy, with well-integrated tannins. The wine will pair well with grilled fish, roasted vegetables, roast vegetables with roasted tomatoes, and roasted vegetables and cheeses.

name: Frogling Fransend Unk Chardonnay 2002
description: The grapes for this wine were selected from the Estate Vineyards, including the two vineyards located in the Umpqua Valley, in the northern part of the Willamette Valley.  The wines are bright and refreshing with a crisp, clean acidity and well-balanced, mouth-filling texture.  The fruitiness of the wine is enhanced by the use of malo-lactic fermentation.  The resulting wine is fresh and fruit-forward, with balanced acidity and soft, round, lingering tannins.

name: Bonoma Holray Rigalo Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: The nose is elegant with notes of blackberry, licorice, and a hint of chocolate. The mouth is full and soft, with flavors of ripe fruit and a touch of chocolate. The finish is long with fine, soft tannins.  The wine is an excellent companion for roasted and grilled red and white meats, pasta dishes with red sauces, and game.

name: Zinos Pinot Noir 2006
description: Lively aromas of raspberry, strawberry and blackberry, with vanilla, anise and black pepper.  The flavors mirror aromas with raspberry, blackberry and cherry, sweet and round with a touch of anise.  Soft, round tannins with a nice balance between acidity and sweetness.

name: Temas Reserva 2014
description: This wine is deep garnet in color, with a hint of orange. It has a fruity and spicy nose, with attractive black fruit aromas and a touch of floral notes. The mouthfeel is soft, velvety and very round, with well-balanced acidity and good body. It is a well-structured wine, with good balance between sweetness and freshness. It has good length and freshness, with soft tannins and good acidity, making it an easy-drinking wine, which can be paired with a wide variety of food.

name: Altouna Santa Classis 2005
origin: Spain pricing info: The wine is bright, pale yellow in color with green highlights. The nose is full of fresh fruit, white flowers, citrus and a hint of white pepper. The mouthfeel is very soft and round, with nice acidity and good minerality. The finish is long, fresh and clean. The wine is an excellent companion to dishes with seafood, particularly the local white fish.

name: Colivessinodolo Il Kiomasson Plesce Sandrina Portiniere Chardonnay 2000
description: Coliviss' signature style: an elegant, harmon infiltrate, soft, velvety, creamy, and aromatic wine with a slight almond-like flavor.  Pairs well with fish, chicken, veal, and mild cheeses.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Vaakes 6 Wine Sauvignon Blanc 2005
description: The 2005 vintage of our Estate-grown Estate Sauvignon Blanc is a bright, refreshing wine with vibrant aromas of citrus, grapefruit, and tropical fruit, followed by floral aromas of honeysuckle and melon. Flavors mirror aromas with bright flavors of green apple, grapefruit, and pineapple with a touch of minerality. The wine is bright and refreshing with a crisp, clean, and mouthwatering finish.

name: Deritagon Wellead Pinot Noir 2006
description: Our 2006 Wellead Pinot Noir is a lively, youthful wine with the flavor profile of strawberries and cherries with the tannin structure and elegance of well-rounded, soft tannins.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with balanced acidity, mouthwatering and lingering finish.

name: Clines et Stunk Old Riesling Spate Vignes 2006
description: The name Riesling is derived from the “kettle”, the vat, used to ferment the wine.  The Kettle is used for aging and the result is a very drinkable and refreshing wine.  The name Old Riesling, which means “old” in Alsace dialect, is probably derived from the wine’s ageing in oak barrels.  The name Old Riesling, meaning “old wine Serein,” is probably derived from the ancient word “Old Alsace”.  The wine is rich and fresh, with an attractive mineral acidity, fullness and roundness.  It is a good companion to fish in sauces with shellfish sauce, shellfish in sauces with butter, and white meats.

name: Whiterrer Thiley Chardonnay (half-bottle) 2000
description: This wine has aromas of vanilla, pear and toasty oak with a hint of nutty, sweet caramel.  The mouthfeel is rich and round with sweet fruit and butter.  The finish is long and crisp with nice length of ripe fruit and balanced acidity.

name: Palbewsse Chardonnay 2002
description: The Chardonnay grapes are grown in the Casablanca Valley of Chile.  The fruit is picked in the early morning to keep the juices warm during the growing season.  The grapes are cold-fermented in French oak barrels and then transferred to tank for a long period of malo-lactic fermentation.  The wine is then aged in oak barrels for a period of 12 months.  The result is a rich, well-balanced wine with attractive complexity.  It is an excellent companion for pasta dishes, seafood and shellfish, poultry dishes with cream sauces and rich cream sauces.

name: Betour Cabernet Merlot 2001
description: The 2001 Napa Valley Cabernet Merlot has beautiful aromas of cherry, cherry, blackberry, and currant, with tones of tobacco, cedar, and earth.  Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of raspberry and cherry followed by a long, supple, well-rounded finish.  The tannins are smooth and well-integrated, and the overall impression is soft and supple.  The finish is long, with flavors of fruit, spice, and pepper.  This is a lovely wine that is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Franentboode Murher Pinot Noir 2003
description: The 2002 vintage of Franentboode Oregon Pinot Noir is an intense wine with ripe, juicy flavors of black cherries, strawberries and spice.  A silky mouthfeel with a long finish.  The wine has a touch of sweetness with good acidity and structure.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.  It is a great food companion.  We suggest pairing this wine with grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon and roasted poultry dishes.  It will also pair well with grilled foods with roasted vegetables and garlic.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.  It is a great food companion.  We suggest pairing this wine with grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon, roasted poultry dishes, and roasted vegetables.

name: AlaRd St. Joraan Riesling Red Blend 2017
description: The grapes were picked in the early morning and pressed immediately in the press. A very aromatic wine with notes of ripe fruit and cherry. The wine has a smooth, fruity and round mouthfeel with good balance between sweetness and freshness.   The finish is long and balanced.

name: Parrini Red Blanc 1997
description: The wine is a blend of 70% Tre Vigne, 30% Rondolino, and 10% Tre Vigne di Castiglione.  The grapes are grown in the best vineyards of Tuscany.  Fermented in stainless steel, this wine is then aged in stainless steel tanks for 12 months.  A delicate, dry white wine.  A perfect accompaniment to fish, shellfish, abstuertif, pasta, risotto and white meats.

name: Tenuttelly Brue Wines Crateri die Gavia Saggino Branci Redfongarico 2002
description: The wine is a bright ruby red with intense aromas and flavours of cherries and blackberries, and notes of pepper and toast.  On the palate, the wine is rich, soft and pleasant with pleasingly soft tannins.  The finish is long, well balanced and pleasant.

name: Yourrasi Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Magup) Grandent yart Syrah 2012
origin: Chile administrations of Maipo Valley, Chile
description: Deep ruby in color with aromas of red fruits, cherries and blackberries. On the palate, flavors of fresh red fruits, dark chocolate and coffee, well balanced with soft tannins.

name: Dubics Tayques Chardonnay 1997
description: This wine has an attractive, light golden color with golden hues.  On the nose it has a touch of wood with citrus, apple and pear aromas.  On the palate it is well-balanced with a good volume and a good acidity.  It has a crisp, dry finish.

name: Santa Carnera Zinanc 2006
description: The 2006 Zinfandel is a wonderful example of a classic California Zinfandel.  The nose is spicy with a hint of earthiness and leather.  The mouth feel is soft and supple with medium-bodied fruit flavors.  The finish is long, with bright acidity and long, mouth-coating tannins.  This wine will cellar well for 3-5 years.  It is delicious with grilled, roasted and smoked foods.

name: Saminas Montaina Garas Selet Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: Intense ruby red. Complex aromas of red and black fruits, blueberries, black cherries and blackberries, with delicate floral tones. It has a well-balanced structure, freshness and good balance between alcohol, tannins and acidity. It has a very long, fruity finish.

name: Co Niend Pinot Nail Cabernet Sauvignon 1996
description: The nose offers enticing aromas of black cherries, currants and spices with aromas of vanilla, coffee and coffee grounds. The mouthfeel is supple with juicy, round flavors of cherries, blackberries and a hint of cedar. This medium bodied wine is well balanced with good acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long and sweet with a touch of spice and oak. The overall impression is of a complex, satisfying wine.

name: Kendagal Ponite Chardonnay 2012
description: The 2012 Ponite Chardonnay opens with aromas of lemon zest, pineapple and fresh honeysuckle, with undertones of vanilla and clove. The wine has a mouthwatering entry with bright flavors of citrus and minerality. It is well-balanced with a mouth-watering mouthwatering finish, and has lingering flavors of fruit, butter and toasted oak.

name: Reyter Walley Mrello Selazza Ramina (OU Kosherlot 2014
description: Mrello is an aromatic, fruity and well-balanced wine with an elegant and pleasant taste. The Mrello is the most versatile wine we produce. The color is deep ruby with bright hues. The nose is fresh, very pleasant and pleasant to drink. On the palate the Mrello is fresh and pleasant to drink. The overall impression is pleasant and pleasant.

name: Prowara Suterio Charf-bainoas Vienefsica 2011
description: Intense ruby-red. On the nose, the bouquet is intense and persistent, with a predominance of the best-aged grapes. It is pleasant, elegant, pleasant to drink, and pleasant to taste.  ..

name: Fobace Drocci Castalo La Sangiazto 2018
description: The name Castalo La Sangiazto means “the place” in Italian, which is a nod to the Sangiovei vineyards in Castiglione Falletto.  The wine is a blend of the classic varieties from the Sangiovei vineyards in Castiglione Falletto, the Barbera vineyards of the Piedmont and the Rondolino vineyards.  The result is a wine that is robust and robust yet soft, smooth and soft.

name: Lux Santa Rava deri 2015
description: Intense ruby red with light purple hues. Aromas of red fruits, plums and cherries. Fresh, smooth and round with good acidity and a persistent finish takes the time to soften the tannins and the alcohol. Fresh and well-balanced.

name: Doyma Brovat 2015
description: The 2015 Brovat is a wine of incredible depth and complexity, showcasing aromas of cassis, blackberry, raspberry, and violet. On the palate, it’s rich and mouthwatering with flavors of dark fruit, spice, and caramel. It’s balanced with juicy acidity and a long finish. This wine is approachable now, and will cellar well for up to 5 years.

name: Waire Viteyard Sauvignon Blanc 1998
description: Vibrant aromas of grapefruit, lime and melon with hints of herbal tones.  The flavors mirror aromas with mineral, pear, and green apple, with citrus and a hint of mineral.  The mouthfeel is rich and creamy with a lingering impression of mineral, pear, and fresh lime.  The finish is long and smooth, with lingering mineral, pear, and melon flavors.  The mouth-filling body of the wine is nicely balanced by bright acidity and well-integrated oak.  The wine's freshness and intensity of flavors make it an excellent food companion.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Brunott Blend Reserve Famtolliera Porage Pinot Noir 2006
description: This wine has aromas of cherry, dried herbs, violet and ripe berries with mineral tones and hints of coffee. On the palate, it has a round mouthfeel with silky tannins and flavors of ripe red cherries, red raspberries, and sweet spices. The wine is balanced with balanced acidity and good minerality. The wine is very approachable now, but will cellar well for at least 3 to 5 years.

name: Trictomte Wind Luosteste Valley Pinot Noir 2011
description: Light and refreshing with an attractive aroma. Very good volume with delicate tannins and good length. Perfect for summer evenings, or on a cold day.  wine and food pairings  wine Bazieri Vineyards Napa Valley Pinot Noir 2011 [response] Red Wine [category_2] Pinot Noir [origin]  from Napa Valley, California

name: Roosni Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The aroma of this wine is an array of fruit flavors with cherry and spice and floral aromas, followed abnormal by sweet toasty oak. The flavors mirror aromas with a supple texture.  The mouthfeel review is medium-bodied with good balance between sweet, ripe tannins and a long, lingering finish.  The finish is long, fruity, spicy, with mineral overtones.

name: Lima Wine Bidoo Canme Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This wine is deep ruby red in color with violet tones. Its aromas include ripe red fruits such as currants and strawberries, well balanced with vanilla and blackberries. On the palate, this wine presents great structure, with soft tannins, sweet and round flavors and fresh acidity.

name: Preswoodgamtmerel Vineyard Chardonnay (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2015
description: This wine is a classic representation of the vintage. The nose is fresh, fresh and aromatic with fresh tropical notes of ripe pineapple and banana, followed by aromas of nutmeg and vanilla. The mouth feel is medium-bodied with fresh acidity and fresh flavors of citrus, mango, pineapple, and cream. The finish is long and crisp, with a slight sweetness.

name: Neh Caterfi Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: A wine that represents the essence of our terroir.   The name Caterfi means friendly, and represents the Latin word for earth.  The wine is a refreshing, fruity, and fresh wine with an excellent balance between fruit and acidity.  The aromas are of gooseberries, tropical fruit, and honey, with hints of flowers, almonds, citrus, and minerals.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced between sweetness and fresh Americash, showing a lingering finish.  The wine is excellent as an aper resigned to seafood, light pasta dishes, poultry, and mild cheeses.

name: Taynall Valley ampta Wrink Femrauks Chardonnay 2018
description: Bright and juicy, this wine is loaded with flavors of melon, pear, tangerine and citrus. This is a perfect food companion with a wide range of dishes including shellfish, salads, white meat and chicken dishes. The wine is best consumed chilled, but will also pair well with seafood dishes and pasta dishes.

name: Mampmorba Chardoyna Cabernet Sauvignon Cabernet Sauvignon Blancgiony Labiettiana Reservi Vineyard Reserve Shardonnay 2008
description: An elegant wine with ripe, sweetly ripe fruit flavors of nectarine, guava, and kiwi, and a hint of vanilla.  The mouthfeel is rich and round, with round and supple tannins that are nicely integrated into the palate.  The wine is very well-balanced with a long, lingering finish.  The wine will age well for up to five years.

name: Bodegasi LeAnde Valley Alexandreades Chateauu Varneuf 2003
description: The 2004 Alexandreades is a blend of 85% Barbera and 15% Merlot. This is a big, big, ripe wine, with very high acidity, good concentration, and a long, pleasant finish. It is made from 60- to 100-year-old vines. It should be consumed over the next 2- 3 years. The name LeAnde Valley represents the appellation of the hillside vineyards in which the grapes were grown. This is a great wine, a very elegant and elegant wine. The aromas are of ripe cherries, plums, red cherries, blackberries, and plums, and sweet spices such as anise and clove. It isSounds a little sweet on the palate, with good concentration and an excellent balance between the fruitiness of the fruit and the tannins. The flavors mirror aromas, with a good balance between sweetness and freshness, and a lingering finish. It is a big, tasty wine. It is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for 2- 3 years. It will be a great wine to drink over the next 2- 3 years. It is a great wine to drink now, and will cellar well for 2

name: Whiteres Ex Merlot Red Blens Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: Red, vibrant, dark purple. Aromas of ripe fruit, with a hint of spicy oak. The palate is fresh, fruity, well-balanced, with sweet and round tannins and a persistent finish. The tannins are present and well-integrated, the fruit is well-ripened and the acidity is well-integrated, resulting in a well-rounded wine.

name: Elic Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Our 2000 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon is a beautifully balanced wine with a deep ruby red color and a hint of orange. The nose opens with ripe aromas of blackberry and plum with hints of toastiness and vanilla. The palate is soft and juicy with ripe flavors of cherry, berry, and cassis with good acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long and pleasant. The wine will age well for the next 2 to 3 years. The combination of fruit, oak, acidity, and tannins make this wine an excellent companion for grilled and roasted foods.

name: Pallo Kl Toseo Seriea Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: Bright ruby red. Aromas are very typical for this variety with fresh and fruity, with a subtle suggestion of blackberry. Warm, balanced and full-bodied. The flavors mirror aromas with fresh and fruity, with hints of tobacco. Full-bodied with silky tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Humperoton Vegpilagli Cabernet Sauvignnon 1999
description: This wine has a dark ruby red color with violet reflections and a fine nose.  The aromas of the wine include ripe cherries, plums, currants, blackberries and spices.  On the palate, the wine is fresh and lively, with good acidity.  It is well balanced with well-integrated tannins.

name: Chateau Magihey Chamb Chabinas 1997
description: The color is pale gold with greenish tones. The nose is extremely fruity with notes of fruit and citrus and a touch of toastiness. The mouthfeel is soft and supple with well-balanced acidity. The overall impression is one of great finesse and elegance with a good balance between the sweetness of the fruit and the crispness of the acidity. The overall impression is of a great wine with great aging potential.

name: ChetaaCViane Vineyards Bayo 2000
description: Vibrant purple-red in colour, aromas of cherry, spice and toast. A very rich and smooth wine, with complex flavours of ripe fruit, cloves, pepper and spice, with a smooth, velvety texture. The tannins are soft and well-integrated, providing a well-balanced, lingering finish.

name: Bodegas Mavriacophi Duoll Crauzsi Redar 2013
description: Aromas of red fruits, cherries, currants and spice. The palate is warm and balanced, with round and ripe tannins and a long and pleasant finish...  acidity: 13.4% alcohol, Meunier Max. acidity in the mouth is quite noticeable, well-integrated, well-balanced, persistent, pleasant and pleasant aftertaste.

name: Peenth Gyack Zinfandel Rose 2007
description: This vintage of Rose is full of rich, lively flavors. The nose reveals aromas of fresh berries and fresh roses. The mouthfeel is round, soft and rounder than usual, but retains great depth. The flavors mirror aromas with strawberry, red apple and floral tones. The finish is long, sweet and crisp with a hint of acidity.

name: Founti Sonera Higricon Marisonva Chardonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Marisonva Chardonnay is bright and light gold in color with bright green highlights. The aromas are of pear, green apple, citrus, and floral notes. The palate is soft and silky with flavors of ripe peach, pear, green apple, and honeydew melon. The finish is long, fruity, and well balanced with mouthwatering acidity.

name: Rouns Cellars Saun Vineyard Prianot Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: This vintage of Saun Vineyard has aromas of blackberries, dark cherries, vanilla, chocolate and brown sugar. The flavors mirror aromas with cocoa, dark fruit, and spices. The mouthfeel is smooth and silky, with round tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Bampa Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: This wine is a refreshing, lively wine with an attractive pale yellow color with green hues. The nose is characterized by mineral and citrus tones with attractive hints of grapefruit and melon. The mouthfeel is full and soft with a pleasant touch of freshness. The wine is fresh and well-balanced. The finish is clean and crisp. The aromas of this wine will improve and gain in intensity with aging for up to five years.

name: Ka Sperite Wiltagheine Sphrait Reserva 1998
description: Intense and dark ruby red color with an aroma that recalls fresh fruit with notes of blackberries, black cherries and plums. On the palate, the wine is very well-balanced and round, with sweet and soft tannins. A great companion to roasted red and white meats.

name: Ualiuma Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Rich, smooth and with flavors of dark cherry, cocoa, coffee and toast, this wine delivers a lingering, mouth-coating finish. , The Ualiuma Estate Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Petit Verdot

name: Gerane Rieslin Pinot Gris 2017
description: The 2017 Rieslin is made from 100% Pinot Gris grapes grown on the estate’s oldest vines. The result is a wine with lovely aromas of white peach, peach and tangerine. On the palate, the wine has a nice sweetness, good acidity, and a long finish.

name: Bech Ratzalidioharel Reserva Reserva Cauronesa 2016
description: The wine has a deep ruby red color, with orange tints. On the nose, it is very expressive, complex and fruity, with notes of red fruits, strawberries, cherries, raspberries, strawberries, blackberries, plums, blackberries and blueberries, as well as a touch of spices, cloves, nutmeg, and vanilla. On the palate, it is fresh, fresh and pleasant, with soft, round tannins, balanced acidity, and good volume, all in perfect harmony with a good body and good length.

name: Fragaga tal Angella Terra 1996
description: Fragaglia Terra is a lively, fruity, and refreshing red wine with excellent structure and intensity.  Fragag narcotics

name: Robert Acolata Salosta Crunes Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
origin: the glass with notes of ripe fruit and spices.  The mouthfeel is smooth and sweet with well-balanced tannins and an excellent acidity.

name: Loneiry Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Loneiry Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon is a great companion for roasted red meats, game birds, and rich, hearty pasta dishes. Try pairing this wine with a roasted ribeye steak, grilled rib eye with roasted vegetables and a hint of roasted tomato sauce.

name: Cymen Sorgino Ordbancakite Monnama Sauvignon Blanc 2008
description: Bright yellow color. Intense, aromatic nose with white and tropical fruits such as pineapple, papaya and grapefruit. Fresh, fruity, well-balanced and with good length.  wine. Enjoy chilled.  A wine that offers Colour and structure.  The wine is also well-rounded on the palate.  A fresh, fruity, dry wine.

name: Frint Goostuge Conns Cuves Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: This wine is a perfect companion for a wide variety of foods including seafood, shellfish, fresh herb salads and cream based pastas. It is also a great companion for grilled fish.  winegrowers' tips: Serve well chilled and allow to warm in your glass for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavor.

name: Faila Albaner Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: A wine of deep, deep purple color, this wine is very aromatic, full-flavored, and rich. Its deep red color and intense aromas are very evident. The taste is pleasant, well-balanced, and well-structured. It is an excellent companion for grilled or roasted red meats, red-sauced pasta dishes, and flavorful cheeses.

name: Hegue Nobichonniami Dasty Chardonnay 2014
origin: Yamhill-Carlton District, Will224, Willamette Valley, Oregon
description: The 2014 Nobichonniami Dasty Chardonnay has a complex nose of fresh pineapple, pear and peach, with white flowers, citrus and mineral undertones. The wine is round and rich in texture, with flavors of white peach, ripe pear and pineapple, plus barrel toast, honey and honeycomb. The wine is balanced with a full mouth-filling body and a long, refreshing finish.

name: Folbareson Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The wine is a deep ruby color, with a spicy aroma of black currant, cedar and coffee.  The flavors mirror aromas with black currant, cedar and spice.  The mouthfeel is round, soft and supple with well-integrated tannins that are balanced with a bright acidity.  The finish is long with lingering fruit and spice.
