The wine will benefit from decanting 1-2 hours before drinking.

name: Texencas Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Deep garnet red color with violet tones. Very fruity nose with red fruits, strawberries and blackberries. Very soft and soft, with soft and round tannins and sweet oak notes.  wine.  Rich and fresh on the palate with a long finish.

name: Ruffors t'Aglaise 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of T-Aglaise has a deep garnet color and aromas of blackberry, chocolate, and sweet vanilla. It has flavors of red and black cherry, dark chocolate, and caramel with hints of black pepper and herbs de Provence. It is soft, supple and well-balanced with flavors of ripe fruits, sweet vanilla, and caramel. It is well-structured with sweet tannins and a long, smooth finish. This wine will continue to improve in the cellar for the next 1- 2 years and will cellar well for at least 5 years from its release date. It is an excellent companion to grilled, roasted, grilled foods and cheeses.

name: Castelia Rodh Carneoa Chianti Pereilas RBata Tere Rosso 2004
description: Garncultural & Traditional Family Traditions: The traditional traditional dish with the wine is grilled white meat, game and game with sauce, and game cooked with wine sauces. Traditional dishes with the wine include grilled or roasted red meat and proving cheese.

name: Artoncalli Rieslinge 2009
description: This wine is bright, refreshing and slightly sweet with aromas of citrus and mineral with a hint of white flowers.  On the palate it is medium-bodied with mineral, stone fruit, and mineral flavors.  It has a smooth mouthfeel, great depth, and a lingering finish.

name: Fosi Crevand Bron Monlec 2001
description: This is a blend of 90% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. The grapes for this wine are sourced from two vineyards in the northern part of the Piedmont region of Italy, one in Monferrato and the other in Castiglione Falletto. The grapes are harvested in the coolest part of the night.  The wine is then matured for 12 months in oak barrels.  The result is a wine of great depth, elegance, and complexity.   This is a wine of good balance between fruit and tannins, with an overall impression of an appealing and pleasant wine.  It is a good match for a wide variety of foods, from meat, vegetables, poultry, game, and cheese.

name: Boodesa Barol Chardonnay 2015
description: Barol Chardonnay is a clean, crisp and refreshing wine. It shows great intensity of aromas of tropical fruits, citrus, honey and vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with mineral and citrus notes. The mouthfeel is fresh, fruity, and well-balanced. The mouthfeel is rich and round with balanced acidity and a long finish.

name: Blettochal Winery Reserve Chardonnay 2014
description: The Blettochal Chardonnay is a refreshingly crisp wine with tropical fruit aromas of pineapple and mango, complemented by sweet apple and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with flavors of green apple, pear and tropical fruit and a touch of minerality. The finish is long, refreshing, and crisp.

name: Vient Loras/Chardonnay 2016
description: Aromas of lemon zest, honey, and lemon-lime blossom with a hint of lemon oil. Flavors mirror aromas with lime, tangerine, honey, and pear. Bright acidity and full-bodied flavors on the palate with rich texture and round mouthfeel. Flavors mirror aromas with lingering flavors of citrus, mineral, and a touch of butteriness. The mouthfeel is rich and mouthwatering with a mouthwatering finish.

name: Mast Hill Sepitu Celede Garbers Selleilro Dostettesson Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: The wine has great concentration, depth, and intensity, with an inviting nose of cedar, black cherry, currants, and ripe blackberries, with a hint of coffee and cedar. The palate has black cherry, blackberry, blackberry, and currant flavors, with a hint of toast, spice, and vanilla. The tannins are soft and round, but present. The mouth feel is soft, round and juicy, with great balance between the acidity and tannins. The wine is medium bodied with round, round, ripe tannins. The finish is long, with lingering flavors of ripe fruit and toasty oak. The wine Diana Sepitu Celede Garbers Selleilro Dostettesson has a lovely balance between richness and finesse.

name: Ail Mamurria Meriot Neirra's Reserd Chardonnay 1995
description: This wine is a refreshing, medium-bodied wine with appealing aromas of pineapple, green apple, and tropical fruit with a hint of citrus.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of sweetness from the malo-lactic fermentation.  This wine is well-balanced with a round, mouth-filling mouthfeel, rich mouthfeel, good acidity, and nice lingering acidity.

name: Argate la Vallon Chardonnay 2006
description: This wine has a lovely, bright straw color. On the nose there is an explosion of sweet ripe fruit flavors with pear, pineapple, cantelope, guava, papaya and papaya with honeydew and apricot notes. The palate is full and rich with great balance between fruit and acidity, ripe fruit and creamy texture. The finish is long with mouthwatering acidity. This is a well-balanced, complex wine with a wonderful, long finish. The finish is long, sweet and refreshing with nice length. This wine is a great companion to grilled fish, shellfish, shellfish with cream sauces, grilled chicken and vegetables.

name: Rucophtum B. Srivele Pinot Noir 2013
description: This wine has intense aromas of black cherry, bergamot, violet and earthy aromas. It is medium bodied, with a round, soft mouthfeel and medium tannins, giving it good structure. This is a well-rounded wine with good balance of acidity, juicy fruit and spicy oak. The finish is long, smooth and supple, with flavors of ripe fruit, spice and minerality. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well over the next 3 to 4 years.

name: BOOPes Schiob Estate Pinot Noir (half-bottle) 1997
description: The aromas are very aromatic with blackberry, anise and earthy tones. The flavors mirror aromas with blackberry, earth and a hint of mineral and spice. The mouthfeel is very full and viscous with a good amount of acidity and a lingering finish.

name: Benzelle Farting Noir 2014
description: The aromas of this wine are classic Oregon Pinot Noir: ripe red cherries, fresh strawberries, and raspberries with touches ofRahmisch. The flavors mirror aromas with sweet cherries, raspberries, blackberries and currants with a hint of pepper. The mouthfeel is soft and round with bright acidity. The tannins are medium-bodied with a velvety mouthfeel. The finish is medium to long with juicy acidity. The mouth feel is juicy with ripe, round tannins that are well-balanced and round with a nice mouth-coating texture.

name: Tenida Merrione Disadino Sera di Supacelli 2010
description: Deep, intense ruby red with violet hues. The nose offers the bouquet with rich and intense aromas of red fruit, balsamic notes and an appealing hint of sweet spices. The palate is warm and soft with ripe, sweet tannins and a pleasant touch of wood. The tannins are well-balanced with good acidity.

name: La Parpoanzo Abilda Real Tontaplies 2017
description: Intense red ruby red color. Nose offers red fruits and spicy notes, which are balanced by delicate floral and floral aromas. It is well-balanced on the palate, with fresh acidity and a pleasant persistence.  of

name: Brodegas Godquas Ranner Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2006
description: The wine is a vibrant, medium bodied, medium-bodied wine. The aromas of the 2006 Brodegas Godquas include gooseberries, tropical fruits, citrus and floral notes. The mouthfeel is fresh and bright with juicy acidity that carries flavours of gooseberries, grapefruit, lime, and grapefruit with an abundance of citrus and mineral overtones. The wine finishes dry and crisp with lingering flavors of grapefruit and mineral. It is a versatile wine, which will continue to improve for the next 3-5 years.

name: Motals
description: The 2016 160-acre parcel of the Grand Cru of Montmâlôt is situated at the northern end of the Grand Cru plot. The vineyard is in a climate of great harmony, which allows the fruit to express itself in the most delicate way.  The wine shows great finesse, elegance, and a very mineral, salty, mineral profile. It is a perfect accompaniment to all fish, shellfish, veal, chicken and cream sauces, cheeses with seafood sauces, or just by itself.  It is also excellent EDT

name: odomar's Estate P'hine Vignaco 2016
description: P'hine Vignaco is a delightful combination of red and black fruit, spices, graphite, leather and vanilla, with a hint of earthiness. The aromas are full Sheep’s milk chocolate, nutmeg, nutmeg, blackberry, with bright, high tones of fresh flowers and cherry blossom. The mouthfeel is very round, round, soft, and round, with well-balanced acidity and soft, juicy tannins. The wine is extremely well-balanced with a long, velvety finish. The finish is very long and is accented by very subtle, spicy, floral notes.

name: Oxloose Merlot 2002
description: This wine has aromas of ripe cherries, plums and strawberries with a touch of vanilla and spices. The mouth feel is soft and well-balanced, with round, soft tannins. This is an excellent food wine.   winegrowing area: Central Coast, California.

name: Browneri Moontain Vallenblles Cosrello 2000
description: Complex aromas of ripe blackberries, black cherries, and blueberries with floral tones.  Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of spice.  This wine is well-balanced with good acidity and soft, round tannins.  with medium-bodied flavors, a long, smooth, fruity finish.

name: St. Cararera Vineyard Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 St. Cararera Vineyard Pinot Noir is an approachable wine with flavors of ripe fruit, spice and light toastiness, and a hint of mineral and mineral overtones. The mouthfeel is soft, round cooker-roasted, well-integrated tannins, bright acidity, medium-bodied, medium-high acidity and long, velvety finish. This wine will age well for 3-5 years. The wine is approachable now, but will cellar well for up to 10 years. The wine is delicious with grilled fish and poultry, grilled vegetables, lighter cheeses and pasta dishes with a cream sauce.

name: Bartones Petite Stetorati Red Reservy Magnan Roungane Shirat 2001
description: The wine is deep red in colour with a purple edge.  The bouquet is generous and intense with ripe berry fruit aromas, with the palate also showing flavours of blackberry, plum and mocha with an underlying spicy oak and vanilla, all in harmony with a subtle, sweet oak nuance.  The tannins are well-integrated and present but very fine, so the mouth feel is very good and the finish is long and persistent.  The wine will cellar well for up to three years.

name: Ilenf De Cremiea Pinot Noir 2015
origin: Willamette Valley, Oregon afraid to say no to your nose that’s a treat! If you’re a fan of Pinot Noir, you’ll find this wine is a natural for you! Fresh aromas of blackberries and cherries and a hint of earthiness lead to a soft mouthfeel with well-integrated oak. Flavors mirror aromas with more black fruits and hints of toast. This wine is well-balanced with soft, round tannins that round out the long finish. The 2015 De Cremiea Pinot Noir is delicious with all kinds of fish, especially Northwest Salmon, poultry, pork, Moonshine, veal, veal, veal, duck, veal, roasted vegetables, creamy sauces, BBQ, vegetarian dishes, Mediterranean dishes, and rich stews.

name: Calra Rerd Cabernet Sauvignon (OK Kooinier) 2010
description: Deep garnet in color, this wine offers aromas of ripe fruit and spices, with subtle vanilla. On the palate, it is smooth and full-bodied with well-integrated tannins, good acidity and a long finish.

name: Campolu Cree Semillan Les Malbec 2018
description: This wine has an intense and bright ruby red color. Aromas of ripe fruit such as cherries, strawberries and blackberries with toasty and spicy notes. Flavors mirror aromas with ripe fruit, with good balance between fruit and oak.  steak, grilled vegetables, meatballs and lighter meats.

name: The Subond Chablis Brerejai Rucaszano 2012
description: This wine is very fruity and easy to drink. It's very fresh, fruity and very pleasant. The nose is very expressive and appealing with hints of fruit.. An excellent companion to grilled fish, white meats and grilled poultry. Serve well chilled.

name: Tormaldh Greey dee Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: Straw-yellow in color, this wine offers intense, fresh, fruity aromas, with subtle hints of grass, citron and citrus.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with pleasant flavors of citrus and ripe fruit, complemented by toasty oak notes.  The overall impression is refreshing, pleasant and crisp, with a pleasing finish.

name: Nontaigherno Tolastiano De Vines Red Dravey S Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 Tolastiano De Vines Cabernet Sauvignon is a wine that is elegant and powerful with aromas of red fruits and spices. On the palate, the wine has flavors of red and black cherries with a touch of coffee and chocolate. The mouth feel is soft and round with well-integrated tannins and acidity. The finish is long and spicy with a touch of black pepper and blackberries. The wine will cellar well for at least 5-7 years and will drink well now. Pair with grilled, roasted or grilled fish, roasted vegetables, grilled chicken, pork roast, roasted vegetables, fowl, veal chops and hearty cheeses. Serve at room temperature.

name: Martorursi Carnaratra Dicher Reservo 2010
description: Intense ruby red color with intense aromas of ripe fruit and spices.  The palate is smooth and well-balanced, fruity, soft and pleasant to drink.  Its characteristic sweetness and lingering finish makes it a perfect match for Mediterranean dishes and meats with sauces..

name: Belpelra de Mougano Antra Vrodita Rieslo Matole Cotie Piigoasolo 2014
description: Pale, bright red color with ruby reflections. Intense nose with blackberries, strawberries, and cherries and plums with hints of violet. It is a dry wine with a medium-bodied, soft and pleasant tannins, well-balanced acidity, and a pleasing aftertaste.

name: YUprugh Pitk Slarliche Syrah Ralson Luwz 2001
description: Intense, deep red. Ripe aromas of black fruits and violets, with a hint of vanilla. A wine with an unmistakable structure. Powerful, well-rounded tannins and flavors of ripe fruits, reminiscent of blackberries. A very full-bodied, elegant wine with an excellent balance between fruit and oak.

name: Piolatri Chianti Classicoo 2016
description: The grapes are grown in the Chianti Classico area of the town of San Gimignan, the heart of the DOCG.  These grapes are harvested at optimal ripeness, harvested in the cool evening hours.  The grapes are vinified in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  The wine is then aged in wood barrels for 12 months before Liangaging in bottle for 2 months before being released.

name: Castol Filtpa Rose d'Agno 2006
description: A lovely, pale rose color with vibrant pink tints.  The nose is ample and pleasant with fresh Stain and minerality, typical of the variety.  On the palate it is fruity, well-balanced, dry, with good acidity and pleasant tannins.  A wine that is pleasant and easy to drink.

name: Canlata Chiant Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 Chiant Pinot Noir has rich aromas of black cherry, raspberry, pomegranate, and violets. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of sweet spices. The mouth feel is round with soft, juicy tannins and a lingering finish.  The 2011 Chiant Pinot Noir is a delightful food companion and is a perfect companion for grilled salmon, roasted chicken, pork roast, and pork roast with a side of truffles.

name: Bantara Tema Ur Dio La Grocesciono Bertona 2007
description: Bright ruby red in color, with fresh and ripe fruit aromas. The wine is very well-balanced, smooth, and medium-bodied with well-integrated oak.  A refreshing wine that can be enjoyed with all red meats, pasta dishes with light sauces, grilled fish, veal, chicken with tomato sauces, cheese, cream based sauces, and fruit based sauces.

name: AntaCilenti Iinerova Barbiro 2013
description: Ruby red in color with violet tones, very attractive and persistent, fruity and warm with delicate hints of spices, licorice, vanilla, and tobacco, balanced, full-bodied and full-flavored with sweet tannins, full-flavored and persistent finish.

name: Alabico Chianti Classico Riserva 2003
description: The Riserva is produced from fruit grown in the Alabico district, in the appellation of Chianti.  The vineyards are located in the villages of Nittori, Lechenea and Nardi.  The grapes are hand-harvested and crushed.  The grapes are destemmed and fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  The wine spends about six months in oak barrels, with frequent pump-overs and pump-overs twice a day, for about 30 to 35 days.  The wine is then aged in oak barrels for an average of 18 months before being transferred to the bottle for the final maturation.  The result is a harmonious wine with great finesse, a firm structure, and a smooth, silky texture.  The wine is well-balanced and easy to drink.  The best vintages are released when they have achieved a perfect balance between their fruit and oak flavors and have an exceptional level of complexity.

name: Terr.s Rojas Recazz Tella Vineyard Pinot Branc 2007
description: The 2007 Recazz is a fresh wine with rich aromas of raspberry and cassis with aromas of tea leaf and spices. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of red and black cherries, blackberries and brown sugar. The mouthfeel is smooth with juicy, round tannins and balanced acidity. The finish is long with spicy flavors and lingering fruit.

name: Lay Nortarding Chardonnay 1999
description: Lay's Napa Valley Chardonnay is a wonderfully versatile wine.  The aroma features fresh fruit aromas of pear, honey, and sweet apple.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with excellent texture.  The mouthfeel is medium-sweet with balanced acidity.  The finish is lingering with a touch of mineral and toasty oak.  This wine is an excellent match for most shellfish dishes, especially those with shellfish sauces.

name: Calilve Mountaine Coustle Colles Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Coustle Colles Vineyard is a Bistro style wine that has a dark ruby color. Aromas of blackberry, cassis and cherry. The palate has a silky mouthfeel with a soft entry and a long finish.

name: Rockione Sanix Fams Blut Blene Andson Merlot 1999
description: Deep ruby-red in color with cherry reflections.  On the nose, this wine shows a very attractive fruity bouquet, typical of a Merlot of this quality.  On the palate it is well-balanced, well-rounded, fresh and fruity with good length.  The tannins are well-integrated and well-integrated.

name: Nicibarg Red Blend 1998
description: Nicibarg Red Blend is a medium-bodied wine with flavors of blackberry, raspberry, and currant with hints of disbelchery and earthy tones.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with silky, round tannins that provide a mouth-coating mouthfeel.  This wine is a perfect match for grilled meats, veal, and roasted vegetables.

name: Clos de lavdrmain Cabernet/Grenello-Saeke P'herot 2015
description: The 2015 Clos de lavdrmain is a great food companion with roast beef tenderloin and roasted vegetables. The wine will also pair well with pork roast and roasted vegetables with roasted tomatoes and roasted vegetables with garlic and olive oil.

name: Tricorce Chalbol Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: The wine is a beautiful deep garnet in color with an aroma of sweet cassis, cherry and raspberry. The palate has flavors of plum, black cherry and cassis with sweet, round tannins and a lingering finish. The wine is well-balanced with a touch of toasty oak on the finish.

name: Vinauker Capery Les Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: The 2013 vintage is deep, bright red with purple tones. The wine has a bouquet of red and blackcurrant fruit, dried herbs and mocha, with a hint of aniseed. The wine is medium bodied with generous flavors of ripe fruit, dark chocolate and oak. The tannins are round, velvety and sweet with very utiity. The wine has a very long, round and juicy finish. The 2013 vintage of our Capery Les Cabernet Sauvignon will benefit from decanting for up to one year and will continue to improve over the next 2- 3 years. The wine will cellar well for up toEA2-3 years.

name: Dalch Buzceelateblo Hamsanued Merlot 2007
description: The 2007 Buzceelateblo Hamsanued Merlot is a blend of 60% Livermore Valley fruit, 32% Monterey, and 14% Paso Robles. The aromas are classic Merlot aromas of ripe fruit and cherries with floral tones. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe flavors of cherries, blackberries and pomegranates with floral notes and a hint of spice. The mouthfeel is soft, round and full with medium weight and a long, spicy finish. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for the next 4 to 5 years.

name: Tre Mountain Pinos Vineyard Pinot Noir 2014
description: This wine is well-balanced and beautifully structured. It has a nose that is intense and deep with aromas of ripe cherries, blackberries, strawberries and raspberries with hints of vanilla. On the palate, it has sweet tannins and flavors of cherries, blackberries, and strawberries with vanilla and brown sugar. The finish is long and smooth with well-balanced acidity.

name: Monca di Wolds Cepalit Sounzanta Zinfandel 1998
description: Our Cepalit Sounzanta, or Spyglass Wine Cellars is a red wine made from 100% Zinfandel grapes.  The name derives from the word taste, a word which means vines, flowers, herbs, fruits, and spices.  The taste is an impression of freshness and freshness which is the hallmark of Zinfandel.  It is also the signature of our winemakers, who look for taste-contribution and balance in the wine.  The wine is not meant to be consumed young and is best enjoyed from 2006 through 2020.  The name Souzant is derived from the name of our estate vineyards, Sundalies.  Our winemaker, Tomero, uses the old-world techniques of the vineyards in order to produce a wine which is more lively and lively and has more fruitiness, but still retains its elegance and elegance.  The wine is produced from 100% varietal grapes, with grapes picked at optimum ripeness.  The wine is fermentedfoil in stainless steel tanks at a minimum of three to four days a week

name: Frick Riter Trembateta Boumaroine Chianti 2013
description: Deep ruby red. It is intense, elegant, and well-balanced on thegian, fruity nose with hints of leather and spices. It is well-rounded, well-structured, full-bodied, with a long, velvety finish.

name: Freet Collers Sanna Rix Delrace Zinfandel 2009
description: Bright, fresh aromas of fresh cherries and berries, ripe plums and berries, licorice and spice, dark chocolate and brown sugar. Flavors mirror aromas with aromas mirror aromas with a juicy mouthfeel, sweet, juicy, round, with good balance between sweetness and fresh acidity, rich, balanced, medium bodied, soft tannins and a pleasingly long finish.

name: Cadine Mogca Blanco Rosella 1998
description: Made from 100% Rosé.  Made from 100% Pinot Noir.  The wine is an excellent accompaniment to Mediterranean and Mediterranean food, particularly fish, salads and Asian dishes.  Serve slightly chilled.  Serve at about 55ºF..

name: Chateau des Lararnenz-Arrade 1995
description: Lararnenz-Armitage is an unusual wine that is a blend of a German varietal (Lieder), a white varietal (Schug), and a wine with a very high percentage of a classic French varietal.  The result is a wine that is full-bodied, with rich aromas and flavors of stone fruit, citrus, mineral, and vanilla, with a long, spicy finish.  The wine is well-balanced and will continue to improve in the bottle for the next 2 to 3 years.  This wine will also continue to improve in the cellar for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Penton Cortan Gris Winlon Spresss 2017
description: Bright, intense pink color with hints of violet. Aromas of raspberries and strawberries, with hints of citrus fruit and a hint of mineral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with an intensity of sweet red fruit and a fresh finish. Pair with a wide variety of foods including antipasti, seafood, veal, poultry and white meat dishes.

name: ONugelly Vinasalb Shivend Pinot Noir 2014
description: Vibrant aromas of dried cherry, cola, and earth, with a hint of sweet oak. Flavors mirror aromas with an abundance of ripe fruits. Juicy, supple mouthfeel with a long, juicy finish.

name: Pai Sintapo Pinot Gragio Clinca 2001
description: The color is a light golden. The bouquet is floral with fruity and fruity notes.  The taste is dry and well-balanced with good acidity.  The finish is well-balanced and pleasant.  The taste is well-suited to an everyday meal.

name: Cla PeR Orgiani Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with the structure and depth of flavor to pair well with grilled foods, cheeses, and even rich foods with a spicy element. On the nose, this wine displays bright aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and plum with hints of licorice, cardamom, and earth. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of sweet fruit and blackberry with notes of dried herbs, graphite, black pepper, cocoa, and leather. The mouth feel is medium to full-bodied with well-integrated tannins. The wine's intensity and balance are perfectly balanced by its round and soft, juicy mouthfeel. The long finish is long and pleasant. This wine will cellar well for 4-5 years.

name: Hall-Sin Pamegy Resaerva Noran Les Moseja 2012
description: Inky, deep and intense in color with attractive red hues, this wine offers intense aromas of ripe fruit, spices and vanilla. The mouthfeel is fresh, well-balanced and full of ripe fruit flavors, which is confirmed in the aroma profile. On the palate, the wine is round and well-rounded with well-integrated tannins.

name: Wynthrenzer Vineyard Riesarnis Chardonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Riesarnis Chardonnay is pale straw in color. Aromas of pear, tangerine, and citrus with vanilla, toasty, and sweet oak. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of tropical fruit and citrus, with a creamy texture on the mouth. The wine has a great mouthfeel and good balance between sweetness and acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of pineapple, tangerine, and citrus. The wine has a long finish and nice balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: M. CChrapit Selecico Maulos Valley Cabernet Maroine Pasquistian Clossion 2010
description: Deep garnet in color with good intensity. On the nose it is fruity, with an appealing structure. On the palate it is well-balanced with good acidity and medium tannins. The finish is fresh, with a pleasant mineral note.

name: Claza Flods Brourger Maainas Cellars Cellars Chardonnay 2001
origin: Napa Valley, California next to the Pacific Ocean, in the heart of the Napa Valley.  The wine is a golden straw color with a slight green tinge.  The nose opens with bright aromas of ripe pear, orange blossom, peach, citrus and mineral notes.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with flavors of ripe peach, pear and citrus, with a balanced acidity and mineral component.  The finish is long, clean and refreshing.  The wine will cellar well for up to five years.  Serve well chilled and allow Numbers 1-2 hours before opening the wine.  This wine is a great companion for seafood, poultry, shellfish and lighter cream sauces.

name: Chateau Briere & Fils-San-Chassarnon Borsanch Raver Clauxeupeil Tontrany-DAOmoire Rose 2016
description: This wine has a brilliant ruby red color and a nose of red fruits, cherries, and raspberries with hints of vanilla, cinnamon and anise. On the palate, it is full and warm with good volume and acidity. It is very well-balanced with flavors of ripe red fruits, cherries, and raspberries, complemented by the fruitiness of the oak. It has a pleasant, well-rounded finish and a smooth, soft, and silky tannin structure.

name: Mistlery Cabernet Sauvignon 1996
description: The 1996 Mistlery Cabernet Sauvignon offers aromas of cherry, currant, and spice.  The palate features a supple texture and well-balanced acidity with flavors of cherry, currant, and cassis.  The wine is approachable now and will cellar well for 3-5 years.  The wine is delicious now and will cellar well for 3-5 years.

name: Nidan Chardonnay 2016
description: This wine displays fresh aromas of tropical fruit, papaya and pineapple with floral tones and nuances of fresh pineapple. The mouthfeel is soft and round with flavors of pear, honeydew, and pineapple. The mouthfeel is soft, round and medium bod graduation to a round mouth feel with round and ripe acidity. The finish is long, bright and clean with good length of flavor and texture.

name: Tondonenten Winery Adure Gevang Syrah-Ttemanta 2015
origin: Ballard Canyon, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The 2015 Adure is deep purple with violet tones. The aromas are intense and intense with blackberry, blueberry, black cherry, chocolate and a hint of roasted herbs. The mouth feel is mouth-coating and soft with round and round tannins. The flavors mirror aromas with blackberry, blueberry, roasted cherry, and a hint of roasted herbs. The finish is long and fresh with fresh, vibrant acidity. The wine will cellar well for at least 5 years. Enjoy now or cellar for up to 10 years.

name: Cadata Brunfoce Merlat 2008
description: Cadata's Merlot-driven Brunello di Montalcino has aromas of ripe, bright cherry, cassis and hints of licorice, mineral and spice. It is very elegant with flavors of blackberry and currants with toasty oak and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, smooth, rich and well-balanced with a long, smooth finish.  The tannins are soft, round and well-integrated with a lingering finish.

name: Casakza Ma Pouglia Radereuleissa 2012
description: Vibrant, bright and bright ruby red. Elegant aromas of red fruits, blackberries and cherries. The palate is round, round, soft, balanced and well- 1024 wine. It is a versatile wine with great aging potential.  It has a round, round, long lasting and well-balanced taste.

name: Carmeaussef Cellerie Chardonnay 2012
description: The Carmeaussef Cellerie Chardonnay is an easy-drinking wine that is well-balanced with a nice, sweet, juicy mouthfeel. It is very versatile food companion, pairing well with a wide variety of cuAYard styles.,

name: Sautherre Menconaccies Vinaso 2009
description: Deep, intense, brilliant red with an elegant, elegant, persistent and pleasing bouquet.  The wine is full-bodied and supple, yet full of elegance.  The fruit is bright, ripeRegarding the structure, but with an aromatic complexity, also with a touch of spices.

name: Sieta Resaro Rienera 2001
description: Resaro Vineyards has a deep red color with violet tones.  The nose is very complex with intense aromas of fresh red fruit, including cherries, plums, and blackberries with a hint of licorice.  The mouth feel is round and soft with pleasant flavors of fresh fruit.  The finish is long, full of sweet and ripe tannins, with hints of spices.   The wine is aged for eight months in American oak, with French and American oak aging, and bottled with a minimum of fining.   The wine can be enjoyed now and will cellar well for the next 5 to 7 years.

name: Borovio ap Toso Sene Bulutilento 2017
description: Bouquet offers aromas of ripe red and black fruits, with floral hints, sweet spices, leather and licorice. Flavors mirror aromas with good structure and balance between acidity, tannin, and alcohol..  ,

name: Canail Rocha Sanamasona 2006
description: The 2006 vintage of Rocha has a deep, intense ruby red color with garnet reflections. The nose is very intense with red fruits, cherries and prunes, and floral tones. The taste is very pleasant with good acidity, balanced by round, soft, silky tannins. The wine is medium-bodied, with a long, pleasant finish.

name: Stees Labertins Hanty Runsane (OU Kosher) 2009
description: The grapes are sourced from vineyards located in the Yestir vineyards and villages of Beitel.  The vines are hand-picked, destemmed and crushed.  The must is then fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  The wine is then aged in French oak barrels for 15 months.  The wine is then bottled and held for 8 months prior to being released.  The wine is well-balanced and ready-to- drink now.

name: veniali Conmenca Cabernet Srans Palode 2008
description: Intense ruby red in color with violet tones.  The bouquet is fruity and fruity with well-integrated oak and vanillaεsmid-cream notes.  The mouthfeel is round and well-balanced, with ripe tannins, balanced acidity and a well-integrated oak.  The finish is long and balanced.

name: Buena d'OrE Rioja Ra Gramondi Merlot 2015
description: Bright red color with violet tones. Rich and complex nose with aromas of black fruits, cherries, strawberries, blackberries, vanilla and light notes of oak. Rich, soft, elegant and juicy with a touch of toastiness on the finish.  and The correlates vineyards that make up the Buena d’OrE winery’s collection of vineyards, appellation and winemaking are located at the highest points on the slopes of the eastern slope of the Andes. These vineyards face due south and are planted on mostly limestone soils.  The vineyards are planted in the coastal part of the appellation of Navigation, which lies about 900 feet above sea level, on the terraces of the Andes Mountains. The soil plays the most important role in distinguishing the appellation in the Rioja district of the Ribera region. The soils are a combination of mineral and limestone, the same as in the ‘Jardin’. The vines are situated in vineyards that are between 3 and 5 years old, planted on a mixture of limestone and clay.  The vineyards are also harvested on the terraces and are located on slopes of the Andes Mountains.  The fruit is grown in dry-farmed vine

name: Enpa Spprumb Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The wine is medium-bodied with a long, smooth finish.  The aromas of the wine mirror aromas of the grape: black cherry, plum, currants, and licorice.  The flavors mirror aromas with black cherry, plum, and currant, interwoven with spicy notes of vanilla and cinnamon.  The mouthfeel is full, smooth and balanced, with firm tannins, sweet fruit, and balanced acidity.

name: Renfit Colts Cofare Chardonnay 2016
description: Crisp and refreshing, our 2016 Colts Chardonnay is a wine for food lovers who appreciate a good wine to sip on their porch and enjoy on their table.  The aromas and flavors mirror aromas with hints of lime, tangerine, and hone owe notification.  A mouthwatering acidity gives this wine a refreshingly crisp finish.  The mouthfeel is soft and creamy with medium-bodied mouthfeel, fresh fruit, and a hint of toastiness.  This is a refreshing wine with mouthwatering acidity.  The wine is an excellent accompaniment to grilled foods such as grilled fish, shellfish, clams, Otago lobster, crab, scallops, and lobster in cream sauce, veal chops, chicken in cream sauce, grilled or marinated chicken with mango salsa, fennel and lemon zest, and veal and mushroom stuffed peppers.

name: Kenf Sinchabdsne Syrah 2010
description: This wine is full of rich aromas of plum, cherry, blackberries, and brown sugar with a touch of spice. The mouthfeel is round and supple, with bright acidity and bright flavors of red fruit and mineral tones, balanced by sweet oak and spice from barrel aging.  The finish is long and supple, with good acidity.

name: alro Goostona Sallelinana 2014
description: This is a bright and lively wine with good concentration. It is very food-friendly with a wide range of foods including poultry, pasta dishes, seafood, white meats, creamy sauces, and more.   acidity [category_2] A wine that is balanced, elegant, and elegant. Aromas of lime zest, honeysuckle, and vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of fresh pear, honeysuckle, and floral tones. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with a creamy mouthfeel and good acidity. This is a wine that can be enjoyed now but will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years. Serve well chilled.

name: Orritio La Redellonareso Rierlana 2005
description: The wine has a very intense ruby red color. The nose offers delicate aromas of ripe fruit, including cherries and blackberries. The flavors mirror aromas with a round and soft mouthfeel. The wine is well-balanced with round and fresh tannins and a long finish. The structure and acidity are in good balance with the fruit. The overall impression is harmonious, fresh and fruity.

name: Jeuutzane Compal Riughia della Graeto 2005
origin: Tuscany, Italy Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Aromas of red cherries, red fruits, blackberries, red currants, vanilla, spices, with black pepper, vanilla, and toasty notes. The flavors mirror aromas with cherries, red fruits, blackberries, blackberries, and blackberries, plus caramel and toast, spices, vanilla, and toasty flavors. The mouthfeel is full, round, well-rounded, and well-structured, with ripe, round tannins and well-integrated oak.

name: Bezhberth S3Hellane Pinot Noir 2016
description: The 2016 S3 Hellane Pinot Noir offers aromas of fresh strawberries, black cherries, and raspberries, with notes of cedar and spice. The mouthfeel is full and viscous, with rich flavors of cherry, spice, and coffee. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet roam and hints of vanilla. The finish is long with fine, yet soft tannins. This is a great food wine that is very food friendly.

name: Preytann Mondain Grand Riesling 1997
description: This wine is a delightful companion to grilled fish and shellfish, especially those fish that are roasted or lightly grilled. It also matches well with most Asian foods., Bill Billaud, Winemaker   We would recommend this wine to be served chilled at about 40ºF (16ºC).

name: St. Cotenet's Pasel Hisell Neppiano Riserv'ss Chardonnay 2015
description: The aromas are clean and fresh, with notes of apple and pear, pear, and pineapple. On the palate, the wine is fresh and full of flavor with nice, balanced acidity.

name: Forta Rambich Estate Rouge 2017
description: This blend is an easy-drinking wine that will pair well with everything from grilled chicken, pork roast, grilled vegetables, roasted vegetables, pizza, pizza with a red sauce, roasted vegetables, pasta dishes with roasted vegetables and anything grilled chicken dishes.  Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled.

name: Sanbera Nestina Kenpellio Blancco Red Pinot Grigio 2005
description: Intense ruby red with a delicate scent.  Very dry, elegant and well-balanced, with very soft tannins.  Very well-balanced, with an attractive freshness.

name: Sacal Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: Deep ruby red in color. The nose offers ripe fruit with notes of blackcurrant, cassis and fig, together with vanilla and cedar. The palate is medium-bodied, well-balanced and rich, with an elegant and round tannic structure. The finish is long and persistent.

name: Hiskllsf Creek Hincielel Pinot Gris 2012
description: This wine is very approachable now, but will cellar well for up to five years.  A wine that will pair well with most seafood and light pasta dishes, as well as Asian food, Asian-influenced pasta dishes and fresh fruit salads.  It also is very versatile food companion.

name: Lukapz Estrate Napa Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Our estate vineyards in the Napa Valley were planted in the early 1980s. The vineyards are composed of predominately hillside and mountain-facing vineyards. The grapes were grown at elevation of 5,000 feet on our estate vineyards. The fruit was harvested at cool temperatures on October 9 and 10. The grapes were hand sorted and pressed directly to French oak barrels for fermentation. The wine was then aged in French oak for 10 months. The wine was then racked to stainless steel tanks for bottling. The wine was then aged in the cellar for eight months before being racked to the cellar floor and held for one to two months prior to bottling. The wine is an excellent accompaniment to grilled or roasted foods.

name: Red Monterut Cabernet Sauvignon 1996
description: This vintage is a complex wine with ripe fruit flavors of black cherry, plum and currant with well-balanced oak and spice notes.  A well-rounded mouthfeel with good balance between fruit and tannin.  The wine has a soft, round mouthfeel with a lingering finish.  The complexity of this vintage, combined with careful cellaring, makes for a very well-balanced wine.  The wine can be enjoyed now or cellared for two to three years.

name: Sterew Russian River Becsachart Chard Bru 2010
description: The 2010 Becsachart Chard Bru has ripe, vibrant aromas of strawberry, raspberry and red cherry.  The mouthfeel is full-bodied with supple, round tannins and mouthwatering acidity.  The wine has a bright, fresh acidity with flavors of strawberry, red currants, vanilla, and toast.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of fruit, spice, mineral and spice.

name: Au Wormion Napa Valley Coast Chardonnay 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of Chardonnay is a beautiful wine with aromas of ripe pear, peach unsuspected by the oak. The wine is crisp and refreshing with flavors of lemon zest, honeydew and ripe pear, all on a creamy, creamy texture with just a hint of barrel toastiness. The wine finishes long with the creamy notices lingering on the palate.

name: Vina Caparo Valley Sieris Pinot Gris 2016
description: The 2016 Sieris Pinot Gris offers aromas of fresh nectarine, tangerine, apricot, tangerine and grapefruit zest. The mouthfeel is medium bodied, with a silky, round mouthfeel, finishing with a refreshing, crisp acidity and minerality. This is a versatile wine, pairing well with fresh fish, shellfish and lighter foods.  Serve well chilled, or pair it with a light cream sauce or roasted vegetables.

name: Tarlesca Pinot Noir 2004
description: The 2004 vintage was a great growing year with perfect weather and optimal ripeness.  The grapes were picked from our estate vineyard in the Oregus Hills of the Willamette Valley.  The wine is a beautiful deep garnet color.  The nose opens with ripe red fruits, cherry, raspberry and cola with hints of spicy oak and violet.  The mouthfeel is full and round with well-balanced acidity.  The finish is long, clean and refreshing with lingering, sweet tannins.  The wine is best consumed chilled and is ready to drink now.  We suggest that you pair this wine with salmon, veal, chicken, veal roast or roasted vegetables.

name: Chateau Valley Kemra Semilo Merlot 2012

name: Edul Seluns Sanamapa Ro Rhone Barbere 2012

name: Jaux Foccage Les Michone Rock Pinot Gris 2015

The mouth feel is soft and juicy with flavors of ripe pear, honey and tropical fruit. The finish is long and lingering with mineral and mineral tones. The wine is very versatile discuss with friends.

name: Marquesuced Reserve Grand Block Malbec 2015

It is round and well-balanced, with good tannins, good acidity and a lingering finish.

name: Domaine Einee Fatal Bilnerey Cabernet Sauvignon 2001

The grapes were all picked in the cool morning and delivered to the winery at the appropriate time for fermentation. incredited to winemakers, to ensure optimum freshness and balance of the wine.  The wine was then aged in French and American oak for 2 months before being pressed and bottled.  A full-bodied wine with deep, rich, ripe tannins.  Its concentration is not surprising, as the wine is composed of 90% Cabern Folk, 8% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Merlot, with the balance coming from other lots fermented with small amounts of Cabernet Franc and Merlot.

The wine is well-balanced and smooth on the palate, with the sweet fruit flavours on the bouquetClassic South African style.

It is fermented and aged in small oak barrels for 11 months before bottling. The result is a Sangiovese that is dark and robust with a hint of mocha, while still being approachable in its youth. The finish is long and fresh, lingering on the palate with hints of vanilla and coffee. The wine will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years and drink well for the next 3- 4 years. It is an excellent food companion for grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon, pork roast, or roasted vegetables. Serve at a temperature of about 55 degrees F.

name: Moldha SeZinq Cabernet Sauvignon 2013

description: The 2011 vintage was an excellent vintage for Cabernet Sauvignon. It was an even and even year, which allowed for the maximum ripeness and the best possible fruit to ripen. This vintage was a moderate and mild growing season, allowing for consistent hang times throughout the growing season. The 2011 vintage of Wostan Mack is an elegant wine with soft tannins that are well integrated and well balanced with the alcohol level. The aromas are complex with notesaghirah, black currants, cherries and blueberries with sweet vanilla and tobacco from the oak aging. The mouthfeel is round and full, yet soft and rounder than past vintages. Flavors mirror aromas with a good balance between acidity and alcohol. The mouthfeel is full-bodied with smooth and pleasant tannins, a long and lingering finish.

Serve well chilled and enjoy at a temperature of 55 degrees F.,We are pleased to offer a new collection of wines from our estate vineyards that will be produced exclusively from grapes grown on our estate watering properties in the Eola-Amity Hills. Our 2016 Blend is composed of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 40% Merlot, and 10% Cabernet Franc. The blend is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 4-6 years.

This wine is full bodied with a juicy and full flavored mouthfeel. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of blackberry, cassis, cherries and spices. name: Roseph-Nictroal Zinfandel 2005
description: This is a California style Zinfandel with ripe, rich flavors of strawberry and cherry with a hint of black pepper and nutmeg. The tannins are soft and sweet and nicely balanced with the fruit. This wine is well-crafted with a mouth-coating, easy drinking style that leaves you with a refreshing, mouth-coating impression. Enjoyable now, this wine will cellar well for five to seven years.

name: Casa Lex Rasch Vineyard Syrah 2009
description: The 2009 Rasch is a great example of cool climate Syrah. It is very dark purple with aromas of blackberry, dried herbs, and tobacco. On the palate, the wine is full of ripe fruit with flavors of dark cherries, blackberries, and plums. The tannins are well balanced, and the finish is long with lingering flavors of dark chocolate and roasted coffee. The wine is a great food companion, and is a great wine to drink now or cellar for up to 3-5 years.

name: Frear Cabernet Sauvignon Montrasheunt Cabernet 2018
description: The 2018 Cabernet Sauvignon is deep garnet in color. The nose is marked by aromas of ripe fruits with a touch of spicy notes, a hint of aniseed and vanilla. The palate is fresh, fresh and well-balanced with fresh and round tannins. The wine is full of finesse and an attractive long finish.

name: FaKut & Rickals Syrah 2012
description: This full-bodied wine displays aromas of red and black cherries, berries, and spice, with notes of herbs and vanilla. On the palate, the wine is full-bodied, with ripe fruit flavors and a long finish. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar Official Washington Wine Cellars for at least three years.

name: Ville Mognumrertry Petriona Zinfandel 2001
origin: Sierra Foothills, California Noir [category_2] Pale, with a dark purple hue.  The aromas are intense with intense berry and cherry flavors with spice, vanilla and sweet oak tones.  The mouthfeel is round and full with flavors of ripe fruit and vanilla, and hints of cedar.  The tannins are soft and round, which make for a smooth mouthfeel.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of fresh cherries, plums, and spice.  This is a delicious wine that is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to four years.  We suggest serving the wine at room temperature.

name: Telaich Vineyards Dicant VGllemiero Rockiloulesh Reserve Pinot Noir 2012
description: The 2012 Dicant VGllemiero Rockiloulesh Reserve Pinot Noir offers aromas of dark fruits and spices. On the palate, the wine offers flavors of dark fruits, including cherry and strawberry transitioning into a juicy, round and sweet tannin finish.

name: Pr. Clos del Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: Vibrant ruby red color. Very intense aromas of red fruits and spices, with a hint of toasted notes. On the palate, the wine is full bodied with well-balanced acidity and soft, round tannins, with a long and fresh finish.   The wine will cellar well for at least 5 years.  The best pairing is with roasted and grilled red meats, particularly braised lamb, and dishes with herbs and fresh herbs.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Laitina Jadel Winery Pinot Noir 2017
description: The 2017 Jadel Winery Pinot Noir has aromas of strawberry, cherry, and sweet earthy spice. Flavors mirror aromas with good weight, a nice touch of tannin, and a long, lingering finish. The nose is very full of fresh fruits with hints of mineral and spice. The mouthfeel is soft and silky with ripe, sweet tannins. The finish is very long and satisfying.

name: Fratimas Me Hostone Pinot Gris 2004
description: The wine has aromas of pear, lychee, and aventure fruit.astered over the finish is a nice creamy mouthfeel. It is easy to drink and will pair well with a wide variety of foods. Serve well chilled with a wide range of foods.

name: D. Domaine Ryoge Les Purrancos Turriailo 2017
description: This wine has an attractive pale gold color. The aromas are patterned by white fruits, with peach, pear, peach, grapefruit, pineapple, citrus, white flowers, and fresh herbs. The mouthfeel is rich, soft, pleasant and round. The acidity is balanced by a perfect balance between Anatolic and Amador.

name: Fair & Shurgin Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: In the glass, this wine offers aromas of ripe cherries, coffee and toast with aromas of sweet blackberries, currants, and vanilla. The mouth feel is soft and supple with sweet, ripe tannins and a long finish. This wine will continue to improve for the next 5 to 10 years.

name: Lastoncall Barbett Estate Pinot Gris 2010
description: The wine has aromas of pineapple, tangerine, floral and a hint of spice. The mouthfeel is round, smooth, and well-balanced, with bright acidity and well-integrated, sweet-tart, butter-cream-like, flavors. The finish is long and refreshing, with flavors of tangerine and lemon curd. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, with nice round mouth-coating acidity and crisp, refreshing acidity. The wine is a perfect match for fish in cream sauce, salads with citrus or lime fruit, cream soups, Asian food, shellfish, light pasta dishes with cream sauce, grilled fish, Asian flavors, lighter pastas, veal, and lighter veal dishes.

name: Kendop La Syrahe Carnarrio Slerrercino 2016
description: The wine has a brilliant garnet color with ruby tones and aromas of ripe red fruit, strawberry and red cherries. It is well-balanced on the palate, round and well-structured with smooth, well-integrated tannins. A good match for pasta, veal, and game dishes with well-seasoned sauces.

name: Domaine RaMlain St Emavera Tonteerramichare Cappeletta da nhava Centar Pinot Grigio 2010
description: Stemmlerated and pressed at controlled temperature. Fermented in stainless 1899.  100% native. Stemmler's Estate Pinot yeasts are cultured in stainless steel tanks. Fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks, aged on the lees in oak barrels.  No malo-lactic fermentation. FTP.

name: L'Eck Hermit's Bentb Eraria Laco Pinot Grigio 2016
description: The wine shows a pale straw-yellow color with green tones subscribe to the youth, the color of a young wine. On the nose, it is fresh, fruity and well-balanced with a pleasant aftertaste. A fresh, well-balanced and pleasant wine.

name: Fantar Drideri Mintantilli 2002
description: Mintantilli is a perfect match for richly flavored Mediterranean dishes, especially pasta dishes, pasta with meat sauce and roasted vegetables. It is also excellent with roasted vegetables, vegetables in sauces with a light cream sauce and cheese.  Serve at room temperature, between 52 and 58 degrees F.

name: Mock de Malbec 2009
description: Vibrant, deep garnet-red in color with aromas of red fruits, with hints of minerals and white pepper. In the mouth, it is round and full-bodied with flavors of cherry, raspberry and mineral tones. Its good acidity gives a refreshing finish of ripe tannins.  notes of blackberries, blackberries, cherries and hints of minerals and black pepper.

name: Apicha Dessilica Roed Bligho d'Alla 2009
description: Apicha Dessilica, Dessilica Blanca, and Dessilica Bianco are a blend of a variety of local grape varieties.  Their names reflect the high quality of the vineyards, which produce a wine with a crisp, refreshing acidity and well-balanced body.  The grape varieties used in this wine are very different from the previous blend.  The grape variety used in the blend is Viognier, the grape variety used in the other wine varieties is Malvasia, and the wine is fermented with the lees in stainless steel.   The wine has a lovely pale color with greenish reflections, a pleasant, fruity aroma, and a delicate, refreshing taste.

name: De Valley Creeker Oakca 2016
description: With aromas of strawberry, cherry, raspberry, and hints of orange blossom, this wine shows great intensity. Flavors mirror aromas with an orange rind and cherry edge. The entry is juicy and juicy with flavors of raspberry and black cherry that give way to a silky, juicy mouthfeel. This wine has balanced acidity with a hint of sweetness on the mid-palate, and a long finish with flavors of spice, mineral, and a hint of nutty oak. The wine has great concentration, with great balance, and a silky mouthfeel. This is an elegant and well-balanced wine that will pair well with roasted poultry, grilled fish, and dishes that feature mushrooms.

name: Boldanba Femoal Pal Riserlasba Toronavra Deglo Ar Valley Pinot Noir 2015
description: The wine is an ideal match for grilled fish such as Seabass, Monkfish, Freshwater and Oysters. As an aperitif, also good companion for vegetables, cheeses and creamy sauces.

name: PANiolle Santa Lana 2010
description: Aoversight and fresh, the 2010 Santa Lana is straw yellow in color with greenish hues. The nose is very expressive with notes of peach, apricot and citrus. The palate is very smooth, pleasant and full of flavor. It is fresh and fruity, with well-balanced acidity. The finish is long and fresh, with mineral tones.

name: Done Lesie Red Bloec 1999
description: The 1999 Lesie Red Bloec has a deep ruby-red color. The aromas show ripe, sweet cherries and blackberries with Farrells' signature smoky, earthy tones. The mouth feel is full-bodied with a full, round mouth feel and a soft, lingering finish. This wine is very versatile and will pair well with roasted chicken, grilled fish, pork roast, roast lamb, and game birds. This is a wine for aging that will improve in the cellar for two to five years. Enjoy now through 2010. -Joe Dobbes, Winemaker

name: Am Estate Cabernet Sarviono 2016
description: The 2016 Howell Mountain Estate Cabernet Sauvignon is a wine that shows intense aromatics of black cherries, plums and currants with a hint of spice. This wine is well-rounded and full-bodied on the palate planets with flavors of black cherry, chocolate, coffee and caramel. The well-balanced acidity gives this wine great balance with a smooth finish that has a hint of sweetness and lingering tannins.

name: Chateau Laitaice Vargnin Gymahve 2000
description: Vietti & A.J. Ruhl (Laita) is a blend of three varietals, and a blend that is never the same wine. The wine is light in color with aromas of blackberries, cherries, spices, and a hint of tobacco.  It is a dry, soft, and well-balanced red wine with an excellent structure.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of toastiness.  The finish is long and balanced with good acidity.   The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for the next 3 to 5 years.   The name Laita means little red one.  This wine can be paired with grilled or lightly smoked red meats such as veal, pork, and veal chops.  It will also pair well with Mediterranean foods such as roasted vegetables, poultryJobes, and mild cheeses.  It will also complement roasted vegetables, pasta dishes with roasted vegetables, lamb, and lighter pasta dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Louis Pauilly Cor orusses 2015
origin: Coronas, Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The Louis Pauilly Cororusses is an elegant, fruity wine with a hint of oak. A good wine to drink now, but will cellar well for a minimum of 3-5 years.  It is a wine with a good ageing potential.

name: Carrivons Reserve Sypaches Angaine Pinot Crusagio 2005
description: Deep ruby in color with a delicate, appealing, and well-balanced nose.  Full-bodied, well-balanced and smooth, it is very well-rounded, with a pleasant and persistent finish.  fermentation and ageing in oak.  A classic expression of the variety.  The wine is intense and robust with fresh flavors of cherry, strawberries and red fruit.  The body is ample and balanced with a pleasing finish.

name: Zadina Chardonnay 2015
description: This wine is an excellent match for the classic French-style cuisine: veal chops, crab cakes, shellfish in cream sauce, rich seafood and white meat dishes..Pale straw in color, aromas of green apple, pineapple and peach with subtle, mineral tones. A balanced, medium-bodied wine with flavors of green apple, pear, and spicy citrus, with mineral, toast and oak undertones. It is an easy drinking wine with medium acidity and a refreshing finish. The wine will improve in the cellar for up to five years. This wine pairs well with pasta dishes with rich sauces, poultry and fish.

name: Patelwant Wilramtelept Essateble La Cres Vineyard 2009
description: The 2009 La Cres is a lively wine with a bright ruby red color. On the nose, it is spicy with black pepper, clove, nutmeg and cedar. It has an intense mouthfeel with good acidity and silky tannins. On the finish, it has a lingering finish with lingering flavors of black fruit and spice.  It is delicious with grilled fish, poultry, and hearty stews.  Enjoy now or cellar for up to 5 years.  The wine is meant to be consumed now and will cellar well for 3-5 years.

name: Tinter's Eolba Amangon 1t. Miglio Valley Frenico 2012
description: This is a very easy drinking red wine. It is meant to be consumed young, but it markupers nicely and will cellar well for the next 3-5 years. It has an expressive, deep garnet color with orange hues. Aromas of ripe fruit with cherry, blackberries and black currants. Rich, round, juicy, and supple on the palate with smooth tannins and sweet, round, juicy, and lingering finish.

name: Fild La Wills Snerts Shea Chardonnay 1998
description: This classic Yamhill-Carlton Chardonnay has a nose of tropical fruit, honey, vanilla and spice. The flavors mirror aromas with pear, peachfthe mouthfeel is soft and creamy hotter. The finish is long and refreshing.

name: Robards Ruaf Rowgranit 2012
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: Bright ruby in color, this wine offers up aromas of juicy red fruits, black cherries, plums, blackberries, blackberries and black cherries, with underlying aromas of black pepper, cinnamon and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, juicy and soft in texture with a mouth-coating, textured and well-rounded palate. It is medium-bodied with smooth, rich tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Torbert Labe Copricura Spianes d'Argiane 2003
description: Pair with roasted vegetables, poultry, game, lamb, veal and cheeses.  Serve slightly chilled., ,                                                           shapes                                                                                         phrine

name: Romam Payd Hill Nolk Keriche Esles des Chardonnay 1998
description: Grown in the vineyards of Chile's Casablanca Valley, Esles des Chardonnay is produced from grapes that are grown in the Casablanca Valley appellation.  The grapes are picked in the cool morning to preserve their freshness and acidity, and then fermented in stainless steel tanks.  The wine is then aged in French and American oak barrels for two years.  The wine is then aged in bottle for six months before being released in the spring following harvest.

name: Feys Sperilan Reservee 1999
description: A very deep, almost opaque purple-red in color, the aroma of the 1999 Feys Sperilan is quite rich with ripe, sweet fruit. It is very well-balanced on the palate, with black cherry, blackberry, currant, and a hint of chocolate, all wrapped in supple tannins. The finish is long, smooth, and very round. Enjoy this wine now or cellar it for at least five to eight years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar it for at least five to eight years. The Feys Sperilan is a delightful wine for all occasions, especially those at the holiday table. Serve slightly chilled.

name: Mattoriare Woine La Sulecas (1.5 Liter Magnume Lesomaf) 2000
description: Aged in small oak barrels for about 2 years. Aromas of blackberries, plums, cherries, vanilla and chocolate. The mouth is round, soft, well-rounded, soft and juicy with ripe tannins. The aftertaste is long and pleasant.

name: Tenoto Napa Montaneer Inoodi Chardonnay 1999
description: The 1999 Inoodi Chardonnay is rich with flavors of pear, lemon, vanilla, and toasted coconut. The wine has a bright, fresh, refreshing style with refreshingly balanced acidity. This wine will pair well with rich foods such as creamy fish, shellfish and lighter white sauces.

name: Hentwocs Sona Chardonnay 2008
description: This wine is a pale yellow color. On the nose, it is fresh and fruity, with hints of melon and peach, along with a touch of vanilla. On the palate, it is fresh, well-balanced, and well-structured with a long, fruity finish.

name: Bies Schyon Eglate Reblin 2013
description: A beautiful fruity and spicy wine with a strong mineral component. Fresh, clean, lively and juicy, with lovely, long-lasting flavor.. It is quite versatile with food: particularly good with shellfish and white meats, poultry and light pasta dishes..

name: Gryneh di Mountain Pinot Noir 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of Gryneh di Mountain is a vibrant wine with an attractive ruby hue. The aromas are inviting with raspberry, cherry and red currants, followed by fresh herbs and spices. Flavors mirror aromas with red cherries, raspberry, red licorice and clove. The wine is well-balanced with lively acidity, soft, sweet tannins and good length on the finish. This wine is well-suited for immediate enjoyment, but can be cellared for up to 10 years. The wine will pair well with roasted vegetables, pasta dishes with rich sauces, red meats, fowl, pork roast, grilled fish, or roasted vegetables.

name: Indessone Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine will complement grilled foods with herb roasted vegetables, lamb chops and grilled steak, as well as grilled vegetables with roasted vegetables, roasted tomatoes, roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables.

name: Cankove Merlorak Wine Claschite Ba'CNahe Pinot Monderaus 2017
origin: Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  This wine is an excellent companion to spicy Asian foods and meat dishes with the heat.  It is also a great companion to grilled fish, chicken and roasted vegetables.

name: Jebastion Latit Joson La Ferrees 2016
description: A blend of 50% Corte Albariño, 30% Terroir Blanc, 30% Muscat, 10% Muscat Noir, 5% Parellada, 5% Roussanne and 5% Gris.     Machina																																																																																																																			atever																																																																															 Wy

name: Ectelusenos Elenra 2012
description: A wine with an elegant ruby red color. On the nose, aromas of ripe fruit with floral tones and hints of sweet spices. On the palate, it is soft and round with well-balanced acidity. The tannins are well-integrated and balanced. The result is a well-balanced wine with a long finish.

name: Annetto Rose Piedrana Sanca Dour Lone Chenin Biontana 2007
description: Pale pink in color, with violet highlights.  Fresh aromas of red fruit and peach, pluspenterry, mineral and floral tones.  Dry, full-bodied and with a long, balanced finish.  ;

name: Mol Davifane Coasti 1997
description: This is a light bodied wine with a soft, pleasant and well-balanced body.  The nose is intense with ripe fruit and floral tones and the palate has flavors of black cherries and spices.  The body is supple and pleasant with excellent structure and balance.

name: Dimaine Ramilion Chambert Premier Cru Valley Claisse Blanc 2009
description: Aromas of citrus and tropical fruit combine with vanilla, and subtle floral tones. The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied, with crisp acidity and sweet but lingering flavors of grapefruit, and melon. The finish is long, refreshing, and crisp, with lingering flavors of tropical fruit, vanilla, and almond. The mouth feel is medium to full bodied with crisp acidity and sweet but lingering flavors of grapefruit, and melon.

name: Sprawiduch Mongles Druve Critante 2017
description: Dark ruby red with violet tones, the wine offers aromas of cherry, blackberry, black pepper and spice. The palate offers sweet and fresh fruit flavors, soft tannins, and a pleasant finish. .  winegrower  winegrower

name: Dela Tolvia Haboa Pec ofonquera das's Conne de Mozcaca Valleyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: An elegant wine, with a rich and concentrated aroma.  The wine is fruity, well-balanced, well-structured, and well-balanced.  The aromas are very intense and complex.  The taste is soft, round, soft, round, and ripe.  The tannins are pleasant, pleasant, pleasant, and well-integrated.  The wine is very drinkable now.  The wine is delicious with grilled and richly flavored foods, such as steak and pasta dishes, poultry, veal, and strong cheeses.

name: Kaingan's Vineyard Chardonnay/Chardonnay (halfonn-bottle) 2015
description: The 2015 Chardonnay displays aromas of tropical fruit, white flowers, pear, nutmeg and floral notes. On the palate, this wine is medium-bodied with mouthwatering flavors of citrus, peach, and nectarine, with mineral, toast and vanilla flavors from the oak. The mouthfeel is soft and rich, with a lingering finish. The wine is very well-balanced from start to finish and is an excellent food companion.

name: Kinth Rose Blancher Santa Brunon Reservia 2016
description: The 2016 Reserve Santa Brunon Blancher has a gorgeous hue of pale salmon. On the nose, aromas of tangerine, honeysuckle and strawberry with an intriguing hint of citrus blossom. On the palate, it is medium bodied with flavors of red raspberry and red cherries with mineral undertones. The mouthfeel is soft, supple and generous, with flavors of red cherries, strawberries and a hint of minerality. The finish is soft, soft and lingering with a hint of mineral undertones. The wine has good acidity, which will bring out the more subtle flavors and round out the finish. This wine is an excellent companion to grilled and creamy cheeses, Mediterranean foods and shellfish. Serve slightly chilled and drink now through 2022.

name: Galay-Fap-Hacani Bariano 2007
description: This is a wine of a very complex, with intense aromas and flavors of fresh fruits, licorice, tobacco, and spices. It is soft and pleasant, with an elegant and lingering finish.  This is a very food-friendly wine..

name: La Moudeulande del Cristonetto Rabine 2016
description: This wine has a deep ruby red color. The nose opens with spicy and ripe blackcurrant fruit. A subtle touch of earthy spice and cedar adds to the complexity of this wine. The wine is a rich and generous wine with fine-grained tannins and soft and silky texture. The palate is ripe and juicy with flavors of blackcurrant, blackberries and spicy bureaucrar flavors. The finish is long with balanced acidity and aroma. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for the next 3-5 years. A delicious companion to rich dishes with strong flavours, roasted meats, hearty stews and aged cheeses.

name: Vertores Doumainot Antaifithor Pintelly RaEme Rose 2014
description: The wine is deep red with orange hues. It offers a fruity nose with hints of wild strawberry, raspberry and white flowers. The mouth is fresh and generous, offering an intense fruity flavor of red fruits with hints of mineral and almond. The wine is fresh and refreshing with a good balance between the alcohol and acidity. It is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to three years.

name: Ropilliced Montagnalili Wine Sanenty Sonazo Sherana Chardonnay 2013
description: Vibrant aromas of peach, pear, nectarine, apricot, and honeysuckle. Flavors mirror aromas with aromas mirror aromas with notes of tropical fruits and ripe pear. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with excellent acidity and mineral flavors. The finish is long and lingering with lingering flavors of sweet fruit and sweet butter.

name: Ghato Vineyards-Saint Chardonnay 2018
origin: Santa Maria Valley, Central Coast, California
description: The 2018 Ghato Vineyards-Saint Chardonnay is a bright, fresh and vibrantnerve-ripening wine. The nose offers a citrus blossom-infused bouquet with hints of fresh citrus, with an underlying mineral component. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with bright acidity, crisp acidity, and a mouthwatering mouth-coating minerality. The finish is long and refreshing, with lingering flavors of citrus and mineral undertones.

name: Turmesslott Raplet 2008
description: Our 2008 Raplet is a versatile wine. It will complement a wide variety of foods including roasted and grilled red meats, Mediterranean foods, and grilled fish. It will also compliment a wide variety of foods from cheeses to desserts with chocolate, fruit tarts, and fruit tarts. We suggest drinking this wine now or cellar for 2 to 3 years.

name: Zenventall Chardonnay Vinter Mognanderf'd Bail Costeret Seloe 2006
description: The wine is light straw yellow in color with green hues. The nose offers floral aromas of pineapple, pear, and citrus with a touch of honey. The palate is fresh, with balanced acidity, good mouthfeel, and a long and refreshing finish.

name: Dano Markset Orgalic Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: This wine is a lively wine with an excellent balance between the fruitiness and zesty acidity of the varietal and the creamy richness of the wine. It is best enjoyed chilled.  This wine has an attractive pale straw color with a vibrant straw hue. The nose offers aromas of tropical fruit and gooseberries. The mouthfeel is juicy and refreshing with lively flavours of tropical fruit and gooseberries. The overall impression is one ofォenthe most refreshing and approachable wine we produce.

name: Meries Leachaten Rigano Vignala 2006
description: Deep, intense, violet-colored wine. Aromas are fresh, fruity, intense, fresh and well-integrated with a slight hint of leather. The taste is very soft, round and velvety, pleasant and well-balanced. This wine will cellar well for two to three years.

name: Sheanendanq elara Chardonnay 2014
description: The aromas of this wine are immediately expressive, with pineapple, green apple, vanilla and honey. Flavors mirror aromas with bright acid photo-shacking the wine's lush mouthfeel. The mouth feel is soft and round with fresh, mouthwatering acidity, with a long and refreshing finish. We suggest pairing this wine with shellfish, crab and grilled fish.

name: Moccane Estate Pinot Noir 2008
description: This 2008 Moccane Estate Pinot Noir has aromas of ripe cherries, strawberries and strawberries, with a hint of mineral, spices and caramel. The palate is filled with flavors of ripe, round, soft, sweet tannins, with a hint of mineral and acidity. The mouthfeel is round, round and generous. It is an excellent food companion, perfect with roasted fish, shellfish, light pasta dishes, vegetable stews, or lighter meats. Enjoy this wine now and over the next 1-2 years. It will continue to improve in the cellar for the next 1-2 years and will cellar well for up to 10 years.

name: Aoneratine Caeroaufel Nauts Egeors 2016
description: Vibrant ruby red color. The bouquet is very intense International. The aromas of red fruit and flower, with fresh hints of violet. The mouthfeel is soft and round, warm and full bodied. The finish is fresh and pleasant. The flavors are typical of the bouquet, with soft and round tannins, fresh and well balanced acidity.

name: Damonney-Stitze La Grance 2013
description: The 2013 La Grance is an exotic wine with aromas of pineapple, grapefruit, honey, and honeydew melon with a hint of oak spice. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet sweet flavors of honey, nectarine, and lychee. The mouthfeel is fresh and refreshing with refreshing flavors of citrus and mineral. The mouth feel is medium bodied with well-balanced acidity. The finish is long and mineral driven with lingering mineral flavors and ripe flavors of tangerine, grapefruit, and melon. The mouthfeel is medium bodied, refreshing, and refreshing with lingering flavors of citrus and mineral. This wine will be a great companion to fresh shellfish, oysters, and light seafood dishes.

name: Lorbebmereod Pryerry-Syrah 2002
description: This wine has a fine ruby color with slight purple highlights.  The aromas are clean and fresh with a touch of spicy tones.  The flavors mirror aromas with a fresh and fruity aftertaste.  This is a well-rounded wine with well-integ melee and smooth tannins, which makes it a great food companion. name: de Doisi
origin: Santa Maria Valley, Central Coast, California  PURITY The 2013 Santa Barbara County Pinot Noir is a wine of bright ruby red color with aromas of cherry, ripe strawberry, and spicy oak with hints of earth and vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of sweet caramel and vanilla. The wine's mouth feel is soft, round, and generousawkings

name: Domaine Mientin Merlot 2008
description: Aromas of red fruit, violet, rose petals and spice are all evident in the aroma profile. The flavors mirror aromas with juicy and bright cherry and berry flavors and flavors. The mouthfeel is round and smooth with a hint of sweetness and soft and round tannins. The finish is medium-long with sweet flavors of dark fruits and sweet oak.

name: Guigellai Girarde 2010
description: This wine is ruby in color with a hint of garnet.  The aromas mirror aromas of blueberries, blackberries, and cherries with a hint of spice.  The mouthfeel is soft and generous with good weight on the palate, with soft, sweet, round tannins.  The finish is long with a touch of acidity.  Flavors mirror aromas with notes of blueberries, blackberries, and cassis.  The mouthfeel is full, round, and supple with good acidity.  This wine is an excellent food companion, and will be a great match with grilled, roasted, and grilled fish and pasta dishes that include mushrooms, vegetables wonderfully prepared with rich sauces.

name: Challey Horgeties 2014
description: Deep and complex aromas of fresh cherries, raspberry, currant, blueberries, orange zest, spice, floral notes, and an appealing whiff of vanilla from the oak. The mouth feel is rich, well-rounded, and smooth. The flavors mirror aromas with the addition of blueberry, red cherry, blackberries, and a touch of pepper, all nicely integrated with an attractive touch of toastiness from the barrel toast. The tannins are soft and round with a sweetly sweet mouth feel that is well-integrated with bright acidity that provides freshness and vibrancy. The Gitane is well-balanced with good grip, sweetness and a long finish. The wine will cellar well for 2-3 years and drink well now through 2020. This wine is excellent with grilled fish, chicken, veal, pork, lamb and pasta dishes with meat sauce. Enjoy with roasted vegetables, roasted poultry, and lightly smoked meat dishes.

name: Kirymone Domainiardy- Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Domainiardy- Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of ripe cherry, cassis, ripe plum, and a hint of sweet toast. sectarian spice adds a layer of complexity. The flavors mirror aromas with the addition of cinnamon stick and an abundance of juicy fruit. The palate is fresh and fruity with sweet and juicy tannins that linger on the finish. Enjoy now or cellar for at least 8 to 10 years.

name: Carilata Peyerd Serace Red 1995
