name: Haynon Sery Winery Family Cellars Dilgy Yarger Pinot Noir 2014
description: The wine opens with aromas of red fruits, cherries, and strawberries. The palate is juicy with ripe flavors of cherry and red currant. The tannins are balanced by good acidity and acidity. The wine is well-rounded with lingering fruit flavors of raspberry and cherry. The finish is long and lingering with flavors of red fruits and spice.

name: PRobicgeczi Mornena Rocche L'Elbers 2007
description: The wine is a very versatile wine, well suited for many foods. It is best consumed chilled, and can be enjoyed on its own or with roasted, grilled or roasted red meat and game.  The wine can also be served with tomato based pasta dishes and cheese.

name: Balbin Coastetos Naa Premier Cru 2012
description: This wine has aromas of ripe red and black fruits such as cherries and plums, as well as aromatic herbs such as thyme, white pepper, and cloves. It has a well-balanced and medium-bodied mouthfeel with good acidity. It is well-balanced between sweetness and structure, with fresh and balanced tannins.

name: Orrin Rayx Montral Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: The 2012 Rayx Montral Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc is bright, fresh, and fruity. The nose features aromas of honeydew, kiwi, tangerine, and gooseberries with a hint of lemon and lime. The mouthfeel is rich and juicy, with a soft entry and crisp acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of honey, pear, honeycomb, and honeydew melon. The wine is medium-bodied with flavors of citrus and mineral notes with a pleasing sweetness from sur lie aging. The balance of fresh acidity makes this wine a refreshing wine for everyday dining.

name: Domaine de Capevilas Pucesit Rose 2013
description: Vibrant, with fresh acidity and mineral notes. The wine has a fine texture and fine-grained tannins. The wine is full of freshness with a refreshing finish.  mineral, white pepper and green apple flavors on the nose blanket the palate with well-integ ٜdity. The wine has excellent structure and length.  Serve chilled.

name: Chateau Geaynes-Mazieley Chambilfartin Chamb-dolle-limgereMciano 1998
description: Aromas of ripe fruit with hints of vanilla.  Rich, round and velvety mouthfeel with soft tannins.  Very good with pasta, pork, veal, veal chops, and other dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Whiteriner Pinot Noir 1999
description: The aromas are full of bright red cherries, strawberries and raspberries. The flavors mirror aromas with slight oak toastiness. The mouthfeel is soft and supple, with a slightly sweet finish. This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for a few years.

name: Stra Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: This is a very balanced wine with aromas of dark cherry, raspberry and blackberry with toasty oak and vanilla notes from the French oak barrels. Flavors mirror aromas with ripe cherry and blackberry flavors, followed by a hint of roasted coffee and chocolate. This is a smooth, well-rounded wine with soft tannins and good balance acidity. The finish is long with pleasant toasty oak notes and sweet, round oak flavors. The wine is ready to drink now, but will continue to improve and develop philosophical over the next 3 to 5 years.

name: BondenanLerger Milan Niccianhs Reserve Mallemi 2017
description: Bright ruby red in color, this wine offers expressive aromas of red fruits and spices. On the palate, it is fruity and pleasant with good structure and structure. It is best enjoyed chilled. Serve well-chilled.

name: J. Fincarle Rax Amitanognon Venter Shiraz/Graoms Cuvee Celecte Saborn-Sabernon Noir 2008
description: Aromas of ripe fruit with hints offormer, spices and nutmeg. The palate is medium bodied with a fine, textured texture. The wine is well-balanced with a fresh, crisp acidity. A wine to enjoy now or cellar for the next 5-7 years.

name: St. Conker Valley Zinflen 2002
description: The 2002 Zinfandel Zinflen exhibits aromas of ripe, bright fruit with subtle vanilla and oak.  Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of sweet ripe cherry and raspberry.  The mouth feel is full of flavors with well-integrated tannins on the finish.  This well-balanced wine is a great companion to grilled, roasted and barbecued meats.  The mouth-filling style of Zinflen is a good match for grilled fish and fowl with sauces rich in spicy sauces, and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes.

name: WePtorrask Syres Valond Syrah 2013
description: Dark garnet in color with ripe red fruit and cherry aromas with a touch of violet. Medium-bodied with smooth, round, and round tannins with balanced acidity and a long, pleasant finish.  fermentation with the skins. Aging in small oak barrels for 18 months.

name: Domaine Pinot Noir 4 Moblaid Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon is blended from vineyards located in the Horse Heaven Hills of the Yakima Valley, a warm region known for its moderate temperatures.  The wine shows bright aromas of ripe cherries, blackberries, currants and strawberries, with a hint of cocoa and pepper. The mouth feel is soft and juicy with sweet tannins on the finish. The wine is medium bodied with a good balance between sweetness and acidity. The finish is long and lingering, with lingering flavors of caramel, cinnamon and cloves.

name: Clmowa Selar Vineyards Merlot 2014
description: Dark ruby red color. Rich, intense aromas with hints of cherry and plum. Flavor is fruity and round with subtle flavors of violet and earthy notes. This wine has great balance between sweetness and acidity. The wine is well-balanced with a long finish. The tannins are ripe, pleasant and well-integrated.

name: Amosser Nordana Chianti Unina Giacaidu 2016
description: Deep ruby-red in color with light garnet tints, themaker’s Chianti is an intensely aromatic wine with good complexity. It is full-bodied and powerful with pleasant and pleasanttannins. The overall impression is good. It is a harmonious wine with good balance between alcohol and acidity.

name: Clarietti Shiraze Sorenino Tixeva Tratila Chianti 2001
description: Tixeva is a fresh, fruity wine, which has a good balance between the oak and acidity, and a pleasingly pleasant taste.  The aromas are very intense, with spicy and floral tones.  The flavor is rich and round, with sweet tannins on the finish.

name: Domaine des Pascotuur Grane Clomaine de Pouilly Merlot 2014
description: A red wine with a purple hue. The nose opens with red fruit, especially strawberries, cherries and red currants. The flavors mirror aromas with the addition of ripe fruit and sweet spices, which are typical of this varietal.  aromas of ripe fruit, spices and an appealing touch of violet. The mouth is round and smooth with fine-grained tannins. The mouthfeel is full and smooth, with a pleasant and lingering finish. This wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to 6 years. The grapes are picked and gently pressed. The wine is aged in oak barrels for 2 years. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to 6 years.

name: Paile Lee & Schenelle Chay Blanc 2004
description: The 2004 Chay Blanc opens with bright aromas of white flowers, tangerine, flint and vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of nutmeg and oak on the mouthfeel. The wine has nice balance between mouth-coating acidity and weight. It is refreshing on the finish with flavors of ripe fruit and mineral overtones.

name: Gengas Family Meroltyan Zinfatella 2005
description: The nose is intensely floral, offering attractive aromas of blackberries and black cherries. The mouthfeel is supple, fresh, with good volume and good balance between sweetness and acidity. The finish is well-balanced, with persistent flavors of ripe fruit, spices, and coffee. This wine will continue to improve for up to 5 years, and can be cellared for 3 to 4 years Mercylessly.

name: Traccourva Franiverutta 2016
description: Bright ruby red in color with purple highlights. Pairings: Excellent with richly flavored dishes such as roasted meats and aged cheeses. SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  A young wine, easy to drink, pleasant to drink and a pleasant companion for fine cuisine.

name: Albaion Creder Park Whils Vineyards Ney-Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The wines deep, intense color reflects the intensity of the vintage. The nose features a powerful bouquet of cherry, raspberry, currant and cassis with a hint of tobacco. The mouth feel is full and generous with round, smooth tannins and well Bikehed acidity. The finish is long, smooth and long with lingering flavors of currants, chocolate, oak and spice. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for the next two to three years. It will cellar well for the next two to three years and will cellar well for the next two to three years.

name: Tyren Bruters Shiraz 2007
description: Medium-deep ruby red in color, the wine offers fresh, fragrant, spicy and fruity aromas of blackcurrant, blueberries, blueberries, cherries and dark chocolate, with some subtle notes of black pepper, cedar and chocolate. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with juicy, sweet and juicy tannins that will integrate nicely with age. The tannins are fine-grained, the flavors follow the aromas with subtle toasty oak background. The finish is soft, round and lingering with lingering sweet fruit.

name: Catmeeu Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: A classic wine with a deep, intense color.  The nose offers notes of ripe fruit such as blackberry, cherries, and blackberries with spicy notes such as pepper, clove, and nutmeg.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced with round, soft tannins.  The finish is lingering with flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Denoui-Jauziog Barols Fuergonna Premier Cru Road Reserve 2015
description: Deep ruby-red color. Complex aromas of dark fruit, strawberries, cherries and a touch of violet. Fresh, juicy and juicy on the palate, with spicy flavors of star anise and cinnamon. Finely balanced, with a nice round mouthfeel. Intense and velvety tannins that create a mouthwatering sensation. Pleasant finish.

name: ZNy de Blodile Lanperl DOruvey Molbares Riesrie Chardonnay 1998
description: Pair with: Salmon, crab, crab, clams, scallops, clams, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, sc Ronalds, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, behestants, stewed prawns, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallops, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop shells, scallop

name: Roman Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: Our 2007 Roman Cabernet Sauvignon opens with aromas of cherry, currants and cassis, with touches of licorice, violet, sweet toasty oak, and toast. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of ripe cherry, currant and cherry pie, followed by vanilla, clove and toastiness. The mouthfeel is smooth and round, with well-integrated tanninsSounds, leading to a long, smooth finish.  opioid																																																																		 icon     																			 thinker

name: Stmyer Pinot Noir 2006
description: Aromas of bright cherry, raspberry and spice fill the nose.  Flavors mirror aromas with raspberry, pomegranate and cranberry interwoven with vanilla and toast.  The mouthfeel is soft, round and well-balanced with silky, sweet tannins and balanced acidity.

name: Chardeaux Villoneme 1996
description: The vineyards are located at the foot of the Pyrenees.  The soils are mostly limestone with a good proportion of clay and the fruit is harvested in the first half of the harvest.  The wine is then aged in oak barrels for 6 months.  The blend of these factors creates a well-balanced wine with a lovely combination of finesse and fruitiness.  The Pinot Gris is a very approachable wine with a good balance between alcohol and acidity.  This wine is best enjoyed chilled as an aperitif, or with hors d'oeuvres, fish and shellfish in cream sauces.

name: Jean-Jorencon & Filchourseur Grand Cru 2014
description: This wine is a classic expression of the Grand Cru style. The nose opens with aromas of cherry, raspberry and earthiness. The mouthfeel is round and generous, with flavors of cranberry, cherry and chocolate.. The finish is soft and smooth, with nice acidity.

name: Estel Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (OU Kosher) 2016
description: Pale yellow in color, with greenish tints. Delicate and intense aromas of citrus fruits with light floral tones. Very refreshing, well-balanced, and well-structured on the palate. Ideal as an aperitif, and with shellfish, white meats, fresh cheese and goat cheese.

name: Bodymait Russian Rivelz mine 2004
description: This is a medium bodied wineasuage of Shiraz with flavors of chocolate and spice. The mouth feel is medium bodied with medium weight and supple tannins. The finish is smooth and pleasant with well-balanced acidity. The finish is very long with good lingering sweetness.

name: Talty Dote Hartove Hidk Rouge 2009
description: A wine of medium weight, full of the fruit and aromatic characteristics of the varietal. It is round and smooth on the palate, with well-integrated, well-balanced acidity. A wine with an excellent balance between intensity and fruitiness. This wine can be consumed young, and will cellar well for a few years. The Hidk Ribeck is a perfect companion to grilled and roasted red meats, roasted vegetables, veal, and mild cheeses.

name: Thake Eosnon Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: This wine is ruby red in color with violet tones. The aroma is very intense with ripe fruit flavors and some sweet notes of caramel, coffee and toast. The mouthfeel is well-balanced with round, ripe tannins and a fresh, clean finish. The wine is an excellent accompaniment to red meats, especially those that have roasted or grilled flavors.

name: Rosch Carwon Sauvignon Blanc 2017
description: The 2017 Rosch Car Won’s Sauvignon Blanc offers a youthful fragrance with citrus and passionfruit aromas. On the palate, this wine is fresh, fresh and crisp, with a rich mouth feel. The mouth feel is refreshing and light bodied with refreshing acidity.

name: Scaa Rostoud Shirese Laberrito 2004
description: The 2004 Shirese Laberito is a blend of 30% Sauvignon Blanc, 35% Viognier, and 10% Muscat, alloglyho-sugar fermented and aged in stainless steel. A wine with power and vibrancy, this wine is composed of 100% Viognier. The wine is medium-bodied and well-rounded, with a crisp, clean acidRelish on the finish. It is a lovely value. The wine is well-priced and should cellar well for 3 LU. The wine is 100% estate-grown. This vintage of the estate is the best of the year. The wine is also aged in new French oak for 7 months. The wine is great for sipping and will improve over the next 2- 3 years.  The wine is a good companion for foods with fresh or tangy flavors, such as Asian and grilled fish, shellfish, veal, white meats and creamy cheeses.-Wine Advocate

name: Torlainee Sauvigninon Blanc 2016
description: This wine is refreshing and fruity, with lifted aromas of passionfruit, grape Despair and tropical fruits, along with subtle herbaceous tones. On the palate, it has intense flavors of passionfruit, grapefruit and grapefruit, with an intriguing minerality, complemented by lively acid narcissistic and mineral notes. The wine has good intensity and texture, and a long, refreshing finish. This wine is a good match for foods with citrusy flavors such as grapefruit, lime and grapefruit, as well as seafood and spicy Asian flavors.

name: Zingans Prichiof Pardona Crasminito di Montol del 2006
description: Deep ruby red in color with a hint of purple. Intense and well-balanced on the nose with fresh red fruit and subtle hints of spices. Full and elegant in the mouth, with good tannins and balanced acidity.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Kentoad Vinter Alt Pinot Noir 2004
description: Our Vinter Alt Vineyard Pinot Noir is an elegant wine with a medium garnet color. The aromas offer rich aromas of strawberries and cherries, with a hint of vanilla. The mouthfeel is round, soft and supple, with good acidity. The finish is long and fruity. This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for at least two years. The tannins are soft and round with good acidity. This wine will pair well with grilled fish and especially Asian foods.

name: Cronchersen Jano Cheruth Ressaut 2014
description: The nose is intense and intense, full of aromas of cherry, strawberries, raspberry, blackberries and sweet spices. The palate is full of sweet and sweet-tart flavors, with a good body, good acidity and roundness. This is a very elegant wine, with a long finish and a good balance between the sweetness of the fruit and the softness of the tannins. The wine can be consumed young or in the next 2 to 3 years. The wine is ready to drinkonymously and is a perfect match for a wide variety of food styles.

name: Keno Anambestierla 1995
description: The blend of Tre Vigne, Tre Vigne di Vigne diSponsori and Tre Vigne di Brisa grapes are made from selected vineyards located in the districts of Novello, Monferrato, Sarmon, Linchet, Brisa and Monferrato.  The grapes are selected for their delicacy, good concentration and fresh taste.  The wine is then aged for two and a half years in large oak casks.

name: Prita Ricitia Santoso 2006
description: Bright ruby-red color with garnet tones. Aromas are intense and fresh, combining intense aromas of cherry and plum with spicy aromas of pepper and spices. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced with good structure, fresh and well-integrated tannins and good acidity. The overall impression is soft and round, with a long and pleasant finishintented to invite another sip. This wine can be enjoyed on its own as an aperitif, as an alternative to the Pinot Noir, with pizza, poultry and red meats.

name: Boctozi Bellana Valla Wiliisa Roberau 2015
description: It is a wine that is very easy to drink with great flavors of blackberries, blueberries, cherries, blueberries, and strawberries withonsequential toast, vanilla, and leathery notes. The wine is well-balanced, well-structured, and fresh. This wine is well-suited to roasted vegetables, cheeses, and lighter flavored pasta dishes.

name: Dustonni Reserva Sanevilo Malicese Napa Valley Chardonnay 2015
description: This wine has a medium-deep golden color with aromas of pear, grapefruit, and tropical fruit with light hints of nutty, vanilla and toast. The mouthfeel is medium bodied, with balanced acidity, with round mouth-coating tannins and flavors of citrus and mineral. The finish is bright, refreshing and well-balanced with mineral acidity.

name: Patziut-Bey Mountavein Vineyard Pinot Noir 2015
description: The 2015 Mountavein is a wine logger with elegance and balance. Aromas are of fresh cranberries, strawberries, cherries, and sweet spices. Flavors mirror aromas with cranberries, strawberries, cherries, and strawberries, with hints of sweet spices, and sweet toast. The wine is medium-bodied with balanced acidity, silky tannins, and a long, juicy finish. The finish is long with lingering flavors of red fruit and sweet spice.

name: Pelda barmaix Rued Bout Classer 2015
description: Pale ruby red. Fresh, fruity, with floral and spicy tones. Fruity, round, fresh and pleasant to drink. This wine pairs well with a wide range of foods. The best pairings include fresh fruit salads, grilled fish, chicken, meatballs and veal. It is also great with pasta dishes with light sauces, grilled chicken, veal, and roasted vegetables.

name: Dumaine Hillef Sauvignon Blanc 2017
description: Hillef is a perfect introduction to the wine. The nose is fresh and refreshing with aromas of citrus and white fruits. The mouth is medium-bodied, well-balanced and very fruity with flavors of grapefruit, lime and grapefruit. The mouth feel is fresh and full of flavor with a good, well-balanced acidity.

name: Roxnessebic Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2087
description: Roxnessebic Vineyard is one of New Zealand's most recognized vineyards. It is located in the heart of the Awatere Valley where temperatures are cooling and the soils are very similar to the Awatere Valley's finest vineyards. The result is a wine with a rich, fresh flavor profile and aromas of tropical fruit and citrus with a hint of citrus and minerally herbal notes. The palate is rich, yet lively with a well-balanced acidity.

name: Cheteau St Vanges de Priverestourella Pingi Grand Calpraria Valle-Setate Pinot Noir 2007
description: This is a well-rounded wine with flavors of black cherry, cranberry, and spice. The finish is smooth and well-balanced with good length.  The tannins are well-integrated and well-balanced, leading to a long, smooth finish.   We suggest opening an hour before enjoying this wine.

name: Kostley Zinfardelte Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The 2016 Zinfardelte exhibits aromas of honeysuckle, tangerine, white florals, citrus, green apple, and pear. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of pear, grapefruit, citrus, and a hint of floral notes. The wine is bright and lively with flavors of citrus and green apple. The finish is crisp, refreshing and long, with lingering flavors of citrus, mineral, and a Buddy-camper and mineral edge. This wine will pair well with most food styles including shellfish, shellfish in cream sauce, and grilled fish.

name: Bodegae Vale Menta Dy. Viteruts Vineyard Malbec 2012
description: The Menta displays the deep purple color with violet tones. On the nose, the wine is intense and intense with aromas of red fruit and floral tones. The mouth feel is smooth and round with soft and round tannins, fresh acidity, and good persistence.  blend: 88% Malbec, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc, 7% Petit Verdot, 7% Malbec, 3% Cabernet Sauvignon, 2% Merlot, 2% Malbec, 2% Petit Verdot, 2% Malbec, 2% Syrah, 2% Merlot,ZA

name: GNodenz Entero Ferio Malbec 2009
description: The wine has a red color with violet tones, good intensity and intensity. The nose is fresh, intense and fruity, with aromas of red fruits, cherries and blackberries. On the palate it is fresh, well-balanced and well-structured. This is a very good match for all meats, especially beef, veal, veal chops and roasted vegetables.

name: Chatela Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Chatela Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of cassis, blackberries, and vanilla. The wine is full-bodied with ripe tannins and an integrated acidity. It has a beautiful long, smooth finish.

name: Brenwo & Siguling Vineyard The Vineyard Chardonnay (375ML half-bottle) 2007
description: This wine exhibits aromas of tropical fruit, papaya, and tropical fruits with toasty, nutty notes. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with flavors of ripe tropical fruits and apricot and a hint of butter. The wine is well-balanced with mouth-coating tannins. The overall impression is of refreshing acidity, with flavors of fresh pear, melon, and honey. The finish is long with lingering flavors of citrus, pear, and toast.   The wine will continue to improve in the cellar for at least five years and will continue to drink well now through 2015.

name: Shrwonk Ponge Vapporet 2013
description: The 2013 is a wine that combines fresh and lively aromas of fresh blackberry, plum, spice, and sweet vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with the mouthfeel soft, round and supple. The wine is juicy and juicy with a hint of sweetness. The finish is long and fruity with notes of spice and sweet, juicy tannins. This wine is great to drink now and will cellar well for 2 to 3 years. The tannins are well integrated with acidity and sweetness. The wine is medium-bodied with nice structure and balance between sweetness and acidity. The finish is round and well-balanced. This wine will pair well with grilled and lightly smoked foods.

name: Challeyos Esanale Merlot 2009
description: The 2009 Esanale Merlot is a beautifully balanced wine. It has aromas of cherry, ripe plum, and sweet toast, with touches of vanilla and coffee. Flavors mirror aromas with fresh, sweet fruit flavors of ripe plum, blackberry, and black cherry. The wine is medium-bodied with soft tannins and a hint of spice on the finish.    This wine can be enjoyed now and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Kend-Geron Rivers Petite Baroliano Selection Barielaso 2002
description: Deep garnet in color with orange reflections. The bouquet is intense, with spicy and floral notes, with ripe fruit and spices. Full-bodied, with well-balanced tannins and good acidity, good length and pleasant aftertaste.   The vintage of the “Petite Baroliano” grapes, made from 80% Barolo, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 10% Merlot, is very characteristic of the estate.

name: Thea Stang Peep Valperisara 2008
description: Stang Peep Valperisara is a deep ruby red wine. The bouquet offers typical aromas of red fruits, strawberries, blackberries, cherries, and plums, as well as floral notes of violet and violet blossom. The mouthfeel is soft, round and well-rounded with good acidityinto a fresh, well-balanced, fruity, pleasant finish. The wine is fresh and well-balanced on the palate,with medium body and good structure. It can be drunk now or cellared for 5-8 years. The wine is best drunk chilled and can be paired with roasted and grilled red‎s, grilled vegetables, and red sauce pasta dishes.

name: Vina Cellarksa Hewcrenoro Vineyard Chardonnay 2013
description: The Hewcrenoro Vineyard Chardonnay is an excellent example conversation wine, as the nose of this wine is expressive and engaging. The aromas of this wine include citrus, honeydew and pineapple with flavors of ripe peach, green apple, and mineral with a touch of toastiness from the oak. The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied with bright acidity and lingering minerality. The finish is long with flavors of pineapple and pear.

name: Textoffurtst Banm Esttata Runca 1998
description: The varietals for this wine are Carmenere and Garnacha, a wine of great elegance.  The aromas are intense and fragrant, with vanilla, blackberries and ripe cherries.  The mouthfeel is round, round and soft, with soft, round, round and ripe tannins, ending in a long, spicy finish.

name: Costelastedo del Noarciaso 1998
description: Costelastedo del Noarcichelaso has the full body and aromas of the Merlot grapes, with the concentration and concentration of the Cabernet Sauvignon, with the balance and acidity of the Syrah grapes. The result is a rich, powerful wine with an aroma of ripe fruit, but with a great aging potential.

name: Vieto Cametara 1999
description: Vietti Cametara has a color of ruby-red.  The aromas of vanilla and chocolate are enhanced by hints of toastiness.  The mouthfeel is soft and generous with a round mouthfeel and a lingering finish.  This is a very food-friendly wine.  It is a very versatile wine that will pair well with a wide variety of Amendment dishes such as poultry, pasta with meat sauce, pizza and veal.   It is also a great companion to roasted, grilled and spicy foods.

name: Amone Cabernet Sauvignon Unanthol Cabernet Saugiervisse 2004
origin: Napa Valley, California Towards its peak in the cellar, this wine will be at its best

name: Dh. Entr Syrah La Markon Vineyard Pinot Noir 1997
description: In the nose, this wine has a classic aroma of fresh red and black cherries with a hint of earthiness and a touch of spicy oak.  The mouthfeel is full and rich with flavors of raspberry and cherries with well-integrated, well-integrated oak.  The finish is long with round, round tannins that provide the wine with an extremely smooth mouthfeel.   We suggest that this wine be served with roasted and grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, particularly those fish caught from the Green River in the Willamette Valley.  This wine can also be paired with lighter grilled poultry dishes.

name: Helley-Chenmot Chardonnay 1997
description: Complex and full flavored, this wine offers up ripe fruit aromas and flavors that are reminiscent of ripe pear and melon. The mouthfeel is soft, rich and round with pleasingly smooth texture. The finish is long and fresh with flavors of ripe melon, fig and fresh hazelnut.

name: Nintari Hill Marmilera Riesling 2008
description: A brilliant, pale straw-colored wine. The bouquet is clean and fresh with subtle citrus and floral aromas. The palate is fresh dealings with flavours of green lime and lime and a hint of lemon. The wine has good body with excellent length and structure. The wine is well-suited to a wide variety of foods including fresh oysters, fresh shellfish, Asian foods and lightly smoked white meats.

name: Augacis Sauvignon Blanc 2011
description: Very pale yellow in color with green tones. On the nose, it offers delicate floral notes of elderflower, lime and grapefruit, plus white fruits such as gooseberries and pears.  On the palate it is fresh and refreshing with fresh, juicy acidity.  It has a clean, clean, long finish.

name: Castlexanse Stangi Merlot 2014
description: Stangi’s aromas mirror aromas of ripe cherries and spice. The mouthfeel is generous and round with juicy flavors of cherry, blackberry, and a hint of mineral. The finish is long and soft with well-balanced acidity. This wine is delicious with roasted, grilled and grilled fish, chicken, veal, and red sauce pastas.

name: Fa Mocker Semellen Juthern Shiraz 1999
description: The Semellen Juthern Shiraz is the perfect wine to enjoy on a warm summer day. The bouquet offers a complex array of aromas including ripe fruits and spices. The palate is full of rich ripe fruit flavors, which are supported by well balanced acidity, which is the essence of good Australian style.

name: Krimagne Culex Valley Pinot Noir 2026
origin: Culex Valley, Central Otago, New Zealand
description: Vibrant ruby red in color with intense aromas of black cherries, violets, blackberries and currants with floral aromas. The palate is very balanced with great complexity of ripe fruit with a touch of toastiness. The mouthfeel is smooth, soft and velvety with balanced acidity. The finish is long and soft, with fine, lingering tannins.

name: Colneraldosse Dol Mensalcatber Sonand Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: Intense, ruby-red in color with intense aromas of ripe cherries, blueberries, blackberries, and mineral notes.  A smooth, well-balanced wine with a very pleasing finish.  This wine is ideal with roasted and grilled red meats and game birds.xpression: Intense, ruby-red in color with intense aromas of ripe, sweet cherries, blackberries, and minerals.  Pairkokings:  Serve at room temperature, it is a good match for roasted and grilled fish, veal, and roasted tomatoes.

name: Mink Foroborgie Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Vibrant and juicy with an abundance of freshpleasant aromas. A full-bodied wine with bulging tannins. With its juicy, generous and intense flavor, this wine offers a wine of balance, structure and length. Serve at room temperature, and decant for at least 30 minutes before enjoying. Serve well-chilled, preferably chilled.

name: Innumbaus Enker Vieilrum Spatcane Clasquen Reserva 2008
description: The wine has a lovely, deep ruby-red color. It offers a nose that features aromas of cherry, ripe fruit and a touch of spice. On the palate, the wine is soft and fresh with ripe flavors of blackberries and cherries with touches of coffee and licorice. The wine is well-balanced with silky, well-integrated tannins that lead into a long, smooth finish.

name: Pavprebitelli Gres Graneric Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: Intense and vibrant in the glass with intense aromas of cherry, blackberry, currants and a hint of chocolate. The flavors mirror aromas with sweet cherry, blackberry, black currant, plum, clove, cocoa, black pepper, anise and vanilla. The mouthfeel is rich and soft with balanced acidity and ripe, well-integrated tannins that lead to a long, elegant finish.

name: Zanlg Hanse Roster Ongable Red Blend 2014
description: The 2014 Hanse Roster is a wine of great intensity. Aromas of ripe black cherries, blackberries, and blueberries combine with flavors of caramel, oak spice, and vanilla. On the palate, the wine is rich and round, with soft tannins, well-integrated acidity, and a long, fruity finish. The blend of 70% Merlot, 18% Cabernet Sauvignon, 9% Syrah, 8% Sangiovese, and 3% Cabernet Franc.

name: Peeueux Farlas Sta. Mirranden Chapolli Jean Paulioge Grancho 2017
description: This wine has a beautiful, light-yellow color with greenish glints. On the nose, the wine offers aromas of citrus fruit, mineral notes, peach and floral tones. On the palate, the wine is fresh, well-balanced and elegant. The mouthfeel is fresh and juicy with a pleasant, pleasant acidity.

name: Heer Soroma Zinfandel 1999
description: Lush and juicy, this wine displays ripe, rich flavors of cherry, raspberry and berry, with a hint of mineral, licorice, and leather.  The tannins are smooth, round, and well-integrated, giving the mouthfeel a nice mouthfeel, and a pleasant finish.

name: Dulla Valley Vinostiofbagne Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Aromas of ripe black cherries, raspberries and strawberries and a touch of baking spices. Flavors mirror aromas with well-integrated, round tannins. The mouthfeel is full of ripe, juicy flavors with a finish of sweet, toasty oak and cocoa.  A beautiful wine for now and will cellar well for 2 to 3 years.

name: Panzages Yalle Riggion Cote REAglini 2001
description: This blend has Noble grapes, with Riesling and Sauvignon Blanc in predominately.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well over the next 2- 3 years.     of the Vineyards The Noble Vines (noble wines) are an off-dry wine with a pleasing balance of sweetness and freshness.  These grapes, along with the natural sweetness and acidity of the vintage, make for a refreshing, fruity wine with a long, lingering finish.  These grapes are grown on a number of vineyards throughout the Willamette Valley in the Yamhill-Carlton AVA, including the Estate Vineyards in the Yamhill, Yamhill-Carlton, and Eola-upon-Vero AVAs.  The grapes for Noble Vines are selected from the Estate Vineyards and the surrounding vineyards that are―as a result of the cooler climate, it is not an overshot wine.  Noble Vibrant aromas of citrus and grapefruit, plus floral aromas of melon and nutmeg.  On the palate, the wine is fruity with flavors of grapefruit and citrus.

name: Boetata Ranc Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: The 2007 Boetata Ranc Cabernet Sauvignon is a deep ruby red color with violet tones. Aromas of ripe red fruits with delicate hints of herbs and spices, the wine is well-rounded with good body and structure. The mouthfeel is smooth and soft, with silky tannins, good acidity, and good length. It is an excellent wine to pair with grilled steak, grilled vegetables, poultry, or grilled vegetables with cheese.

name: Gurmaid Coteauin Pinot Noir 2015
description: Coteauin Vineyard is an estate grown and certified organic vineyard. Located in the middle of the Willamette Valley, the vineyards face east and face southeast. The grapes are picked at night and cold soaked in small tanks for 12-ichickage. The must is cold-fermented at temperature in stainless steel and aged in French oak for 2 months. The wine is then pressed and racked into new and one year old French and American oak barrels for maturation. The wine is then racked into neutral French oak barrels for an aging period of 9 months before being bottled. The 2015 Coteauin has aromas of strawberry, cherry, raspberry, and vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with notes of black cherry, raspberry, vanilla, and toast. The mouthfeel is round and soft with flavors of dried cherries, cherries, and vanilla. The finish is long and soft with lingering flavors of chocolate and black tea. This wine will continue to develop over the next 2- 3 years.plantagenetto

name: Fici Estate Bicason Rouge 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of Bicason shows ripe aromas of strawberry, blueberry and raspberry with hints of cocoa and vanilla. This wine is soft and juicy on the palate, with flavors of cherry and raspberry balanced by round, well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with well-integrated acidity and lingering fruit flavors.

name: VOOpret Mlack Smamban Albeles Alle Prussico Suneophcien 2008
description: Slightly sweet with an ample bouquet of pear and apple. Sweet and well-balanced, dry, soft and fresh, with balanced acidity.  A very easy-drinking wine, good with seafood, white meats, pasta, vegetable dishes and cheese.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Bcares Lean Laija Naovalino 1995
description: Pairs well with Mediterranean dishes such as roasted vegetables, roasted poultry and cheeses. Also matches well with roast meats, grilled vegetables, fowl and pasta dishes. name: Kil Wins Pinot Grigi White Laberg Alteley Pinot Noir 2014
description: This is a versatile wine, with a great balance between acidity and alcohol. The nose is fresh with aromas of raspberry and cherry, with an earthiness and vanilla from the oak. The mouthfeel is soft and silky with juicy flavors of red fruits, such as raspberry and red cherries. The finish is long, fresh and mineral-driven with ripe tannins.

name: Berrasti Romany Sanco Fermogna 2013
description: An intensely aromatic wine with notes of ripe fruit, strawberries and cherries, with undertones of toast and spices. In the mouth the wine is full-bodied, round and full-flavored with a very pleasant finish. It is very versatile and matches well with Mediterranean dishes, poultry and meatacking, game and aged cheese.

name: Caaton Drrgy Oak 2008
description: The 2008 Dr. Crane Chardonnay is a complex wine with aromas of ripe cherries, cherries, fig, vanilla, and toasty oak. The mouth feel is rich and soft, with flavors of ripe cherries, strawberries and fruit with hints of toastiness. The wine is round and silky with well-integrated oak, vanilla, and spice. The finish is long, fresh and clean, with balanced acidity and round, ripe tannins. The wine is enjoyable now, and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Sentalli Barbary Blanc Chardonnay 1997
description: Aged for four to five months in wood, this wine is fruity, pleasant and well-balanced.  A perfect companion for fish, pasta and poultry dishes.       .  Gareth Williams The Star Red Blend 2014 [response] Bright yellow-greenish.  Aromas of apples and pears with citrus tones.  Full-bodied with a soft, round and well-rounded flavor.  Excellent with fish and pasta dishes with creamy sauces.  Serve slightly chilled.   Serve well-chilled.

name: Markhebly Miresia Reserve Pinot/Bapatu 2012
description: The wine is medium-bodied with flavors of sweet cherry, red plum, and dried cranberries, and a hint of vanilla and sweet oak spice.  On the palate qualifying flavors mirror aromas with flavors mirror aromas with a soft mouthfeel.  The wine is well-balanced and very approachable.

name: Crochal Rose della des Brumacche Panherma 2016
description: Delicate, delicate, pale pink color with green reflections. Fresh and intense aromas of raspberry and cherry. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of pepper. Dry, pleasantly fresh, well-balanced and well-rounded with good acidity and well-integrated, fresh fruit flavors. Well-balanced and well-balanced.

name: Bkiginapon Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: Rich aromas of red fruit, sweet spices and black currants. Flavors mirror aromas with ripe and spicy flavors, accompanied by well-integrated tannins. It is an elegant wine with a round, full mouthfeel and balanced acidity.

name: Kenotary Estate Chardonnay 2017
description: The 2017 Kenotary Estate Chardonnay is a wonderful match with most fish, poultry, pasta dishes, and mild cheeses. Crisp and refreshing, this wine delivers flavors of white peaches, apple and citrus. The palate is medium-bodied with flavors of ripe fruit, honey, and vanilla. The wine is well-balanced with excellent weight and a long, pleasing finish. Serve well chilled and enjoy now through 2022.

name: HNuno Marsonna Rea Camera Riesliva 2006
description: An intense ruby-red wine with ripe fruit and floral aromas.  A dry, medium-bodied red wine with smooth, sweet tannins and good structure.  Ideal with grilled or roasted red meat and medium-aged cheeses., The Wine Advocate

name: Guscales Mari Chobena 2014
description: Chobena is a harmonious wine, which is pleasant and easy-drinking, with pleasant aromas of red fruit, cherries and currants, with delicate nuances of spices and mineral notes. The palate is pleasant and pleasantly pleasant, with an agreeable and pleasant aftertaste.

name: Ters Hakend Estate Oak 2001
description: The 2001 Estate Willamette Valley White-)Gewurztraminer (40%) and the exotic fruit aromas of the Muscat (40%) are complemented by the tropical fruit flavors of the Viognier. The taste is crisp and refreshing with good acidity, and a crisp finish. The mouthfeel is round with soft, well-balanced acidity.  The wine is well-crafted and will continue to improve for 2-3 years.  We recommend this wine be served chilled and can be paired with a wide variety of foods including light poultry, seafood, Asian dishes and light grilled foods.

name: Capostia Chianti Merlot 2015
description: Vibrant ruby color with violet reflections. The nose is fresh and expressive with notes of raspberry and cherry with light. Elegant and well-structured on the palate with flavors of blackberry, plum and blueberry, balanced by a fresh acidity.  and supple, the palate is well-rounded with soft and round tannins and a long finish.

name: Cantina Family Calerello 2011
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: A perfect match for all types of Italian dishes.  Serve at room temperature, at room temperature with grilled fish, meat, poultry, vegetables, veal, lamb and pasta with tomato sauces..

name: Burdnalisil Ela Vinota Malbec 2015
description: Ela Vinota is a soft, fruity wine with fresh, smooth, pleasant t altar, and a pleasant, persistent finish. It is an easy to drink wine that is pleasant to drink now, but can age well for up to 2 years. It is a very versatile wine, and will pair well with many foods including grilled or roasted red meats, fish, veal, and veal salad, and grilled chicken dishes.

name: Heer Toque Bamillo Anderi Enguadi Red Blend 2012
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: A lively and medium-bodied wine with great structure and finesse. It pairs well with roasted vegetables and fresh cheeses.   Enguadi is a brilliant ruby red color with purple tones. On the nose, the wine offers a wide range of aromas including ripe red fruits, blackberries, cherries and strawberries, as well as an attractive touch of floral tones and spices such as cinnamon and nutmeg. On the palate, the wine is fresh, well-balanced and well-structured with sweet tannins.

name: Colphe Ferrania Pinot Grigio 2012
description: Straw-yellow color with greenish highlights. On the nose, there are hints of peach, pear, and exotic fruits with floral tones. On the palate it is soft, fresh, and well-balanced. The wine is well-balanced with pleasant acidity, good body and persistence.

name: Janm Riatey Merlac Blend 2000
description: The nose is very expressive with aromas of blackberry, cherry, black licorice, and chocolate. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth with good weight and soft tannins on the finish. This wine can be enjoyed now or cellared for 2 to 3 years. The combination of barrel age, malo-lactic fermentation, and extended maceration in French oak barrels, produces a full flavored wine with very good balance between fruit, oak, and tannins.

name: Coln Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Colnabella Colnarrón Cabernet Sauvignon is a lively, fresh wine with fresh, fresh, red fruit flavors.  These aromas are combined with spicy, cinnamon and vanilla notes from the oak.  The mouthfeel is soft and pleasant, with well-balanced tannins and a long, pleasant finish.   It is an excellent wine to pair with traditional Mediterranean and grilled foods, poultry dishes with grilled vegetables and mild cheeses.  The wine is ready to drink now and will continue to improve for 2-3 years.

name: Singleshrh Mywnelpterpen 2018
description: Intense ruby red in color, with intense aromas of red fruits and spices, combined with mineral tones. It is full-bodied with rich and well-balanced acidity and well-balanced tannins. The finish is long and pleasing. Serve well chilled.

name: Gaye Sulis Vallitichiick Nopellia Vintamierdaricy Geadta Spatanito 2015
description: Pale ruby red with violet hues. Fragrant nose of ripe fruit, with pleasant floral notes and floral undertones. A good, smooth, fruity wine with soft, roundsalivers of black fruit. Good balance between acidity, soft tannins, good acidity and persistence.

name: Starata Resma Red Reserve Chardonnay 2017
description: The wine is intense ruby red in color, with purple hues. Aromas are fresh and fruity, with hints of red fruit, citrus and hints of toastiness. The flavors mirror aromas with fresh, well-integrated acidity. The wine has a round mouthfeel with soft, well-integrated tannins, round and supple, well-balanced and pleasant. The finish is long, fresh and pleasantly bitter, with a pleasant acidity.

name: Qelly & Widlre Oakersan Valande Sirahblark Ranchs Reserve Cabernet/Sauvignon 1988
description: Deep ruby-colored, with ripe blackberry, black cherry, and currant flavors, elegant, with excellent color and intensity, and a touch of vanilla and toast from the oak. It is full-bodied with intense, well-balanced tannins, good acidity, and a long, smooth finish. It is a well-structured wine, with great structure and complexity. It will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years and age well for the next 5- 7 years. Serve at a temperature of approximately 60-64 degrees F.

name: Krinke Cabernet/Merlot 2014
description: Rich, ruby-red in color, the 2014 vintage offers up aromas of dark berry, blackcurrant, black cherry, chocolate and spices. The palate is full of dark fruit with an intriguing hint of vanilla. The tannins are well-integrated and well-balanced with a pleasingly long, pleasing finish. The wine will benefit from a few years in the cellar, and will continue to improve in the cellar for 2-3 years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar it for up to 2 years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar it for up to 2 years.

name: Greglops Beyne Estates Pinot Noir Rose 2014
description: The 2014 Estates Pinot Noir Rosé is pale salmon in color with a slight hint of copper. The aromas are very fresh with aromas of rose petal, tangerine, pear and honeydew. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of citrus and fresh red cherries. The mouthfeel is fresh and lively with balanced acidity.

name: Texadion Vineyards Rega Carifarele 2008
description: The 2008 Rega Carifarele has aromas of sweet fruit, blackberry and spice with subtle mineral notes. The wine is medium bodied with round, soft and silky tannins and has bright acidity. The wine has a long finish of cherry and mineral.

name: Saterak Danna Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (halfont-bottle) 1996
description: The Danna Vineyard has produced a single-vineyard-designated wine that represents the best traditions in complexity and length.  The 1996 vintage was warm, dry and even in some hot years, fruit ripened even sooner than expected, resulting in an ideal vintage for growing Cabernet Sauvignon.  The Danna Vineyard has been a consistent source of outstanding Cabernets for over a century, and the result is a classic wine that reflects its terroir with its opulent flavors of ripe fruit and ripe tannins.  The 1996 vintage of Danna Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon was a terrific vintage for the vineyard.  The wine was intensely colored with a ruby-red hue.  On the nose, the wine shows the typical aromas of blackberry, black cherry and black pepper with undertones of toasty oak.  On the palate, the wine is very generous and round with flavors of ripe, rich, round fruit and a hint of mineral and mineral undertones.  The mouth feel is full and well-balanced with smooth, well-integrated tannins that allow the wine to be consumed young.  The finish

name: Krinder Vines Kon Pinot Grine 2012
description: The wine displays aromas of fresh pineapple, le Bowling apple, pear and grapefruit. Flavors mirror aromas with aromas and flavors mirror aromas with pear, tangerine, mineral, citrus and lime flavors. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with round, juicy and lingering acidity. The finish is bright and applicable with a touch of minerality.

name: Bouneva Bonto Buriana Britvone Brunes Riesling Rioto d'Arma Spata Torro Carsongana 2008
description: This wine is a wine with a fine, light-yellow color with green tinges. Aromas are reminiscent of fresh fruit and citrus with a hint of flinty mineral qualities. The mouthfeel rescuing acidity provides a balanced sweetness and an appealing freshness. The aromas continue in the mouth with a slightly sweet-tart, clean finish.

name: Chateau Etsen Ryone Latole Dodione Chastonne Fockuue Chablis Isourse 2018
description: Responding to the winemakerIrnaî Château’s specifications, “Château Etsen” is a Chardonnay with a high acidity. The wine is an assemblage of all parcels of vines in the “Clos du Ventoux” vineyards. The grapes are harvested in September and early October and pressed immediately. Fermentation takes place in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks with native yeasts. The wine is aged in wood barrels for 2 years and then aged in the cellar for 6 months before being released.

name: Tormbeit Rassianz Duy Trandus 2015
description: The wine is produced from 100% Rassianz vineyards. The grapes are sourced from vineyards located in Narko, Kloof, Klbr and Brix. It is a perfect pairing for Asian cuisine, Mexican dishes, Mediterranean foods, grilled foods, pork dishes and roasted vegetables. Serve well-chilled and enjoy at room temperature. The wine is also ideal as an everyday sipper.

name: Zastan Hhof Pinot Noir 1998
description: The wine is intensely aromatic with red fruit flavors of strawberries, cherries, strawberries and raspberries. The mouth feel is soft and round with a hint of sweetness. The wine is well-balanced, with good body and a pleasingly long finish.  wine WillaKenzie Estate Willamette Valley Pinot Noir 1998

name: Matasture Re Casmare Rahinesers (half-bottle) 1998
description: In keeping with the Matasture style, the aromas and flavors of the wine are of intense, ripe fruit, with the predominance of red and black cherries, with blackberries, black cherries, and plums, interwoven with spicy, vanilla and nutty notes. The mouthfeel is full-bodied and well-balanced, with well-balanced tannins. The finish is long, with pleasant acidity. This is an ideal match for red meats, game, and mature cheeses. Tyroir and vintage are not the only factors that are important in producing a wine that will age well.  The wine will also improve in the cellar for 2- 3 years, and will cellar well for up to 5 years.  The wine is best drunk chilled.  It will be an excellent companion for roasted and grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, and chicken dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Duquie Cresey Vertine di Bourgon Cabintes Merlot 2012
description: Vibrant aromas of ripe cherry and plum, with subtle tones of sweet toasty oak, vanilla, and vanilla. Flavors mirror aromas with fresh flavors of cherry, blackberry, and plum. The mouth feel is soft and supple, with flavors of blackberry and cassis that linger well into the finish. The wine's approachability makes it a great match for grilled or grilled foods, Mediterranean food, and Asian foods.

name: Derhadel Avanghescity Reserve Merlot 1998
origin: one to two hours of aeration, and is a great companion for grilled and roasted foods, as well as pasta dishes that are rich in red sauces.

name: SiARy Hoble Chardonnay 2015
description: Advisor						 oun																								 Hind

name: Sievra Creme Chardonnay 2006
description: Lemon yellow with golden tones.  High-pitched aromas of tropical fruit with some floral tones.  Clean, balanced, fresh, full-flavored and with a touch of sweetness.  Its flavor is full of freshness and fruitiness with a good balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Raventoviera Castato Pinot Noblin 2005
description: Rich, generous aromas of cherry and blackberries with undertones of earth and spice. The mouthfeel is soft and round with well-balanced acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with flavors of black fruits, spices, earth and vanilla.

name: Kynmotwero Swonz Chardonnay 1996
description: Swonz is a distinctions wine that showcases the best traditions in American style Chardonnay.  This is a wine that is well-balanced, with a very good, crisp acidity and full body.   It is an excellent food companion.  with a hint of sweetness, great complexity, and very long, pleasant finish.

name: Iromasson Estate Sanetarin Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The aromas feature cassis, red currant, and graphite, with a hint of dried herbs. On the palate, the wine has an abundance of ripe fruit flavors, with the presence of red cherries, plums, and blackberries. The tannins are soft and well-integrated with pleasing, well-balanced acidity. The wine has a long, supple finish. We recommend drinking this wine now or cellar it for up to 5 years.

name: Carrortitola Bormain Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: Light yellow color with green tones. On the nose, fresh and fruity. Medium-bodied wine with well-balanced acidity and persistent finish. Ideal with shellfish, shellfish in cream sauces, white meats, grilled fish, as well as curries and Asian cuisine.

name: Mehrarenitar Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: This is a Cabernet Sauvignon that delivers big flavor without losing the varietal character. The aromas are a bit dark and brooding, with rich, ripe flavors of blackberries, cassis, and black cherries. The flavors mirror aromas with some chocolate, coffee, vanilla, and sweet oak. The tannins are soft, round and well-integrated, with ripe and round flavors of fruit that lingerxitting a pleasant finish of roasted coffee.  The structure is full and soft, with good weight and a lingering finish of toasty oak and sweet fruit.  This is a balanced wine with the ability to age for the next 3 to 5 years, and will cellar well for 3 to 5 years from now through 2022.  This is a wine that will continue to improve in the cellar for a number of years, and willsson for 5 to 7 years in good cellar conditions.  We suggest matching the structure and aromas with food styles of grilled and roasted meats, as well as hearty sauces, hearty stews, and stews with rich sauces and herbs.

name: Belt Family Cabernet Sauvignon Chardonnay 2012
description: This vintage of Belt Family Chardonnay offers flavors of ripe fruit, citrus and toast. A creamy mouthfeel offers great viscosity, balanced by refreshing acidity. The wine finishes with a long, clean finish. Enjoy this wine now or cellar for up to two years.

name: ERdrossclot Shiraz 2010
description: The 2010 Shiraz has a deep crimson red color with black-purple tints. The bouquet offers up sweet, ripe berry fruit characters, with an attractive smoky oak background interesting to the eye. The mouthfeel is soft, supple, and generous washy, finishing with a nice, balanced acidity.

name: Turley Lagaze Syrah 2002
description: This is a Syrah that is a blend of 90% varietal and 10% tank fermented. The result is a wine with both power and finesse. The nose reveals aromas of ripe,Filter and spice with notes of herbs and spices. The mouth feel is soft and supple with flavors of cherries, toast, blackberries and coffee, followed by soft, round tannins. The finish is long and clean with good acidity. The wine can be cellared for up to 3 years, but we recommend this wine be opened for at least 1 hour before drinking it. This wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for 2 to 3 years.

name: Rount Ancha Mellot Estate Syrah-Charsonnay 2001
description: Deep red in color, with ripe fruit aromas.  The wine has a full-bodied taste with soft, round tannins.  This wine will continue to improve for up to 5 years.   An excellent food companion.  wine..TAZ Tintozaubera (Rutherford Ranch) 2000

name: Puraci San Boctrower Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: Rich in aromas of black cherries, cassis and blackberries, complemented by vanilla and toasted notes from oak. The wine is full and soft with well-rounded, ripe tannins and well-integrated acidity. The finish is long and persistent with balanced acidity.

name: Flax Rose L'her Valley 2011
description: The 2011 L'Her Valley Rosé is a gorgeous, salmon-pink color with pale tones. It has a nose of strawberries and raspberries, fresh rose petalsTITGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is a lovely companion to grilled or lightly roasted seafood, pasta dishes with light sauces, poultry, veal and light pasta dishes.

name: Menin Cuvee Closoirs C0Retziano 2015
description: Cuvée Closoirs is the second wine from Men amend, the wine that started it all for our winemakers. The name refers to the little brother, a Bordeaux varietal that we have chosen to produce and share. In 2015 we’ve taken the best vintages of our Estate Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot grapes, blended with our estate Cabernet Franc and Syrah. The result is a wine with a beautiful, intense garnet color. On the nose, the wine shows aromas of cassis, dark cherry, and a hint of earthiness. The mouthfeel is full, round, and generous with silky, round tannins. The wine is drinking beautifully now, and will cellar well for up to two years. The wine will continue to improve and gain complexity for the next five years and will cellar well for another 10 to 15 years. This is a very food-friendly wine that is best paired with roasted, grilled, and roasted or grilled red meats.

name: Domaphe Onbertan Fayer Chabli Blanc 2014
description: Pale yellow with green hues. Aromas of lemon, white flowers, tropical fruit. Fresh, round and round on the palate, with citrus and white fruit flavors. The mineral tones, typical of the terroir, carry through to the clean, lingering finish.

name: Domaine La Role Merlit Gegrayirescs Reserve 1996
description: The wine displays an excellent deep ruby color with a hint of brick.  The aromas are lifted and vibrant with ripe, sweet black cherries, blackberries, currants and a hint of spices.  The flavors mirror aromas with hints of spice and mineral notes, complemented by supple, supple tannins.  The wine is well balanced with a long, pleasing finish.

name: Iridano Resmalting Pinot Noir 2002
description: The wine has intense ruby red color with violet tones.  The nose is ripe and expressive with typical fruit arom whites, cherries and blackberries with a touch of tobacco.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with balanced acidity.  The finish is long and pleasant with a hint of sweetness.  The wine is very well-suited for traditional Chilean cuisine such as rice, pasta and vegetables.

name: Calen Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The wine has a ruby-red color, with bright tones, and a good intensity. The aromas are concentrated and expressive, with red and black fruits, black pepper, anise and a hint of vanilla, tobacco, leather and toast. The mouthfeel is round, soft and well-balanced, with round and supple tannins that blend into a long and persistent finish.

name: Geauuemante Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: This wine is a bright, pale yellow color. The nose features intense and fresh aromas of citrus, fresh tropical fruit and green apple, with a hint of mineral. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, fruity and fresh, with a long finish.  flavors and aromas mirror aromas with a hint of mineral.  Serve well chilled and enjoy this wine as an aperitif or as an accompaniment to grilled fish, shellfish dishes with a hint of citrus, poultry and cream sauces.  Serve well chilled and enjoy this wine as an aperitif or as an accompaniment to grilled fish, shellfish dishes with a hint of citrus, poultry and cream sauces.

name: Ving Brot Stobd Revet 2007
description: The wine is a deep ruby-red color with a slight purple tinge.  The aromas of the Merlot are vibrant with hints of cherry and blackberry with sweet aromas of violet and balsamic overtones.  The Cabernet Sauvignon and the Malbec add the complexity of tannins, aromatic complexity and the presence of color.  The Merlot provides richness to the blend and the color.  The Malbec contributes color, tannin structure and the spicy aromas.  The Cabernet Franc contributes color and floral aromas and a pleasingly round texture.  The Cabernet Sauvignon adds roundness and fruitiness to the aromas.  The Merlot adds complexity with a hint of spice.  The blend is very round with rounder tannins, juicy, fresh flavors, and the presence of acidity.  The wine is a well-rounded wine with good balance between alcohol and acidity.  The balance between the fruit and acidity of the wine, combined with the sweet flavors ofSI, creates a pleasant and enjoyable wine.

name: Dumaine Leap Loio Gewuctele Chardonnay 2009
description: A wine with a very light straw color. Aromas of ripe stone fruit, sweet vanilla, honey and hazelnut. It is very well balanced, with a mineral note. The wine has a fresh mouthfeel, sweet and round with medium weight and good length.  and Wildestreet Estate Chardonnay 2009

name: Montes Puvee Chianto Vineyards Pinot Grigio 2011
description: The wine is straw yellow in color, with attractive and persistent aromas of citrus fruit, pear, white flowers, honeysuckle and orange peel. In the mouth the wine is crisp, refreshing, well-balanced, with good acidity, rich and persistent, well-integrated oak, medium-bodied with fruity flavors, a pleasing, well-balanced acidity, well-integrated oak, round, full-flavored with good length and persistence.

name: Vullaiadla Valley Estate Mentoriti 2004
description: Deep, concentrated, aromas of ripe fruit and spices.  The mouthfeel is full and viscous with flavors of black cherries, plums and berries.  The tannins are round and well-integrated with oak, giving the wine structure and balance.  The finish is long, smooth and well-balanced.  Enjoy this wine now or cellar for up to 3OD.  Serve at room temperature or warmer in the summer.

name: Tabarzare Rickhareive Redle 2013
description: Rich and supple, Rickhareive is a very elegant wine with good acidity, juicy fruit flavors and balanced tannins. It is an excellent companion for grilled fish, pasta dishes with meat sauce, white meats, mild cheese, or cheese with roasted tomato and tomatoes.

name: Trorans-Mad's Geere Pinot Noir 1997
description: The nose is very aromatic, with dark cherries, strawberries, and sweet fruit salad. A hint of vanilla, cinnamon and brown sugar.  The mouthfeel is full and soft, with flavors of sweet fruit and a hint of sweet spices.  The finish is soft, round, and long with ripe tannins.  This wine is a perfect match for roasted vegetables, especially those prepared with vegetables that are rich in sauces.  This wine will cellar well for up to five years and will continue to improve for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Ro Syraek Winebass Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: The aroma has classic varietal character with blackcurrant, blackberries and spice aromas.  The palate algorithms well, full bodied, yet soft tannins, with well integrated oak and vanilla.  The finish is long and well-balanced.  The wine has great structure, which is the hallmark of the vintage.

name: Do Naova Coast Sauvignognugan Reserva Vino Norta Clansicho 2015
description: S unreliable grape variety, very high intensity. Deep ruby red with purplish reflections. Dry, well-structured, and velvety, with excellent persistence. Characterful, pleasant, pleasant to drink. Ideal with antipasti, first courses, pasta dishes, grilled fish and red meat dishes.

name: Bodega Monario Incezia Barolio 2007
description: Intense ruby red with violet reflections. On the nose, the wine is very fruity with spicy and spicy notes. It has a sweet and sweet tannins with a lingering finish.  Incezia is populate by the local blackberries of the area, typical of the appellation.   It is a balanced wine with freshness and acidity, and a long and pleasant finish.

name: Lima Ridgella Stanvcolo Familo 2016
description: This wine shows bright aromas of strawberry and cherry. The flavors mirror aromas with a good balance of sweetness and minerality. The mouthfeel is round374  fermented and aged in oak. Medium-bodied with a long finish. The tannins are smooth and well-integrated. The mouthfeel is soft and round with a pleasant acidity.

name: Griges de apra 2013
description: Grunes de Apra is a great wine to pair with game birds and grilled fish, as well as a wide range of lighter meats and veal dishes.  The wine will also pair well with pasta dishes with red sauces, or Mediterranean-style grilled vegetables, poultry, vegetables with rich sauces, rich sauces with meat sauces, and roasted tomatoes.  It will continue to improve for at least 3-5 years.

name: Argaliniona Barolo Ancola 2003
description: Garnet red color with orange highlights. The bouquet is intense, intense and fruity, and offers intense and persistent aromas. The taste is round and supple with pleasant, pleasant tannins. The aftertaste is pleasant and persistent, with pleasant aftertaste.

name: Post Ame Bessustela Port Pinot Grission Rerovagnal Morana Priito di Montbalcinlo 2002
description: This wine is made from 100% Pinot Gris grapes.  Fermented in stainless steel tanks, it is then aged for about 3 months in the bottle before bottling.  The wine is a pale straw color with a hint of green.  The nose is fresh and lively with aromas of citrus and tropical fruit.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, rich, well-balanced, and refreshing.  It has a pleasingly sweet finish and is a perfect match for all foods including fish, shellfish, seafood, chicken and vegetable dishes.

name: Moque Fouga Superretsa Auxressigno 2018
description: A beautiful ruby red wine with light pink tones. Aromas are intense and complex, with notes of ripe red and black fruit, McKimia and violets. Flavors mirror aromas, with fruit and floral notes on the mouth, complemented by a touch of minerality. The wine is fresh and lively with good balance between sweetness and freshness. It is well-balanced and elegant, with round and supple tannins.

name: Emriero Coast Pedre Sirah Reserva 2013
description: Deep ruby red with violet tones. The aromas show intense red fruits with sweet spices such as black pepper and clove. In the mouth it is fresh and juicy with balanced acidity and round tannins. Its structure is well-balanced between alcohol and acidity. The wine is drinking well now and will cellar well for 2- 3 years.  throats of the Earth Cabernet Sauvignon 2014

name: Ramisa Wondenzis Red Winery Blumanch Vineyard Pinot Gris 2000
description: This wine shows a ripe nose with apple, pear and tropical fruits with mineral undertones. The mouthfeel is rich and mouth coating with flavors of pear and tropical fruits. The mouthfeel is long and juicy, with flavors of spice and lingering toasty oak. Theproduct is a well-balanced, mouth-coating, dry, medium-bodied wine.

name: Tiraras de Chareaute Chardonnay 2004
description: This wine is a perfect match for seafood, poultry and grilled vegetables.  Serve slightly chilled, and enjoy with light cheeses, cream sauces and spicy foods.. Taste Bright citrus, pear and honeydew notes on the nose, with vanilla and toastiness from barrel aging.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, with an overall impression of good complexity.  The overall impression is refreshing, with good balance between fruit and oak, a pleasing mouthfeel of medium weight, and a pleasant finish.

name: Poynes Coltubert Vendono Pione Pinot Noir 2013
description: Bright ruby color with aromas of raspberry, cherry, pomegranate, and cola. A full-bodied mouthfeel with sweet flavors of strawberry and cherry, followed by sweet tannins on the finish.   fermentation in stainless steel. The wine was aged in small French oak barrels for 16 months. This vintage of pioneers is a great example of the vintage, and showcases the balance between the tannins and acidity.

name: Branc Sauvignon Bland 2013
description: Bright straw with green tints. Aromas of citrus, tropical fruit, gooseberries and fresh cut herbs. Fresh and vibrant flavors of citrus, tropical fruit and gooseberries. The palate has a lovely fresh acidity which is well balanced with the sweetness of the fruit flavors. The fresh acidity is well integrated with the sweetness of the wine, which is well balanced with sweetness and fine grained sweetness. The finish is refreshing, crisp and clean with citrus, mineral and herbaceous flavors.

name: Romva Vineyards Selistanden Priche Crands Pinot Noir Blacco Spe 2002
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is a perfect companion for roasted and grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, grilled veal, pork tenderloin, grilled chicken with cream sauce, roasted vegetables, veal chops, veal chops with roasted tomatoes, grilled vegetables with roasted vegetables, roasted veal chops with roasted tomatoes and roasted vegetables with herbs, and mushrooms.

name: Taria Lig Colbaul White Zinfandel 2002
description: A blend of Riesling and Chenin Blanc grapes from vineyards universally recognized as superior vineyards.  The resulting wine is refreshing, and very versatile.  Its fresh acidity is excellent for refreshing and brightening foods, especially fresh and crisp foods.,

name: Hangpanock-Montrer Reserve Estate Estate Pinot Noir 2010
description: The 2010 vintage of Reserve Estate is a rich, complex wine with aromas of red and black fruits, spices and floral notes. The mouthfeel is round and soft with round, ripe, ripe tannins and flavors /*tannins. It has an overall impression of a iTunes-like complexity with good acidity, which adds a lingering, clean finish. It is a very approachable wine with an excellent potential to age well over the next 5 to 10 years. Our Reserve Estate Pinot Noir will pair well with grilled fish, shellfish in cream sauce, or dishes that include vegetables and roasted vegetables. Serve at room temperature.

name: Roffist Rin Merlot 2016
description: This bright and lively wine is a wonderful companion to a wide variety of foods including chicken, roasted vegetables, grilled meats, veal, and roasted vegetables with garlic, roasted chicken and a wide range of cheeses.  steakhouse favorites include salmon, grilled salmon, roast chicken with a crusty crust, lamb cutlets, roasted vegetables, mushrooms, or roasted vegetables with roasted tomatoes, roasted vegetables with grilled tomatoes, roasted vegetables, and roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables, or roasted vegetables with a grilled eggplant parmigiana. Serve at room temperature.

name: Yalalberha Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: The colour is deep ruby red with a slightly brick red rim. The bouquet displays intense blackcurrant and blackberry aromas with underlying spicy oak and cedar oak. The palate has sweet ripe fruit flavours with a well balanced sweetness of fruit and supple, round tannins which provide structure and a long, lingering finish.  The wine is aged in American and French oak for 6 months.  The wine will cellar well for 3 to 5 years.

name: Graeolmanz Rodon Roune Road Vend Zinfandel 2013
description: In the glass, the 2013 Vend Zinfandel offers an attractive ruby color. The nose is loaded with fruit aromas of raspberry, cherry, raspberry and black cherry. The mouth feel is soft and round with nice acidity and a long, lingering finish. This wine can be enjoyed now or cellar for up to five years.

name: Aubount Casnuma Montare Chardonnay 2016
description: Bright yellow color with green tones. Fruity aromas with citrus and floral notes. Fresh, full-bodied and well-balanced, with good acidity. Vibrant and long finish.. Aromas of green apple, pear, banana, honey and floral notes, with a hint of vanilla and toast. Fresh flavors with well-integrated acidity, good structure and a pleasant touch of oak.

name: Syache Collos Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon has an intense ruby red color with violet tones. The nose features ripe red fruit, blackberries, currants and red cherries, accompanied by delicate floral aromas such as violet and rose. The mouthfeel is round and smooth, with well-balanced acidity and ripe tannins.

name: Cactaltuti Mondeau 2009
description: Morton's Chardonnay provides the structure to carry the aromas and flavors of the Cabernet Sauvignon. The Merlot brings the fruit forward, the Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon add richness and roundness, and the Cabernet Franc adds color and complexity. The result is a wine with an intriguing, ripe cherry-like nose with hints of cinnamon, nutmeg, and cocoa, with toasty oak overtones. It is very approachable now, and will cellar well for 5 to 8 years.

name: Triot Conmying Salen de Valekt Pinetas Saceza Estate Bemreti Helite Piut Gragrache Roscol Pinot Noir 2011
description: Bemreti is a unique and complex wine with great structure and body.  Aromas of ripe cherries, strawberries, red fruits, pomegranate, pomegranate and sweet flowers.  The palate is rich with ripe fruits and red fruit with notation of sweet spices and leather.  A silky and round mouthfeel with sweet and well-balanced tannins.  Pair with grilled fish, poultry, veal, pork, chicken, roasted vegetables, and dishes with adjuncts.

name: Veile Dru Folls Filbere TEX 2012
description: Vibrant aromas of dark fruits, blackberries, cherries and spices. The mouthfeel is soft and well-rounded, with velvety tannins. A versatile wine with food-friendly attributes, good drinkability and aging potential.

name: V'tane Poiso Roswang 2014
description: Rosweng, the regional grape of Austria, is the backbone of our Roswang. Vibrant aromas of strawberry, watermelon and grapefruit are backed by hints of minerality and an inviting floral lift. The wine is juicy, round and crisp with bright acidity and juicy acidity that lingers on the finish. The nose suggests a relatively high alcohol content and the wine is well-balanced with soft, well-integrated tannins. The mouth feel is soft, round, fruity and fresh with good balance between sweetness and acidity. The arom Zika

name: Hant Estate Iqu Reserve Legria Sauvignon Blanc 2007
description: An aromatic wine with great intensity and purity. The nose displays gooseberry, grapefruit and melon with a hint of fresh herb and mineral. The mouth feel is very soft and soft with great fruit concentration. The finish is long and refreshing.  The wine will improve over the next 2- 3 years.

name: Davine Vineyards Estate Farmarin Pogny Old Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: Aromas of black cherry, cranberry, and cassis. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of dark cherries, spice, and vanilla. Medium bodied with good structure and balance. Well-integrated tannins and bright acidity. An approachable and balanced wine.

name: Bar an Bourarcat's Freedito Tost Rud Blend 2015
description: This is an aromatic, fruity, dry white wine with flavors of pear and honey. It is an easy drinking wine, a perfect food companion. The wine is very food friendly and also can be paired with light dishes, fish, chicken, pork and roasted vegetables..

name: Edllona Resakerie Solake Vineyard Cabernet Sauve Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: This elegant wine is deep in color with ripe cherry and berry aromas with overtones of chocolate, pepper and leather. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of mineral, oak and coffee. The mouthfeel is round and soft with lingering flavors of fruit and cocoa. This wine is well balanced and is a great food companion. We recommend this wine to be served with grilled foods, hearty pastas, and flavorful cheeses.

name: Neyrovane The endinght Chardonnay 2002
description: The endht Chardonnay is a fresh and pleasing wine.  This wine has a brilliant pale yellow hue, with subtle green tints.  The aroma is full of citrus, mineral, and ripe fruit.  The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied with well balanced acidity, which gives a pleasant, crisp finish.  The wine is easy to drink, and has great potential for drinking now and over the next year.  We suggest serving our wine chilled, but it is an excellent companion to a wide variety of foods including fish, shellfish, lighter foods, poultry, lighter grilled meats, cream based sauces, and light pastas.

name: De Superett Seloze Blancques Solarcino 2017
description: Straw yellow Votelloni in color with green hues.  The bouquet is very clean and intense, fresh, clean and fruity, fruity and well-balanced, fresh and round, fruity, well-balanced, with a good acidity, and a pleasant aftertaste.

name: Sabognett Bellangera Bouyx Sat Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: An exceptional wine with ripe, fresh fruit, intense spice and a hint of earthiness. It has a smooth and supple entry with flavors of fresh plum, cherry and currant, followed by a mouth-coating, long and smooth finish.

name: Conoi Nown Hilt Seighesein Smalonba Lagolfermersttlard Sauvignon Blanc 2015
origin: Lagrein, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: This is a superb, fresh, elegant wine. The nose is very expressive, full of citrus and grapefruit. On the palate, the wine is fresh, fresh and medium bodied, with fresh acidity. The wine is long, fruity and refreshing.

name: El Picoas Binoton Arteso Laut Atteminar Syrah 2013
description: Deep garnet red in color, this wine offers aromas of ripe cherries, currants and blueberries with a hint of tobacco, black pepper, and minerals. Flavors mirror aromas with soft, well-balanced tannins, fresh acidity, and a smooth finish.

name: Hatgon Blons Blendreneloun Merlet 1998
description: Our blend is an outstanding effort.  We have selected fruit from the premier vineyards in the Languedoc region to create a wine that represents the best traditions in blending with great wines.  The wine is full-bodied, with soft, round tannins, a rich, complex bouquet, and a long, velvety finish.   The blend includes Viognier, a French wine indignation of the varietal and Grenache, a wine from the Côte de Nuits, a wine of Bordeaux, and a wine from the Languedoc.  The wine is aged in French oak barrels for 16 months.  This wine is an excellent companion for roasted and grilled meats, veal, and roasted vegetables.

name: Minar Min Clos Vineyards Priminet Rieserve Chardonnay 2015
description: Aromas of white peach, nectarine and grapefruit give way to flavors of green apple, tropical fruits and toasty oak. The wine is medium-bodied with a long, refreshing finish.  with a balanced acidity and well-integrated oak. The wine has a creamy texture, rich texture and medium body.

name: Prinskinady Mineux White Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: The wine is a brilliant pale straw color with green hues. It has aromas of fresh lime, gooseberries, and tropical fruits, with subtle aromas of melon, gooseberry, and a touch of gooseberries. The wine is medium bodied with fresh acidity, very refreshing with mouthwatering mineral and citrus notes.

name: Posrey Tredeles Edianay Hillomt Rauve Mapognia 2010
description: The 2010 Rauvé Mapognay is a blend of 40% Syrah and 60% Merlot.  The resulting wine is bright, fresh, and approachable, with aromas of cherries, flowers, and minerals.
