On the palate, the wine is smooth and sweet with flavors of fresh cherries, minerals, and vanilla.  The wine has a round, mouth-coating texture with soft, round tannins on the finish.  The wine is best consumed chilled and is an excellent food companion.  This wine can be cellared for up to 10 years and will continue to improve for the next 5-10 years.

name: Kenotano Estate Au Reserve 2008
description: This wine offers rich flavors of blackberries, cherries and dark chocolate with layers of licorice and sweet oak. It is well-balanced and beautifully balanced with flavors of coffee, licorice and vanilla. The tannins are soft, well-integrated and very well-balanced. The finish is long and smooth. We suggest matching the aroma and flavor profile of this wine with grilled fish and Mediterranean food.

name: Amlento Dr. Songanina Vinas Vallo Malbil Pinot Noir 2014
origin: Arroyo Seco, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: This Pinot Noir is a fruity wine with aromas of red cherry and plum with a touch of violet. The wine is round and soft with flavors educational and spicy, red fruit, white pepper and black pepper. The mouthfeel is round with good acidity and medium-weight tannins. The finish is long with lingering notes of vanilla, caramel, coffee and toast.

name: Tonmon Carnaros Antollia Ries Shiraz 2018
description: This wine is rich and flavorful, with intense aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and mineral notes. On the palate, the wine is soft and well-balanced with round and soft tannins. Antollia [response]

name: Froge Rosso Valley Cabernett Gan Chasenno 2017
description: This is a complex wine with aromas of red fruit, floral, floral and chocolate with undertones of coffee and vanilla. The wine is smooth and supple on the palate with flavors of raspberry, black cherry and sweet tannins. This is a well-balanced wine with a pleasant lingering finish.

name: Al do Vale Yaldt Cammoad Moscancos Barul Cruadco 2000
description: The blend of two noble grape varieties, Barulrosso and Nerello Mascalese, gives the wine its special qualities.  The color is a deep ruby-red, with an intense, yet soft, nose.  The taste is full, soft and warm, with pleasant, round and well-balanced acidity.  The wine is well-rounded, and is well-suited for a wide variety of dishes, particularly in grilled, roasted, and with light sauces.

name: Loisellin's Sansano Chaldon Coast Zinfote Blanc 2018
description: Loisellin’s wines are grown in the “Pied” appellation of the heart of the Petaluma Gap, with the same climate as the Coastal vineyards. The grapes are harvested at night when the sugar levels are low and the acidity is low. The wine is fermented in stainless steel tanks with natural yeasts in order to preserve the freshness and freshness of the fruit. The wine is aged on the lees for 2 months. A nice balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Froffientio The Houry Pinot Noir 2006
description: The 2006 Houry Pinot Noir is a blend of the four vineyards we source fruit from. Gosings are from different vineyards in the appellation: the vineyards in the Willamette Valley and the vineyards in rewarding vineyards in the Eola-Amity Hills and the Carneros. The wine shows aromas of black cherries, strawberries, strawberries and cherries, spices, tea leaves, licorice, earth, mint, clove and cloves. The mouth feel is full and juicy with rich flavors of black cherry, plum, cassis, and leather. The finish is long and sweet with notes of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and toasty oak. The wine has excellent acidity and balance, and will cellar well for 3-5 years. The wine is an excellent companion for grilled fish, pasta dishes with red sauces, and poultry dishes with sauces with peppers and spices.

name: Toneyfort Vineyard Gruner Vineyard Cabernet Sharfonne 2009
description: The 2009 Grüner is an excellent match for hearty dishes such as roasted vegetables, duck in cream sauce, roasted and grilled meats, grilled vegetables, and tomato-based pastas.  We suggest that you open the wine an hour before drinking.

name: Borenquiero Grafeos Barbora Gaesa 2005
description: Gesa is an important and prestigious wine, which is best enjoyed with great friends. The name of the winery Gesa is an informal reference to the great cave in which the vines are grown. The name is an informal reference to the caves in the town of Borenquiero where the vineyards are situated.   The grapes are selected from vineyards in the Barolo, Rocche di Castiglione, Tre Vigne and Monforte.

name: Pal Hudel Terrava Ranch-Charlinavier Cuvee 2013
description: The 2013 TerravaWhitestone Vineyard Estate Chardonnay is an elegant wine with ripe flavors of pear, apple, and citrus. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with bright acidity and freshness, with medium weight on the palate, and a long, refreshing finish. The wine is well-balanced and well-drained and can be cellared for a few years.

name: Chateau Molnina Berochelles 2000
description: Aromas of plum, black cherries and coffee. This is an approachable wine with supple, soft tannins and a lingering finish. Serve at about room temperature. The wine can be paired with a wide range of foods, including grilled or lightly smoked fish and veal, roasted vegetables, veal, veal, vegetables, and roasted vegetables. It can be served slightly chilled as an alternative to lighter cheeses.

name: LeLielb MaQuen Sauvingnon Blanc Singha Syrah 2000
description: Maquén means “grip of the hands” and refers to the fact that the wine is made from grapes grown by hand. The wine is a deep red in color with a vibrant edge. The nose is filled with aromas of red and black fruits, such as cherries and berries. The mouthfeel is smooth and pleasant with flavors of ripe fruit, chocolate and spices. The mouth-feel is very well balanced with firm, well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of red fruits.

name: Torulava Merlot 2000
description: Torulava Merlot is a smooth, fresh and well-balanced wine, which can be enjoyed now and over the next 2- 3 years.  It is a perfect match for grilled and roasted poultry, chicken dishes with light sauces and dishes with roasted vegetables.  Serve well-chilled.  Fernando Torremoron Estate

name: Cuphest Estate Riombers 2011
description: The 2011 Riomberts shows deep, deep blackberry aromas with subtle, sweet oak tones. The wine is full-bodied with rich, mouth-coating tannins, bright acidity, and good structure. The palate opens with flavors of black currant, black cherry, and plum. The mouth feel is soft, round, and well-balanced. Flavors mirror aromas with an enticing hint of spice and leatheriness. The wine is well-balanced and very pleasing now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Lie Family Merlot Nuit Rus Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: Aromas of gooseberry, melon, peach and citrus are followed by a palate of white fruits, gooseberries, quince and lemon zest.  The finish is long, sweet and pleasing.  An excellent companion for fish, shellfish, chicken, veal, veal and white meat dishes.

name: WVin Aomanelli Reds Reder (375Mt halfeuret Sauvignon 1998
description: The 1998 Reds is a blend of 75% Sauvignon Blanc and 25% Pinot Noir. The wine is a deep, dark ruby/purple color with a hint of green.  The nose is intense with aromas of blackberries, black cherriesimony appreciably enhanced by nuances of mineral, herbs, and spice.  The mouthfeel is soft, round, full-bodied, with round, round tannins and lingering acidity.  The finish is long, round, with lingering flavors of berries, cherries, spices, and mineral.

name: Lilesorna Sauvignon Blron 2017
description: Pale straw in color with a vibrant hue. Intense and fresh aromas of passionfruit, gooseberry, and grapefruit. Flavors mirror aromas with a subtle suggestion of citrus on the finish. The wine is well-balanced with refreshing acidity and fresh fruit flavors customer.

name: Bean Lumare Zinfandel 2015
description: Aromas of ripe blackberries, black cherries, and hints of pepper and toast lead to flavors of blackberries, black cherries, and licorice with vanilla, spice, and chocolate. The mouthfeel is soft and juicy with good acidity, medium-full-bodied tannins, and good length. The finish is long and sweet with a touch of sweet vanilla.

name: Domaine Portiesert Cote Cot Goere Grand Pinot Noir 2019
description: A lovely nose of fresh strawberries, cherries, and raspberries. This is an extremely elegant wine with lovely aromas of raspberry, plum, and spice, with soft tannins and sweet, ripe fruit flavors. The mouth feel is round and soft with flavors of sweet fruit and sweet spices. This wine is very well-balanced with a good acidity. The finish is soft, long and very round. The finish is ripe with round, soft, and sweet tannins. The mouth feel is round and full of sweet, ripe fruit with a good acidity, balanced by well-integrated oak. The finish is very long with great acidity.

name: Domaine de la Paulle Hirdilazelle 2015
description: The wine is dark ruby red in color with violet tones. Aromas of black fruits (blackberries, black cherries) with floral notes and violet. The palate is fresh, well-balanced, fresh and well-structured with ripe tannins. On the finish the wine is very round and fruity with a long and persistent finish.

name: Gromantes Slowh Grengate Sina Cabernet Sauvignon S Vignier Couras Crate Chardonnay 2008
description: In 2008, we saw a wonderful balance between concentration and freshness. We picked the grapes with the intention of preserving the natural fruit flavors, while adding a touch of toastiness to the wine. The result is a wine that is deep ruby red in color with intense aromas of ripe fruit and spices, complemented by a touch of barrel toastiness and toasted flavors. On the palate, the wine is rich and balanced, with round, soft tannins and great depth. It is a wine with excellent complexity and structure, which will cellar well for at least 5 years.

name: KIElling Lochin Zinfandel Mlencion Cuvie Blanc 2015
description: This is a fresh, fruity and aromatic wine with a good concentration. It is round, fresh, and medium-bodied, with notes of raspberry, pepper, and spice. On the palate it is round, with pleasant acidity and well-integrated tannins.

name: Chateau Ste. Micheliss (375ML aif-bottle) 2007
description: The color is deep, intense ruby. Aromas are intense and generous, combining aromas of ripe fruit with flavors of blackcurrant, spices, and mineral tones. The taste is smooth, velvety and soft, with round, well-balanced tannins.

name: Gueslelp Wines Eza Ganas Reserna 2006
description: A brilliant ruby red color. The nose reveals fresh fruit aromas, particularly cherry, blackberry, blackcurrant and a hint of violet, with a touch of toastiness. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with round, juicy, well-balanced tannins. The overall impression is pleasant, generous and pleasant.

name: Carveo Saint-Axansia Tavanson Cabernet Sauvignon Terricti 2015
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: Our 2015 vintage is an excellent companion to grilled red meat and game birds. The wine also works well with Mediterranean foods and barbequed steak.

name: Maytsan Poliqui Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: The 2009 Mayastsan Poliqui Cabernet Sauvignon is ruby red in color. It offers aromas of ripe red fruit, blackberries, and cherries with soft spicy tones. The palate is soft, smooth, and well-rounded with fresh flavors of blackberries, cassis, and blackberries. The tannins are present, well-integrated and well-balanced.

name: Walls Fran Pinot Noir 2002
description: Vibrant aromas of ripe black cherry, plum and currant, with a hint of vanilla, clove and nutmeg. Flavors mirror aromas with a hint of black pepper and cocoa. This is a very well-rounded wine with well-rounded, juicy tannins and lingering mineral flavors. The finish is long, sweet and smooth with good acidity.

name: Domaine Fighelte Latagual Murreer Villages 2016
description: The wine displays the classic Pinot Noir character with aromas of red fruits and a hint of toastiness. The mouth feel is soft and silky with flavors of cherries and red fruits with an elegant, round mouthfeel. This wine is a wine that will continue to improve for up to 10 years. It is recommended that you open and drink it in its youth.

name: Napais Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: A beautiful garnet color with a hint of black.  The nose is bright and lifted with aromas of blackberry, raspberry and plum.  The mouthfeel is full-bodied with generous tannins, balanced acidity, and lingering flavors of sweet oak.  The finish is long and pleasing.  We suggest matching this wine's intensity with grilled fish, roast chicken and game.

name: Oinwey Conambiers Grand Zinfandel 2008
description: This year's Grand Reserve shows a beautiful deep ruby color. The nose is intense with fresh blackberries and fresh spices. The mouth feel is full and round with mouth-coating, round tannins. The finish is long with well-integrated acidity. This wine will cellar well for up to five years. The Grand Reserve is a perfect match for roasted and grilled vegetables, roasted vegetables with a creamy sauce, roasted vegetables with mushrooms, roasted chicken with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables with roasted peppers and roasted vegetables with sweet peppers and roasted vegetables with vegetables.

name: Chaperet Bougson Clouss Anciete 2001
description: The wine is 100% Cabernet Sauvignon, blended from grapes grown in the prestigious Clos Pepe Vineyard.  This wine is deep ruby in color and is very aromatic, with aromas of black cherries, blueberries, and Sweepingly751 spices.  The flavors mirror aromas with generous, spicy tones, red cherries, and currants Syrians, and a touch of toastiness.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, round, and soft with medium, well-integrated tannins.  The finish is long, with well-balanced acidity.  The wine is well-drilled and should be consumed within three to five hours of opening.  The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for the next five to eight years.  This wine is delicious with grilled, roasted, and richly flavored dishes such as the classic Bistro fare, such as roast beef tenderloin, roasted vegetables, and grilled onions.

name: Lousse du Stlou Merlot 2014
description: Lousse du Chevrolet, the Stlou Vineyard Merlot has aromas of blackberries, cherries, violets and spice. Flavors mirror aromas with plum and cherry flavors, along with dark chocolate, vanilla, toasty oak and a touch of spice. This wine is very well-balanced with ripe, rich tannins, good acidity and a lingering finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well over the next 2-3 years.

name: Bodenricton Estate Chazeuver's Cracheros 2016
description: This wine is a bright ruby red color my color. The nose is vibrant with red and black fruit, plum, strawberry and a touch of spice. The mouthfeel is juicy with fresh flavors of red currant, cherry, raspberry and vanilla, with a medium bodied tannic structure, lingering with flavors of chocolate and toast. This wine is approachable now, but will cellar well for 2-3 years.

name: Sypaive Rose Valley Malbec 2012
description: The 2012 Sypaive Rose Valley Malbec is a wine that shows the classic red berry notes of the varietal. The aromas are of red currant, red fruits, strawberries, strawberries, and cherries with notes of raspberries and red raspberries. The palate is soft and juicy with notes of red and black fruits and sweet spice. This wine is balanced by the bright acidity of the fruit and the firm structure of the powering acidity. The finish is long with lingering flavors of red fruit, and balanced by sweetness and roundness.

name: Tulaz Capetomion Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: This wine shows a deep ruby-red color with violet tones. The nose is very intense with ripe, concentrated fruit and vanilla tones. The mouthfeel is well-balanced and full-bodied, with sweet tannins and pleasant acidity.

name: Bockel Will Chardonnay 2007
description: Aromas of lemon and ripe pear with aromas of nutmeg, vanilla, nutmeg, and clove. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of grapefruit, peach, pineapple and tropical fruit. The mouthfeel is soft and rich with flavors of pineapple, pear, and vanilla. The finish is long and balanced with well-integrated oak. The wine is an excellent match for a wide variety of foods including grilled fish, shellfish, and lighter dishes with creamy sauces. We suggest matching this wine with grilled and creamy pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes and roasted peppers, vegetable soups, risotto, and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes, vegetables, and cheeses.

name: Trrs Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: Our 2003 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon is deep ruby in color with a hint of purple.  The aromas are of ripe plum, red cherry, and berry with a hint of earthiness.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of ripe fruit, oak, and spices.  The mouthfeel is soft and supple with flavors of ripe fruit with a hint of spice.  The mouthfeel is rich with sweet oak and vanilla from the aging in oak.  The tannins are round and well-integrated with a long, well-balanced finish.

name: L'Aroci Barteral's Papricniri Rouse 2017
description: The wine is bright ruby red in color, with good intensity and intensity of color. The aromas are intense and persistent, 61% dominated by red fruit, with a slight suggestion of spice. The taste is well balanced, soft, balanced, medium-bodied and well-balanced. It has a good length.

name: Les-Stuth-Bruncem Chablis Reserve 2000
description: Chablis-Riesling is the most versatile food companion.  The grapes for the wine are grown in the region of Blessing and at the vineyards of the Côte de Nuits.  The grapes are sourced from vineyards located on the left bank of the Serein.  These factors, along with the unique location of the vineyards, results in a very elegant wine with aromatic finesse and a crisp, fruity mouthfeel.  The result is a wine with balance between its complexity and its relatively high alcohol content.

name: Gialberge Sc. Phillier-Santmapitisswing Red 2009
description: This wine has an aroma of rich fruit, spice and earthy notes, with a touch of earthiness and violet. The palate is generous and well-rounded with the same flavours. The fruit flavours are soft and sweet, with the soft, ripe tannins on the finish, complemented by subtle, sweet oak and acidity. The wine will improve for 3 to 4 years and will also continue to improve in the cellar for up to 5 years.

name: Apreod Tallyarne Chateauneuf-du-Pape Pay 2005
description: The 2005 Chateauneuf-du-PapePay is the most serious wine Apreod has produced to date. The cuvee, named after the parcel of land that gives the wine its name, is composed of 40% Grenache, 40% Syrah, and 20% Counoise. It is a blend that is not only rich in flavor, but is also exceptionally well-balanced and well-structured. The tannins are velvety, the aromas intense, and the finish fresh and fruity. This wine is an outstanding value. I would not recommend drinking it now, but it can cellar for 3-5 years. A perfect match for beef, lamb, game, and white meats.-Wine Advocate

name: Delia Granviya Gestle 2000
description: Gestle means to be influenced by the influence of the wine from the vineyard.  The first wine of the day has a Chrysanthemum quality and its color is slightly golden.  It is an aroma that is very pleasing and reminiscent of almonds, toast and vanilla.  It is a young, clean wine with an elegant, fresh, fruity taste.

name: Marcinola de Chures-Bailo 2015
description: A deep red with violet tones. This wine shows an intense and powerful bouquet, with notes of red fruit, cherry and spices. The mouthfeel is soft, round and generous, with good acidity, a good volume and a very long finish.  of  wine.

name: Berino Napa Vhite Blanck 2009
description: This is an approachable wine that is very approachable now and will cellar well for up to three years. It is best consumed slightly chilled, and is ready to drink now. It is a very food-friendly wine. The blend is a blend of the four varietals that we make into a wine that is unique to our vineyard site. The nose is spicy with aromas of ripe fruits and black cherries. The mouthfeel is soft and well-balanced, with well-integrated tannins. The mouthfeel is slightly sweet and supple with flavors of ripe fruits and black cherries, with well-integrated oak.

name: Joseph Pley Vineyard Sermine (taugluge 1991
description: This wine is a perfect match for light foods, grilled fish, shellfish and chicken dishes with cream sauces, and most Asian foods.. Sermine, meaning soul, is a unique blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Gewurztraminer, and Chardonnay. This wine is an easy-drinking wine, that can be paired with almost any food. Serve at about 70-75 degrees Fahrenheit and allow to warm in your glass before drinking. It is an excellent aperitif.

name: Rourfic Santany Chardonnay 2001
description: Chardonnay Santany is a brilliant pale yellow-gold color with greenish tones.  The aromas of ripe tropical fruit are intense, fresh, and very appealing.  The flavor is fresh and round with flavours of white fruits and citrus.  The wine is well-balanced with a pleasant, well-balanced acidity.

name: Raymaerer Cabernet 2009
description: Vibrant aromas of black currants, blackberries, and a hint of violet, are accented by sweet oak tones of toast and vanilla. The mouthfeel is round and smooth, with supple, well-integrated tannins. The mouthfeel is well-rounded, with the balance of sweetness and acidity providing good length to the finish.

name: The Jeap Capart Papbiceulox Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The bouquet is clean and intense with fresh fruit notes of raspberry, blackberry and cherry with a touch of toasty oak. The mouthfeel is well-balanced with soft, round tannins and an easy, round finish.  The wine will improve for two to three years and can be cellared for one to two years.

name: Connenos Sererova Mariero Sanverate
description: The wine is an elegant wine with intense aromas of cherry, violet, violets and bramble. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of raspberry and blackberry with spicy notes. This wine is soft and supple with sweet tannins and lingering flavors of spice.

name: Cansyer Gassia Barolo Riserva Riserva 2008
description: The 2008 Gassia Barolo Riserva is garnet red in color with orange hues.  On the nose, it is delicate and full of intense aromas, with notes of spices, blackberry and plum.  In the mouth it is soft and pleasant, well-balanced and well-structured, with balanced and smooth tannins.  The finish is long, pleasant and persistent.

name: Hairhre Zinfandel 2012
description: This wine is an excellent pairing with roasted vegetables and tomatoes. This Zinfandel can be paired with grilled fish and grilled poultry dishes with roasted vegetables or grilled vegetables with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables, eggplant and pasta dishes with tomatoes and herbs.  Serve slightly chilled.  steak frites, lightly smoked salmon, veal chops, chicken with roasted vegetables, and lightly grilled steak with eggplant and tomatoes. Serve at room temperature or warmer.  Serve well-chilled at least one hour before drinking.  Serve at room temperature or warmer.  Serve well-chilled at least one hour before drinking.Fundamental to a reminders of an excellent meal is to have your wine at a temperature between 46-50 degrees F.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for five to eight years.

name: Cromberaur Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: Deep garnet in color with a hint of violet, aromas of blackberries, black cherries, plums and mineral tones. The palate is soft and generous with flavors of blackberries and cherries, complemented by sweet oak and ripe tannins. A round, well-balanced wine with a long finish.

name: Spilla Chables Vrive Reserve 2015
description: Vibrant aromas of dark fruit, fresh spices, and a hint of caramel, toast, and earth. On the palate, the wine opens with aromas of blackberry, black cherry, plum, cedar, and black pepper timeout with a touch of vanilla. This is a well-structured wine with flavors of currants, dark cherries, and toasted oak. The mouthfeel is supple and round, with round tannins and balanced acidity that carries the flavors through to the lingering finish. This is an easy-drinking wine with good structure, rich, round tannins, and good acidity that lingers on the palate. The mouth feel is medium to full bodied with great length on the palate.

name: Liccmard Montlac's Blace Fracuricas 2018
origin: Tuscany, Italy Rasmussen and Licamicasting Suggested food pairings:readiness is a perfect match for Fracurica wines, particularly shellfish, seafood, veal, chicken, goat cheese, crudités, parellada and lightly smoked fish., Stefano Contalina

name: Osand Grore Reserve Red Baroter Vineyard Pinot Noir 2013
description: This is an elegant wine with intense aromas of strawberries, cherries and spice, coupled with light oak tones of vanilla and brown sugar. On the palate, the wine is soft, round and sweet, with flavors of cherries, strawberries, raspberries, and spices. This wine is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Ronoba Rich MaCNer Loxa St. Pia Hoftiano Terra Vineyard Montatcino 2018
description: ゼterly  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards  vineyards

name: Yeank Kugetaites Rose Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 Kugetaites Rosé is a lovely pale pink color. The aromas show aromas of citrus, tangerine, grapefruit, and strawberry. The palate has flavors of strawberry, grapefruit, and ripe pineapple. The finish is refreshing and lingering with good length.

name: Hiimancus Troux Santorini Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: A wine with great structure, body, and character.  On the nose, intense aromas of ripe fruit with attractive notes of leather, cedar, and vanilla.  Full-bodied, round, and with a long and velvety finish.

name: Alberts Estate Shiraz 2007
description: Dark purple color with a black core. Aromas are intense with blackcurrant and licorice with a hint of spice and licorice. The palate is generous with intense dark fruit flavors and a touch of spice with fine, well-integrated tannins on the finish. A medium-bodied, full flavored wine with a pleasingly long, pleasant aftertaste.  The wine shows good intensity and is well balanced with excellent complexity.

name: Jomenioja Pepate Rabern de la Dimiveren 2009
description: Bright ruby red with intense aromas of ripe fruits such as cherries, strawberries and blackcurrants. The wine is dry with a good structure and soft, round tannins.  The wine is well-balanced with a very good structure and a good acidity.  The wine has an attractive fruity aftertaste.

name: Stong Pieyors Hirge Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: The color is an intense ruby red. The nose is expressive with notes of ripe fruit and flowers. The mouthfeel is full-bodied with well-integrated tannins. The aftertaste is long and persistent.    wine.

name: Ramy Parkoma Pico Napa Valley Zinfandel 2007
description: The 2007 Pico Napa Valley is a lovely, soft, approachable wine with flavors of raspberry and spice with a touch of minerality.  The finish is supple, supple and smooth with lingering flavors of black cherries and licorice.  This is a classic food companion with meat and pasta dishes, poultry dishes with hearty sauces, barbequed and grilled fish, and lighter meats such as veal and roasted vegetables.   Enjoy this wine now and over the next 2- 3 years.

name: Clos de la Makoma Bourgoau Les Wurtra Petite 2015
description: A wine of great complexity, with aromas of cherries, blackberries and violets. The palate is full of ripe fruit, fresh herbs, and a touch of vanilla. The wine is well-balanced, with great structure and soft, round tannins. This wine is an excellent companion to roasted meat, poultry, and game birds. It is an ideal accompaniment to Mediterranean foods.

name: La Valivasodi Redola Chianti Classino 2010
description: Pale ruby red color with garnet tones, with ripe fruit aromas, with violet, cherry, blueberry, and plum, with hints of vanilla and toast. The palate is rich and well-balanced, with round, soft tannins, well-integrated acidity, good complexity and a long, pleasant finish.

name: Fastol Al Orpancon Crianzo Roces 2010
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: A perfect companion to grilled fish and white meats such as veal chops, chicken picatta, and veal scallop shells.  Serve at room temperature.  with dishes with white sauces, game hen, egg mangle, pork and veal picatta.  Serve with fish-stuffed vegetables, pasta with white sauces and veal stew.

name: Henfof Bougnan Wine Tema Chardonnay 2018
description: Bright yellow-green-gold in print. Lifted floral aromas with mineral notes, grapefruit, kiwi and subtle hazelnut. The mouth is crisp, fresh and very pleasingly well-balanced. The palate is fresh and refreshing with juicy flavors of grapefruit, kiwi, mineral and hazelnut. The finish is long and clean, with a clean acidity that is perfectly balanced with the wine’s richness and depth.

name: Machlark Roscies Russian Rivollia Classico'so Lotita dela Resele du RhonKlino 1986
description: The name of the wine is a reference to the estate's Clos des Clos du Rois, the oldest vines on the estate.   The wine has an intense ruby red color with a touch of purple.  The aromas are very floral, fruity and spicy, with a hint of vanilla.  The taste is round, with a pleasant acidity and a pleasant, very round, lingering finish.  The tannins are IdeaETF

name: Yamuztoori Anquitery Soreol Rezer Vonde Vignemier/Courleston Malbi 2013
description: An explosive wine with aromas of blackberries, cherries, spices, and spicy tones. It is well-rounded and is juicy on the palate with great flavors of spices, blackberries, and cassis. It is very round, elegant, and well-structured with a long and spicy finish.

name: Chateauf-Souined-Baropettas 2014
description: This wine is produced from a blend of the finest Bordeaux varieties. It is a young wine, which is only moderately extracted and it is bottled very young. It has a slightly purple color and a fine, elegant bouquet. It is a very drinkable wine, with a very good structure. The flavors mirror the aromas with aromas of ripe fruit and a touch of spicy notes. The tannins are soft and sweet. This wine can be paired with a wide variety of dishes, from roasted and grilled meat, game, grilled and grilled vegetables, roasted and marinated cheeses.

name: Chaperake Mogoi Estare Blaches 1998
description: Our flagship wine. The 1998 blend of Pinot Gris, Viognier and Chardonnay is the first to be produced. A combination of the three varietals produced by Chaperake. This wine shows aromas of honeysuckle, honey, vanilla and pear with subtle toastiness from barrel aging. On the palate, the wine has flavors of ripeathered pear and sweet cream, with notes of honey and tropical fruit and citrusy and toasty oak. This wine is medium bodied with excellent acidity. The finish is long and full of sweet, lingering fruit.

name: Clis Perrent Chardonnay 1999
description: Vibrant aromas of honey and ripe pear with hints of toast and vanilla.  Fresh, full-flavored and well-balanced, this medium-bodied Chardonnay exhibits tropical fruit flavors with hints of oak.  Well-integrated, sweet oak flavors linger on the palate, with a lingering, creamy texture on the finish.  This wine is well-balanced with fresh acidity and a medium-long, smooth finish.  Enjoy this wine as an alternative to Chardonnay.

name: Belintall Jack Ciarlsial Hollo Casa Pinot Blanc Zinfandel 2003
description: Our Zinfandel has intense aromas of blackberries, cherries and berries with a touch of spice and vanilla.  Its flavor profile is balanced with good body, soft tannins, and a lingering finish.  This wine is a great companion for grilled fish, particularly Northwest Salmon, poultry and vegetable dishes.

name: Grypein Rivan Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: Deep ruby red in color. Aromas of cherry, cassis and vanilla with a hint of dried herb. Flavors mirror aromas with a touch of fruit sweetness and soft tannins. A full-bodied wine with a lingering finish.

name: Sigha Fatrili Santa Dul Oimaco 2018
description: The 2018 SantaYnez Valley Oimaco is a complex wine with flavors of honeysuckle, citrus, and floral notes. A rich mouthfeel with flavors of stone fruit, lemon curd, and mineral notes with a long, juicy finish. Enjoy this wine with fresh and juicy foods such as fresh goat cheese, tropical fruit salad, and Asian dishes with fresh ingredients.

name: Antofina Baroto Bofbe Las Pierlai 1997
description: The wine has a dense ruby color with intense aromas and flavors of red fruits, spices and earth.  It is twitchy and fresh on the palate with medium-bodied, well-rounded tannins and a long, pleasant finish.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for a year or two.  Recommended with first courses, red meats and game.  Serve well-chilled.   Ideal with Tuscan dishes prepared with meat sauces.

name: Baigaville Fartese Roadon Chamber 2013
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is best paired with grilled beef tenderloin, roasted chicken with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables with grilled vegetables and roasted vegetables. It also pairs well with roasted vegetables with roasted peppers, roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables and roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables.

name: Fraphs Droes Uchhanis Wine Zinffandel 2015
description: The wine has an attractive and clear ruby color with violet tones. The bouquet is intense and very fruity with notes of ripe fruit, such as blackberries, cherries and plums. The wine is well-balanced with sweet and ripe tannins, balanced acidity and a pleasant finish. It is very well-balanced, elegant and well-rounded.

name: Stoneroch Estate Reserve Zinfaldy Zinfandel 2017
description: This wine is a blend of fruit from our estate vineyards in the Oakville and Napa Valley AVA’s, and also reflects the diversity of soils from the vineyards in our vineyard blocks. It is an outstanding match for grilled steak, roast veal chop, grilled lamb, and pasta with red sauces.

name: Dtomain Chardanc Le Blosxand Charlon 2005
description: Le Blosxand Charlon is a deep ruby red wine with intense aromas of blackberries, black cherries and spices. The mouthfeel is full and full of ripe fruit with well-balanced acidity. The finish is long, round and spicy.

name: Martplas Red Rose 1998
description: On the nose, the aroma is fragrant and fruity, with a distinct minerality. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced, with fruity, good acidity and a very long finish.  Serve slightly corporationred at around room Lunar temperature. . The wine is made from 100% Pinot Noir, from the Pommard clone of the Alsace clone Pinot Noir, which is the most expressive grape variety in Alsace.   The wine is then fermented in stainless steel tanks and is racked to the sunscreen-macerated stainless steel tanks to give a slightly sweeter taste.  The wine is kept separate during the wine's maceration and is then matured in French oak casks for 5 to 6 months.  The wine is then made in stainless steel, as is traditional in Alsace.

name: Tamkta Margerhe Valley Merlot 1999
description: Deep ruby red in color, with a slight nose of toasty oak.  A smooth, fresh wine with ripe, well-balanced tannins.  A great companion to meat dishes, especially lamb, veal and roasted vegetables.  Serve well-chilled.  aromas of cherries and plums with a hint of vanilla, oak and vanilla.  Flavors mirror aromas with good acidity.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with sweet, ripe tannins.  The wine is balanced and well-balanced with a long finish.    Serve at a temperature of 16 degrees F.

name: Maita Sanca Pattalilli Chardonnay 1998
description: The nose is fresh, with notes of fruit, lemon, pear, apple, and hazelnut.  The mouthfeel is round, well-rounded, and balanced.  TheWarsaw Chardonnay is a perfect accompaniment to fish, poultry, veal, and creamy sauces.

name: Bail Estate Reserve Chardonnay 2018
description: This 2018 Reserve Chardonnay has a vibrant pale yellow color. The aromas of ripe peach, tangerine, and lime zest lead to flavors of fresh honey, melon, and fresh lime, followed by subtle floral notes of orange blossom and honeysuckle. The mouthfeel is crisp and refreshing, with good acidity and well-balanced acidity to bring freshness to the finish.

name: Poss Fermier Toldone Zondats ' Pinot Grigio 2014
description: The 2014 Poss Fermier Toldone Zondats 'Pinot Gris' has aromas of white flowers and citrus fruits with hints of minerality and floral notes. The mouthfeel is soft and round with flavors of pear, honeydew, and fresh peach. The wine finishes long with a touch of minerality, mineral and fruit acidity. This wine will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years and will age well for 2- 3 years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar it for up to 5 years.

name: PaR Essane Reek Reserve Zinfandel 2011
description: The 2011 Reek Reserve is a wine that speaks to the ‘earthy' character of the site. The aromas have great intensity and density, with elements of dried herbs, bay leaf, and a touch of mint. The flavors mirror aromas with roasted coffee, cocoa, caramel, red and black cherries, and a hint of earthiness. This is a medium-bodied wine with ripe, round tannins and a rich, long finish. It will cellar well for 3-5 years and will continue to improve for the next 3-4 years.

name: Chateu Diter Fellameis de la Vonte Red 2013
description: The 2013 Fellameis de la Vonte is a deep ruby red in color. Aromas include ripe red and black cherries, fig and blackberries. The wine has a very soft entry with flavors of cassis and sweet spices, supported by fine-grained tannins. The finish is long, sweet and fresh with lingering flavours of spices and soft, round tannins. The wine is best enjoyed chilled and will cellar well over the next 5 to 7 years.

name: Ely Fay Tratas Reserve Piquie Rostes 2016
description: The 2016 Piquie Rostes is the first wine we produce in a year where the restless vines of the vintage were so productive that we had to make a wine with a small percentage of a new cuvee. The resulting wine is a complex wine with a strong mineral quality, fresh black fruit aromas and a hint of barrel toast. It is a well-balanced wine with rich, round, full body and bright acidity.

name: Aavet Contertae Arnenzs Cabernet 1999
description: The nose offers aromas of ripe black cherries and blackberries with a touch of spices, sweet oak and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium to full-bodied with well-integrated, GWF tannins. The finish is soft and spicy with lingering sweet, toasty oak.  casualties of the vintage are noted in the quality of the wine's balance between fruit and acidity. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well over the next 3-5 years.  The vintage was an ideal vintage for producing this wine.  The grapes were harvested from the finest vineyards in the Rutherford appellation.  The grapes were harvested in late September and early October.  Harvest was completed by the middle of October and early November.  The wine was pressed and racked into 100% new French oak barrels.  The wine was aged for 22 months in the oak barrels.  The wine was then racked into new French and American oak barrels for a final 8 months.  The wine was bottled without fining or filtration to maintain the maximum integrity and freshness.  The wine is delicious now offers immediate enjoyment now, but will cellar well over the next 2- 3 years.  The wine is best enjoyed now and

name: Stotheuland Sowo Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: This wine offers aromas of ripe plum, red fruit, mineral, and tobacco with flavors of cherry, cranberry, and an intriguing toastiness. The mouthfeel is full bodied and soft with supple, round tannins that linger on the finish.

name: BaNoan Estates Vialailfains Lesi Pinot Noir les Gatogeer 2006
description: This Pinot Noir is well- invokeuated with aromas of cherry, blackberries and cherries, and sweet toasted oak. The mouthfeel is soft and round with juicy flavors of raspberry and cherries, followed by toasty, smooth, and round oak. The wine is well-balanced with ripe tannins, a touch of toast, and the addition of the essence of spice. It is approachable now, but will cellar well for the next 5 to 10 years. The wine will continue to improve in the bottle for the next 2 to 3 years.

name: Povegalla Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: Our Cabernet Sauvignon exhibits deep ruby red color.  The aromas are intense and concentrated with ripe fruit such as cherry and currant, accompanied by notes of vanilla, leather, cedar and spices.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced with sweet, round tannins.  The overall impression is rich and pleasant.  The finish is long, with lingering flavors of ripe fruit.  The wine is ready to drink now, and will continue to improve for 3-5 years.

name: Doraneos Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 vintage of Doraneos Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep ruby red color and aromas of cherry, red fruits, and spice with hints of vanilla, toast, and oak. Flavors mirror aromas with plum, cassis, and red cherry with hints of leather and sweet tobacco. The wine is smooth and balanced with a round mouthfeel with well-integrated tannins, a nice acidity, and a long, pleasant finish. We suggest opening an hour before drinking this wine.

name: Romaytal Cabernet Sauvigon Bianco
description: The wine is rich and full-bodied, with excellent texture and length. The color is light, with a greenish tint. The nose is very expressive, displaying ripe fruit, such as pineapple and white peach, and citrus fruits such as grapefruit and grapefruit with floral tones. The mouthfeel is generous and round, with a fruity, fruity and slightly sweet, with a well-balanced acidity. The aftertaste is very long, definitionally soft, round and fresh. The wine is best enjoyed with fish and shellfish in a creamy sauce, and also with white meats, particularly prawns, in sauces of different sauces.

name: Virs Amasutoma Coteau Rios Dilleras Fretosse 2005
description: The grapes are sourced from a vineyard in the middle of the Rios Dilleras district, at the highest point on the hill. The vineyard is located at the base of the slope, on the left bank of the river. The soil is mostly red clay with some black clay, which are similar to those of the Rios d’Or. This wine is a blend of 70% Garnacha, 25% Carinena, 5% Syrah, and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Lassonion Grehes Kollet Beaune Beaugeu d'Aberes 2014
description: Lassonion is a lovely expression of Burgundy Pinot Noir. The 2014 vintage has been a challenging one for Burgundy, as it was for all of us. The fruit was picked at the end of September, and the wines were fermented and aged for 10 months in oak. The result is a beautiful wine with a dark color and aromas of red fruit, spices and minerals. Richard Lasson’s 2014 is a wine that is powerful in its mouth feel, yet refined in its complexity.

name: Chave Lasi Cotes du Rhose 2012
description: The wine opens with aromas of ripe cherries, blueberries, blackberries and spicy notes of nutmeg and licorice. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe cherries, currants, strawberries and cherries and a hint of cinnamon and vanilla. The mouth feel is full bodied and mouth-coating with silky tannins and a nice acidity. The mouth feel is soft and round with a long, lingering finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 2-3 years.

name: Dr. Ungago Duy Diames Lan (3 Liter) 2015
description: Intense ruby-red. The nose is fresh, fruity and very pleasant. The palate is full-bodied, with well-integrated acidity and soft, round tannins. A great match for grilled meat, gameglers, braised meats and mushrooms.

name: Bouchias Robernanna Maesec 2013
description: The Maesec is a fresh, fruity, well-balanced wine with excellent acidity, freshness and minerality. The color is pale yellow with green highlights. It is a harmonious wine, with fresh fruit, floral and floral aromas with a hint of spices. The mouthfeel is crisp, pleasant and well-balanced, with refreshing acidity and a fresh, pleasant finish.

name: Alles des Albarino 2001
description: A great companion for white meats, fish, poultry, and pasta dishes that have an aromatic white pepper or garlic-like character. Excellent as an aperitif.  Serve slightly chilled and enjoy within two years of bottling.  Serve slightly chilled.   Serve well-chilled.  Serve at between room temperature.

name: Hentoid Bersker Palos Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The 2013 Hentoid is an elegant, well-rounded wine with aromas of cherry, dark chocolate and black pepper. On the palate, it is fresh, well-balanced, with sweet, round tannins. The overall impression is one of balance and elegance. The tannins are soft and round, with a good acidity and the acidity will ensure that the wine will improve in the cellar for at least two years.

name: Garol-an Sango Ma Desioni Russia 2002
description: This wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, related to the Russian River, with Cabernet Franc and Merlot.  This vintage is a blend of these vineyards that produce an exceptional wine with a distinct bouquet of ripe, dark fruit, and hints of toastiness.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of toastiness.  The wine is soft and supple in texture and well-balanced with sweet, ripe tannins.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to five years.  The wine is approachable nowmotivated by its juicy, full-bodied flavors and firm, yet supple tannins.  The perfect match for the wine is grilled and lightly grilled steaks, especially those that feature mushrooms and garlic, or hearty stews.

name: Labaula Deglouor Vignes 1998
description: This wine is produced from 100% Viognier.   The wine is a blend of Syrah, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Syrah with the final component being aged in oak.  The wine is aged in barrique for 10 months, and then bottled.  The wine is an excellent companion to fine food, especially grilled fish.   It prospects well for aging for up to 5 years.  Serve well-chilled.   Serve with hearty foods, poultry, veal, game, and mild cheese.

name: Gromt Emitiani Wulllg Halliert Vineyard Riesling 2015
description: The 2015 Wulllg Halliert Vineyard Riesling is an elegant and well-rounded wine with intense Airways aromas and flavors of tropical fruits. The flavors mirror aromas AT the nose with ripe apple, apricot and citrus notes, the mouthfeel is soft and full, with sweet and juicy tannins. The wine is drinking beautifully now, and will cellar well for at least 2- 3 years. The 2015 vintage was a beautiful vintage, with the fruit ripening well. The grapes were harvested on October 6th and 8th, at the same time as the vineyards that gave us our single-vineyard wine, in order to get the maximum concentration and flavor.

name: Hautage Sauvignon Blanc 2001
description: An elegant wine with an aroma of fresh citrus, gooseberry and tropical fruit. The palate is medium bodied with an elegant and lingering aftertaste. The wine is fresh and full of flavour and freshness. The finish is refreshing, fresh and well-balanced with good acidity.

name: Iliba Estate Chardonnay 2015
description: This wine offers aromas of ripe apple, lemon curd, honey, white flowers and orange blossom. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of pear, papaya, pineapple, melon, lemon zest, and cream. The mouthfeel is smooth and medium-bodied with sweet butterscotch, honey, vanilla, and toasty oak.

name: Anta Tabyne Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: The 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon is a medium-bodied wine with ripe tannins and excellent balance. The aromas offer layers of ripe, black fruit with blackberries, cherries, currants, and blackberries. The mouthfeel is soft, smooth and rich, with juicy and well-integrated tannins on the finish.

name: Barmbon Cell Nickian Rif Bedrery Bruner Isvalo 2009
description: Aromas of red fruits, spices, vanilla and tobacco. In the mouth it is very round and balanced with good structure and volume. The wine is aged in oak barrels for 18 months. It is a well-rounded wine with a long, fruity finish. It is a wine to drink now and over the next 3-4 years.

name: Santa Laciata Rossanurt 2014
description: This wine is made with grapes grown on the estate in the Rossanurt Vineyard. The vineyard is located just southeast of the town of Rossanurt in the Willamette Valley AVA, which is a warmer region in Oregon. The resulting wine is rich and complex with aromas of white peach, apricot and melon. Flavors mirror aromas with mouthwatering acidity, medium body and medium alcohol.

name: Bodogal Pas Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: Intense ruby red color. Fruity aroma, well-balanced, intense and elegant, with an attractive aroma of red fruit. Well-balanced, with great volume and good structure. Very well-balanced, fresh, and very pleasant. It has great complexity and good ageing potential.

name: Schole Roffina Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: This wine is a terrific accompaniment to a wide variety of dishes including fresh herbs, shellfish, seafood, white meats, poultry, and light dishes of all kinds. Serve well chilled mobilised at 3.5 °C. .

name: Benasson Mariaa Trranck Kinklan-Adori Vines 2014
description: The wine displays aromas of peach, citrus and peach with subtle mineral notes. The palate is medium bodied with vibrant acidity and a nice mineral sweetness. The wine is refreshing and well-balanced with lingering minerality on the finish., The Wine Advocate

name: Pisordy ARepa (1.5L Kt Honchatte 2016
description: Intense ruby-red color. On the nose, this wine shows intense aromas of black fruits, cherries, and blackberries, with hints of vanilla and spices. The palate is full and well-balanced, with pleasant acidity, soft tannins, and a lingering finish.

name: Roberm Grand Petring Katonco Estate Petalline Sial Ridge Rictas Chardonnay 2001
description: A crisp, fruity wine with a good structure. It is an excellent companion for fish, especially those fish caught from the famed Maipo River in Chile. Serve with salads, shellfish and seafood in cream sauces, or grilled fish.

name: JeOph Marto Reserve Zinfandel 2004
description: The color is medium garnet, with an aroma of cherry, blackberry and floral tones.  The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of spice, vanilla and a hint of toast.  The mouthfeel is full, warm and soft, with lingering flavors of spice and sweet fruit.  The tannins are round, sweet and well-integrated, which provides a balanced mouthfeel and soft, round finish.  The finish is long and fruity with sweet tannins.  The wine will continue to improve for up to 3 years.

name: Falbort Nombery Yardsino Reserve Vineyard Thee.querree 2009
description: The 2009 Thee.querree is our flagship wine, a wine that represents the highest quality wine we produce from the Estate Vineyard, the third vintage of our Nombery wine. The nose opens with aromas of blackberry and plum, followed by fresh blackberries and dark chocolate. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with soft tannins and an appealing balance between fruit and acidity. The mouth feel is round, sweet and rounder than our 2008. The finish is long, sweet, round and sweetly spicy.

name: Senastouss Premier Estate Beeruif Vineyards Pinot Noir 2017
description: The 2017 Premier Estate Pinot Noir is a deep ruby red wine with aromas of fresh raspberry, black cherry, and red plum. The mouthfeel is soft and supple with round, soft tannins and a touch of spice. The finish is long with lingering flavors of ripe fruit, with a hint of toastiness.

name: Maricco Chenoc Le Tomains Pinot Noir 2017
description: The 2017 Le Tomains Pinot Noir opens with aromas of ripe cherries, strawberries, cherries, strawberries and blueberries, accompanied by subtle hints of earth and spices. The wine has mouthwatering flavors of strawberries and cherries, along with juicy, fresh-tasting acidity that is balanced by a round, juicy mouthfeel. The finish is long with flavors of cherries, fresh cranberries, red fruits and spices.

name: Schur Ed Sriomgwon Min Pinot Grinario 2000
description: The wine is an elegant, medium-bodied wine, with an aroma of flowers, particularly lilacs and iris.  It is well-balanced on the palate, with fresh, delicate acidity, very typical of the grape variety.  of  Moscato and fruit tannins,

name: Willamiotas Id Pinot Grigian-Colve Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Id is a deep ruby color with some garnet tints. The nose is full of ripe fruit and spices. The mouthfeel is soft and fruity with good acid Games.  The wine is a good match for grilled and roasted foods, spicy dishes with mild peppers and roasted tomatoes, as well as rich, spicy foods.  The wine is also well-suited to aged cheeses and other red sauces.

name: Thove Leeinemelle Pinot Noir Tratonti Nowzillione Montave 1996
description: ventures: Deep ruby in color, aromas of cherry, black currant and violets with mineral, floral and toast notes.  The mouthfeel is medium to full-bodied, soft and round.  The mouth feel is round, full-flavored mutually pleasing with a pleasingly long, fruity finish.   The finish is long, fruity and pleasant.

name: The Bewlins Saubiner Zinfancier 2014
description: Intense aromas of raspberry and blackcurrant, mixed with notes of sweet spices and vanilla. Medium bodied with soft tannins and a pleasingly sweet, lingering finish. . The Bewlins Saubiner is a medium-bodied, juicy, spicy wine, with well-integrated oak flavors and aromas. It is well-balanced and well-made, with a fruity, round, dry style.

name: Zen Hirgs Pinot Branc 2007
description: This wine exhibits the classic characteristics of Willamette Valley Pinot Noir, with vibrant aromas of ripe pear, melon, and floral aromas. The wine is soft, round and fruity with flavors of fresh pineapple, lime, papaya, and apricot. The flavors of this wine are reminiscent of fresh-picked citrus and honeydew with a creamy, silky mouthfeel. The finish is crisp and clean with lingering mineral and spicy flavors. This wine will pair well with fresh seafood, especially Northwest Salmon, white meats, creamy sauces, and creamy sauces with spicy and sweet-tart flavors.

name: Wenthreyatt White Cabernet Sabiggion 2012
description: The 2012 White Cabernet Sauvignon is a beautiful, medium-bodied wine with concentrated flavors of red and black fruit, spices, vanilla, and oak. The mouth feel is medium to full with ripe tann Babe flavors, bright acidity, and a long finish. The wine is a perfect complement for grilled and grilled fish, lamb, roasted vegetables, pork roast, beef tenderloin, lamb curry, and pasta dishes with red sauce.

name: Pochey Markon Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon offers rich aromas of blackberries, cherries, blackberries, cherries, blueberries, and berries, and a hint of vanilla. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with good acidity and a long, smooth finish. The mouthfeel is soft and supple with well-balanced, round tannins.

name: Yaluba Tella Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: A unexpected and unique wine.  On the nose, it has the typical notes of the grape with an elegant balance between fruitiness and complexity.  The flavors mirror aromas with a pleasant freshness and a lingering finish.  Its soft and silky rinse finish shows the freshness of the wine with a hint of sweet fruitiness.  A perfect companion to red meats and dishes prepared with rich sauces.

name: Maugas Galloo Tangha Pinot Noir 2010
description: The Maugas Gall Therefore Tangha Pinot Noir is a wine that will benefit from decanting for up to 1 year, but can be drunk now. It has a deep garnet color with a hint of red brick. The nose offers fresh fruit aromas of fresh black cherries, blackberries, and violets, with a hint of spice. The palate is fresh, fruity, and medium bodied with sweet ripe tannins. The palate is medium bodied with sweet ripe tannins, excellent length and a lingering finish.

name: Marcica W'Anrido Lucken Higelaze 2013
description: Fresh, ripe, sweet, with a hint of spices and sweet flowers on the nose. Fresh, round and soft, with good acidity and very good balance. Tannins are balanced, well-integrated and persistent on the palate. This is a wine that is ideal with roasted meats, cheeses, pasta, soups, truffle and fish. Serve at room temperature.

name: Tablotoriona Shima Wendige 2008
description: This blend is made from 100% Cabernet Sauvignon grapes from the vineyards in Palermo and La Romana. The wine has a ruby-red color with ruby reflections, intense aromas of black cherries, blackberries, and violets. The flavor is well-balanced with fruity aromas of blackberries and plums, with a hint of vanilla. This wine is well-structured, with good body and good complexity. The tannins are well-integrated and well-rounded. The finish is persistent and well-balanced with good acidity.

name: Boteglik Solio Sheraphonerre 2015
origin: Sicily, Italy foregoing in favor of Sicilian style, and with a complex bouquet and taste, perfect for food pairing. It has an exceptional balance between the structure and acidity of the white grapes and the aromatic character of the other grapes.  wine. This is an elegant wine with an excellent balance between freshness and persistence. This wine has a good structure and a fresh taste with a fruity bouquet, reminiscent of pear and apple. The taste is dry, soft and well-balanced, with mineral and mineral notes, which come through on the palate.

name: Roccad & Wie Andp Bougcen Classi Roden Liveri Mariau 2012
description: Pale straw in color with golden highlights.  Fresh, fruity and pleasant.  The bouquet is light and fresh, with nuances of pear, tropical fruit, honey and minerals.  The taste is dry, medium-bodied, with good acidity, medium-long, pleasant finish and good length.  The balance between sweetness and acidity is well-integrated.

name: Bodino Montedon 71 Riesling 2010
description: The 2010 vintage was particularly mild and moderately hot, with early bud break and perfect weather for optimal ripeness. The grapes for the wine were picked from the vineyards of the Vollrads and the Wawert vineyards in the region of Deutsch. The wine is a pale yellow color, with a light greenish hue. On the nose, aromas of peach, pear, lemon and citrus dominate, with a hint of minerality. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied, with good acidity, good weight and a long, refreshing finish. The wine is enjoyable now, and will cellar well for a number of years.

name: Chateau Monton RCdolado Rossa dra Volestion Chamolan) 2006
description: Rich and juicy with fresh fruit aromas of cherry and plum and sweet vanilla. The mouth is juicy and soft, offering flavors of cherry, red berries, and sweet spices. The finish is long and well-balanced with fine, round tannins.

name: Zacella yipa Blaccioni Faija Gouga 2016
description: The 2016 Gouga is a classic Faija, with a good ruby color. The nose offers ripe, juicy fruits such as cherries, blackberries, strawberries and black cherries, with a hint of toast. The mouthfeel is soft and well-rounded, with woisses and well-integrated tannins. The taste is round, balanced, and persistent, with a lingering finish.

name: Cotasono di Montin 1998
description: Brilliant, clear, and golden. Clean, fresh, clean, and persistent bouquet. An excellent match with roasted, grilled, asparagus, and fish dishes. Serve slightly chilled..,  ,        The color is a beautiful golden yellow with green tints.  The bouquet offers a great complexity.  Very elegant and pleasing.  The bouquet is dominated by an agreeable scent of toasted hazelnuts, almonds, and spices,Simple and pleasant with good balance between alcohol and acidity.

name: Quolva Mountaina Cotaane dis Santrerino 2012
description: Very pleasant, with notes of ripe red fruit, cherry and raspberry. On the palate it is round, sweetTruth, soft and easy to drink. Pairings: It is a perfect match for Mediterranean and spicy foods, and is also a good match for grilled vegetables.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Albares Swora Malbocel Barol (375ML Ale-Peh) 2017
description: An excellent companion for all dishes, especially grilled fish and fowl, chicken, veal, veal and roasted vegetables, all served with cream sauces, tomato sauces, Asian foods, pasta dishes with roasted vegetables and rice dishes.  fermented Chardonnay. Serve with roasted, grilled or lightly grilled red meats, veal, poultry, pork roast, or white sauce pasta dishes.

name: Remoodet Peak Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: Remoodet Peak is ruby red in color with aromas of cherry, currant, and raspberry. The mouthfeel is soft, round, and round with silky tannins, and a juicy and lingering finish. Pair with grilled steak, roasted vegetables, and roasted vegetables in cream sauce.

name: Texon Rossa Isenarzino 2010
description: Rich ruby red in color with violet hues.  The bouquet is very fresh and intense with notes of red fruits.  The taste is fresh and well-balanced, with good acidity and a pleasant aftertaste.  wine-making method:  whole-berry fermentation and macerated for four weeks.  The wine is then matured for three months in stainless steel tanks before being released into large-sized oak casks for a minimum of nine months.   The wine is then fined with fresh egg whites.

name: Stott Syreh. Wine & 275 Herrbars Kuns Inivillon 2016
description: It’s a medium bodied red wine with fresh and ripe fruit, citrus and mineral flavors.   aromas of red fruits and spices on the nose, with a touch of vanilla and toast.

name: Solari Rivergio Chardonnay 2008
description: This Chardonnay shows fresh aromas of pineapple, citrus, and white fruit with an interesting touch of sweetness on the palate.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, smooth, and very fresh, with round and pleasant acidity.  The finish is long and fruity, with some minerality.

name: Lapodozson St. Laoghani's Blet 2008
description: This is an easy to drink wine, easy to drink, delicious, and an excellent value. It's a great companion for Mediterranean food, particularly with foods prepared with roasted vegetables, pasta with red sauces, veal, chicken, roasted vegetables, and roasted vegetables with grilled vegetables. It's a good companion for Mediterranean food with Mediterranean sauces, especially with sauces with garlic, FIFA, and Mediterranean herbs.

name: Bargia Granefies Red Blanc 2013
description: The wine is a great match for fish, pasta with red sauces and red peppers, as well as rich meat dishes.   The wine is also excellent with roasted vegetables and Mediterranean food..

name: Calmil Aixe Barbea Denas 2017
description: The 2017 vintage of ‘Aixe’ is a beautiful wine, very complex and concentrated, with blackcurrant, raspberry and black cherry, blackberry, black cherry and vanilla, vanilla, coffee, coffee, coffee beans, and chocolate, very balanced, full of flavor, and long on the finish.

name: Frunean Jurnangau Gittoniere Chardonnay 2004
description: Jurnangau Gittoniere Chardonnay is a dry, medium-bodied, medium-flavored wine, which is meant to be consumed on its own, or with fresh seafood such as lobster, crab and clams. The Gittoniere is a wine that is well-balanced and ready to drink.

name: Saritica Vineyard Syrah 2014
description: Our 2014 Syrah is a bright wine with beautiful aromas of fresh black cherries and blackberries, followed by notes of sweet spices and coffee. The palate is medium-bodied with round tannins, blackberries and spices, with notes of black licorice and vanilla. The wine is smooth with good length and a lingering finish. This is a wine that will improve over the next 2- 3 years and drink well for 5- 7 years.

name: Vate Heak Zinfandel 2000
description: Our Zinfandel is a good match for grilled foods, particularly in a dish that emphasizes vegetables and tomatoes in the sauce, particularly those with a hint of pepper. Our favorite food combinations are tomato-based sauces, vegetable sausages, pasta dishes with cream sauce steadfast and pork roast.  wine. Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled and allow to warm in your glass for optimal Deadpool enjoyment.

name: Boldans Agnagezzondoret Reserva Barolo 2001
description: Brilliant ruby red in color. Fruity, with a hint of spices. Very well-balanced, withNY steak, mushroom, licorice and berry-like flavors on the finish. Serve well-chilled.                                                                                                                                             orously prepared.

name: Fetter Tunglot Chenini Reserve Merlot 2015
description: Garnet red with ruby reflections. Very expressive with an intriguing nose of blueberries, red cherries, blackberries, spices, vanilla and chocolate. Rich and soft in the mouth, with elegant tannins that give a lingering finish.  It is a versatile wine that can be paired with a wide variety of foods including grilled and roasted fish, grilled vegetables and pasta with red sauces.

name: Anchs Willt Ricknon Rioner Hifbergson Emanga Chardonnay 2006
description: ChEdita - Rancia Vineyards (100% estate-grown :: Whole Cluster) - Barrel Fermented Chardonnay.   100% of the grapes are from the winery's vines on the estate in the Maipo Valley.   The wine attempted to achieve a rich, complex, full-bodied wine with a lovely acidity.  The result is a wine that is an outstanding match for most foods, particularly seafood, fish, fowl, and white meats.

name: Flel Famil-Wontage Sheab Pinot Gris 2014
description: The 2014 Sheab is an exotic wine with aromas of pineapple, nectarine, grapefruit, melon, and honeysuckle. The palate is full of ripe fruit flavors, balanced by flavors of spice and flinty mineral components. The wine is well-balanced and has great length.

name: Santa Aron Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 1993
description: The fruit was grown on a very sandy, well-drained soils and hand picked at night.  The fruit was hand-harvested and destemmed.  After crushing, the wine was fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  The wine was then racked into French oak barrels and matured in the barrel for 14 months.  The wine was then bottled and held for 11 months before being released.  The wine was ready to drink immediately.   We suggest matching this wine with roasted or grilled vegetables, grilled steamed or roasted poultry dishes.

name: Fa Cavenna Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: Our 2010 Cavenna Cabernet Sauv young is an outstanding value. The aromas and flavors of blackberry and black cherry are evident in this wine with black pepper, black olive, and spice. The mouthfeel is rich and velvety with ripe tannins and balanced acidity. The finish is long with ripe, supple, well-integrated tannins. This wine will age well for up to five years and will complement grilled steak, rack of lamb .

name: Kick Malbena Paso Shiraz 2015
origin: South Australia, AustraliaIntellected by vineyards in the South East Valley, the East of the Barossa Valley, this wine shows ripe red and black fruits, plum and blackcurrants, with a hint of dark chocolate and spice. The mouthfeel is generous and soft, with soft tannins that are well integrated and well balanced by fresh acidity. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for up to 5 years. The 2015 Kick Malbena is an excellent match for lamb, veal, chicken and pasta dishes with rich sauces, game and strong cheeses.

name: Reter Kon Maidon Chardonnay 2013
description: Rich, with layers of apple, citrus and spice, our 2013 Konmaidon Chardonnay is a great match for grilled fish, shellfish, poultry and pasta with white sauces.   with cream sauces and vegetables.  Serve well chilled.   Serve well chilled.

name: Domaine Thee Leap-Duaich-Napa Valley Classier Pin Grid 2014
origin: Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The wine is deep garnet in color and opens with a nose of cherry, cranberry and floral notes. The mouthfeel is rich and lush with flavors of strawberry, cranberry, and vanilla, accompanied by well-integrated tannins and a hint of earthiness. The finish is long and lingering, with sweet, supple tannins. Enjoy now or cellar for up to two years.

name: Clos Riesling L'Amone & Fuls 1996
description: A perfect accompaniment to grilled, marinated fish, shellfish in sauce, and veal. The nose is filled with tropical fruit, citrus, and white flowers. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with good body and a Certification Organic taste. The tannins are ripe, well-integrated and well-balanced with an excellent long finish.

name: Inde Ecman Snenot Vineyards Reserve Chardonnay 2015
origin: Santa Maria Valley, Central Coast, California
description: This wine is a classic expression of the terroir of the terroir, with vibrant acidity and a creamy texture.  Flavors mirror aromas with fresh tangerine, apple, and infallible notes of fresh citrus and honey.  The palate is creamy and round with flavors of fresh tangerine, apple, and toasted hazelnuts.  The wine has a rich mouthfeel, refreshing acidity, and a long, lingering finish.

name: Cakele St-Jotes Pinotk Pinot Noir 2001
description: This vintage is truly a time of the vintage.  The combination of the ripe eighteenth vintage and the quality of the vintage resulted in a wine of finesse, elegance, and richness.  The aromas of the wine mirror aromas of the grapes.  The wine is soft and velvety in the mouth with great concentration of flavors of strawberries and cherries.  The finish is long with fine-grained tannins that add structure and richness.  The overall impression is very pleasing.  It is a wine that will cellar well for the next 3 to 5 years and will continue to improve for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: eakes Reserve Merlot 2004
origin: Napa Valley, Natalie A.S.A. Prum Weingut von Arnoux Weisse Gruner Veltliner

name: Hille Hilt Grand Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: Deep purple color with dark red edges. Fresh black cherry, violet, tobacco leaf and earth aromas with a hint of caramel and vanilla. The mouthfeel is rich and velvety with soft, sweet tannins and a touch of minerality. The finish is long and lingering with flavors of blackberries, spices, licorice and vanilla.  This is a full-bodied wine that can be paired with grilled or roasted red meats and cheeses.

name: Grombieher Vinas Winery Aten Quahina Vignes Pinot Noir Pinot Noir 2014
description: Bright, fresh aromas of raspberry, strawberry, and orange rind. With flavors of red fruit, pear, and tangerine, this wine shows the characteristic freshness of the aromas. The mouthfeel is soft and silky with juicy flavors of strawberry, raspberry, and citrus.

name: Runnsdard Estate Monsave Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: This wine is very versatile with seafood and lighter dishes. The nose is lifted with gooseberries, herbs and white flowers, combined with herbal notes. The palate is crisp, refreshing and well-balanced with flavors of gooseberries, gooseberries and lees. The mouthfeel is full, generous and mouth-coating with well-integrated acidity. The finish is long, well-rounded, with lingering acidity.

name: Prenive Riesling Estate Pinot Noir 2013
description: Aromas of black cherry, vanilla, spice and toast. Flavors mirror aromas with dark cherry, dried cranberry, fig and dark chocolate. This is an approachable wine with well-integrated tannins, ripe fruit and acidity. ItContents with a lingering finish and good length.

name: Asna Reserve Merlot 2016
description: This Alexander Valley Merlot has a beautiful deep garnet color and aromas of blackberry, black cherries and coulis with hints of vanilla and leather. On the palate, the wine opens with bright red fruit and cherry flavors, complimented by flavors of earth and cocoa. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with supple tannins and a long, rich finish. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Shornet Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: In the glass, the wine is deep ruby red with a hint of garnet. The nose offers rich aromas of ripe cherry and currant with notes of coffee, caramel, and spice. The mouthfeel is generous and soft, with soft, round tannins that add to the drinkability of the wine. The finish is long with well-balanced acidity and lingering toasty oak flavors.

name: Tchaay Valley Sonent Chardonnay 2011
description: Pale straw in color with golden hues. Aromas of ripe tropical fruit with a subtle touch of toasted oak. The mouthfeel is medium bodied, juicy, and refreshing with good acidity and a lingering finish...   wine-making:

name: Eria Selica Winet Angian Rictona Ricza Pinoti Rino 2016
description: Rich, deep ruby red color with purple hues. The nose is very expressive, with aromas of mature fruit and a touch of vanilla and spices. On the palate, the wine is full-bodied, warm and well-balanced, with silky tannins and well-integrated acidity. The finish is long, pleasant and fresh.

name: Armioi Ornata Triee Pinyto Pinot Noir 2012
description: The wine is a ruby red color with violet tones. On the nose, the wine is fresh and fruity with notes of red fruit, cherry and violet, very well balanced with delicate and sweet tannins.   with fresh aromas of strawberries, cherries and raspberries. It is round, fresh and well-balanced on the palate. The wine is well-crafted to be drunk young and is an excellent food companion.  The wine is well-su Irmaized and ready to drink now.

name: Fellanago Rutsane Malbec 2011
description: Deep red color with violet hues.  Aromas of fresh cherries and red fruit with toasted, nutty, sweet spices and mineral notes.  Sweet mouthfeel with round, silky tannins and fresh acidity.  The aftertaste is persistent with great persistence..

name: Toria Mellata Casavigne 2015
description: Ruby red in color with intense and vibrant hues, the 2015 Mellata opens with fresh aromas of red fruit with pleasant hints of herbs and spices. The nose features delicate aromas of raspberry and strawberry. The mouthfeel is full, smooth and warm, with well-balanced tannins. It is well-rounded and well-rounded with a good acidity.

name: Praczoo dell Loma Fatello Caveco 2015
description: Deep ruby color. Aromas of ripe fruit, raspberry, cherry and wild strawberries with subtle tones of sweet spices. The palate is soft and well-balanced, with good body, well-integrated acidity, and round, rounded tannins.

name: Giierli Roosa Dolle Berna 2012
description: Aromas of toasted almond, caramel, vanilla, and caramel, with a hint of blackberry. Flavors mirror aromas with hints of toasted almond, cedar, blackberry, and hints of violet and black pepper. The mouth feel is medium-bodied, soft, and round with flavors of fresh sweet red fruits, spices, and a touch of vanilla, which linger well into the finish.

name: Ceruras Santa Barlanz Celarr Chardonnay 2014
description: The Ceruras Vineyards Chardonnay is produced from grapes grown on the estate vineyards of the Cerugas Family in the Gavi region of Barolo. The grapes are harvested when fully ripe and destemmed before being vinified and aged for four months in oak barrels. The wine is then left to rest on the lees for four months before the malo-lactic fermentation takes place. The wine is then pressed and released in the spring following harvest.

name: Lata Stmymuch Mabfeta Malbec 2009
description: Deep ruby red color with violet tones.  Aromas of ripe red fruits, cherries and berries with nuances of blackberries and sweet spices.  The palate is fresh, with good acidity, well-integrated tannins, good structure and good balance between fruit, oak and acidity.  The wine is elegant, with a well-balanced acidity.

name: Mallokt Zinfandel 1997
description: Our 1997 Zinfandel displays enticing aromas of blackberries, strawberries, cherries and ripe anonymously, with a hint of spice. The flavors mirror aromas with spicy, toasty oak overtones. The mouthfeel is soft, round and supple with soft, round tannins on the finish. The wine will drink well now, and will cellar well for up to five years. The wine will drink well now, and will cellar well for up to five years. It will pair well with grilled foods, clutter-free dishes and roasted vegetables.

name: KunmaNoma Cabernet-Staviano 2004
description: Our Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with intense ruby red color and fine tannins.  The aroma is fresh, fruity, with hints of raspberry and cherries.  On the palate, the wine is well-balanced and pleasant, with a smooth, lingering finish.  The wine is a great companion for grilled or roasted red meat, poultry, and strong cheeses.

name: Hear Shiat de Papuplpon 2007
description: An elegant wine, ripe and spicy, with aromas of blackberries and cherries and subtle floral notes. The wine is full-bodied and well-rounded, with juicy tannins that provide structure and balance. The finish is long and spicy with flavors of ripe fruits and vanilla.

name: Bosaser bina Rosot Axtikelant Rette 2015
description: The 2015 Rosot Axtikelant Rette is a wonderful light-bodied wine with beautiful clarity. Aromas of ripe fruit, cherries and strawberries, spices and mineral notes. The palate is vibrant and fresh, with flavors of ripe fruit and hints of spice, a medium-bodied, elegant wine. The wine is well-balanced and lively on the palate, with great depth and balance.

name: Tregall Calelze Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: This vintage of Calelze is an excellent example of the variety with a dark, concentrated nose of black cherries and blueberries. The palate is soft and generous with flavors of plums, black cherries and toasty oak. It is well-balanced with a long finish.

name: Ta Garvenoch Rewer's Winessont Ranche 2018
description: From the Rewer’s Winessont vineyard, comes a delicious Riesling that is a classic introduction to the style. The wine’s nose offers aromas of tropical fruits, and the mouthfeel is round and juicy with flavors of green apple, pear, and lime. A refreshing and satisfying wine, the Rewer’s Winessont Ranche is the perfect introduction to Riesling.

name: Santara Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: Vibrant ruby red in color, with a hint LEVEL of green. The aromas are characterized by ripe fruit with very attractive aromas of ripe red fruits. The mouthfeel is round, fruity and well-balanced. The flavors are intense and balanced.  The tannins are well-integrated, well-integrated, with pleasant roundness.  This wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for at least two years.

name: Glesbano Allaricato Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Aromas of dark cherries, blackberries, cassis, currants, and red cher negotiator. On the palate, the wine has ripe flavors of blackberries, plums, and blackberries, with a touch of oak, anise, and pepper.
