A velvety, supple tannins and balanced acidity balance the long, warm days and cool nights in the vineyards. The wine will continue to improve over the next 3 to 5 years and age well for up to 10 years.

name: Catere Wines Mountain Cabernet Fothand 2012
description: This is a complex wine with a bouquet of ripe red fruits, dark cherries, cocoa and toast. The palate is plush with flavors of raspberry, red currants and blueberries. The tannins are soft and round, but not too big. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with soft, sweet tannins. The finish is long with balanced acidity and lingering flavors of ripe fruit and spices. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 3-4 years.

name: Antozsbang Lesepafeg Blend 2013
description: The name “Lesepafégés”, in Pfalz, is the local name for a single vineyard. The wine is a blend of the traditional varieties of the Pfalz region, namely the more intensely flavored white wine varieties of the Viognier and the wine-producing area of the Pfalz. The wine is made from the classic varieties of the Pfalz region, like Chardonnay, Chenin Blanc, and Viognier. The wine is well-balanced with a good acidity. The wine is then aged in French oak barriques for eight months before being bottled.

name: Clig Pera Etanio Estate Sereelly Chardonnay 1998
description: The wine has a great combination of aroma and flavor. The bouquet is intense, with a touch of vanilla and vanilla from the barrel, and fruity notes of ripe tropical fruits, citrus and pineapple. On the palate the wine is medium-bodied, fresh and well-balanced. It is well-suited for casual consumption and is a perfect accompaniment for grilled fish, shellfish, seafood, cream based sauces, cheeses, fruit-based pasta dishes and Asian foods.

name: La Velley Valley Cabernet Sauvivignen 1999
description: The 1999 La Velley Valley Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of currants, black cherries and blackberries. The mouth feel is full and well-rounded, with nice round tannins and good acidity. The finish is long and persistent, with soft, sweet tannins. The wine will continue to improve and gain complexity for the next 5-8 years.

name: Cade Valley Brord lannet-Badote Velley Pinot Noir 2015
description: Zarra Creek Estate Pinot Noir 2015 [response] This elegant wine is a classic Oregon expression of the varietal. A collapsing red color, vibrant aromas of cherries, strawberries, raspberries and blackberries, and fresh earth, and floral notes of rose petals, violet and lavender. A delicate palate of fresh raspberry, strawberry, cherry, raspberry, and black currant with a hint of spice. Fresh, medium bodied, and juicy, the mouth feel is mouthwatering, fresh and juicy, and generous with acidity. The finish is long and fresh with lingering tannins and a long fruity aftertaste.

name: Lavedten Cellars Geal Familla Sellariembacon Pinot Noir 2013
origin: Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: This Pinot Noir offers aromas of cherry, raspberry, cranberry, and ripe strawberry with hints of anise and spice. The palate is soft and generous with flavors of cherry, cranberry, and sweet oak. The mid-palate is soft with nice weight and round tannins. This is a full bodied wine with a lingering finish. Pair this wine with grilled tuna, grilled swordfish, or grilled chicken and veal with a spicy ginger-cinnamon sauce.

name: Hovello Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: The 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Cabernet Franc from our estate vineyard is a lush heavily extracted wine with delicious aromas of cherry, blackberries, currants, and plum, accented by hints of licorice and toasty oak. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe, sweet fruit flavors. The mouthfeel is full and juicy with flavors of blackberry and plum and ripe tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of oak, spice and caramel. This wine is an excellent companion for grilled and roasted meats, roast chicken, roasted vegetables aim and cheeses.  The wine is also an excellent accompaniment to Italian foods, especially roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables and roasted tomatoes.

name: Kirbang Noir Zinfandel 2017
description: Sierra Foothill’s Amador County Zinfandel is a medium-bodied wine with rich flavors of strawberry, cherries and ripe raspberry with a hint of floral notes. This wine has balanced acidity and a smooth, soft, lingering finish.

name: Berlot Veglis Villages Cuvee Pinot Noir 2002
description: Veglis is a blend of three vineyards located in the southern Willamette Valley of Oregon.  The vines are planted in soils of fine-grained, well-drained volcanic ash with some gravel and limestone.  The grapes are harvested by hand in late September.  The juice is then cold-fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks.  The wine is then aged in French oak barrels for eight months.  This is a complex wine with notes of black cherry, vanilla, and cedar.  The finish is soft and supple with lingering tannins.  This wine will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years.  It is an excellent companion to roasted vegetables, roasted poultry, and pork dishes.

name: Poszes Peaglun Russion Riesling 2015
description: Perfect as an aperitif, it is also a versatile food companion. Serve as an aperitif, and with shellfish, poultry, seafood, veal, and pork dishes.  of the Riesling and adds a nice acidity and freshness to the finish. Serve well-chilled. Serve slightly chilled. Serve at about 12-15 °C.

name: Barton Lino Amyret Staas Ro Mal Brun Chardonnayo Chardonnay 1999
description: This wine has a bright, golden straw color and aromas of sweet pear, honey and vanilla with notes of toasty oak.  The flavors mirror aromas with sweet, ripe pear, Heldriven apple, and sweet, warm spices.  The mouthfeel is full and rich with flavors of apple and pear, accompanied by mineral and toastiness.  The wine finishes long with a well-balanced acidity and long, round, and rich texture.

name: Yerral Estate los Pinot Noir 2013
description: The 2013 Los Pinot Noir is deep garnet in color with vibrant purple hues. The wine opens with intense aromas of ripe cherries and spices with floral notes and a hint of violet. The palate is full of sweet fruit, with hints of cherry and redcurrant, together with rich, sweet, rich, round tannins. The wine is well-balanced, mouth-filling and well-structured with a lingering finish. The acidity is bright and refreshing, but balanced with a subtle sweetness of the fruit and oak. The wine has great intensity and intensity of flavor with a strong mineral component. This is a lovely wine that can be consumed now, and will cellar well for up to 10 years.

name: Chateau Premier Estoon Vignes Cotee de Olde Colt Colmra Classino d'Ascies Cuve 1999
description: The name of the wine derives from the fact that the vines are grown in the area of the ancient vineyards, the Colmarrha, of which the name Vignes Cotee de Olde Colt, meaning Our Old Wine, refers to the name of the winery, located in the ancient village of Colmarrha.  The name Cuvée Colt is a reference to the name of the owner, Colmarrha, of the area.  It is a very good match for grilled meat, particularly with roasted or grilled fish, grilled vegetablesourses with roasted tomatoes, dishes that feature cheese, particularly fresh cheeses.

name: Greavenig Barilan Valloy 2016
description: An elegant, fruity wine with aromas of red fruit, spice and toasted notes. The mouthfeel is smooth, with rich, juicy flavors of cherries and raspberries. Well-rounded and smooth tannins and flavors of vanilla and tobacco, which are followed by a lingering finish.

name: Domaine ofenor Margy Chardonnay 2002
description: Vibrant aromas of toasted oak, pear, honey, toasted nuts, hazelnut, and vanilla. On the palate the wine is rich, round and soft with ripe fruit flavors, with bright acidity, and toasty oak flavors.,

name: Chateau Storraney-Chabiauneu 2015
description: Light gold in color, this wine opens with a nose of floral and citrus blossom aromas. The mouthfeel is soft and creamy with flavors of lemon zest, grapefruit, kiwi, and green apple with a slight mineral component. The finish is well-balanced and refreshing with lingering flavors of lemon zest, lime, and mineral.

name: Wrickank Olidge Estee bakon Oakmesse 2017
description: The 2017 Olidge Estee bakon is a deep garnet color with vibrant hues. The nose presents aromas of red fruits, cherry, raspberry and blueberry, followed by sweet spicy oak. The mouthfeel is soft and round with round, round, sweet and juicy tannins. The wine shows vibrant acidity on the finish. The palate is fresh and juicy with juicy flavors of red fruits, cherry and plum, supported by hints of toasty oak and toasty, spicy oak. The tannins are soft and velvety, providing good structure and balance. The wine shows a good balance between fruit and oak, which is well-integrated into the mouthfeel and structure of the wine.

name: Parave Droves Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: This is a classic Cabernet with a bouquet of fresh black cherries, cassis, violets, and sweet vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of earthiness, spices, and sweet oak. The tannins are velvety and supple, and the finish is long and pleasant. The 2005 vintage produced a very elegant and balanced wine.

name: Sadfer Grynerut Paroma Pinot Noir 2014
description: Dark garnet in color with a ruby hue, the 2014 vintage opens with aromas of cherry, strawberry, and red currants with a hint of earthiness. Flavors mirror aromas with ripe, bright flavors of strawberry, cherry, and cherries. The finish is soft and round with a hint of spice.

name: Yalumbo Aireore And's Tarre Vineyard Chardonnay 2013
description: Aromas of honey, Op tribute, toast, brioche, butter, citrus and creamy toasted notes. On the palate, flavors of tropical fruits, pineapple, citrus, and sweet cream. This is a bright wine with bright acidity and flavors of white flowers, lees, and vanilla. This is a very approachable wine with mouth-coating tannins and long finish.

name: Tirenzy Hird Sonourit Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 Hird Sonour Pinot Noir opens with a vibrant nose of black cherry, blackberry and sweet oak. The palate opens with vibrant flavors of blackberry, raspberry and cherry. The mouthfeel is soft, round and generous, with well-integrated tannins and a long, bright finish.

name: Giry Soneekons Montese Nutich Chardonnay 1999
description: Bright yellow-green in color, with brilliant clarity. The nose is typical of the varietal with pear and almond aromas, with light floral tones.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with excellent volume and good acidity.  The finish is long with good balance between fruit sweetness and acidity.  The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for up411 days.  rapidly drinking and pleasant, yet with good aging potential.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Trestopk Hilchabpenoss Rhabing Chardonnay 2000
description: The wine is a medium straw colour with a vibrant straw tinge. The nose displays intense floral aromas with an underlying peach and tropical fruit flavour. The palate is well-balanced with ripe fruit flavours and soft, well-integrated oak on the finish. The wine has excellent structure, weight and length of flavour. It will improve in the bottle for at least two years, but is a great companion for rich, creamy pasta dishes and fish dishes. The wine can be enjoyed now and will cellar well for at least five years. Serve slightly chilled.

name: Vingninoriti Noprolie Dusados AltaMora di Valley Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: The AltaMora di Valley is a very pleasant wine with great aromatic intensity.   The wine is rich, well-rounded, full-flavored and full of flavor. itates well with all fish dishes.  Serve well chilled and enjoy with a fresh glass of wine.  Ideal with fresh, young cheeses.

name: Kent & Rach Pinot Noir 2002
description: The Willamette Valley is consistently recognized as one of the premier growing regions in the world for Pinot Noir.  The vibrant acidity of the vineyards, particularly in the Wairau Valley, is well-balanced by ripe fruit flavors, well-integrated tannins and soft, ripe tannins on the finish.  The resulting wine is medium-bodied, with a bouquet of cherry and blackberry.  It is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Artestient-Santa Kedinebole 2007
description: The 2007 vintage was a long and 1907 growing season with a small crop and low yields. The result was a very balanced and elegant wine with fine grainy tannins and good acidity. The blend of 60% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 10% Malbec is blended from the vineyards in the Oakville and Oakville Hills suppose to achieve a classicient style wine with rich fruit and spice aromas and flavors. The wine is a good match for grilled and roasted meats such as beef, lamb, and lamb stew.

name: Soboeuf Bask Killoveses Merlot 1999
description: Aromas of spicy and spicy oak with an attractive minty, black cherry aroma. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with good acidity and balanced by the soft, sweet tannins. The finish is long, pleasant and pleasing.  and

name: Challi Whit Estate Dolluss Trenter Vineyard Zinfandel 2018
description: This wine displays bright aromas of raspberry and cranberry, with hints of orange blossom, and lavender. The entry on the palate is soft, with flavors of red fruits, such as strawberry and raspberry, complemented by bright acidity and a lingering finish. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with nice round tannins and good length. The overall impression is a wine that is approachable now, yet will cellar well for 3-5 years. This wine will pair well with roasted and grilled foods.

name: Ca'Eslockofa Detstone Chardonnay 2012
description: Aromas of tropical fruits with floral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with green apple and stone fruit flavors, balanced by rich flavors of pear, sweet caramel and vanilla. The wine is medium-bodied with mouth-coating acidity, round with balanced acidity, good texture and long finish. It is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: ALgerly Hills Oreve Califere Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: The 1998 Oreve is a medium bodied, complex wine with a bouquet of blackberry, cassis, and cedar. The flavor profile features black cherry, currants, vanilla, and coffee. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with well-integrated tannins and a finish of roasted coffee. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 4 to 5 years. Enjoy this wine now through 2009.

name: Rabliberg Pronos Cabernet Sauvignon (OU Kosher) 2009
description: This wine is a blend of grapes grown on the estate vineyards and also from selected vineyards of growers who are located in the villages of Tzofiel and Eleney.  The wine is produced from grapes grown in the vineyards of the vineyards, in the vineyards of the wine growers, in the vineyards of the winery, in the vineyards of the cellars and in the restaurants.

name: Lesciamol Roud Pinot Noir 2008
description: The 2008 Roud is a deep ruby red in color with a hint of purple. The nose offers aromas of red fruit, sweet spices and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is smooth and rich, with round, soft tannins and balanced acidity. The finish is long and lingering, with sweet oak flavors. The wine has a wonderful balance between fruit Borealis and acidity, and will age well for the next 3 to 4 years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar for up to 5 years.

name: Casteral Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is a beautiful garnet in color with a complex nose of cherry, vanilla, and anise, followed by aromas of cherry, cocoa, and sweet oak. The wine is very well-balanced on the palate with rich, round tannins that lead into flavors of black cherry, red currant, and plum. This wine is elegant with a lingering finish of spice and oak. Enjoy now through 2022.

name: Taynean Coakon Reeread A Seleca Nossiare 2009
description: Deep ruby red color. Complex aromas of red fruits with toasty tones and spices.  On the palate it is a well-balanced wine with good body, round tannins and a long finish.  Pair with pasta dishes with red sauces, grilled vegetables, poultry, and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes.

name: Pacca astar Carnero 2016
description: The 2016 vintage of Ast Carneros is a blend of Carneros’s estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Syrah, and Sangiovese grapes. The result is a deeply colored wine with intense aromatics of blackberries, black cherries, and vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with fresh, vibrant acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with lingering flavors of vanilla and cocoa.

name: Borrangito Tembacure 2004
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  Tembacure is an easy drinking wine that is very versatile. The wine is particularly well-suited to Mediterranean foods, particularly grilled Mediterranean foods, smoked fish, hypocrites, smoked meats and game.  Serve at a temperature of around 60-64 degrees F.

name: Pissolottina Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: Pale garnet with ripe, good color and an intense bouquet, with a touch of oak and vanilla. On the palate, it is soft and well-rounded with good structure. The finish is pleasant and long, with balanced acidity. It is an excellent match for grilled or grilled foods.

name: Pallingai Meulo VheAlla Trora Meulos du 2016
description: The name Meulo VheAlla is derived from the combination of three varieties. The grapes are produced in the village of Lujan, on the slopes of the Mt. Konc. The soil is similar to that of the wine-growing area: very high-quality volcanic rock, pebbles and gravel. The grapes are grown in small bins, harvested at optimum maturity, and vinified in the traditional Neusiedler’s cellars. The wine is aged in French oak casks for three months, followed by one-year-old barriques and 1-year-old bottled. Meulo VheAlla is a wine that can be paired with food, with the complexity of the flavors and aromas offset by the relatively high acidity. The wine is also an excellent companion to Mediterranean foods and with dishes that feature Mediterranean herbs, such as black pepper, cloves, blackberries and black cherries. Serve at a temperature of 28-30 degrees F. insultingly decanting or it will improve in the cellar for two years.

name: La Camel Pinot Noir 2018
description: This wine is the perfect match for grilled fish in a cream sauce, especially Northwest Salmon, crab cakes, and grilled vegetables. Serve at room temperature, and pair with roasted tomatoes and roasted vegetables. This wine’s complexity is evident in the flavors that it expresses. This wine has aromas of raspberry and cherry with notes of cherry, rhubarb and black pepper. The palate has bright acidity with flavors of red fruits, cranberries, and strawberries. This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to two years.

name: Gulaxur Valley Chardonnay 2014
description: Pale straw in color with a green tinge, the wine offers aromas of green apple, citrus, pear, papaya, lime and pear with some oak notes. The wine is fresh, soft and elegant with flavors of citrus, peach, and vanilla. The flavorsGsamlet stone and toast on the palate with a mineral and mineral-driven acidity. The mouthfeel is creamy with ripe, full-bodied flavors and good balance between sweetness and freshness. The overall impression is balanced, well-balanced and soft, with a long, pleasing finish.

name: Coloma Compiania Elai Valla Criano Barbarino Sanca 1998
description: Our 1998 Elai Valla Criano is a blend of 50% Grenache and 50% Syrah from estate vineyards in the cool, coastal region of Paso Robles, with the remainder coming from vineyards in the warmer part of Paso Robles. This wine has a lively, clear ruby color with a hint of orange and purple, and arom comprehensive flavors of raspberry and black cherry with a hint of pepper.  It is full-bodied with a pleasant, round mouthfeel, good balance of sweetness and acidity, and a smooth, lingering finish.  It is an excellent companion for grilled fish, roasted vegetables, roasted vegetables, white meats and cheese.

name: Dua Sin Pelpelachli Chardonnay
description: This is a wine that is classic in the sense that it is refreshing and easy to drink. The aromas are complex, but also elegant and fresh. The wine is medium-bodied, with well-balanced acidity, but also a very long finish. The flavors mirror aromas with ripe, rich fruit and floral tones, and a hint of toastiness.

name: Gepanue Postigno 2010
description: Intense ruby red with violet tinges. Very intense bouquet, with intense aromas of cherry, red fruit, spices, minerals, herbs and vanilla. Rich and velvety on the palate, with well-integrated tannins and a long, harmonious finish.

name: Ramy Gapassanph Cabernet Shiraz 2008
description: The wine has a deep red-purple color with hints of garnet. The nose offers a wide range of aromas including ripe fruit, floral and spicy elements. On the palate, the wine is soft, rich and well-balanced with ripe and spicy flavors. The wine is well-balanced with round and soft tannins, which give the wine a pleasant finish. The wine can be aged for 2- 3 years.

name: Buide Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: Crisp, refreshing, medium-bodied, with flavors of tropical fruit, citrus and mineral notes, well-balanced by a pleasant touch of oak, leading to a long, clean, fresh finish.  Serve well-chilled.    Serve with fresh seafood, salads, seafood-based sauces, Asian foods, especially those dishes with curries, Asian dishes with ginger and ginger-spices, as well as fresh, spicy Asian foods.

name: Kentallo Sauvignon Blanc 2002
description: Our 1999 Sauvignon Blanc has a bright, clear yellow color with light green tints. Aromas of citrus and tropical conscience are evident.  A clean, refreshing wine with flavors of lemon, grapefruit, and grapefruit flavors, with a crisp acidity and minerality.  It is very approachable and drinkable now, but will cellar well for up to three years.  We suggest matching this wine's fresh fruitiness with seafood dishes, especially with shellfish, grilled fish and chicken.

name: Brancis Moine Sirfurpino 2013
description: Deep ruby red with violet tones. The nose offers floral aromas with mineral, violet attributed by the variety of soil. In the mouth it is warm and soft, with pleasant fresh flavors and soft tannins. This is a well-balanced wine with a long finish.  blend: 40% Nero d'Avola, 40% Brunello di Montalcino, 30% Tre Vigne, 30% Malvasia

name: Amano Rocha Yerdoren 2014
description: Bright pale gold. Ripe peach, pineapple and lemon zest aromas are accented by sweet oak and spice. The juicy mouthfeel is well-rounded with flavors of stone fruit and pear, followed by a crisp acidity and well-integrated oak on the finish. The fruit flavors and crisp acidity will be an excellent companion for grilled fish, shellfish with shellfish sauce, prawns, lobster, crab and shellfish with creamy sauces.

name: Tontany Toriewto Coast Chardonnay 2017
description: The wine has aromas of ripe yellow fruits, citrus and white flowers, which are accompanied by hints of toast and vanilla. The palate has rich flavors of ripe fruit with flavors of nutmeg and clove. The palate is soft, supple and well-balanced. The wine has good concentration with a long, lingering finish.

name: QubaJcia Anncza Balbara Crepie 2007
description: Aged for 9 months in small oak barrels. It has an intense ruby-red color with violet tones.  The bouquet is fresh and elegant, with hints of red fruit, such as plums, cherries, blackberries, blackberries, and blackberries with sweet spices.  The taste is medium-bodied, soft, well-rounded and well-structured.  The acidity is good and fresh, with a slightly bitter aftertaste.

name: Thinarats Roule Testaigi 2000
description: This wine has an attractive ruby red color.  The nose offers fresh, ripe fruits with good structure, an interesting, fresh and soft palate.  The freshness of the bouquet is well-balanced by the presence of oak, resulting in a pleasant, harmonious wine. mberry and leathery, with a well-integrated and pleasing finish.  This is a wine of great value.

name: Belrelbocpigis Hirtazte Classion Rose 2012
description: Saga																			 Turbo												Avg

name: Aycicone Alta d'Agina Grunerana di Armarinotte Blancho Merlot 2001
description: This is a fresh wine with a good balance between sweet and fresh tannins.  The nose is complex, full of plum and black cherry fruit aromas, with a mineral and spicy edge.  The mouthfeel is round, with good acidity and smooth, well-balanced tannins.  It has a long and well-rounded finish.  It is an excellent food companion.

name: Aossa Rued Blen Epicilu Meuf Mianta Lowonze Tenga Papustandino 2013
description: Pair with grilled and roasted vegetables, herb-crusted roasted poultry, and wild game birds. Also try this wine with grilled fish, especially those of the Northwest Salmon. Serve at room temperature.

name: Tinta Dorie 2011
description: Intense ruby color with intense aromas of cherries and violets.  It has a soft, smooth, well-balanced palate with round tannins and a fresh acidity.   drinkable now, this wine will cellar well for 2 to 3 years.

name: Domaine Diad Badorne Cotes de Rothen Reserva Cauveol Tlendin Pinot Noirs 2000
description: A wine of elegant aromas with an intense, clean bouquet.  The nose is complex and intense, with dismal touches of leather, truffles, spices, leather, and vanilla.  On the palate, the wine is smooth, smooth and well-rounded, with good body and concentration.  Its balance is extremely good, showing good fruitiness profiling with good complexity.

name: Callatu Cuvente Alara Rosona 2003
description: This wine is a classic example of the variety. The aroma has ripe, intense aromas of strawberries and cherries, and hints of toast and spices. The mouthfeel is rich and juicy, with supple, well-balanced tannins. The flavors mirror aromas with strawberry and Differences between the varietals are apparentusat the finish. Our favorite companionPost-Vintners: This is a delicious match with grilled foods, roasted vegetables and pasta with cream sauce.

name: Restole Chardonnay 2018
description: Light yellow in color with greenish reflections, this Chardonnay offers aromas of pear, peach and honey. On the palate, it is soft, round and well-balanced with flavors of tropical fruits, pineapple and pear.   and has an excellent acidity, well-balanced by sweet-ripe, round and full-flavored.

name: Kinett Serace Clardso Tresitie Vineyard Syrah Cratk Syrah 2017
description: Deep purple with red hues, the 2017 Tresitie Vineyard Syrah Cratk Syrah unbeaten with wild flowers and white pepper aromas. A full flavored palate with black fruits and plum, savory, meaty flavors with a hint of mineral and soft tannins. The finish is long and sweet, with lingering notes of mineral and spicy oak.

name: Triaborz Dra CaSte Tamrianuer Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: This wine is ruby red in color with a pleasing aroma of black cherries. It has a good balance between sweetness and roundness with a slight acidity on the finish. The aromas are of ripe red and black fruit. It attributed to the perfect harvest conditions.

name: Richunts Marloca Whitel 2014
description: Vibrant and bright color with greenish tones. Very attractive with citrus notes such as lime and grapefruit, well balanced by delicate floral tones. Elegant and crisp, with delicate flavors of white peach, melon and citrus. It has a fresh and round mouthfeel. Serve well-chilled and slightly chilled.  primer

name: Wilfa Merlot Blend 2004
description: The wine is dark ruby in color with an aroma of red and black fruit. The flavor has black cherry and currant fruit with a touch of toastiness. The mouthfeel is full and round with a soft, round mouthfeel and flavors of currants and black cherries. This wine is well-balanced, with soft, round tannins.  The finish is long and pleasing, with a lingering touch of spice.  The wine is a good match for grilled or lightly smoked foods.  Serve at a temperature of about 60 degrees F.  Serve with your favorite meat dishes or your favorite pasta dish.   Serve at a temperature of about 64 degrees F.

name: Styestan Winery Hallius Dinrumbeld Prianote Pinot Noir 2014
description: Pale ruby in color with a bright edge, the 2014 Hallius D’Numenote has aromas of fresh cherries, strawberries, strawberries, strawberries, raspberries, cherries, strawberries, and raspberries. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced with bright acidity and soft, round tannins. The palate opens with flavors of strawberry, raspberry, and raspberry followed by flavors of toasted bread and spice. This wine is well-balanced with ripe acidity, nice acidity, good acidity, and a lingering finish.

name: Akerrond Shiraz Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: A vibrant wine with a deep ruby 1050, this wine has lifted aromas of red fruits, plum, blueberries, blackberries, spice and toasted oak. A vibrant wine with vibrant red fruits, plum, blueberries, blackberries, spice and toast. The mouth feel is medium to full bodied with juicy fruit flavors, balanced by soft tannins and a lingering finish.

name: Ro Sidch Vineyard Carato Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: The 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon Carato is a wine of complexity and great value. This is a wine that shows intense aromas of black currant, dried herbs, vanilla, tobacco, and a touch of cedar. The flavors mirror aromas with black currant, blackberry, laundering cherries, dried herbs, and cinnamon. This is a full bodied wine with soft, round tannins, well-balanced acidity, and a long, lingering finish.

name: Leyen Papas Graneco  1996
description: Deep ruby in color with bright hints of purple.  Complex and elegant bouquet with ripe fruit and sweet oak.  Fresh and well-balanced wine with sweet tannins and a long finish.  A wine to enjoy with grilled fish and meat dishes.   winegrower-partners Rob Mondavi, James Halliday, and Robert Mondavi Winery Pinot Noir 1998

name: Follayward Th. Bitzeado Suina Serela Vineyard Doone 2007
description: The wine is an intense, ruby red color with aromas of cherry, chocolate, and vanilla. On the palate the wine is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years. The flavors mirror aromas with sweet fruit and vanilla, and the mouth feel is round and full. The finish is long, lingering, and smooth with well-balanced tannins and fruit sweetness. The tannins are firm but supple and the wine is ready to drink now and Traffic well now, but will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years. The wine is an excellent food companion and will complement Mediterranean, Mediterranean foods with rich sauces, and roasted vegetables.

name: Todreans Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: Todreans 2010 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with a classic nose of black cherry, tobacco and chocolate. On the palate, this wine is generous with ripe fruit flavors of cherry, currant, and blueberry with supple tannins, sweet spice, and a hint of earthiness. The finish is long with bright acidity and a touch of mineral and spice. This wine will continue to improve over the next 4-5 years. The tannins are well-integrated and balanced. Our Estate Cabernet will continue to improve for 3-5 years and will cellar well for at least 10 years.

name: Conatiti D Varalla Zinfandel 2000
description: The fruit was sourced from the most outstanding vineyards in the appellation, including the estate vineyards in Amador and Paso Robles.  It was fermented in stainless steel tanks and then aged in French and American oak barrels for 22 months.  The result is a wine of great balance between sweet, rich fruit flavors, well-integrated oak and spice.  The mouthfeel is generous and round with ripe fruit flavors of black cherries, blueberries and sweet spice.  The finish is long, with round, soft tannins.  This wine will pair well with roasted and grilled fish and shellfish in cream sauce, as well as lighter-style dishes with rich sauces and cheeses.

name: Granchika Creek Syrah 2004
description: A perfect match for grilled fish dishes, especially Northwest Salmon, roasted vegetables, veal, poultry, pork and even grilled meat dishes with mushrooms and vegetables.  Serve well-chilled. .  of   of ,

name: Willa Sph Chardonnay 2013
description: This wine exhibits aromas of tropical fruit, citrus, and hazelnut, along with fresh and sweet butter, vanilla and nutty toast. Flavors mirror aromas with bright flavors of grapefruit and fresh tangerine, and flavors of ripe tropical fruits, ripe pear and lychee. This wine has a rich mouthfeel with refreshing acidity, which gives it graham-like balance and lingering finish. The acidity is balanced by mouthwatering, juicy, round and full body with a bright finish. Enjoy this wine as an aperitif or as a complement to a wide variety of foods including cream-based sauces, sushi and sushi on the grill, or grilled fresh seafood.

name: Bradiar Charbernan 2014
description: Brilliant, light yellow-green color with hints of green. Aromas of red fruits, cherries, strawberries, and red cherries, with a floral edge. Flavor is rich, full-bodied, fruity, well-balanced and well-balanced. The finish is long, pleasant and refreshing.

name: J. Bayge Sopora Temake Pinote Bouure 2015
description: The 2015 Sopora Temake Pinot Noir is very approachable now. This wine has great aromas of sucking the fruit liths and mineral tones with a touch of violet and black tea. It is a medium-bodied wine with great balance between the sweetness of the tannins and acidity. The mouth feel is soft and round, with a long and fresh finish.

name: Smenwock Cellars Pintaners Bos Chardonnay 2015
description: Intense straw-yellow color. Aromas of tropical fruits, peach and honey, with nuances of spice. On the palate, the wine is full and well-rounded, with ripe fruit flavors and a subtle oak influence. The overall impression is a smooth, soft and well-balanced wine with a long, refreshing finish.

name: Reflec-Nown Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Reflec-Nown Cabernet Sauvignon is a fresh and fruity wine with an aroma of fresh red fruits and licorice. It is a medium bodied wine with medium tannins, a medium acidity and good length. This wine is an excellent match for Mediterranean and Mediterranean-style foods, grilled fish, lamb, veal and roasted vegetables.

Our 2018 Willamette Valley Pinot Noir opens with aromas of cherries and red cherries with hints of mint and spices. The aromas are complemented by vanilla, chocolate and sweet oak. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with soft, round tannins. The finish is well-balanced and fresh. The wine has bright acidity and good persistence. The finish is long and soft. We suggest matching the aromas and flavors of the aromas with a classic Oregon style: full flavored seafood, grilled fish and pasta dishes with roasted vegetables.

name: Adomiy Winery Sopbery Orrwoy's Esa Gallecte Red Chardonnay 2014
description: With aromas of pear, apple and fresh white flowers, this wine has a mouth-filling body and soft, juicy, well-balanced acidity. Its fruity, round, medium-bodied, and lingering finish make it an excellent food companion.

name: Mancie ek Estato Gragse Grendene Arterns Ruvellinn Pinot Noir 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of this wine is rich and complex, with aromas of blackberries, black cherries, strawberries and a hint of toastiness. The mouthfeel is juicy, yet very soft with fresh acidity and fine-grained, well-integrated tannins. The finish is long with flavors of blackberries and cherries.

name: Thore Reserve Collary-D Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: This 2017 vintage is very much like our 2014, with an abundance of fresh red fruits and spice, leading into the vibrant, fresh flavors of red currants and blackberries, followed by an aroma of floral and cedar. The mouthfeel is generous, with round and juicy tannins that lead to a long finish of acidity and sweet oak. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to 8 years. Enjoy now or cellar for 3-5 years.

name: Elnyb's Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: Elnyb's hospital bed red. Aromas are ripe and sweet, with ripe cherry and currant aromas with hints of anise and black pepper.  The palate has soft, ripe, soft tannins with sweet sweet fruit flavors and a touch of oak.  The wine has great length of flavor with the soft, ripe, sweet tannins and balance acidity NUMEROUS SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:

name: The Barosta Sauvignon Blanc 2003
description: This wine has a very clear, light straw-yellow color.  The nose offers an array of grapefruit and herbal notes, which are confirmed on the palate.  It has a fresh, vibrant acidity, very well-balanced with a good mouthfeel.  The finish is very clean and fresh, with mineral, lime and lemon zest nuances.  It is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for at least 5 years.

name: Gregapolo di MoneaVento Ux Pinotot Noir 2008
description: Vento Ux is a light bodied, elegant wine with aromas of red fruit and floral tones. It is well-balanced with bright acidity, juicy, round, sweet tannins and a lingering finish.    flavors mirror aromas with aromas mirror aromas of fresh red fruits and spices.  The flavors mirror aromas with ripe cherries, strawberries and cranberries and spicy, earthy tones.  It is well-balanced with bright acidity and ripe, soft tannins. name: Singanzelt Sparzadiore Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: It is an elegant wine with an intense ruby red color. On the nose it offers fresh aromas of red fruits with some spicy tones. The palate is rich and fruity, with well-balanced acidity and soft tannins.

name: Boissato La Mote Conce Emi Reserva Mortate Estate Reserva 2015
description: Deep red color with a slight purplish edge. Intense aromas of red and black fruits, red cherries, with floral and spicy notes. Full-bodied, with ripe tannins and a good structure, good acidity and a very long finish.

name: Nena balle 4% Sulewa Vineyard Chureaune 2015
description: The 2015 vintage was warm and dry, which gave the grapes perfect growing conditions for growing flavorful grapes. This vintage is a blend of the three grape varieties that we produce. The wine shows aromas of strawberry, cherry and raspberry with a hint of caramel. The flavors mirror aromas with strawberry and cherry with hints of toastiness and caramel. The tannins are silky and round. The wine is a perfect match for a grilled and toasted poultry chop or a spicy Mexican pizza.

name: Chateau Cantil Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: An intense ruby red color with purple tones, this wine offers aFeatured aroma profile of black fruits with a touch of cedar and spices, balanced by round, fresh tannins. The mouthfeel is full, with rich flavors of black cherries, blackberries and plums, and a touch of mineral notes. The wine is elegant and well-balanced with a lingering finish of black pepper and vanilla.

name: Waintta Brothern's Reserve Chardonnay 2011
description: The wine is an attractive, light gold color with greenish tones. The nose is floral, with notes of pear and pineapple. The palate is rich and generous with flavors of white fruits and quince. It is well-balanced with a good acidity and well-integrated oak.

name: Feritroy Lorey Zinfandel 2013
description: The 2013 Lorey Vineyard Zinfandel is a vibrant, vibrant wine. The wine has aromas of raspberry and cherry fruit with sweet floral notes. The palate is rich and sweet with flavors of red fruits, and toasty, vanilla tones. The wine is full-bodied and well-balanced with good acidity. This wine is well-integrated tannins and a round, sweet finish.

name: Postare Chardonnay 2011
description: Aromas of Fuji apple, pear and citrus aromas with sweet caramel and spice. The mouthfeel is soft, round and sweet with flavors of pear, vanilla and vanilla with well-balanced acidity and sweet oak. This wine is medium-bodied with a refreshing, long finish.  The wine is an excellent phenotype																																				Ob

name: Hargamanoak Pinot Noir 2012
description: This wine is dark ruby in color with aromas of black cherry, blackberry, and violet. The mouthfeel is soft, with supple tannins, and the mouth feel is soft and round, with a hint of toastiness on the finish. The wine is approachable now, and will cellar well for the next 5-8 years. Enjoy now through 2025. Serve at cellar temperature.

name: Wa Celerry Chardonnay 2014
description: Pale gold in color with a vibrant green tinge, the wine shows off aromas of pineapple, green apple, kiwi, and sweet butter with mineral notes. The wine shows bright flavors of pineapple, green apple, and citrus, with touches of toasted almond, caramel, and toast. The mouthfeel is juicy and mouth-coating with crisp acidity, balanced by well-integrated French oak.

name: Walla Akter Naha Lay-Rierve 2018
description: Aromas of citrus, tropical fruit and sweet white fruit with floral tones. A good body and good acidity. Light and fresh on the palate with good length. A nice mouthfeel and lingering finish..  vol. 11, Issue 1, 2006

name: Hebintonk Vellagey 2009
description: This classic Bordeaux blend has aromas of fresh cherry, blackberry, vanilla, clove, and baking spices. Flavors mirror aromas with a full mouthfeel and soft, round tannins. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with a finish that lingers on and on. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for at least 5 years. It is a great companion to grilled and roasted foods, as well as lighter meats and roasted vegetables.

name: Vissia Spmella Valmalb Chardonnay 1999
description: Spmella Chardonnay is a bright yellow color with a delicate aroma of toast.  It is very well-balanced in flavor, with toasted and sweet hints of oak.  It is well-structured, fresh and full-bodied, curved by ripe, ripe tannins.  It is a well-rounded, contaminated wine with a lingering aftertaste.

name: Radd Hayn Sume Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Sume Cabernet Sauvignon is a wine with a IGFG, showing great intensity. The aromas of this wine include ripe cherries, blackberries, and plum. The flavors mirror aromas with blueberries, blackberries, and ripe cherries. The tannins are ripe and velvety, with sweet fruit flavors, and a hint of earthiness. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with sweet, ripe tannins that lend to a mouth-coating mouthfeel. The overall impression is round, with balanced acidity that gives this wine a nice acidity. The finish is long and smooth. The 2015 Sume Cabernet Sauvignon will age well meticulously for up to 4 years.

name: Vorpinino Dici Reserva Claisses Pritk Gran 2016
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: Dici Reserva Claisses Pritk Gran is a great companion for Mediterranean and grilled dishes with a strong character.   It is also a good companion for grilled or lightly grilled vegetables and poultry.

name: Frablacria Reste Merlot 2016
description: Straw-colored with bright, clear tones. Aromas of red fruits such as plums, cherries, currants, and strawberries with hints of tobacco and pepper. Soft, round, and well-rounded with soft, round tannins. An easy drinking wine with a pleasant finish.

name: St. Collowwi Colli Carutere Riessanviese 2016
description: The aromatics have an exotic mix of cherries, strawberries and blackberries, along with the spicy qualities of the varietal, fresh earth, graphite and subtle earthiness. The palate is soft and round, with sweet, ripe fruit flavors with good structure. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of roasted coffee, coffee beans, brown sugar and toasty oak, leading to a smooth performace.

name: Remior Blodge Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: This wine has a classic, expressive style. It offers a brilliant straw color with a bright edge. The aromas feature an array of tropical fruit and gooseberry fruits with a hint of gooseberry and citrus. The palate is refreshing and well-balanced with mineral flavors. This wine has a crisp acidity, which provides freshness to the mouthfeel. The finish is long and crisp with lingering flavours of citrus, gooseberry, and mineral.

name: Cay Troma Pinot Noir 2000
description: This wine has aromas of cherries and strawberries with an earthiness and mineral component. The mouth feel is full-bodied and round with round tannins and a long finish. It is a great wine to pair with grilled fish and shellfish.   Serve slightly chilled.  Serve well-chilled.

name: Turas Pinot Noir 2014
description: The 2014 Pinot Noir's deep garnet color is a great match with the wine's Healthcare, fish, poultry, grilled vegetables, light meat and pasta dishes. A true match with veal, chicken and pasta with veal or veal and meat sauce. The wine's excellent value is best appreciated by decanting and allowing to warm in your glass for at least one hour before enjoying it.

name: Jeta Crutain Pinot Gregic Sautino 2007
description: The 2007 Crutain is a classic example of this grape variety. Pale straw color with brilliant clarity, this wine displays aromas of ripe pear, citrus, honeysuckle and honeysuckle with a hint of honey.  A medium-bodied wine with good acidity, this wine displays flavors of ripe pear, peach and apple, with a hint of honey and floral notes. The mouthfeel is rich and creamy, with lingering flavors of melon and spice.

name: Fatta Martolverrare Hurzmin 2011
description: A deep ruby-red color with a black edge.  Aromas are fresh and elegant with notes of ripe fruit, violet, violet and sweet spices.  On the palate it is dry, fruity, pleasant, well-balanced, well-structured, with a persistent finish.

name: Stongiy Sauvignon Blanc 2017
description: The 2017 vintage of Stongiy Sauvignon Blanc offers aromas of citrus, tropical fruit and pear with hints of lychee, papaya, papaya and grapefruit. The mouthfeel is crisp and lively with flavors of grapefruit, gooseberry and fresh citrus. The finish is long and refreshing. The wine has a pleasant acidity, balanced by well-integrated oak, that carries the flavors through the palate.

name: Actanzho Hosson Cabernet/Shiraz 2016
description: A blend of two of the world’s oldest grapes: Merlot and Syrah. The resulting wine is a juicy, drinkable wine with a pleasingly spicy character, and a touch of pepper. The Merlot and Shiraz are grown on the Maal Vineyard, which is planted in the 1880s. The Merlot provides sweetness and texture, while the Shiraz adds structure and spice. The Cabernet Sauvignon adds power and structure, while the Cabernet Franc adds softness and roundness. The blend of these grapes create a wine that is rich and generous with flavor and texture. The wine has a ripe, round, well-balanced fruit profile. The flavors mirror aromas of plum and cherry. The mouthfeel is rich and round, with a lingering finish that is well-balanced and persistent.

name: Aldbbers Red Blend 2017
origin: Columbia Valley, Washington inhabited by The Combine
description: Aromas of fresh strawberries, cherry cola and subtle notes of vanilla and caramel. Flavors mirror aromas with fresh strawberries, cherry cola, cranberry and brown sugar and a hint of caramel. The mouthfeel is round and smooth with soft tannins. The finish is lingering and pleasant with balanced acidity. Serve at a temperature of 57°F (15°C).

name: Hunlaph Estate Fermscater Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 Estate Fermscater Cabernet Sauvignon opens with ripe aromas of red fruit, currants, and red cherries. The wine is bright and lively with flavors of red fruit, with a hint of sweet oak and a hint of black pepper. The mouthfeel is round and supple with flavors of ripe fruit, fresh herb, and sweet toast. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with a lingering finish.

name: Lazucie Thyon Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: This is a wine with a full-bodied mouthfeel, a juicy acidity and a long finish. The wine is a wonderful match for roasted poultry, roasted vegetables, grilled vegetables, grilled vegetables, tomato-based sauces, and cheddar cheese.

name: Z'ransano Familme Famriina C.Cbare Red Reyerve Red
description: A wine with an attractive ruby-red color, with an intense and typical aroma, with hints of cherries, plums, berries, vanilla, and licorice.  This is a full-bodied, balanced, harmonious wine, well-rounded, full of structure, and pleasant with pleasant, round, well-rounded and persistent tannins.

name: Champs Picos ACBlorcies 2009
description: The 2009 AC Jehovah's Vineyard Chardonnay is deep ruby in color with aromas of cherry, pomegranate, plum, and orange zest. The mouthfeel is round and soft with ripe fruit flavors that carry well-integrated oak. The wine finishes with round, soft tannins that will mellow and soften over time.

name: Gridgech Creek Winery Tayrans Vineyard Rurs Vineyard Chardeenau 2014
description: The wine displays a vibrant straw color with vibrant green tones. On the nose, aromas of lemon, pear, and tropical fruit are followed by notes of peach, lemon zest, and honeysuckle. boasted by its intense fruit, this wine is full bodied and bright with a long finish. With mouth-filling mouth feel, the wine is full of flavor, making it a great food companion. The wine displays flavors of ripe peach, lemon, pear and tropical fruit with a hint of minerality on the finish. With refreshing acidity, the wine is well-balanced, refreshing, and well-balanced on the finish.

name: Yarul Woltumieura Bitloto 2016
description: Deep ruby red in color with a hint of violet. The nose is intense, elegant and fruity with a touch of toastiness. The mouth is fresh and lively with good acidity, sweet tannins and ripe fruit flavors.  flavors of black cherries, plums, spices, pepper and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, soft and velvety, pleasant and pleasant. It is well-balanced with good acidity, pleasant tannins, and freshness. The wine is well-integrated with a long and pleasant finish.

name: Icoltilly Toistage Terratti Syrah 2010
description: Vibrant ruby color with violet hues. Aromas of red fruits, blackberries and cherries with a hint of white pepper and violets. It is a full-bodied wine with soft, round tannins. On the palate, it is soft, pleasant, warm and well-balanced. The finish is long and pleasant.

name: Somat Rand Bidge Reserva Secerie 2000
description: This wine is a good match for fine cheeses, particularly those from the region of Piedmont.  As an alternative to a fine Cava, it is an excellent match for game birds, particularly those that are roasted or grilled.  Serve well chilled.  Serve at about 1.5ºC.

name: Linerad Red 2011
description: The wine is an exotic blend of Tempranillo, Garnacha, and Malbec. The wine is named for the Spanish word for sweet wines. The sloping slopes of the winery's vines produce wines that are powerful yet elegant. The winery has chosen carefully selected small parcels of fruit from the best vineyards in the Casablanca region. The resulting wine is medium-bodied, with flavors of blackberries, cherries, and vanilla. A versatile wine that will pair well with grilled meats, hearty pasta dishes, pizza, veal and mild cheese.

name: Yarfan Rnames Ma aly Cellans Chardonnay 1999
description: This classic wine exhibits aromas of apples, pears and citrus, with a hint of hazelnut and spice.  The mouthfeel is round and soft with sweet, round fruit and creamy, creamy texture.  The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of apple, pear, butterscotch and butter.  The wine has good acidity with good balance between sugar and acidity and a lingering finish.

name: Rom Cri Nis Estate Reserva Ranvos Pinot Noir 2000
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  The wine is excellent with grilled and lightly grilled fish and lightly smoked poultry. Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled.  Serve well chilled.  Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled.  Serve well chilled.  Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled.  Serve affiliation:   Winemaker's Select - the wine is 100% Pinot Noir from the finest vineyards in the Casablanca Valley, the best vineyards in the Casablanca Valley.

name: Domeine Lany Vignear 2009
description: This wine is a blend of Carmenere, Carmenere and Carignane fromzsche Vineyards in Chile. Aromas of vanilla, toast, spice, herbs, and ripe fruit. Flavors mirror aromas with subtle hints of chocolate, cherries and red fruit with hints of black pepper, coffee and caramel. A well-balanced wine with smooth, round tannins, round and soft mouthfeel. It is a good companion to grilled meats, grilled vegetables and creamy sauces.

name: Jos Lan La.Hit-Bothel Olmand Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: The 2017 “La Bothel” is an opulent wine with aromas of dark fruit and fresh herbs. The wine is soft, round and balanced on the palate with juicy flavors of blackberry, currant, and licorice, with flavors of dried fruit and herbs on the finish. The finish is long with lingering sweet tannins. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 5 to 10 years.

name: Gregan Soocanes Pehit Bountand Crous Premier Cru 2017
description: The Soocanes is the most powerful vineyard in the appellation. The vines are planted on the limestone soils of the vineyard. It is the most elegant wine of the appellation. It has a great mineral, floral, and citrus character. The wine is round and pleasant to drink.

name: Lamino Bisolierze Cotes du Bernard Critse Branese Resarno 2014
description: This wine is a blend of 60% Grenache, 20% Syrah, 10% Cinsault, and 5% Counoise. The vineyards of the appellation are located in the Côte de Nuits, the Côte de Beaune, and the Côte de Nuits-Vallenay.

name: Chateau Melin Basservo Cotavoun 2003
description: This is a harmonious wine with good color, the typical aromas of ripe fruit, red berries, spices, and vanilla.  The taste is dry, well-balanced and with soft tannins, round and with a pleasant aftertaste.  Excellent with red meats, game, and aged cheeses.  Recommended with pastas.

name: Lapruite Sauvignon Blanc 2010
description: The wine has a fine, light straw-yellow color. The nose offers aromas of grapefruit and gooseberries. It is fresh and medium-bodied with flavors of grapefruit, gooseberries, and citrus. The wine is clean and McCrea-like in style, with a crisp acidity, fresh minerality, and good mouthfeel.

name: Barasse Rivonni Red Blendex Cotpale Blacce Blanc 1996
description: The aroma has the complexity of a blackcurrant with hints of anise, blackberry and tobacco. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of cedar, oak and vanilla. The mouthfeel is full and round with balanced acidity. The finish is long and elegant with supple tannins and well-integrated oak.

name: Midouley Copez Mouttle-MCHargio 2008
description: Our 2008 C Lopez MCHargio is a blend of 88% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% Cabernet Franc, 3% Merlot, 2% Malbec, 1% Malbec from the High Valley vineyards in Napa Valley. We chose the finest lots ofotti and malo-lactic fermentation to create a wine with intensity and flavor. This is a wine of tremendous concentration and complexity. The aromas mirror aromas of dark cherry, cassis, and plum with a touch of toastiness and spice. The mouthfeel is rich, soft, and round with good weight and length. Flavors mirror aromas with concentrated flavors of cherry, cassis, and raspberry and a touch of sweet oak. The finish is soft and generous, with good acidity, well-balanced tannins and a touch of mineral-like elements on the finish. This wine is approachable now, and will cellar well for up to two years.  The 2008 vintage will cellar well for 4-5 years. Enjoy this wine now or cellar for three to five years. The blend is also a blend of the most complex of our estate vineyards blocked in the appellation.    The 2008 vintage we decided to

name: Aubfe Re Wondey Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The 2015 Aubfe Re Wondey Cabernet Sauvignon offers bright aromas of cherry, red and black fruits, and spicy oak. The palate has rich flavors of black cherries, plum, and currants, with hints of spice, coffee and chocolate. It is well-balanced with a juicy, mouthwatering finish.

name: Fermrbern Sauvignon Blanc 2017
description: Light and refreshing, Fermrann's Sauv implies great minerality with lemon aromas. Fresh, with flavors of citrus and mineral notes. Fresh, lively, medium bodied wine with good balance between sweetness and acidity.    aromas of gooseberries and lees.  flavors mirror aromas with a hint of herbs, minerality and well-balanced acidity.  The wine is lively, with a lingering and pleasing finish.

name: Cascall Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: Our 2008 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is full of ripe fruit flavors of blackberry, currant, black cherry and spice.  The flavors mirror aromas with sweet oak aromas and soft tannins.  The mouthfeel is round and soft with well-balanced acidity, lingering fruit flavors and medium to full-bodied tannins.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar busy for up to 3 years.

name: Wyekion Borsano 2012
description: The Borsano is a blend of 60% Tre Vigne and 40% Malvasia grapes from the estate vineyards. The resulting wine is smooth and juicy with ripe, silky tannins, and a hint of mineral. The wine is a perfect match for pasta dishes with red sauces, red meats, roast and roasted vegetables, or roasted vegetables in sauces.

name: deed Creak Bourgon Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
description: The 2016 Creak Chardonnay opens with aromas of fresh baked apple, pear, and pineapple with notes of flinty minerality. The palate is bright with flavors of Fuji apple, pear, and tropical fruits, with a touch of caramel and vanilla. The wine is medium bodied with well-balanced acidity and creamy, round, mouth-coating flavors. The finish is long with refreshing minerality, balanced by fresh acidity.

name: Liuphelle Merlot 2015
description: Vibrant aromas of blackberry, red cherry and plum with hints of vanilla, clove, cinnamon and nutmeg. Flavors mirror aromas with aromas of blackberry, cherry, and blackberry with hints of cocoa powder, toasted oak, vanilla, and oak spice. Full-bodied with sweet and juicy tannins, soft and juicy acidity, medium-to-long finish.

name: Alta Supata Series Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: Deep ruby red in color with attractive and intense aromas of red fruits, cherries, strawberries, currants, and raspberries with aromas of licorice, leather, and spices.  The mouthfeel is soft and supple, with round and rounder tannins and fresh acidity.  The aftertaste is fresh and pleasant, with notes of ripe fruit and sweet spices.

name: Neccion Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Intense red with violet tones, very clean and bright. The nose is intense and pleasant with blackberries, cherries and berries with vanilla, chocolate and licorice. It is round and fresh in the mouth with ripe and round tannins. The finish is long and pleasant with well-balanced acidity.

name: Yalumas Pinot Gris 2000
description: Yalumas Willamette Valley Pinot Gris is a lively wine with lovely aromas of honeysuckle, citrus, and flint.  On the palate the wine is refreshing with flavors of honey, citrus, and floral tones.  This wine is well-balanced with good acidity, with an overall impression of sweetness on the finish.  The wine is a great companion for Asian dishes, especially sushi, Chinese dishes, Vietnamese foods and seafood.

name: Syrahe Red (375ML half-bottl)-Frant 2013
description: An easy drinking wine with good complexity, the Syrah is a perfect match for Mediterranean-style cuisine. Serve at room temperature. Serve at room temperature.  winegrowers' suggestions: A great companion for grilled meats and Mediterranean-style cuisine.   winegrowers' suggestions: A great companion for grilled meats and Mediterranean-style cuisine.

name: d'Esofaread Reserv Estate Celencia Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: The wine has a bright, pale straw color with green hues. The nose offers tropical fruits and citrus notes with hints of grapefruit and gooseberries. The palate is medium-bodied, crisp and refreshing, with flavors of grapefruit, passion fruit and passion fruit, followed by a clean, fresh acidity and a medium-long, refreshing finish.

name: A. Olk Estate Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: Vivid ruby red color with intense aromas of cassis, ripe fruit and spicy oak.  Full bodied, with smooth, round tannins and a long finish.  The best vintages are still very young, so they will benefit from 2-3 years in the cellar and age well for up to 6-8 years.  The best value in wines.

name: Aubbalswato Pinot Grigio 1999
description: A fresh and fruity wine, with pleasant aromas and fruity flavors, it is dry, well-balanced and well-integrated.  Its pleasing bouquet is characterized by floral, fruity and flowery scents, which carry on the palate with a pleasant freshness.

name: Ingal Hirth Brithoun Pinot Noir 2003
description: The Hirth Brithoun is a full-bodied wine with intense fruit, spice and tannin flavors.  The aromas are ripe and juicy with hints of plum, cherry and strawberry with a hint of earthiness.  The flavors mirror aromas with excellent balance between fruit and acidity.  The mouthfeel is soft and silky with flavors of blackberry, cherry, and vanilla, finishing long and round.

name: Dishayne Pano Barolowo Lalo diba Rozalo 2017
description: Lalo diba is a great companion for grilled fish such as Northwest Salmon, Tuna in a light cream sauce, grilled vegetables such as roasted peppers and potatoes, pasta dishes with reduminati tomatoes, pork and veal roasted in black pepper.  with tomatoes and roasted peppers.

name: Cantela Crener Narac Rege Encia Ri Blend 2017
description: Straw yellow color with greenish tones. Complex and elegant bouquet, with aromas of white flowers,peringaging, freshness, complexity and a pleasant touch of minerals. Fresh and pleasant taste, with a pleasant and pleasant persistence., Powerful, well-balanced and well-rounded.

name: Roli & Frypt Coruma Chardonnay 2002
description: Our Coruma Chardonnay is a rich and smooth wine with an aroma of fresh pears and apricots. The flavors mirror aromas with citrus and pear flavors with a hint of vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft and round with a well-balanced acidity that is refreshing and refreshing. The finish is long with lingering flavors of toastiness and fresh hazelnuts. The wine is an excellent companion to seafood, lighter foods, veal, and chicken dishes.

name: Bon Gengascin Chardonnay 2002
description: The 2002 Bon Gengascin Chardonnay is a vibrant wine with vibrant aromas of pear, citrus, and tropical fruits.  A creamy mouthfeel and a creamy mouthfeel with well-balanced acidity.  A very refreshing wine.    with a hint of sweetness and crispness.

name: Rodbert Nedor Gabicel Pinot Noir 2001
description: The wine is a classic Oregon style with good color, richness and length.  The nose opens with rich aromas of red fruits and sweet, sweet, ripe cherries, followed by spicy oak notes.  The mouthfeel is soft and sweet with a good balance between sweetness and acidity.  The finish is well-balanced and well-loved, with lingering flavors of fruit and sweet oak.

name: Kendal La Sparks Hendo Sanena Vineyard Chardonnay 2006
description: The 2006 Hendo is a beautifully balanced wine with flavors of pear, tangerine, and lemon zest with a hint of toasty oak. It has an inviting mouthfeel with a long finish. The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: Lonino Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: The wine shows a deep, intense ruby red color. On the nose, aromas of ripe fruit and sweet spices, complemented by fresh floral notes. On the palate, the wine shows balanced tanninsRelatively high acidity, and an agreeable alcohol level. The wine has a long, soft finish.

name: Molfocht Estate R Bockez Pinot Noir 2001
origin: Willamette Valley, Oregon 759 casesollabelle.deusserliEsprit de Molfocht, meaning mixed spices, is the name of the game in the aroma profile. The nose is very pretty, complex and fragrant, with fruit flavors of strawberry, cherry and cola with a hint of earthiness. The mouthfeel is round and full, with juicy acidity that carries well-rounded fruit into the mouth. The finish is very pleasingly long, fruity and well-balanced. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 5-6 years. It is an excellent companion to grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, and chicken dishes with vegetables, particularly roasted vegetables.

name: Margaadi Ste Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Intense ruby red with violet reflections. The bouquet reveals aromas of ripe fruit and cherries, and hints of toastiness. The taste is full-bodied, round, and velvety, with well-balanced tannins, good acidity, and good length. This wine will continue to improve over the next 2- 3 years.

name: Domaine El Gros Delecot Com Rose 2018
description: The 2017 Com Rose is a lovely, pale pink color with glints of pink. The nose is very floral with aromas of fresh strawberries, watermelon and rose petals. On the palate, it is refreshing, fresh and fruity with great balance between acidity and alcohol. The finish is long and fresh with a delicate touch of sweetness.

name: Tenon Cherlot 2006
description: The color is a deep ruby red.  The aroma is elegant and delicate with hints of ripe fruit, especially blackberryatalie

name: Cros des Dewintadi Campano 2003
description: Deep ruby red in color.  The bouquet is very expressive with aromas of black fruits, plums, cherries, and blackberries.  The flavors mirror aromas with the aromas present in the bouquet.  This wine is well-balanced in the mouth with pleasant tannins that are well integrated with the sweetness of the fruit.  The finish is long with well-integrated oak.

name: FKmindelly Ries Trich Merlot 2006
description: The 2006 Riesling is medium garnet in color with Seriously intense aromas of ripe fruit with blackberry, red cherries, and blueberries. The aromas are also full of spice, mint, mineral, and an edge of earthiness. On the palate the wine is fresh, balanced, well-rounded, and quite well-integrated. It is medium-bodied, with a smooth, sweet tannin texture that carries the fruit flavors through to the finish. The wine has an elegant and medium-long finish. It will cellar well for 5-10 years and can be paired with a wide range of foods including grilled and roasted fish, poultry, pork tenderloin, roasted vegetables, veal chops, pasta with roasted tomatoes and herbs, grilled veal chops, and a classic American cheese. We suggest enjoying this wine with your favorite pasta dishes that feature roasted tomatoes or other roasted vegetables with roasted vegetables. Enjoy this wine now, or cellar it for 2- 3 years.

name: Santa'dara Tosolo Naolaria 2008
description: This is a wine of great character, with intense red-ruby red color, with violet tones. The nose offers an intense bouquet with toasted notes, reminiscent of vanilla, vanilla, cedar, tobacco and cigar box, which are confirmed on the palate. It is round and full bodied, well balanced, full of finesse and good acidity.

name: Aldhesser Santilgune Disch Kesh Estate Britello 1993
description: Disch Kesh Estate is a dry, crisp, fruity white wine.  The aromas are fresh, fragrant and pleasantly aromatic with hints of pear, apple and melon.  The taste is fresh and crisp with pleasing acidity.  The body is round and well-balanced with eldest impressions of the aromas and the wine's excellent balance.  The finish is pleasantly bitter, long and pleasing.

name: Laaneratei Edelba Kertanina 2014
description: Bright ruby red in color with violet hues. Vibrant and fruity with aromas of red fruits, cherry and raspberry with vanilla, tobacco, and mineral overtones. Well-balanced in mouthfeel with pleasant acidity and well-integrated tannins. Fresh, smooth and persistent with long finish.

name: Mackling Cuvee 2016
description: This wine has aromas of blackberry, raspberry, violet, and chocolate with a hint of caramel. The palate is full of flavors of blueberry, red currants, and red cherries with spice, leather, and a hint of pepper. The finish is soft and round with medium tannins that give way to juicy acidity that is balanced by good acidity and roundness. This is a well-balanced wine that is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to 5 years. Serve at room temperature or open at room temperature for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavors.

name: Chateau C Tassones Roumiera Grane Tourzere 2005
description: Carrascal Tourzere is a deep ruby red color. The nose reveals sweet and spicy notes, fresh red fruit with subtle nuances of licorice. The palate is soft, round and well balanced.  The tannins are present and ripe.  The overall impression is a good wine that is drinkable now but will cellar well for a number of years.  The extravagance of this wine makes it an excellent match for Mediterranean-style foods.  In contrast, the earthy flavors and freshness of Touriga Franca provide a more powerful match.   The wine is a great companion to grilled and grilled fish, particularly those fish with tomatoes, black peppers, eggplant and vegetables in sauce.

name: Chateau La Beczal) 2016
description: Aromas of cherry, blackberry, blackberry and plum with fresh floral notes, vanilla and cloves. The mouthfeel is soft and well-rounded with round, well-integrated tannins. The wine has a lingering finish, showing ripe, juicy tannins, balanced acidity and mineral notes.

name: Eriano Cedoravara Valley Pinotibang 2015
description: The 2015 Cedoravara Valley Pinotibang displays a deep red color with violet tones. The wine is very elegant, fruity and well-balanced. It offers fresh aromas of red fruits, blackberries, cherries and blackberries with mineral tones. The palate offers good structure, good structure, ripe and round tannins with pleasant acidity and well-balanced, well-integrated oak. The finish is long, persistent and pleasant.

name: Joseph Druns Son Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: The 2017 Son Whete is a classic expression of the vintage. Dark ruby in color with aromas of cherry, chocolate and currants with a hint of spice. The mouth feel is soft and round with silky, round tannins, with flavors of dark fruit, dark chocolate, caramel, vanilla, toasted oak and caramel. The finish is long with sweet oak, bright acidity, and lingering flavors of black cherry, chocolate, toasty oak, and caramel.

name: Ednes Speegassan Pinot Noir 1999
description: The 1999 Ednes Speegass Estate Pinot Noir is a rich wine with rich aromas of cherries, strawberries, and cherries interwoven with vanilla, vanilla, clove and earthiness. The mouthfeel is soft and supple, with well-rounded, round tannins that provide balance and finesse. The finish is long with toasty oak, vanilla, and toast. The mouth feel is medium bodied with soft, round tannins and acidity that gives the wine good balance. The finish is long and smooth, with lingering flavors of vanilla, toast, and cherries.

name: Wollayig Shaldon Vineyards Pinot Noir 2009
description: The 2009 Gian Wollayig Shaldon VineBlocks is a classic Oregon wine. Dark and concentrated, this wine offers a nose of ripe fruit, minerals, earth, tea leaves, leather, and licorice. The mouth is full and round with flavors of blueberry, blackberry, cherry, and cranberry with nuances of brown sugar, sweet tobaccoFestoon, and toast. The mouth feel is soft, round, and balanced with a long finish. The wine is enjoyable now and will cellar well for the next 3-5 years.

name: Bocker Enta Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: Enta Cabernet Sauvignon is the perfect accompaniment to grilled steak, or a wide variety of lighter meat dishes.   Enjoy with pasta, pizza, roasted vegetables, and with white meats frowning at mild cheeses.  wine.  This wine is made from 100% Cabernet Sauvignon grapes grown in the Casablanca Valley of Chile.

name: Grigfanzhert 2016
description: An intense, deep ruby-red color with a slight garnet hue. Aromas of blackberries, cherries, and red fruits, and spices. On the palate, this wine is rich, supple, well-balanced, and medium-bodied. The flavors mirror aromas with a good structure and firm tannins.

name: Stardina Creek Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Bright aromas of blackberries and cherries with undertones of cocoa and coffee. On the palate, aromas mirror aromas with a touch of chocolate and coffee, which adds to the wine's soft, round mouthfeel and pleasant tannins. The finish is long with bright acidity.

name: Fathorontol Mrehin Pinot Noir 2010
description: This wine has aromas of ripe red cherries, spice and vanilla with hints of mineral. The mouth feel is full bodied with soft tannins and flavors of red fruit, mineral and earthiness. The finish is long with lingering flavors of spices and pepper. This is a wine that will age well for 4 to Cuban years.

name: Blusamera Beakoge de Bogolfertini 2013
description: The 2013 vintage is the most attractive vintage of Beakoge de Bogolfertini, the wine is a blend of 35% Bricco di S. Tufo, 30% Gavi di Gavi and 30% NegroamPsyl. The grapes are harvested from vineyards in the areas of Palermo, Palermo d'Asti, Barolo, Gavi di Gavi and Negroam Psyl. The wine is aged for 14 months in French oak, 8% new, and the remainder in bottle for 9 months before being released. The wine is ruby-red in color with violet tones. On the nose, the bouquet is concluding with intense fruit aromas of cherries, plums and spices. It is full-bodied with well-balanced acidity, well-rounded tannins, and good acidity in the finish. The wine is well-suited for everyday drinking.

name: Handran Oratina Baria Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: The 2006 Oratina Baria Cabernet is an elegant wine with elegant and intense aromas. The aroma is intense and fruity with balsamic and spicy tones, with a good balance between sweetness and acidity. On the palate it is fresh and pleasant, with a good balance between acidity and alcohol. The tannins are well-integrated and well-balanced, well-integrated in structure and good concentration.

name: Winesquhe Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: The aromas are lifted with black cherry and black currant.  The flavors mirror aromas with black cherry, currants, and blackberries, followed by a hint of nutmeg and earthiness.  The mouthfeel is round and generous with sweet ripe tannins.  The finish is soft and round, with well balanced acidity and lingering flavors of cherry andlisted spices.  This wine will continue to improve for the next 5 to 7 years.  It is an excellent companion for grilled beef tenderloin, lamb stew, lamb or pork roast, and roasted vegetables.

name: Gorena Reserve Chardonno 2014
description: The wine shows great clarity and vibrant gold color with green tones. This is a light-bodied wine with a pleasingly balanced acidity. The aromas are fresh and fruity with citrus, apple, melon and floral notes. Flavors mirror aromas with citrus, apple, pear and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is round with a long, mouthwatering finish. The wine is full-bodied, with excellent acidity and well-balanced residual sugar. This wine will cellar well for the next 5 to 7 years and is a great food companion.

name: Toraztra Am. Turpegles Dagehalbile Pinot Noir 2010
description: Dagehalbile is an ideal match for lighter meals with fresh flavors. This wine will pair well Spielberg shellfish, white fish, and lightly grilled white-meat dishes. lists as an ideal companion for Asian foods. Great companion to salmon, especially those caught from the North Pacific.  Serve well chilled on warm days.  Serve well chilled on warm days.

name: Lowher That Winerre Merlot 1999
description: Our 1999 Merlot has aromas of ripe fruit with an aroma of sweet oak, vanilla, and oak spice.  The flavors mirror aromas with hints of black cherries and a slight mineral component.  The wine is very balanced with soft tannins and a well-balanced acidity.  The mouthfeel is round and well-rounded with good length and flavor.  This wine is a great match for grilled fish, roasted vegetables, pasta with red sauces, and pizza.  It is a great companion to roasted vegetables, chicken dishes with cream sauces, veal and pork roast dishes with roasted tomatoes and grilled vegetables.

name: Conmoin Estatles Sonea Merlot 2000
description: The color is deep, deep ruby red.  The aromas are intense and complex, with an attractive note of cherry.  The flavor is of ripe fruit, with a well-balanced acidity.  The finish is soft and pleasant.  This wine can be served with grilledanks, grilled or lightly roasted fish, veal, lamb, chicken dishes with spicy sauces, grilled vegetables, or a medium-strong cheese such as Camembert.

name: Tirbassd Syrah 2000
description: Aromas of cherry, vanilla and white pepper are present in this medium-bodied wine. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of anise and spice. The wine has soft, round tannins that are nicely balanced by its acidity. This Syrah will continue to improve over the next 5 to 8 years and age well for 2-3 years from its release date.

name: Bargie 1340 Mouglio Alastione 2014
description: Fresh, with intense fruity flavors of mango, pineapple, lychee and white flowers. The texture is soft and round with excellent acidity. The wine is an excellent companion for shellfish in cream sauce, roasted vegetables, sushi, fish dishes with light sauces, grilled fish, and sushi with a sweet or sweetener.

name: Dupacker IVenaud Lab Mondavillon Cuvee La Cot Grenee L'E. 2016
description: The 2016 vintage is a great wine, expressing a great complexity and finesse. The nose reveals the full richness of the terroir with black fruits, chocolate, and liquorice. The mouthfeel is smooth and rounded, with a fruity and spicy finish. The aromas, full of fine, well-integrated tannins, are the proof of the balance between the terroir and the wood.

name: Chateau de ascande Pinot Glosant Bruer 2013
origin: Willamette Valley, Oregon  Laurent and Vincent Romperts Controlled Demibrillage is one of the most compelling experiences a wine can be. The wine is produced by a selection of vineyards in the Willamette Valley to make a wine that is crisp, fresh and easy to drink. The wine is a true example of the wine grape variety. The wine has a lively acidity that provides a refreshing, crisp and refreshing taste. The wine is fermented in stainless steel tanks. The wine is then pressed into stainless steel tanks for cold fermentation and bottled. The wine is ready to drink now Rising and fermenting the wine in the bottle creates a wine that is both refreshing and refreshing on the palate. The wine is best consumed chilled. Serve slightly chilled.

name: Moon Veere & Fitlon Les Rananut 2016
description: This wine has aromas of strawberry and raspberry with a hint of nutmeg and nutty spice. It is round on the palate with flavors of blackberry, cherry, and plum with a hint of caramel and spice. The tannins are soft and well integrated with a hint of toasty oak. The wine finishes with flavors of toasted oak and well-integrated acidity.

name: Domaine de Pinesser Garleneas-Gaukher-Murree 2014
origin: Gevrey-Chambertin, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: The wine is deep ruby red in color with a slight hint of orange. On the nose, there is a bouquet Cups and black fruit. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with round, soft tannins. There is a long, fruity finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to 5 years.

name: Chateau Ste. sins Clos de Lautes Cuvee Pinot Noir 2018
origin: Sta. Rita Hills, Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: A perfect food companion for this wine would be a dish featuring a wild mushroom risotto, or a grilled fish in a cream sauce.   wine

name: Joamak Rean Undana Zinfandel 2014
