description: This vintage is from vineyards situated on the hillsides of the famous “crus”. These sites are on an average of 30-50 years old and the grapes are picked during the cool hours of the evening. The grapes are picked from vineyards in which the grape maturity is average around 6. The wine is aged in French oak for 14 months.

name: Francho Estate Therbarese 1997
description: This full-bodied wine is a wine of great intensity, balance, complexity and length.  A very elegant, fruity, and well-rounded wine with a very distinct aroma.  It is produced from 100% Tempranillo, a grape of great intensity, concentration, and great intensity of aroma.  The grapes are picked from the small vineyard of the same name.  This wine has a very fresh taste, elegant, with a crisp, pleasant finish.  The name of the wine is ‘ Therbere' 08 - “therbere' is Latin for “to the south”.  The name of the wine, Therbère, means “flower of the sun”.  In the glass, the wine is a medium-gold color, with orange-red tones, and a hint of green.  The aroma has a predominance of white fruit, with a touch of herbaceousness.  The mouthfeel is soft, pleasant, with a fruity and persistent finish.  The wine has excellent balance, structure, and balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Bertifn Ranchanores Rouf 2015
description: This wine offers aromas of ripe fruit with an agreeable acidity, with a very good balance between sugar and acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet fruit aromas, round, soft and round tannins, good body and a persistent finish... The wine shows good intensity, a hint of menthol, and a nice balance between sweetness and acidity. The wine is well-balanced with a long finish and sweet flavor.

name: L'Elo Miller's Willame Granch Ranch White Montemle Chardonnay 2014
description: The 2014 Miller’s Willame Vineyard Chardonnay is a medium straw in color. The aromas have tropical fruit and citrus fruit with a touch of mineral and sweet butter. The flavors mirror aromas with some sweetness, balance with the acidity to create a well-balanced, refreshing mouthfeel. This wine is well-balanced with good acidity and a nice lingering finish.

name: Romaili Olp Seleew Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: Lively aromas of currants, blackberries, and blueberries. Flavors mirror aromas with blueberry and blackberry notes with an attractive touch of toasty oak. The mouth feel is soft and silky with rich flavors of ripe fruit, licorice, and spice. The mouth feel is well balanced with good acidity and soft, round tannins. This wine is drinking well now and will cellar well for up to five years. Enjoy with grilled foods, roasted vegetables, roasted vegetables, cheeses, and pasta dishes with grilled vegetables, roasted vegetables, and cheese sauces.

name: Pendar Drouhins Celrar Valley Promute 2016
description: Sauvignon Blanc with the backbone of Petit Verdot. This wine is more ‘Cuvée Franc' than ’Cuvée Bordeaux, as the vines are grown on ‘Les Vignes�matches’. The vines are grown on the hillside of the famous ‘Cuvée des Terres Drouhins’. This wine is well-balanced, supple, and elegant, with great length, intensity, and concentration. A blend of 60% Petit Verdot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Cabernet Franc, 10% Merlot, and 10% Malbec. This wine has great aromatic complexity, a perfect balance between sweetness and freshness, and a silky, fresh finish.

name: Shagna Creglier Gana Vina Oricalo Re Baso Buinma Saleste Roset 2014
description: The wine has an intense ruby red color. On the nose, it is very aromatic with floral tones of violet, cherry and raspberry. In the mouth it is well-balanced with good acidity, sweet tannins, and sweet fruit. It is a very food-friendly wine with good body and freshness.

name: Pesif-Gayer Sonoma Classon Risenva 2006
description: The 2006 Risenva is an elegant wine with great structure and depth. The nose offers aromas of black cherry Summary of aromas, with aromas of cedar, sweet tobacco and mineral components. The mouthfeel is very well-balanced and well-rounded, with flavors of ripe cherry, toasty oak, mineral, and spice with a smooth, velvety finish. The wine will benefit from 5 to 7 years in the cellar and will cellar well for 10 to 12 years. This wine is best paired with grilled steak, rack of lamb, or roasted vegetables.

name: Aacte Rose Rose 2007
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  Perfect with grilled fish, salads, pasta and rice dishes with tomatoes, and Asian foods.   The 2007 Rose of Pinot Noir 2006 [response] Bright ruby color with orange highlights.  Very clean and fresh aromas of red and white pepper.   Fresh and fruity on the Cumming:  Bright acidity with roundness.   Soft and easy-drinking on the palate, with fresh flavors of cherries, strawberries and raspberry.  The flavors follow the aromas with good intensity and freshness.

name: Jacaa Noiti Voulliamiato Reservi Dousse del Atichen 1999
description: Garnet red with intense tones, intense, vivid, with ruby reflections. Aromas are very expressive, fruity and intense with hints of red fruits and berries. It is well-balanced and harmonious on the palate with a good, round structure. A wine with an agreeable and pleasing taste.

name: Maccall Reserve Pinot Noir 2000
description: The wine's aromas of ripe black cherries, blackberries and strawberries dominate with a hint of clove and clove. The mouthfeel is medium bodied, soft, round and mouth filling with ripe tannins, which provide a round mouthfeel and good length of flavor. The wine is excellent with roasted and grilled fish, game birds, poultry, pork, roast vegetables, or with cream sauces.

name: Foigellia Estaa Reserva Montavi Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Deep, intense red with violet tones. The aromas are intense, fruity, and well balanced with round and sweet tannins. A wine that expresses its place in the Colchagua Valley.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: In 2015, Napa Valley’s cool climate grapes were harvested earlier and at lower sugar levels, yielding a wine with greater complexity and weight. The resulting wine is rich with intense flavors of black currant, red cherries, cocoa powder, and blackberries, with a hint of toast and toasted oak. On the palate, the wine has ripe, round tannins, with fresh acidity, and a long finish. This wine is an excellent match for roasted red meat, roasted vegetables, and Mediterranean foods.

name: Charlis-obanR Carnera Tablingwese Reserve Pinot Noir 1999
description: This wine is a big, robust wine, with a spicy, spicy character that is quite seductive. The aromas are powerful and concentrated with rich aromas of black cherry, plum, mineral, tobacco and black pepper. On the palate the wine is full and round with a big mouth-feel. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet ripe flavors of red cherries, plums and spice. The mouth feel is well-balanced with soft, round tannins that will soften and develop in the bottle unfair to those with the patience to cellar this wine.

name: Druvucce Sanoma'iria Chardonnay 2001
description: Dense, golden straw in color.  Sweet, sweet fruit aromas of ripe apples, pears, and tropical fruit.  Medium bodied with buttery flavors of butter and fruitiness.  A pleasing mouthfeel with refreshing acidity.   Light and well-balanced, this wine offers a pleasing, crisp finish.  It is a versatile wine with dishes of all kinds.

name: Sapournie Paigio Malbec 2010
description: Pale and intense red in color.  Aromas of red fruits, such as raspberry, strawberry, cherries and strawberries.  A well-balanced wine, fresh and well-structured.  It has good balance between its fruitiness and sweet tannins.   aromas of ripe red fruits, such as raspberry, strawberry, cherries and blackberries.  A pleasant wine with a long, pleasant and persistent finish.

name: Concith Besse del Amaa Farana Fomenazte 2018
description: The wine is a very pleasant and refreshing aperitif, a perfect accompaniment for pasta, rice dishes, fish, white meats and mild cheese.,  with fresh, ripe fruit, the wine is also a great accompaniment to spicy Asian dishes.  Serve well chilled.   Serve well chilled.

name: Repumey Walley Gronva EPgista Branod Temia Piner Criamy Niot 2007
description: The wine has the classic qualities of the varietals. The aromas offer dark berry and plum, with a hint of spice. The flavors mirror aromas with juicy blackberry and cassis with hints of nutmeg, and cocoa dust. The mouthfeel is round with soft, round tannins, lingering well into the finish. The mouth feel is medium-bodied with medium acidity. The tannins are well-integrated, and the finish is long with lingering mineral and floral tones. The wine will continue to improve over the next 3 to 5 years. Enjoy this wine now through 2022.

name: Chateau Fentamet 2008
description: This is a unique wine. A blend of three varieties, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Syrah. The Merlot adds weight and fruitiness, while the Cabernet Sauvignon adds body and structure. The Syrah gives color and body, and the Cabernet Sauvignon adds roundness, while the Malbec adds an intense, deep color, aromatic intensity, and softness. The wine is medium-bodied, with a round, juicy and soft tannins.

name: Chateau Jacello Chognino 2016
description: Aromas of pear, grapefruit, honeysuckle and spice; with flavors of ripe tropical fruit, mineral, and sweet cream. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with flavors of pear, honey, apple, and mineral, with a lingering, smooth finish.

name: Waatontan Ogu Rebercio 2012
description: Aromas of red fruit, cherries and currants with floral tones. Full body with smooth tannins and a long and fruity finish. Pair with first courses, first courses with a creamy or spicy character, grilled fish, veal, grilled vegetables, roasted vegetables with sauces, roasted vegetables, and pasta with meat sauces.

name: Vieito Bianco Vigne Husciove Syrah 1998
description: This is a big, sweet, soft, velvety wine with a nose that is ripe and spicy with flavors of pepper, plum, and cassis.  suppressed oak and vanilla tones.  Soft tannins are well balanced with sweet fruit.  with a pleasant, lingering finish.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Madoa/Rozola Robascinele (375ML half-bottle) 2015
description: Intense ruby red color with violet tones. Intense, elegant, and fruity on the nose with sweet aromas of red fruits and cherries. On the palate, it is fresh, pleasant, and well-balanced with good volume. Its soft, round, and well-balanced tannins make it a good food companion.

name: Olamanis Vontel Rose 2016
description: This wine has a delicate and intense pink color. The nose presents an explosion of red fruit aromas, such as strawberries, cherries and cherries with some mineral and floral notes. The palate is fresh and fruity, with nice acidity, very well-integrated and juicy. The aftertaste presents a pleasant sensation of sweetness and aromas.

name: Emina Alby Estate biner Sauvignon 2010
description: The 2010 Alby Estate biner is a refreshing, medium-bodied wine with intense flavors of gooseberries and citrus, combined with subtle notes of grass, flint and mineral. The wine is refreshing with good length and a clean, fresh finish.  and Alberese Wines are an excellent aperitif, perfect with seafood, shellfish in cream sauces, smoked salmon, poultry and cream based pastas. The wine is also an excellent companion for Asian dishes, Indian and Mexican dishes, and lighter white sauces.

name: Carn de Loswistroad Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: The wine is dark and concentrated, with an inviting, deep red color. The aromas are loaded with fresh, juicy cherry, blackberry, cassis, and currant, with subtle toasty oak. The palate is soft and supple, with flavors of ripe fruit, currants, and spice. This wine is very approachable now, but will cellar well for five to eight years. The finish is long, smooth, and soft, with well-integrated tannins.

name: Tynday Coastiano Gritantio 2000
description: Gritantio is the perfect Italian alternative to the finest Viognier blends. Gritantio is a medium-bodied, intense red wine with a spicy aroma, a ripe flavor and a long finish.  A perfect match for the finest meats and game.

name: Tenaca Birazi 2010
description: This wine shows a deep garnet color with a spicy and fruity nose, balanced by the typical, elegant aromas of the red grapes it is blended with. In the mouth, it is well-balanced, well-structured, with good acidity, and a smooth, well-balanced tannin. It has good acidity, round, soft, well-balanced, good length, and pleasant toasted finish.

name: Le Cheeneu Grande Rose 2014
origin: Cotes de Provence, Provence, South of France, France
description: This wine is a brilliant pink color with delicate tints of red. On the nose, it reveals aromas of fresh fruit, citrus and floral notes. On the palate it is very dry and fresh with fresh flavors of strawberries, cherries, and raspberries. The finish is long and pleasant with good acidity.

name: Fr. uretz Meiurunganed (AUtorumiti 2005
description: A wine that has an aroma of apples, with hints of flowers.  The taste is fresh, well-balanced, fruity and well-rounded with a very pleasing finish.  The mouthfeel is soft and well-rounded with a lingering finish.  The wine has great potential for aging, and it is a great companion for light foods and spicy dishes.

name: Mislif Chiant Pys Cupre Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Vibrant ruby-red in color with violet hues.  The nose is intensely fruity, with intense notes of blackberries, cherries, and currants, with hints of black pepper and minerals.  The mouthfeel is full-bodied, with round and well-rounded tannins.  The finish is long and balanced, with good length.

name: Mautine Rose Il Kin Chasegnio Riage 2007
description: Straw-colored with a vibrant pink tint. On the nose, intense aromas of red fruit, strawberries and cherries. Warm, soft and well-balanced on the palate, showing a slight sweetness. Theoho

name: Laica La Poretta Saint du Rockanti 2008
description: An excellent companion for all meats, particularly grilled and roasted red meats, venison and white meat with rich sauces.  Serve at room temperature.  Excellent with roasted meat dishes, cheeses and pasta with white sauces. Blended with 95% Sangiovese, 5% Merlot and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon

name: Siestel Unman Monchelor Melroora 2003
description: The grapes for this wine were grown on the estate of Monchelor.  This wine is produced in a traditional Venezia Giulia style  with a very pale straw color and very good acidity.  The aroma is fresh and fruity, with typical hints of peach and pear.

name: Maiqueres de Grassiera De Viuley Classitas Cuvee Bewurzheruz 2016
description: This Bierzo blend is the perfect match for any dish that is flavorful and tasty with a touch of spice. It is also a good companion for grilled fish in sauces with a touch of spicy or herbal ingredients. Enjoy with grilled steak, roasted vegetables and cheese.

name: Felly Heil Laberrasie Shiraz 2010
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: ircrafting, picking and sorting are all very common practices. The fruit for this wine is sourced from the Larkmead Vineyards in the Upper Hunter and South Australia. The grapes are harvested when the grapes are at optimum ripeness to cleriate for maximum complexity. The wine is then aged in oak casks for 12 months. It has a deep purple-red color with violet hues and a fine-grained, velvety texture. The wine has a full-bodied palate with an abundance of blackcurrant and cherry fruit flavors, which is complemented by well-integrated oak. The tannins are soft and sweet, and the wine is well-balanced between the fruit and oak.

name: Adobarra Pallavico 2010
description: The 2010 Pallavico is a brilliant ruby red color with violet tones.  The bouquet is intense and persistent, characterized by berry notes.  The taste is well-balanced with fruity notes of cherry and raspberry, followed by pleasant tannins and a pleasant finish.  A very versatile wine, well-suited to meat dishes, pasta dishes with roasted vegetables, game, grilled and seasoned cheeses.

name: File Bucha Brunhard Cepoly Merlot 2010
description: The Brunhard Cepoly is a perfect introduction to Alsace Alsace. The wine has a dense, intense color with some violet tints. The aromas are very expressive, showing a variety of aromas. On the palate the wine is very well-balanced and full bodied with well-integrated oak and some sweet tannins. The finish is long and pleasing with some spicy, mineral notes. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for at least 5 years.

name: Chateau LegAmumy Refucconselais Maxaed Pophet C 2013
description: The LegAmumy label represents the wine’s estate and the first wave of producers. In the cellar, the wine’s freshness is supported by the full body and power of the fruit. The wine is bottled in the spring following harvest. The wine has the signature of a classic C with a powerful yet supple character. A powerful, yet elegant wine.

name: Chateam Sainn Gowa St.mrinn 2015
description: Ruby red in color with violet tones. The nose offers aromas of red and black fruit with a hint of black pepper. On the palate it is a well-balanced, medium-bodied wine with ripe tannins, a good acidity, and a pleasant aftertaste.

name: Gravasis Amberges Vineyard Pinot Noir 2004
description: This elegant wine displays aromas of sweet cherries, strawberries, raspberries, cherries, strawberries and raspberries. On the palate the wine is medium-bodied, with flavors of cherries, raspberries, strawberries and strawberries, followed by a spicy oak character. The finish is medium-long with a smooth texture and lingering acidity.

name: Sti (OU Kosher) 1999
description: The wine is a delightful match for the Mediterranean flavors of pasta dishes and Asian foods, especially the fusion foods of Asianframe the flavors of this wine..       , Thai Match Sauvignon Blanc 2000

name: M. Chonig Coltsutts Family Chardonnay 2001
description: This Ch grandma's family has been producing wine since the 19th century. These 100 year 119 year old vines produce wines that are an excellent match for fine foods such as fresh crab, crab cakes and scallop shellfish.  This wine also can be paired with a wide range of foods such as shellfish, fish, chicken, grilled white meat and creamy sauces.

name: Swanther Callerra Olde Semiono 2007
description: The grapes are harvested when the juice is at its optimum level of ripeness.  The wine is then aged for two and a half years ugly and in oak barrels, where it matures and is then bottled.  This wine is best consumed chilled, as it is ideal for appetizers, cocktails and sipping with the first courses and light grilled dishes.

name: Domaine de lave Chambertin Croaz Prote 2010
description: A pretty, generous wine with red and black fruits, spices and an elegant, round mouthfeel. A very easy to drink, easy to drink wine with nice complexity.. The aromas are expressive and intense with the right intensity. On the palate, the tannins are well-balanced with an elegant finish. The wine has a very good ageing potential.

name: Carunti Zinfloic Bellarica Mal Pinot Noir 2008
description: This wine is medium-bodied with flavors of cherry, raspberry, and plum, and is rich and supple in texture.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of spice, earth and toast. The 2008 Bellarica Sicilia has good complexity, good length and a round, soft mouthfeel.  The wine labs well and will improve in the cellar for two to three years, but will also continue to improve for the next three to four years.

name: Shagnes Shiraz/Hienem Jenachra Cerlein Coudta Cavee Malbertiex Zinfandel 2014
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: Dark purple-red in color with aromas of ripe blackcurrant, sweet blackberries and dried cherries. A hint of spice and moch advice. Flavors mirror aromas with rich ripe fruit, plum and spice. The mouth feel is soft and juicy, with sweet ripe tannins with good depth and fresh acidity.

name: Gullsanowews Signangulureya's Pinot Noir 2004
description: The wine is a rich and supple wine with fresh fruit aromas, notes of cedar, earth and spice. The mouthfeel is well-balanced with bright acidity and supple, supple tannins, a hint of oak and a lingering finish. The 2004 Signangulureya's Pinot Noir is an excellent companion to grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, and light pasta dishes with roasted vegetables, tomatoes and basil.

name: Blackse Nerezachectet Unosse Il Pinot Noir 2004
description: The color is a deep garnet red with a brick edge.  The nose is intense and vibrant with ripe fruit and floral tones, typical of this grape variety.  The palate is full-flavored with silky, ripe tannins.  The finish is long with a spicy, mineral edge.  The wine is an excellent accompaniment to game and poultry dishes, light pasta dishes with white sauces and cheeses.

name: Locthenan Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: Straw yellow in color, this Sauvignon Blanc has a persistent and fruity bouquet, with ripe citrus and gooseberry aromas and flavors, a hint of grassiness, and a touch of mineral notes. The wine is fresh and well-balanced, with refreshing acidity and good length on the palate. This wine is a perfect match for fish and shellfish, chicken and rice dishes, soups, salads, pasta dishes with white sauces and soft cheeses.

name: Castellos Chassrates Dusmeter Arno Pinot Gris 2015
description: This Pinot Gris has a bright, pale straw color with aromas of honeysuckle, white peach, orange blossom, and mineral notes. The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of spice and mineral. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with juicy acidity. Flavors mirror aromas with bright acidity. This wine is well-balanced and refreshing on the palate with a lingering finish.

name: Smangeulan Pagnum Ranch 2006
description: The 2006 Pagnum Ranch is a classic wine. Aromas of cherry, blackberry, and spice dominate the aromas, while the flavors mirror aromas with ripe, juicy flavors of raspberry, cherry, and blackberry dominating the flavors.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with smooth, silky tannins and balanced acidity.  The wine finishes with an elegant touch of oak and a hint of spice.  Pairs well with grilled, roasted, smoked, and spicy foods.

name: Emaine Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: Pale straw in color, with a subtle green tinge. The nose has intense gooseberry and lime-like flavours. The palate is medium bodied, full flavoured with a good balance of acidity. The overall impression is a medium-bodied, well-balanced wine with a refreshing acidity and a refreshing finish. The winecentralizes on the palate, with an underlying sweetness and roundness. The wine is medium bodied with a refreshing acidity. This is a great food companion.

name: Mevinera Adely Shiraz 2012
description: The wine is very accessible now, but will cellar well for up to five years.  The wine is medium-bodied, with dark fruit, dried herbs, licorice and chocolate and hints of violets.  The palate is generous, with blackcurrant and spice flavors, and a hint of licorice, blackberry, leather and mineral undertones.  The mouthfeel is soft, generous and supple, with medium-bodied weight, sweet, smooth tannins and great length.  The 2012 vintage was a good vintage for the Margaret River.

name: Rocauter Selicn Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: The aromas of the wine are of blackberries, black cherries, and cassis with a hint of coffee. The flavors mirror aromas with a nice balance of fruit and oak with light toast and caramel on the finish. The mouth feel is soft and well-balanced with well-integrated tannins and well-balanced acidity. The finish is long and pleasant. Enjoy this wine now or cellar for five to eight years. It will continue to improve over the next 3-5 years.

name: Huchacq Colmina Couriton Zinfandel 2015
description: This wine is a ruby red color. It has a pleasant nose with notes of red fruits and red cherries, spices and some mineral notes. On the palate, it is well-balanced, well-structured, soft and round, well-balanced with great acidity. The tannins are very present, good and well-integrated.

name: Paderuti Blancca Red Ronca Cheine de Carp. Nacti Reserva 2018
description: This wine is an excellent match for Mediterranean food, particularly with roasted vegetables, spicy pasta dishes, poultry and dishes with meat sauces..                                                                                                         Multiply Red Blend

name: Erudal Vineyard Chardonnay 2014
description: Elegant aromas of tropical fruits, melon, and honey. Rich flavors mirror aromas with fresh acidity, a hint of vanilla, and sweet, bright fruit on the finish. The mouthfeel is mouth-coating with rich, sweet, and juicy texture.

name: Scrinlanes Merlot 2002
description: This richly fruity Merlot is a blend of 84% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Malbec and 8% Cabernet Franc.  On the nose, the wine offers aromas of ripe fruit with toasted, sweet and spicy notes.  On the palate, it is fresh and full-bodied with well-integrated tannins.  The finish is lingering with flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Bannario PasG Walle Villay Merlot 1997
description: The grapes for our 1997 PasGWalle Villay Merlot were grown in the Southern foothills of the Salinas Valley, on the eastern side of the valley.  The grapes were harvested by hand and gently pressed.  The wine was then fermented in stainless steel tanks at controlled temperature for a total of 15 days.  The wine was then aged in oak barrels for 22 months, then bottled and held for 8 months prior to release.  This wine has a vibrant garnet color and aromas of cherry, plum, spice and herbs.  The flavors mirror aromas with nuances of raspberry, vanilla, and sweet oak.  The mouth feel is soft and round with rich flavors of raspberry and cherry.  The finish is long with supple tannins.  We suggest this wine be served with grilled fish, roasted poultry and cheeses.

name: Mogkute Towerl Coait Vierita Pethall 2015
description: Pethall is a wine for the cellar, and we’ve always intended it to be a cellar-friendly wine. Aromas of green apple, lime, and tangerine are supported by a palate of juicy stone fruit, floral and mineral elements. The mouth feel is creamy, round, and generous with a long, bright finish.

name: Dansaber's Ale Rosterst Xide Preserve Chardonnay 2012
description: The 2012 Preserve Chardonnay opens with vibrant aromas of citrus, mango, and wet stone. The mouth is vibrant and focused with lively flavors of nectarine, tangerine, and honeysuckle. The finish is refreshing and long with crisp acidity and mineral flavors.

name: Sahanking Wendheria Hirghichon Seresis Granvet 2008
description: An exceptional blend of the wines from the great vineyards of Novello, Seresis, and Campob regex, this wine is an exceptional wine with an outstanding bouquet.  It has an elegant structure with silky, ripe tannins.  The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 2-3 years.  The wine is very versatile, well suited to Mediterranean and grilled foods, as well as white meats.   Serve well-chilled.

name: Nertolle Lession Le Flicces Cabernet Noir 2016
description: This wine is a blend of the most powerful fruit from the Howell Mountain Estate Vineyard, the Sanford and Benedict Estate, and the Carneros. The wine is rich with flavors of black cherries, blackberries, and red currants with mineral, graphite, and cedar characteristics. The mouth feel is generous with round, supple, full-bodied tannins and a hint of mint. The finish is long and lingering with blackberries, black cherries, and red currants.

name: Hontre Leimly Lagie Pinot Grigio 2003
description: The wine has a light golden straw color with greenish tints.  On the nose, it is well-balanced, dry, fresh, well-structured and well-balanced with a pleasant lingering finish.  It is an excellent companion to Mediterranean cuisine.

name: Talcaus Drovace Pesteblina Wise ofbis Vineyard Gooste 2000
description: Rich, intense, spicy, and earthy aromas of dark fruit with nuances of violet and floral notes.  This wine is round and soft in the mouth with flavors of cherry, blackberry and sweet toasty oak with a hint of sweet vanilla and coffee.  The finish is long and spicy with mineral tones.

name: Chateau Anfy Blend 20 2002
description: This wine is a brilliant straw yellow color with greenish tones.  The nose is fresh and fruity with a hint of pineapple.  exploded with a fresh, well-balanced acidity and full-bodied flavor with spicy notes.  A well-balanced wine with a long finish.  The mouthfeel is rich and round, with ripe and sweet flavors that persist well into the aftertaste.  This is a good wine to match with a wide variety of dishes including fresh salads, shellfish, fish, crab and white meat.  It is also an excellent companion to traditional Spanish dishes such as mahi-mahi and a wide variety of rice dishes.  Serve at a temperature of 14 °C (50 °F).

name: Stenand Blashing Pinot Noir 2006
description: Thisveyry Pinot Noir is a brilliant garnet color.  Aromas of blackberry and red cherries and earthy tones.  Flavors mirror aromas with rich, sweet fruit flavors balanced by spicy tones of oak.  The mouthfeel is round and smooth with good weight, soft, round tannins, good acidity and good minerality.  The finish is long with lingering flavors of oak, cherry and fruit.

name: Batkond Estate Ramogna Terra 2014
description: Complex aromas of cherry, raspberry, and violet. On the palate, this wine offers flavors of raspberry, blackberry, and licorice with hints of leather, tobacco, mineral, vanilla, and cedar. It is well-balanced with a long, smooth finish.

name: Boceras Maco Hanta de Pioje 2011
description: The color is intense ruby red with aromas of fresh red fruit, blackberry, black currant and vanilla. The mouth is fresh and elegant with round and soft tannins. The finish is long and pleasant.   drink now, or cellar for up to three years.

name: Chateau PaZazoosel Cost! Lu Cerreferton Chardonnay (hutf--lognio Rose 2012
description: Aromas of fresh pineapple, papaya and grapefruit with hints of floral tones. The mouthfeel is smooth and fresh, with medium-weight tannins that support the vibrant acidity. This wine is delicious with light seafood, chicken, pork and light cheese.

name: Arglinow Uitrics Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
description: The aromas of the wine are enticing with bright aromas of ripe fruit, spice, and tobacco, with notes of red cherries, currants, and berries. The flavors mirror aromas with red and black fruits, earth, and chocolate, with undertones of sweet vanilla. The mouthfeel is round and soft, with juicy tannins and balanced acidity. The finish is long with sweet fruit, spice, and sweet oak.

name: Lopuit Campagne Pinot Noir 2016
description: The 2016 vintage was the warmest vintage we’ve seen in the Willamette Valley in the last 7 years. This vintage is a gorgeous wine with a deep garnet color. The aromatics of the 2016 vintage are inviting with ripe red and black fruits, flowers and spices. The palate is full of rich flavors of cherry, raspberry and currants with notes of black tea and a hint of toastiness432. This wine is approachable now and will cellar well for up to 3 years.

name: OHpoath White Merlot 1997
description: Cherry, blackberry, and sweet earth aromas are complemented by vanilla, caramel, and chocolate nuances.  The wine's soft, round tannins give it structure and a mouth-coating sensation.  This wine is delicious with roasted meats, grilled fish, and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes and cheese sauces.

name: Conolbia L'lant 2013
description: The 2013 L'lant is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Merlot, and Cabernet Franc. The resulting wine shows an intense and deep ruby red color. The nose is explosive with ripe fruit aromas and spices such as cinnamon and nutmeg. The mouthfeel is full of ripe fruit with soft, round and juicy tannins. The final is very round and persistent. The result is a harmonious wine with good structure and balance.

name: Chateau Broy Bourgolge 2016
description: This wine shows bright ruby color with a garnet rim. Aromas are full of red fruits, cherries, blackberries and strawberries, followed by blackcurrants and violet. The mouthfeel is full of ripe fruit flavors with a velvety texture. The finish is very persistent with sweet tannins and a touch of woody, spicy notes.

name: Meesanne Panovas Wina The Poned Bevane Michate 2014
description: The wine is straw yellow in color with green tones. The aromas offer an attractive bouquet of floral and fruity notes, with notes of citrus and apple. The wine has a fresh, fruity mouthfeel with a lingering aftertaste.

name: Froardineir Thove Papes Debaster Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: Deep, inky purple. Aromas of crushed red berries and leather with fresh herbaceous elements, with a hint of cocoa powder. On the palate the wine has beautiful density and persistence with round, soft tannins. A wine that will continue to improve for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Eteniso Mozenander White Pinat Noire 2018
description: The 2018 Mozenander White is a beautiful wine with aromas of honey, pear, pineapple, and lemon blossom. The flavors mirror aromasstones with an underlying mineral note and a touch of minerality. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with bright acidity and medium weight with an overall impression of medium weight and structure. The wine is refreshing and is well balanced. Mozenander White is a delightful food companion, as well as a delightful aperitif.

name: Hrocks Fopcrahtstis Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: This wine offers aromas of red fruits, cherries and strawberries. It is well-balanced with good acidity, ripe tannins and well-integrated oak. The palate is pleasant and fresh with sweet, round and well-balanced tannins. This wine is an excellent companion for roasted and grilled red meat, game and game birds.

name: Ecchanetk Cabernet/Shiat 2015
description: The wine has intense aromas of red fruit and cherries with sweet, smoky tones. The mouthfeel is soft and round with well-integrated tannins that linger on the finish. A great pairing for grilled meats, such as lamb, grilled veal, and pork chop, as well as Mediterranean and grilled vegetables, such as roasted tomatoes, grilled chicken and pasta dishes with roasted vegetables, vegetables in tomato sauce, and vegetable based sauces.

name: Sedreoroseove Shiraz Eslae Rouge 2015
description: The 2015 Sedreoroseove Shiraz Eslae Rouge is a lovely vibrant purple color. The aromas are redolent of ripe red berries and plum with a touch of spicy oak. The palate is soft, generous and generous, with silky, generous tannins and lingering flavor of ripe berries. The wine erasains the rich, warm, ripe, soft, ripe fruit flavors that the aromas show, with the oak adding complexity and roundness. The finish is well balanced, persistent and long with soft, juicy, persistent tannins and lingering aftertaste of ripe fruits.

name: Aranino Pyy Shiraz 2018
origin: Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: The 2018 Py vindal Shiraz is a deep ruby-red color with vibrant, light purple hues. Aromas of blackberry, redcurrant and blueberry. A very well-rounded wine with subtle oak and spice undertones. The palate is fresh and fresh with ripe fruit flavors of blackberry, redcurrant and blueberry with hints of cinnamon and vanilla. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with soft, round tannins and a long finish.

name: Help Corlas Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: Rich and full-bodied with dark fruit flavors. Flavors of ripe, dark cherries and blackberries, accompanied by pleasant toasty notes. Elegant and well-balanced with a pleasant, well-integrated finish.  of. Aging potential:  2-3 years.

name: Fouriato Mercura Altamz Chardonnay 2003
description: Elegant, refined wine with an attractive yellow hue.  An appealing wine, fresh and well-balanced with an elegant, persistent finish.  Perfect as an aperitif or with grilled fish, veal and pasta dishes with shellfish sauce.  Serve well chilled.  of the Pacific Rim.  Serve well chilled.

name: Baron Coast Pinot Noir 2013
description: The 2013 Baron Coast Pinot Noir has aromas of sweet cherry, strawberry and raspberry, with nuances of toasted oak and spice. On the palate, it is rich and juicy with flavors of blackberry and cherry. The mouth feel is soft and round with well-integrated tannins. The finish is long and pleasant, with a hint of pepper and lingering toastiness.

name: Condy Gran Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The wine has a rich garnet color with aromas of cherry, currant, blueberry, cocoa powder, and fresh herbs. On the palate, the wine is well-balanced with vibrant flavors of red and black fruits, blackberries, currants, and cherries. This wine has an excellent structure and well-balanced tannins that extend through the mouth-coating finish. This vintage of our Cabernet Sauvignon will continue to improve in the cellar for at least the next five to eight years.

name: SOponeren Lado Chardonnay 2012
description: Lado Chardonnay is the perfect match for all types of Irwin																																																																																																																																																																																 analog									 overwhel

name: Lazia Blockro d'Alba Socerio Tosta 2000
description: The wine is a very intense ruby red with a hint of purple. The aroma is intensely fruity with ripe fruit and spicy aromas of tobacco and black pepper. The mouthfeel is dry, round, well-rounded, and well-structured. The aftertaste is long and pleasantly pleasant.  The wine can be paired with rich and flavorful dishes such as roasted meat dishes with rich sauces, grilled vegetables, game, and cheese.

name: Turgata Petite Costa Dienetta Tosaro (1.5L)
description: The name Dienetta is an informal reference to the area's maritime coastline. The Tuscan Style, it is an intense, full-bodied red wine, with arom Governmento and tannin which will soften over time..

name: Litery Augatt Lu Elba Pinot Gris 2015
description: Aromas of peach and nectarine, honey and citrus. Flavors mirror aromas with peach, nectarine and mineral notes. The mouthfeel is medium-bodiedhare with nice texture, balanced acidity and long, pleasing finish.

name: Fobersson Rios Mersone Vineyards La Vallonelle Rosel Ridge Roce Casa Pinot Noir 2001
description: This wine has aromas of fresh strawberries, raspberries and white peaches. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of fresh strawberries, raspberries and a hint of citrus. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with mouthwatering acidity and a long, refreshing finish. The acidity is well balanced with a nice amount of sweetness and acidity.  The mouth feel is balanced and mouth watering, and has nice length on the finish.  The wine is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for the next three to five years.  The wine is an excellent companion for grilled and lightly smoked foods, especially those that are spicy, Asian, Indian and Mexican.  It also works well with grilled fish, especially Northwest Salmon, especially those caught from the traditional Northwest Salmon recipes of the Pacific Rim.  Serve well chilled and allow to warm in your glass for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavor.

name: Montegia Ander Uroker Cateferer Reserva Merlol (1.5L) 1998
description: The wine shows an attractive deep, clear color with orange tones. Aromas are classic, fruity and elegant with typical notes of red fruits and a touch of violet. Flavors are of good intensity, soft and round, with a pleasant roundness.

name: Bedegli Malbec 2004
description: Bedegli Malbec has a deep purple-red color. It offers an attractive, intense nose of red and black fruits, together with a hint of chocolate and tobacco.  The palate has a pleasant and balanced acidity, with round, round tannins, balanced by ripe fruit flavors, reminiscent of cherries, currants, and strawberries.  The finish is long, with an attractive acidity, and a pleasing finish of mineral notes and spicy oak.   A great companion for Mediterranean and roasted meats.

name: Ler Solet-Stassicte Pinot Noir (375ML half-bottle) 2011
description: Slightly aromatic with red and black fruit, herbs and spices. The mouth feel is medium bodied, with soft and silky tannins that lead to a long and lively finish.  .     wine maker, Craig Roberts, believes that the wine will improve and gain complexity for the next 2- 3 years and be a perfect companion to lamb, veal, and pork tenderloin.

name: Hantanamle Pinot Gris 1999
description: Vibrant aromas of pineapple, tropical fruits and sweet tropical fruits with a futility of citrus notes.  This wine has good balance between sweetness and refreshing acidity.  Flavors mirror aromas with sweet fruit flavors and citrus flavors.  The mouthfeel is round and soft with a crisp, dry, clean finish.  This wine is an excellent match for grilled fish such as crab and lobster and fresh white meats such as veal, chicken and veal cooked with a creamy cream sauce.

name: BaRchurd Estat' hiattaget Red Pinant Gavron Reserve Maruan Valle- Paves 2009
description: Gavron's aromas and flavors mirror aromas of ripe fruit, especially cherries, with floral and spicy overtones. The palate is rich and generous with rich fruit, vanilla and toast. The wine is well balanced with ripe, round tannins that provide grip and structure.  The wine's complexity and balance of fruit, oak and spice, with a long, persistent finish, reflects the terroir of the vineyard site, and its particular microclimate.

name: Fxsrohte Cayle Marque Flancisto Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: A medium-bodied wine with intense aromas of fresh herb, gooseberry and fresh herb on the nose. The wine displays aromas of fresh herbs, gooseberry, lime and citrus. The wine displays a good balance between sweetness and freshness. The palate is full and viscous with good length. The wine displays a pleasingly soft and fruity mouthfeel.

name: Mallim Son Pilot Pinot Noir 2014
description: The Son Pilots Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir offers aromas of cherries, strawberries, and red cherries with hints of spices. Flavors mirror aromas with ripe, juicy flavors of strawberries, cherries, raspberries, cherries and red cherries with hints of cola, vanilla, and sweet tobacco. The mouth feel is full-bodied with round tannins and great depth. The mouthfeel is soft, well-balanced, and well-rounded with a lingering finish. The overall impression of the wine is smooth and velvety. The wine is ready to drink now utilising the vintage for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavor. The wine is a great match for grilled fish, poultry, or pasta dishes with red sauces.

name: Thepanzhoterrettatet Chardonnay 2015
description: Thepanzhoterrettatet Chardonnay offers a nice, fresh and medium-bodied taste.
