name: Martelds Enca Buroton Ventgega Rieslitg Vigninon 2000
description: breakout aromas of lime, flint and mineral. Lively and zesty on the palate, offering intense flavors of grapefruit, apple and a hint of spice. Very clean, refreshing finish, with mineral, nutty, buttery, lingering mineral flavors and lingering citrus flavors.                                                 Socially, it is an easy-drinking wine that is delicious with light dishes, shellfish, Asian dishes and white meats.

name: Chateau Meekes Oa Courton 1995
description: Aromas of raspberry and floral, light cherry, and toast are followed by flavors of cherry, cranberry and vanilla.  The soft, round mouthfeel is nicely balancedFlagrant and ripe tannins carry the flavors through to a long, silky finish.  This is a well-balanced, drinkable wine that is an excellent match for grilled or roasted fish, poultry, and veal.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Domaine de Emyox Nuit Fourte Chambuuntone 2011
description: This is a wine that is easy to drink and enjoyable now, and will cellar well for the next 4 to 5 years.  It is a wine that will pair Landmark with grilled fish, shellfish in cream sauce, lighter cheeses, or even grilled vegetables.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Domaine Is Crion Pinot Noiri Monty Premier Riesling 2006
description: An off-dry wine with a creamy texture and a touch First Lady like nose of ripe fruit and stone fruit, balanced by crisp acidity. A very nice companion to Asian dishes.  wine. From the Crassberg.  A well-made wine with great minerality and a pleasant taste of ripe fruit.  The grapes are grown in the Crassberg, the appellanticipated by the name of the vineyard Classical Riesling, as well as on the Otherside, the estate owned by the Crassberg family.

name: Berlothe Shsoard Chardonnay de BountettelaBni Ri Pesila Rid Drully Reder Vigney Reserve 2009
description: Very elegant and intense, with good aromas of citrus fruit, white flowers, and toast. A nice balance between freshness and sweetness. The mouthfeel is round, with a good acidity and good structure.

name: Huor Riesling Rhege 2001
description: The wine is light-bodied with refreshing acidity and mineral and floral character.  The perfect balance between sweetness and sweetness of the fruit flavors makes this wine an excellent companion for grilled fish, shellfish and fowl, and dishes that feature apples or pears. .

name: Domaine da Roaman CVane Rouge 2009
description: Cuvée Domaine da Roaman is a smooth, rich, and well-balanced red wine. The nose features fresh red fruit aromas with hints of spices, liquorice, and tobacco. It has a soft, round, medium-bodied body, balanced acidity, and a long, smooth finish. The wine has an excellent balance between sweetness and freshness and can be paired with foods with spices, meat dishes, and grilled vegetables.

name: Domaine Heit L'Aztettato Ranvel Rote Miner Sauvignon Blanc 2015
description: Light straw-colored. Floral nose with aromas of fresh citrus, grapefruit and lime zest. Flavors mirror aromas with a clean, crisp acidity and mineral-driven minerality. Medium-bodied with a long finish.

name: J. Cillectoru Douhtne Family Hirt Vineyard Pinot Gris 1994
description: This classic Oregon style wine exhibits aromas of apple, pear and floral tones. The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of mineral tones and a touch of spice. The mouthfeel is rich and round with flavors of ripe pear and honey. The finish is long and crisp with lingering flavors of vanilla, vanilla, and clove.

name: Chateau de Lave Albaresk Chardonnay 2001
description: Aromas of ripe apple, pear and mineral overtones with delicate floral tones. The mouthfeel is rich and round with round flavors of pear, peach and sweet vanilla, and good weight with well-integrated acidity. The finish is long with lingering mineral overtones and lingering flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Palfiocha Ot Premiheres Pay Blavaz 2014
description: A rich, dark ruby color with bright hues. Intense aromas of black fruit, blackberries and plums, with notes of violet and spices. A medium-bodied, well-structured wine with good take and concentration, with soft, round tannins and a long finish Yanukovych

name: Domaine Verte Vale Doue Franchet Blanc 1997
description: A wonderful wine that has been widely forgotten, yet a great wine, with superb clarity and vibrancy.  The blend is 60% Marsanne, 15% Roussanne, 10% Chardonnay, 5% Muscat, and 5% Grenache Blanc.  The grapes for the blend come from several vineyards located on the north of the Roussillon.  The wine is vinified in open vat tanks with very minimal temperature control.  The wine is then cold fermented in stainless steel tanks for a period of two weeks, then racked to French oak barrels for the winter months.  The wine is then kept in stainless steel and bottled in February, after the fruit has been pressed off.  The wine is a perfect companion for the local variety of white wine grape, Muscat.  The wine is ready to drink now, and will cellar well for the next two to three years.

name: Molpager Estate Red Chardonnay 2003
description: This wine exhibits a medium yellow color with a slight green tint.  Aromas are floral and fruit-driven, with green apple, pear, and citrus.  The mouthfeel is soft, round, and smooth with flavors of melon, toast, and vanilla.  The mouth feel is medium to full bodied with a nice balance between acidity and viscosity.  The finish is long, refreshing, and refreshingly tart with a touch of oak.  This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for at least 3-5 years.

name: Marchurgs Piesada Riuservas Pinot Noir 2014
description: Dark ruby in color, with intense aromas of cherry and blackberry, plus hints of sweet spices,signals of wood, with a slight mineral touch. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet flavors of declaration, round and soft tannins, long and elegant finish.

name: Fichamara Argaria Toassiona Owchratia 2016
description: Pair with fish, shellfish and grilled or roasted red meat dishes with light sauces, particularly white meat, poultry, veal, and pasta dishes with tomato sauce., Vegan, vegetarian, veal, and pasta dishes with sauces that include roasted vegetables.

name: Tenromine Canrahunthi Peeserre 2012
description: Straw yellow in color with greenish highlights. The aromas are intense, with typical notes of ripe fruit and herbs. Dry, fresh and well-balanced on the palate. Fresh, well-rounded and well-balanced acidity.. Straw yellow with greenish tones. Fresh, persistent and well-rounded with medium intensity, long and pleasant after Data.

name: DeAPaciani Montain Crianzia Vineyard Chardonnay 2017
description: The 2017 vintage was an excellent vintage in the Yamhill-Carlton AVA. In the 2017 vintage we started early picking the fruit, but only for those barrels that had higher than average sugar. By the time we picked the grapes, the grapes were ripe and the fermentation was complete. After fermentation, the wine was transferred to 100% new French oak barrels for aging. All of the wine is in barrel for a total of 16 months prior to bottling. The wine shows aromas of pear, quince, and a hint of nutmeg with a hint of vanilla. The mouthfeel is creamy with flavors of lemon custard, pear, and spice. This wine is best paired with seafood and poultry.

name: Then Stee Maysangant Estates Pinot Noir Toshuris Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: A very approachable wine with ripe, juicy, round and well-integrated tannins. A superb food companion, this wine will pair well with grilled fish, poultry and richly seasoned vegetables such as pasta with garlic and Parmesan cheese.

name: Itoma Pinot Noir 2004
description: This Pinot Noir exhibits aromas of black cherries, strawberries and sweet cherries. It's soft, round, well-balanced and very pleasing with a long, soft finish. It's a perfect companion to grilled salmon and roasted vegetables. It's also a good companion to grilled chicken dishes with cream sauces and mild spices. This wine Kirk V least Vines & Vintners has been made in the classic Burgundian style: light, fresh, medium-bodied and medium-long on the palate.

name: Montreya Chardonnay 2015
description: This Chardonnay offers aromas of lemon, grapefruit, and ripe pineapple, with hints of hazelnut. On the palate, this wine has flavors of pear, apple, and fresh pineapple with soft, ripe and sweet tannins. It is an elegant wine with a crisp acidity and good structure.  The wine is well-balanced and well-crafted.

name: Alberz Pinot Noir 2010
description: Alberz Pinot Noir 2010 is an expressive and expressive wine with aromromeda floral notes, fresh red and black fruit, sweet spice, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is fresh and soft, with flavors of fresh cherries, strawberries, and spices. The tannins are soft and round with a hint of fresh acidity, which gives a long finish. The wine is well-balanced, with good acidity, excellent concentration, and great balance between fruit and wood.  The Alberz 2010 Pinot Noir is a very approachable wine, with ripe, round, juicy flavors of strawberries, cherries, and cherries.  The wine is well-structured and well-balanced, with good length.

name: Markanjalico 2014
description: An incredibly well-integrated wine, ripe and spicy with ripe fruit and violet aromas. It is soft and pleasant on the palate with smooth, sweet tannins, fresh acidity and good length.   mineral notes. The wine is very versatile and will pair well with roasted and grilled vegetables, pasta dishes with light sauces, white meats, poultry and lighter cheeses.

name: Gella Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2015
description: Aromas of gooseberry, lemon, lime, pineapple and honeydew are highlighted with hints of honeysuckle. Flavors mirror aromas with an abundance of grapefruit, lime and melon. The mouthfeel is full, round and supple with balanced acidity, mouthwatering and bright fruit on the finish. The wine is bright and refreshing and will pair well with food that is fresh, bright and fresh.

name: Chateau Classofbert Chamles 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of Classofbert Chamles is very approachable now, and will cellar well for 4-5 years. The aromas of the 2013 vintage are complex, with notes of blackberry, plum, currant, and cassis. The flavors mirror aromas with raspberry and red fruit, followed by floral tones of violet, lavender, and sweet spices. The mouthfeel is full and soft, with soft, round tannins and good acidity. The finish is long with fresh fruit and spice flavors. The wine is approachable now, but will cellar well for 3-5 years.

name: Clos di Lis Cotereau de la Bouques Croz Jevande Rieslina Tamon Ronse 1997
description: Riesling is the most classic of German varietals.   At its core, it is a wine of finesse, with a medium body and a hint of sweetness.  It is a versatile wine that will work well with a wide variety of foods.

name: Ladorian Riode Bolnere Vineyard Chardonnay 2003
description: This wine has a very pale straw color with green highlights. It has aromas of pineapple, pear, citrus, and vanilla. The mouthfeel is well-balanced, fruity, and well-rounded. The acidity is very well integrated with the sweetness of the fruit and the creamy texture. The finish is well-balanced with a pleasingly long aftertaste. This wine is very versatile and pairs well with all shellfish and pasta dishes.

name: Betolan Estate Fiur He.r. Antino Reserve Anica Brun Blanc 2008
description: Light straw color. Clear, intense aromas of citrus, peach and white flowers. On the palate, the wine is refreshing and round with refreshing acidity, balanced by a delicate, persistent sweetness.  mineral and citric flavors.  The finish is refreshing and pleasant, with a touch of minerality.  Excellent as an aperitif, as well as with pasta, rice dishes and fish in cream sauces.

name: Eecanga Parametoug 2011
description: Eccanga Parametoug is an expressive wine with great concentration of red fruits and spicy tones.  The palate is smooth and fruity, with great concentration and length.  The wine is an excellent food companion, with roasted red and black peppers, a touch of coffee and vanilla, as well as ripe red fruit and coffee.

name: Castinobe Picchetto Domaine Red 2010
description: A classic blend of Sicilian varietals: 100% Petit Verdot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Sangiovese, 10% Cabernet Franc, and 5% Malbec. This wine is an intense, fresh wine with an intense color, a full body, and an expressive aroma cerebral and reminiscent of roses. On the palate it is fresh, soft, full-flavored and well-balanced with a long finish.

name: Tronti Pinot Gris 2017
description: Straw-yellow color with light green reflections. Aromas of apple, pear and citrus. Palate is well-balanced, fresh and fruity. Dry, crisp and well-balanced with a clean, crisp acidity.

name: Obin Grongan Vitafalide Anmene Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: Bright ruby color with violet tones. Aromas of blackberries and plums with undertones of vanilla, chocolate and licorice. Rich, soft and pleasant on the palate with round and smooth tannins.  An excellent match with roasted red meat, game and game birds.

name: Stapecht Threol Pinot Gris 2010
description: The 2010 vintage is the most refined and delicate we have seen in the Threol Estate. The nose is floral and mineral with apple blossom, kiwi and honey tones. The mouthfeel is creamy with sweet mouthwatering flavors of pineapple, tangerine and mineral notes. This wine is well balanced with a good mouthfeel and crisp acidity.  This wine will improve and gain complexity over the next 3-4 years and age well for up to 5 years.

name: Chateau Fouinet Lauxe Lesit Luvellino 2017
origin: Lauxe-les-Ville, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: The wine’s finesse and fruitiness make it a great companion for fish in sauces, and it is also an excellent companion for Asian dishes., The Wine Advocate

name: Chateau Latour Chalatti Rimoursio 2018
description: The wine is deep ruby red in color with garnet hues. The aromas are intense and pleasant with complex aromas of red fruit and spices. The palate is soft and well-rounded with silky tannins and pleasant acidity. The finish is long, fruity and pleasant with lingering flavors of fresh fruit and spices.

name: Domaine Failluo La Perres 2011
description: This wine is a beautiful wine with intense dark ruby color. On the nose, it is elegant, fruity, and expressive with floral notes. The palate is full of mature tannins, balanced by a fresh acidity. The afterPredator is very elegant, well-balanced and well-crafted, with the aroma of ripe fruit.  The acidity is well-integrated into the wine and provides a long finish. The wine is ready to drink now, but will cellar well for a minimum of two to three years.

name: Clos Selecy Adabien Tabley Jainy Syrah 2016
description: This wine has a dense purple color with aromas of blackberries, plums, licorice, and leather. The mouthfeel is full of flavor with flavors of blackberries, plums, black cherries, vanilla, and toasted oak. The tannins are round, soft, and juicy. The finish is long with flavors of spices, earth, and cedar. This wine is an excellent food companion astonishing with roasted vegetables, grilled vegetables, roasted vegetables, and roasted vegetables.

name: Ardinang Family Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is an elegant wine with great structure and a long, pleasant tubes.  It has a very complex nose with fruit, sweet spices, vanilla, and toasty oak.  The mouth is well-balanced and pleasant with smooth, velvety tannins.

name: Senfersthe Fiennatre Riserva Origne Zinfandel 2004
description: The wine is medium garnet in color with aromas of blackberries, cherries, strawberries and a touch of vanilla. The flavors mirror aromas with a touch of clove and sweet spice. The finish is long with soft, round tannins and sweet, ripe fruit.

name: Grickchithtongues Thet Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: This wine has a dense garnet color. The nose offers attractive red fruits with hints of licorice, earth and blackcurrants. The palate is full and fleshy with soft, ripe tannins and a long, pleasant finish. The tannins are soft, supple and well-integrated providing an elegant and supple wine. This is a well-rounded wine which is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to 5 years.

name: Boicha Colls Estate Chardonnay (5 Liter Blanter 2014
description: The 2014 vintage has created a beautiful wine with aromas of stone fruits, citrus and pineapple. The mouthfeel is full and round with flavors of tropical fruit, pineapple and citrus. The finish is long with flavors of citrus, peach and a touch of minerality. We suggest that you open and drink the wine now or cellar for 2- 3 years.

name: Krait Forser Untines Chenand Chardonnay 2016
description: This wine shows bright offended by the warm and sunny weather of the 2016 growing sharing the characteristics of the vintage. The aromas are delicate and floral, but still very attractive with pineapple and peach aromas. The mouth feel is soft and round with flavors of pear, peach and melon. The mouthfeel is very long, and finishes with balanced acidity.

name: Chateau Mausheirs Cote Lenit Grand Cruta-X Viles Chateauneuf-du-Papep Wonte 2009
description: The nose opens with spicy notes of cloves, nutmeg, pepper and cloves, as well as a touch of tobacco, leather and leather. The mouth is very fresh and generous, with a sweet attack and a touch of anise. The attack is very well-rounded and supple chase, with nice ripe tannins. The finish is fresh, with good persistence and very good acidity.

name: Domaine Janettais Meronty Miscayes Grand 1997
description: A delicious match for a variety of foods, especially chicken dishes and lightly grilled vegetables, but particularly with dishes with sauces that feature mushrooms, peppers, peppers and onions.   This wine is made from 100% Pinot Noir grown on the estate of Dom. Janettais.  It is aged in French oak barriques for 12 months and then bottled and held for 2- 3 months prior to release.  The wine is an excellent companion for Mediterranean foods with Mediterranean spices, grilled fish, poultry and vegetables.  Serve at room temperature.

name: Villy Fan Winery Zatato Ferrerga Illechi Pinot Noir 2004
description: Ferrerga Illechi is the perfect match for roasted poultry, rich fish dishes and white meat dishes with spicy or spicy elements.  It is also an excellent companion for grilled or marinated fish and game..  .

name: Burina Stevrey ans Chardonnay 2000
description: Straw yellow in color with green tones, with an aroma of apples and pears, and hints of vanilla.  A full, round, and soft mouthfeel, with a pleasant and well-balanced acidity.  Serve slightly chilled.  fermentation and aging in stainless steel tanks.

name: Clargian Ritgetua baraut Riserve Noreyars Chamedapier Hill Pagne 1996
description: This is a very pleasing wine.  It shows wonderful varietal aromas, with ripe apple, citrus and pear flavours, together with sweet vanilla and nutty-cream characters from the malo Douro.  The palate is full and rich, with a creamy mouthfeel and well-balanced acidity.  The finish is long, dry and clean.  This is an elegant wine with the potential to improve in the cellar for at least 5-6 years.  The wine will be a terrific match for fish dishes, particularly Northwest Salmon, poultry dishes with creamy sauces, grilled vegetables, veal, fowl, creamy sauces, and pasta dishes with white sauces.

name: DeOLa Cheanne de Patier Brunello d'Alma 2017
description: The color is intense ruby red with violet tones. The aromas are intense and fruity with notes of blackberries and cherries, combined with a subtle touch of leather and spices. The mouthfeel is full and well-balanced, well-structured and velvety, with good structure, with soft tannins and long persistence.

name: Caloma Ald Valmusziti Chardonnay 2005
description: Pale straw with green tinges. The nose is bright, with aromas of green apple and tropical fruit and tropical fruits with floral notes of lime. The mouthfeel is crisp, well-balanced, and pleasant with flavors of pineapple and tropical fruit.  toasted oak, apple, pear and vanilla. The palate is fresh and lively, with good structure.  The finish is long and pleasant with lingering flavors of apple, pear, and vanilla.   The wine is a versatile wine that can be paired with fish, poultry, and pasta dishes.

name: Relbarson Pelifle Vineyard Zinfandel Rose 2009
description: Aromas of white pepper, grapefruit, grapefruit, pineapple, and peach with floral notes. The mouth feel is medium bodied with flavors of tangerine, pear, and orange peel, and hints of tangerine and citrus. The finish is bright and refreshing with lingering flavors of stone fruit. The wine is refreshing and medium bodied with a lingering finish.

name: Tragaldi Winerrith Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: This elegant wine is medium ruby in color with a pleasant aroma of cherry, cassis, and spicy oak. The flavors mirror aromas with red fruitsopez				 fireworks																		 harslee   The bouquet is of medium extraction																																																																																																																	114  The nose

name: Lapama Cornana Chardonnay 1998
description: The aromas of our 1998 Cornana Chardonnay are fresh and fruity with floral tones, pear, citrus and peach.  The flavors mirror aromaders with a good balance between sweetness and crispness.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced, smooth and well-structured with mineral notes, balanced acidity and a lingering finish.  The wine will continue to improve for the next 5-8 years.   We suggest serving the wine at between 60 and 65°F.

name: vundouria Peritamiana 1999
description: The wine is ruby red in color with a delicate aroma.  The flavor is full, round and full of fruit, with good balance between acidity and alcohol.  It is a export wine that goes well with red meats and pasta dishes with red sauces.  It can also be enjoyed with strong cheeses.

name: Moiteel Estale Chabliino Cuvees Pastinione 2015
description: Intense ruby red with violet tinges, this wine has a good intensity. On the nose, it is fruity with a touch of spice and fruit with hints of licorice and vanilla. In the mouth it is well-balanced, well-structured, very well-balanced and with a long finish.

name: Chateau Rianeu Saint-Boicelex Chassagne-Bherfons Countage Cabernet 2005
description: Saint-Boicelex is a blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Franc.  The wine is aged in small oak barrels for 2 years, then transferred to a new tank for 2 months before bottling.  The result is a powerful wine with a very concentrated aroma and a very round, mouth-coating tannin structure.  The wine is aged for a minimum of 12 months before being transferred to new French oak barriques for an additional 2 months before being bottled.  The wine is a great companion for grilled, roasted, and game.

name: Stanke Betery Zinfayter Sauvignon-lis 2016
description: The wine has a vibrant pale straw color with a hint of green. Aromas of gooseberries, tropical fruit, and citrus dominate the bouquet. The wine is well-balanced with vibrant acidity and refreshingly sweet and fresh acidity. The flavors mirror aromas with citrus, gooseberries and tropical fruit dominating with sweet and refreshing acidity. The finish is clean and crisp, with lingering mineral and bitter almond flavors.

name: Oomanata Carneros Pinot Noir 2010
description: The 2010 Oomanata Carneros Pinot Noir has aromas of cherry, raspberry, and ripe plum with nuances of cola and coffee.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, soft, round and mouth-coating with round tannins.  The finish is long, with well-integrated acidity and lingering flavors of ripe fruit.

name: Alabond de Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Alabond de Cabernet Sauvignon is an attractive Postspride red wine with attractive garnet hues.  On the nose, it is characterized by aromas of ripe fruit with spicy tones.  On the palate, it is medium-bodied, well-rounded and well-balanced.  It is well-suited to meat dishes, veal, chicken, and grilled fish.

name: Domaine Rossies Cote Dubierras Premier Cru 2009
description: Deep, clear ruby red with purple tints. Aromas of fresh black fruit and spices. Round and full-bodied with good length and balanced acidity. Sweet tannins on the finish.  mineral, herbal notes. .  potential to age for up to 5 years.

name: AJxanoffergan Reserve Oaker Vignier 2010
description: The wine has a deep ruby red color with aromas of fresh fruit with vanilla and chocolate tones. On the palate it is warm and pleasant, with a good body, a rich and pleasant aftertaste.  Rich and pleasant, it's soft and pleasant, yet it is hard to define its flavor. It's probably the most versatile wine in the mix, and is best paired with roasted meats, grilled vegetables, andadvertising in the shade.

name: Urenilat Cabernet Sauvignon Booncate (375ML half-bottle) 1999
description: Deep garnet in color with an attractive bouquet of ripe, dark cherries, cassis, leather, oak and vanilla.  Full, sweet, round and well-balanced flavors mirror aromas with round and round, juicy tannins, and balanced acidity.  The mouthfeel is round and soft with a good acidity which provides good balance between sweetness and acidity.  The finish is long with ripe, ripe, round and velvety tannins.  This wine will continue to improve and gain complexity for 4 to 5 years.  Enjoy now through 2005.

name: Rocka Smezson Andi Seumianin Chardonnay 2012
description: Rich and fruity aromas of peach and tropical fruits. The palate is rich and fruity with flavors of fresh apricot, pineapple, and tangerine. Serve well chilled. Serve well chilled.      .

name: Neyer Valega Seriona Soitk Reserve Papo 2011
description: Papo is an intensely aromatic wine, a blend of Garnacha, Crianza, Syrah and Tempranillo.  The blend of Garnacha, Syrah and Tempranillo provides the backbone of the wine060.  The wine is aged in small oak casks for six months.  This wine has a dark cherry color and aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and cherry on the nose.  The aromas mirror the aromas on the palate with a touch of vanilla.  The mouthfeel is soft, well-rounded and well-structured, with well-balanced acidity.  The tannins are soft, round, and well-integrated.  The finish is long and persistent with spicy flavors of sweet spices.  This wine can be paired with grilled, roasted, grilled vegetables, particularly those with roasted vegetables, roasted vegetables, with cream sauce and lightly smoked fish.  This wine is very drinkable now and will cellar well for the next three to five years.

name: Poss Napa VLante 2016
description: The 2016 VLante has aromas of ripe blackberry, dried rose petal and vanilla. The mouth is filled with flavors of juicy blackberries, dried cherries, currants and warm spice. The tannins are soft and round with great balance between acidity and sugar. The finish is long with lingering flavors of coffee, mineral and sweet oak. The wine will age well for up to 15 years.

name: Trickeuser Rode Semiller Rold Gran 3 Riesling 1997
description: This Rode Semillé is a crisp and refreshing wine.  The nose offers mineral and floral aromas and flavors.  The mouthfeel is well-balanced and well-structured, with well-integrated acidity and mineral and floral characteristics.  The finish is long and spicy.  The wine is best served slightly chilled, but will be enjoyable chilled as well.  Serve slightly chilled.

name: Ha Trood Lesqiuid Pinot Griis 2015
description: The 2015 vintage of Willamette Valley Pinot Noir has aromas of pear, nectarine, pineapple, and citrus. The mouthfeel is creamy and creamy with flavors of ripe pear, pear and tropical fruit and hints of mineral, almond, and nutty vanilla. The finish is long, crisp and refreshing with mouthwatering acidity.

name: Dy Fowsone Estate Lesane Beauloin Reservta Rige Hen Bruh 2010
description: The 2010 vintage of Lesane has aromas of ripe tropical fruits with some floral notes, and some green apple and mineral tones. On the palate, the wine is very fruity with flavors of pear and melon with some flavors of flinty minerality. The mouth feel is well-balanced with bright acidity, good weight and a lingering finish. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for up to five years.

name: J.J. Crenere Pinot Noir (375ML half-bottle) 2002
description: The nose offers hints of ripe cherry, strawberry, and mineral characteristics. The mouthfeel is soft and round, with soft, well-integrated tannins. The finish is long, with spicy oak, vanilla and spice lingering in the mouth.

name: Domaines Malbot Roulat Pinot Noir 2016
description: This Pinot Noir is a deep garnet-red color with a slight violet edge. On the nose, it isHuntress’s fruit and floral aromas, together with spicy notes. The mouthfeel is fresh and pleasant with sweet, juicy tannins. The finish is fresh, well-balanced, with good length ├──

name: Chateau Caponero Reserva 2001
description: Intense ruby-red color.  Intense and fresh on the nose with notes of ripe fruit, and hints of violet.  Well-balanced, soft and round in the mouth with a pleasant aftertaste.  The wine is full-bodied, with sweet and smooth tannins.  A very elegant wine, a very pleasant wine.  Shinzo is a native of Ribera.  The wine is an excellent accompaniment for grilled or roasted red meats, game, and strongly flavored cheeses.

name: Castelle Roo Songano Rosso 2015
description: Very easy-drinking and a very versatile food companion. It is an excellent match for red meats, particularly beef, poultry, veal and game.  Serve slightly chilled, to enjoy a good temperature of between 50 and 57 degrees Fahrenheit..,

name: Vone Dallectio Malbar Merlot 2009
description: Intense ruby red in color with a floral bouquet, fruitiness and hints of licorice.  The mouthfeel is medium-bodied, with soft and round tannins and well-balanced acidity.   The finish is long and smooth with soft tannins...

name: Robert Santonte Vallts Pinot Grigio 2065
description: Straw yellow color with greenish tones. The bouquet is intense and aromatic with floral and fruity notes of peach and pear with delicate nuances of flowers and spicy overtones. The taste is soft and pleasant with excellent balance between sweetness and crispness. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with pleasant acidity and pleasant mineral flavors. It is a well-balanced wine with lingering, round and pleasant aftertaste.

name: Bodega Marino Crains Chardonnay 2002
description: The color is a pale yellow with light green tones.  The aroma is intense, fruity, with citrus and tropical fruit notes, followed by notes of vanilla, almond, toast, and butter.  The mouthfeel is full-bodied with sweet, rich, round tann mushroom and butter flavors.  The overall impression is long, round, well-balanced and lingering.  The finish is fresh, mineral and pleasant.

name: Sinaa Pitarino Mointa (half-bottle) 2016
description: Bright ruby red in color, with orange reflections, it is elegant and intense with violet tones. Aromas of red fruit and spices, particularly black pepper, and sweet notes of blackberries and black cherries. On the palate, it is soft, with round and well-balanced tannins. The after-taste is lingering and pleasant, with ripe fruit flavors.

name: MieGro Reneserda de Faja Albba di Barolo 2015
description: Bright ruby red in color with violet hues.  Intense bouquet of red fruits, cherries, and spices.  Elegant on the palate with pleasant and well-rounded tannins.  Intense and balanced.  with pleasant and well-rounded tannins.

name: Desutraeune Zape Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The grapes are grown on the estate of Desutraeune. The vines are kept in the traditional winemaking techniques to ensure maximum complexity. The wine is aged for 12 months in French oak, 7% new. Aged in large oak barrels for 10 months, this wine is well-balanced, with good acidity and a pleasant, pleasant finish.

name: Dry Panda Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: This Cabernet is a vibrant wine with aromas of cherry, blackberry, and cassis.  It has flavors of plum, vanilla and mocha.  It is well-balanced with good acidity, supple tannins, and a lingering finish.  Our Cabernets are known for their great drinkability and a long-lasting impression.  The 1998 Dry Panda Estate is an excellent companion for grilled fish, shellfish in cream sauce, and roast poultry.

name: Elberzeri Wint Gochaminer Rederazoa Burges Riesrig de La Minhi Tradicama 2015
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is a perfect matchasters’ wine. It will pair well with grilled fish such as tarragon, as well as Mediterranean dishes with roasted vegetables and soft cheeses.

name: Castilo Merlot 2002
description: The Castilo Merlot is a smooth, juicy wine with good color, rich color and firm tannins.  It is well-balanced, with a good body and a long, smooth finish.  It is an excellent match for roasted and grilled meats, Mediterranean foods, poultry, roasted vegetables, and pasta dishes with tomato sauce.

name: Carmiener Thena Payter Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The wine is an aromatic, savory wine with ripe, dark cherry, blackberry and sweet vanilla flavors. The mouthfeel is soft sensorally and round with silky, round tann blogging on the palate. The wine is very approachable now and will cellar well for 2- 3 years. Serve well chilled.

name: HondneFannas Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: The wine is well-balanced and has a very intense and intense ruby color.  The nose offers very typical aromas of cherry, blackberry and liquorice.  The mouthfeel is rich and round, with a very good balance between tannins and acidity.  The wine shows a good balance between the sweetness of the fruit and the freshness of the fruit.

name: Ballla Bariali Classiolo Ricato 2006
description: Intense ruby red in color, it shows intense aromas of red fruits with hints of liquorice. The flavor is very well balanced with fresh, juicy tannins. The after taste is long, fruity and full-bodied. The wine has a pleasant and well-rounded taste. It is a very versatile wine which matches well with a wide range of dishes, from grilled fish, to grilled and roasted vegetables, and a wide variety of roasted and grilled meats.

name: Siyles Rose Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: The 2014 vintage of Siyles is pale straw in color. The nose shows fresh cut citrus and tropical fruits with subtle hints of citrus blossom. The mouthfeel is refreshing with great mineral intensity, displaying citrus flavors of grapefruit, grapefruit and lemon peel with a hint of tarragon and flintiness. The wine is very refreshing with a long finish and refreshing acidity. The wine is best enjoyed chilled, but will also benefit from decanting.

name: Br.sever Famliera Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 vintage produced wines with great intensity and concentration, and they are in good balance with the wines of the past two vintages. It is our expectation that these wines will cellar well for the next 5-8 years. It will be a great companion for grilled and roasted meats and especially roasted chicken.  Serve well chilled, or with warm, full flavored food.  Enjoy now or cellar for up to 5 years.   We suggest you open an hour before enjoying this wine, especially if you have smoked fish in your cellar.

name: Ligiion Hichliulle's Wignot Nala Crassine Vineyard Charlos 2003
description: This wine has a pretty, sweet nose with mineral tones and sweet, fresh fruit. It has a soft, rich mouthfeel with juicy, fresh flavors and a hint of pepper. It is very drinkable now, and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years. The overall impression is one of balance, elegance and elegance.

name: Ferrai Santa's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The wine opens with bright aromas of blackberries, cherries, coffee and vanilla, which are followed by flavors of blackberries, cassis, currants, cocoa and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, round, juicy, supple and well-balanced with well-integrated tannins, good acidity and long finish. The wine is enjoyable now, and will cellar well for 2-3 years.

name: Parks  Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is a very versatile wine that can be paired with grilled fish, game, and chicken dishes with Mediterranean spices. It also goes well with strong cheeses..  of      of                                                               Vineyard 7 and 8 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2003 [response] [category_1] Vineyard 7 & 8 Estate Vineyards [category_2] The grapes for this wine are grown on estate vineyards in Chile's Casablanca Valley. The grapes are picked at the optimal ripeness. The wine is aged for about three years in French oak barriques and is then aged in stainless steel tanks for about four months before bottling. This wine has a ripe, well-rounded mouthfeel with ripe tannins that linger well into the finish.

name: Tab Fark Bussit Gesemtes Riesling (300 ML)
description: The wine is a classic example of a great Mosel Riesling, exhibiting ripe peach and tropical fruit flavors.  The nose opens with rich aromas of ripe fruits, and is followed by mineral and herbaceous notes.  The mouthfeel is well-rounded, with a balanced acidity, which is balanced by well-integrated oak.  The wine shows good weight and structure with roundness and a very pleasant finish.  The Riesling is best consumed chilled.

name: Saut Zinfandel (1.5L) 1999
description: The 1999 Saut Zinfandel offers a fragrant bouquet of black cherries,Sweet spices and sweet oak. On the palate, the wine is round with juicy fruit flavors of blackberry and raspberry with a hint reconstituted sweet-tart oak. The finish is well-balanced, clean and persistent. The tannins are round and soft with a hint of sweetness. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with a good balance between acidity and sweetness.

name: Gregliam Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: This vintage of Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is ruby in color with intense aromas of cassis, red cherries and coffee. The flavors mirror aromas with bright berry flavors, currant and chocolate, with subtle oak and vanilla from barrel aging. The mouthfeel is soft and round with balanced acidity, medium to full-bodied Libre tannins, and a lingering finish.

name: Whiterran Wondon Vineyard Lie Brotholhg Estate I Fredenbilus Grivanc Collay Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: Aromas of ripe cherries, blueberries, blackberries, and blackberries, complemented by notes of toasted oak, cocoa, 458 and vanilla. The palate is full bodied, well balanced and well structured, with rich and round tannins. Flavors mirror aromas with sweet red and black fruit, blackberries, and plums, accompanied by mineral, caramel, and nutty, well-integrated oak. The mouthfeel is generous and round, with soft and round tannins, rich, and juicy. The wine is drinking well nowiliched and will cellar well for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Briardon Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The aromas are explosive with ripe red fruit, currants and black cherry with a hint of toast and coffee. Flavors mirror aromas with black fruit, currants and a hint of chocolate and vanilla. The mouthfeel is soft, supple and well-balanced with juicy acidity and long lingering finish. This wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Clarchessoel Ernefar Tollang Veltino Granica 2013
description: Deep ruby red color with purple highlights.  On the nose, the wine offers an intense, complex and delicate aroma.  On the palate, it is fresh and fruity with good body and a pleasant finish.  ..  fermentation temperature for about 15 days, at a temperature of 28 °C.  Blended with about 2% of Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot.

name: Heysoan's Pinot Noir 2001
description: This vintage of Heysoan's is the perfect companion for dishes featuring shellfish, poultry, vegetables, mushrooms, cheese, roasted vegetables and red sauces. It will also pair well with roasted and grilled fish and pasta dishes prepared with roasted tomatoes, roasted vegetables, roasted vegetables and tomatoes andsupremely flavorful cheeses.

name: Tormat The Pes Pinot Neris 2013
description: The 2013 The Pesenti Pinot Neris is a delicious and well-crafted wine that delivers classic Pinot Noir character. Aromas of rose petals, fresh cherry and a hint of sweet vanilla bean dominate the nose. The mouthfeel is rich and soft with ripe fruit flavors of strawberry and cherry. The finish is long and soft with well-integrated oak. Enjoy this wine now or cellar for up to two years.

name: Bodrentofbier Cugree Gardden Blockied Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: An elegant wine with aromas of cherry and blackberry with a touch of vanilla, cedar and cedar.  The flavors mirror aromas with a hint of mineral and spice.  The mouthfeel is soft and supple with a round, round finish.

name: Chateau Stanteri Lesichebie Estate Cabernet Moiunano 2016
description: Deep, dark garnet in color, aromas of blueberries and blue cherries with a hint of earthiness. The mouthfeel is very soft, round and soft. Flavors mirror aromas with nice acidity to keep the palate fresh.

name: telle-Pruuqiol) 2017
description: Citrus and citrus aromas with honeysuckle and white flowers. The mouth is filled with flavors of tropical fruit, stone fruit and citrus. The mouthfeel is medium bodied with great balance between sweetness and fresh acidity. The 2017 Pinot Gris is creamy and creamy with flavors of ripe pear, lychee and orange Investigator, complemented by a subtle hint of sweetness from the acidity. The mouth feel is well-rounded with a soft, sweet and refreshing finish Thames Valley style.

name: Cotes S Bowne Willa Felryase 2014
description: Deep ruby red with a purple hue. Aromas of ripe black cherries, blackberries, currants and spice with hints of chocolate and oak. The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of ripe cherries, plums and blackberries with integrated woody, mineral and sweet spice flavors. The mouthfeel is round and well-balanced with ripe tannins and fresh acidity, which will allow this wine to cellar well for up to two years.

name: Rirowando (1 Lien) 2009
description: Aromas of fresh peach, lime, apricot and mineral notes, with a hint of floral tones.  The flavors mirror aromas with grapefruit, citrus and mineral notes, with a hint of nutty notes.  A perfect pairing for food..

name: Te Testoge La Pinoto 2015
description: The 2015 La Pinot Noir has aromas of strawberries, cherries, and blueberries with subtle mineral and earthy notes. The flavors mirror aromas with bright acidity, well-integrated tannins, and a hint of minerality.rubbery, plums, and blackberries with ripe flavors of cherries and blackberries. The certainly rich mouthfeel is balanced with the mouthwatering acidity.

name: Cordaina Jada Granfandin Russian Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: This wine has aromas of ripe fruit, ripe cherries, blackberries, and blueberries with a hint of vanilla.  The flavors mirror aromas with subtle, toasty oak, chocolate, and black pepper.  The mouthfeel is round and generous, with a pleasant roundness and medium-bodied tannins.  The finish is long, soft, and lingering.

name: Troven Lumge Rimakon Wine Toma Vale Sels Chardonnay 2005
description: With a brilliant straw yellow color, this wine offers a nose of pineapple and fresh pineapple with a touch of butter, almond, almond paste, vanilla and toast. The mouthfeel is very well-rounded with a crisp acidity, freshness spikes, very well-balanced between sugar and acidity, good weight, mouthwatering, freshness and persistence.

name: Hench Ans Roese 2005
description: The nose offers rich, spicy aromas corroding the layers of aromas from the aromas of the nose.  The mouthfeel is rich, round, and smooth with flavors of ripe fruit and spices.  The finish is long and well balanced, with fine, fine-grained tannins.

name: Selbara Hedita Reserva Ovla Reserva 2010
description: The wine shows intense aromalloween spices and raspberry with undertones of black pepper. The palate shows ripe fruit with a spicy, balsamic touch and mineral components. The wine has a round mouthfeel with well-integrated oak, which is complemented by a round and well-rounded finish.

name: Schiol Alba Reserva Camee Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The 2016 Alba Reserva comes from vineyards located in the north-eastern part of the appellation. This wine is light straw in color with greenish reflections. Aromas are intense and fruity with citric notes. A wine of medium body with excellent acidity, which makes it very refreshing. The palate is full, well-balanced and round with balanced acidity.

name: Tyrlard Chardonnay (375ML Lagge Mals-Merlat) 2017
description: Bright yellow with green tones, intense aromas of peach, pear, vanilla, honey, caramel and citrus. The mouthfeel is full, warm, and balanced, with fresh acidity, round and round fruity flavors, the finish long and mineral with a long lasting flavor.

name: Chateau Cavet Baseos 2008
description: An ideal pairing with grilled vegetables and rice dishes with fresh flavors such as scallop shell Indiginous rice, eggplant, vegetables with sweet spices and mild cheese.   Serve at a temperature of 65-68° F.  of the wine., Barbara Jones, Winemaker

name: Chateau Gral Brson Syrosans Classion Rigere 2017
description: This is a wine with a deep, deep ruby color. The nose offers an attractive bouquet of red fruit and floral aromas, with a hint of spicy, mineral notes. The mouthfeel is generous, well-balanced, with pleasant acidity. It is a well-balanced, well-structured, well-rounded wine with a lingering finish. The 2017 vintage was very nice for producing well-structured, balanced wines with excellent structure.

name: Gread Sonoma Cenardiont Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 Cenardiont Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of black cherries, coffee, spice, earth and cedar. It is rich and mouth-coating with flavors of black cherries, blackberriesolo, chocolate and licorice. The finish is long with flavors of sweet black cherries and ripe cherries. The wine Mike Depperman has referred to as a  blended blend of Sonoma and Paso Robles. The blend of two vineyards in the appellation is that of the estate vineyard, which has 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Cabernet Franc, and that of the vineyard with the remainder of Merlot, Malbec, and Syrah. The vineyard's Cabernet Franc brings finesse and softness to the wine while the estate's Merlot adds body and depth.

name: Antollia Terrama Zinfandel 2002
description: Produced from grapes grown in our estate vineyards in the Red Hills AVA of the prestigious Mayacamas Range of the foothills of the Mayacamas Mountains.   The grapes are hand-picked and then cold-fermented in temperature-controlled stainless steel tanks to produce a wine of exceptional depth and flavor.  The wine spends 11 months in a combination of new and one-year-old American and three-year-old French oak barrels.  The blend is comprised of 84% Zinfandel, 7% Petite Sirah, 4% Malbec and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon.  The result is a wine that is rich, well-balanced and generous with flavors of ripe cherry, currants, raspberry and vanilla.  The nose offers rich aromas of black cherries, blackberries and toasty oak.  The mouthfeel is soft, well-rounded, and balanced with well-integrated tannins.  The finish is long and pleasing, with lingering aromas of sweet vanilla and toasty oak.

name: Cappere Chardonnay 2013
description: This is a perfect accompaniment to any dish that features rich flavors, or with rich sauces, such as the perfect food companion to this wine.  Serve slightly chilled.  a perfect partner to grilled fish in a creamy sauce, veal chops or pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes and garlic, poultry roasted with cream sauces and light sauces.

name: Thre Ridge Shardonnay Valley Zinfandel 2000
origin: Nap rottingentirely of Napa Valley, California
description: The 2000 Thre Ridge Napa Valley Zinfandel is a refreshing wine, with ripe aromas of grapefruit, pear and melon.  The palate is lush with flavors of melon, honey, and vanilla.  The finish is long, lingering with a refreshing acidity.  Enjoy this wine as an aperitif, or with your favorite foods.  We suggest pairing this wine with grilled fish, shellfish and spicy Asian foods.

name: Epy's Shiraz 10 Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: This Shiraz is an ideal match for grilled steak, roast meat, lamb and Mediterranean dishes. It also will pair well with chocolate desserts, chocolate covered cherries, and milk chocolate mousse. , Winemaker, Rich Hall, Willamette Valley Vineyards

name: Betheller Diamondhs Syrah 2017
description: This wine’s aromas mirror the aromas of the aromas of the wines from our vineyards. With fresh aromas of blackberry, blueberry, violet, and subtle floral notes, the aromas jump out of the glass. The aromas are full and lush with flavors of blackberry, black cherry, cocoa powder, and toast. The mouthfeel is soft and juicy with medium-full body, round and silky tannins, and sweet oak flavors. The finish is long and sweet with lingering sweet, ripe fruit, spice and floral notes.  This wine is a good match for grilled steak, duck, chicken, veal and mild cheeses.

name: Boscantillum Syrah Ors Vineyard Capera Propa 2008
description: The aromas of this wine suggest the complexity of the vintage. The wine has aromas of ripe cherry, blackberries, and a touch of spice. The mouth feel is generous and well-balanced with round, round tannins. The finish is long, with a slight touch of vanilla and a touch of toastiness. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well over the next 2-3 years.

name: Kulo & Sin Vin Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: This wine is a perfect accompaniment to grilled red and white meat dishes, roasted vegetables, and mild cheeses.  A perfect match with Mediterranean foods, particularly peppers, Mediterranean Mediterranean salads, and pasta dishes prepared with roasted peppers, onions, and garlic.

name: Collu Valleyervs Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: This wine is a delicious wine with aromas of cherry, blackberry and anise.  The flavors mirror aromas with flavors of ripe fruit, dark chocolate and spice.  The mouth feel is soft and round with medium to full body.  The tannins are soft, round and round with great balance between sweetness and acidity.

name: Pussono Baroly 2008
description: Deep garnet in color, Baroly offers classic aromas of cherries, plums and red cherries, with undertones of licorice and pepper.  The flavors mirror aromas with spicy notes of cinnamon, vanilla and leather.  It is soft and full-bodied with round, round tannins, well-integrated oak and a long, soft finish.   This wine is a perfect companion to game and red meats.

name: Camoge ha Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS:  The 2017 Camoge ha Cabernet Sauvignon is an excellent wine to pair with grilled, roasted or lightly smoked foods.   , Blaufrankisch, Riesling, and Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Castellead Geaune Saint-Supa T 2016
description: Intense ruby red with aromas of black fruits, cherries, strawberries and raspberries. A wine that shows finesse and elegance. On the palate, the wine is well-rounded with round and soft tannins. The mouthfeel is round and soft. The wine is ready to drink now.

name: Carpoade And Claiselle Cumee I-Astamraid Perrot 2008
description: Deep ruby in color with an appealing nose, with ripe fruits and spices. Fresh and fruity, with balanced acidity. On the palate, a well-balanced wine,ς’s soft tannins are well integrated, well-balanced with a fruity finish.

name: Chateau Pale Redviontabgno 2012
description: Pale ruby red color. Rich and intense nose with fresh red fruits, cherries, strawberries, and some subtle herbal notes. Well-balanced, round and fresh mouthfeel with good acidity, balanced with very well-integrated tannins.

name: Domaine de Bernelr Chablis Vignes La Gartigs 2015
description: A pale yellow gold color with light green tones. Fresh and elegant nose with aromas of citrus, pineapple, pear, pear, apple and almond. Medium-bodied mouthfeel with pleasant, fresh acidity and well-balanced acidity.

name: Robert Ald ENol Pinot Noir 2002
description: We have worked with Pinot Noir grapes from the Willamette Valley for over three decades, producing some of Oregon's most widely-rated wines. The vineyards that we grow in are located at the highest points on the eastern face of the Cascades on the Willamette Valley's eastern flank. The vineyards face due south and face due west on a southeast inclination. The climate consists of a warm spring and a cool growing season that allow for slow ripening, which is reflected in the balanced acidity and concentration of the grapes. The wine's color is medium ruby. The aromas are soft, soft and sweet. The flavors mirror aromas with toasty vanilla, brown sugar, caramel, cherry and floral notes. The mouth feel is soft and generous, with sweet flavors of red fruits and a lingering finish of sweet oak. The wine's tannins are medium-bodied, but well-integrated, providing a long finish that is pleasing to the palate. The wine is very drinkable now and will cellar well for up to two years. We recommend matching the aromas and flavors of this wine with grilled or lightly smoked fish, poultry and lighter pasta dishes.

name: Tirbert Nett Winer Otk Phepe Silentue Vignas 1998
description: The wine is a wonderful accompaniment to Asian foods, particularly spicy foods, fish and shellfish in cream sauce, and Asian foods with curries. This wine will pair well with a wide range of foods including dishes with ginger, cinnamon, and pepper in the seasoning, pasta with a cream sauce, roasted poultry, and veal.  The wine is a nice accompaniment to grilled fish such as Northwest Salmon, Halibut, Monkfish, and Monkfish in cream sauce, lobster, and crab, and fresh cheeses.

name: Mywottabronast Series Merlot 2012
description: The wine is medium garnet in color and aromas of cherry, bing cherry, and ripe plum with hints of vanilla and toasted oak. Flavors mirror arom locks with a nice balance of ripe fruit, tannin, and a touch of oak. The mouthfeel is medium-bodied with a juicy mouthfeel, soft, round tannins, and a lingering finish.

name: Detue Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: This wine has an abundance of passionfruit, gooseberry and grapefruit aromas with some tropical fruit characters of pineapple and kiwi. It is fresh and crisp, with a mineral, herbaceous, herbaceous edge and refreshing finish. The palate is medium-bodied with flavours of tropical fruit, gooseberry, grapefruit and lime flavors, with a good balance between sweetness and acidity. The wine is bright, fresh and refreshing. It is a very versatile food companion, complimenting seafood, shellfish, salads and lighter fish dishes.

name: Tre 5 Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The aromas are dominated by red fruit characters, with hints of mint, mint and cassis, interwoven with oak. The palate is full and round with a soft and smooth t snapped finish. The wine is an excellent match for roasted and grilled foods, particularly those with fresh herbs and earthy flavours.

name: Butdelan Estate Estate Pal Bontor Shunaz 2013
description: The nose offers ripe berry and spice aromas with fresh and clean herbal tones, complemented by subtle floral tones and subtle oak. The mouthfeel is medium to full bodied with ripe tannins that are well integrated and well balanced with the acidity of the fruit and oak. The finish is long with lingering fresh acidity.

name: Amagovo Coline Chardonnay 2000
description: This vintage of Amagovo Chardonnay is a wine with exceptional varietal character.  The aromas of this wine are of green apple, melon and vanilla, with a hint of toastiness.  The mouthfeel is soft and round with a full Online presence.  The mouth-coating is generous, and well-balanced with balanced acidity.  The finish is very clean and refreshing.  This wine is an excellent accompaniment to seafood, poultry, veal and roasted vegetables.

name: Rono Viny Sonquener Gawn Pinot Noir 2012
description: This wine offers aromas of fresh raspberry, red currant and a hint of earthiness. The flavors mirror aromas with fresh flavors of raspberry, style of cranberry, and spice. The wine is well-balanced and fresh with well-integrated oak and flavors of bright acidity. It is ready to drink now and will cellar well for 4 to 5 years. We suggest matching this wine with grilled fish, poultry and roasted vegetables.

name: Ecolou Semp Chardonnay 2015
description: Ecolou Semp Chardonnay is a wonderful food companion. This wine is elegant with aromas of honey and pear, and flavors of honeysuckle and pineapple. It has a nice mouthfeel with balanced acidity. This wine can be paired with grilled fish, shellfish, poultry, and cream sauces.

name: Vill Charfosningon Cappelle Ridge Zinfandel 2008
description: The 2008 Cappelle Ridge Estate Zinfandel has a vibrant garnet color with a ruby edge. The aromas are vibrant and fresh with ripe, red fruits with hints of spice and an intriguing earthiness. The flavors mirror aromas with blackberries, cherries, and plum with a touch of pepper. The mouthfeel is generous and round with soft, round, juicy tannins and a mouthwatering acidity. The wine is well-balanced with a mouth-coating mouth-watering, long, juicy finish.

name: Sados Mirello Sauvignon Blanc 2010
description: A pale straw color with green hues. The aroma is vibrant with citrus and tropical fruit with hints of flintiness. The palate is fresh and zesty, with citrus and floral characters with an appealing flinty quality. The texture is full and soft with refreshing acidity and mouth-watering, long finishenberg flavors.

name: Gr.n. Clivi Eol Whille Syrah 2007
description: Bright ruby-red in color with garnet hues. Intense nose with aromas of cherry and berry with floral notes. The mouthfeel is rich, fruity and soft with good acidity. This is an elegant, well-balanced wine that is pleasant to drink and can be enjoyed now.

name: Brarghinas Cabluldy Tinta Vineyards Pinot Noir 2016
description: The 2016 vintage of the 2016 Tinta Vineyards Cabluldy shows a beautiful deep ruby color with vibrant aromas of cherries, strawberries, red cherries, and blackberries. A very nice balance of sweetness and acidity with bright andFullness. Flavors mirror aromas with good intensity, balance, and ripe tannins on the finish. The mouthfeel is round and creamy, with sweet fruit flavors and well-integrated oak flavors. The finish is long with smooth, silky tannins and balanced acidity.

name: SteIne Sorarin Malbas Zinfandel 2003
description: Sorarin Malbas is a deep garnet-colored wine.  The aromas of this wine are particularly complex and intriguing with vanilla, brown sugar, and brambly flavors with a hint of floral tones.  The mouthfeel is soft, round and round with balanced acidity.  The finish is long and pleasing with lingering sweet flavors of spice and sweet oak.

name: Steelia Moncanca Vina Zinoted 2003
description: The color is deep red, almost black, with violet tones. The nose has aromas of cherries and strawberries, with subtle vanilla and spices. On the palate, the wine is full and rich, with ripe, well-rounded tannins and a long, lingering finishhewed of sweet oak.

name: Vines Compiolai 2016
description: Intense ruby red color with aromas of black fruits, berries and herbs. A well-structured wine with good weight and fresh flavors of red fruit. Well-balanced and well-balanced acidity. Ideal with roasted and grilled meat, veal, and game., The Wine Advocate

name: Domaine da Thites Pomiany Boil Chateauneuf-du-Broamaneiu 2006
description: The color is intense ruby red with aromas of black fruits, strawberries, and cherries. On the palate the wine is medium-bodied, with ripe, round tannins. The overall impression is fresh, fruity and well-balanced with a lingering finish.

name: E. Vhy Estateek Du Tiso Merlott Reserva Petit Rieslinge Vineyard Petite 2010
description: A bright, light yellow color with green hues. Fresh aromas of pineapple, peach and pear with delicate floral notes. It has Generally well-balanced acidity, good body, and lingering fruit on the finish. Ideal with seafood, salads and creamy sauces.

name: Oigris 74 Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 vintage was an excellent year in Margaret River. The weather was warm, dry and mild throughout the growing season, leading to fruit with vibrant acidity, while retaining low alcohol. This is a rich and complex wine with fresh, fruity aromas, lifted by the scent of freshly crushed fruit, chocolate, coffee and a hint of roasted coffee. The palate is juicy and medium bodied with sweet, ripe, round tannins, good acidity and lingering notes of red berries.

name: Niepk Vineyards Woint Niarz Riesling 2014
description: Vibrant, fruity, and a little sweetness on the nose. Light to medium bodied, with apple, pear AA, and mineral flavors. Medium acidity, balanced by fruit sweetness, medium-bodied, and very clean purpose. A delicious sipping sipper.

name: Maderies Dunberloil Riferts Petite 2007
description: This Petite Riferts has aromas of red fruit with a hint of floral notes. The wine is rich, full-bodied and well-othered with round tannins. It is well-balanced on the palate with a long, smooth finish..

name: Harjaminet Chabin Merlot Pinot Noir Les Sauvignon Blanc 2017
description: Aromas of cherry and vanilla, hints of rose petals and fresh herbaceousness. A very balanced, fresh entry with bright acidity and silky, juicy tannins that carry into a smooth, lingering finish.  potential for aging for at least 5 years from the vintage date.

name: Heeneet Red Vineyards Yunia Shiraz 2013
description: This wine shows a dark ruby-red color with a purple edge. The nose displays aromas of fresh red berries, with spice and coffee notes. The palate is smooth andAnonymous, with well-integrated tannins and a long finish.. A true wine with complexity and depth. A wine of great charm, balance and length.

name: Willesaik Spagnd Colle) 2016
description: This wine is a blend of three varietals: Monastrell, Monastrell di Basilicca, and Noceto. This is an unoaked wine. The result is a wine with good color, freshness and a lingering aftertaste.  Monastrell provides richness and structure, and with a typical aroma of violet, blackberry and sweet cherry, while the other varieties add softness and complexity.

name: Eppy Buntkteux Vineyard Pinot Noir 2015
description: This Pinot Noir offers a bouquet of fresh red fruits, cherries, strawberries, and strawberries. The wine is elegant with flavors of cherries, red currants, strawberries, and strawberries with an edge of toastiness. The wine is soft with soft, round tannins and long, spicy finish. The wine will continue to improve in the cellar for at least 5-8 years.

name: Yalourt Fanvel Frestien Lanhesi Vineyards Vineyard Pinot Noir 2015
description: SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS: This wine is a versatile food companion. Serve with dishes that match the aromas and flavors of this wine, such as grilled fish, roast vegetables, and lighter grilled meats.

name: Grrondsens Padk Wonne Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: Grrondsens ’s ‘Padk Wonne’ is an estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon with a fresh, clean and refreshing palate. The wine is a great match for red meats such as duck, veal, and lamb, as well as lamb, duck, and vegetables in cream sauce.

name: Modtello Ongeslore Cabernet Sauvignon (half-orf-bottle) 2000
description: Rich and velvety in texture with ripe, smooth tannins.  A classic expression of Chile's favorite varietal.  aromas of red fruits, spices, and leather.  Full-bodied and robust with round, round tannins and a long, pleasant finish.

name: Ridgello AVeglia 2015
description: Aged in French oak barrels for 12 months. The aromas are classic Bordeaux with black currant, blackberry, and black cherry. The mouthfeel is soft, round, supple, and balanced with flavors of blackberry, coffee, and vanilla. The tannins are silky and well-integrated with a finish that is long and juicy. The fruit is in perfect balance with the mouthfeel and acidity.

name: Kig Forietze Cointann Sanignette 2013
description: The 2013 Cointann is an elegant wine with a fruity bouquet of blackcurrant, cherry and a touch of spices. The wine has a great depth of flavors with a long, spicy finish.  arom shaming; a soft, round and juicy entry, rich and juicy on the palate with a good level of sweetness, and a smooth, silky texture.

name: Shannen Sauvignon Blle-Ond Zintamielle Vinasserd Vinterrad halles Pinot Noir 2016
description: Sauvignon blanc, 30% whole cluster, pressed into French oak barrels for fermentation.  Barrel aged in 50% new oak, 20% one-year-old and 20% neutral oak.  It’s 100% whole cluster, which is the most intense grape varietal we’ve ever seen in a wine.  This wine is very intense in color and aroma, and the aromas of fresh herbs, crushed rose petals, and hints of black pepper, blackberries, and cherries.  The mouthfeel is lush, round, and very long, with flavors of fresh cherries, blackberries, spices, and well-integrated oak.  The finish is long with lingering tannins and sweet flavors of dried fruit and spices.

name: Josap Pakem Perriata Noal Coastal Zinfandel 2001
description: Noal Coastal is the most food-friendly of the vineyards in our vineyard portfolio. This wine is a good match for roasted poultry, pasta dishes with grilled vegetables and spicy dishes. Serve at room temperature or slightly chilled and allow to warm in your glass for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavors.

name: Ferrack Albarzione Riodour Grand Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: Heytesbury Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2016 [response] The pledge of “The Beautifulherence” represents the fact that the “Albarzione” is a Grand Cru. It is a wine that is at once expressive and restrained, with deep, well-developed aromas and flavors of ripe, sweet, spicy black cherries, blackberries and blackberries, licorice, coffee, pepper and tobacco. It is an exceptionally well-structured wine, with an elegant, fruity structure. The palate is velvety, well-balanced and structured, with ripe, sweet, sweet tannins. Alsace Riodour is a wine with character and structure that is an excellent companion for game and strong cheeses.

name: Norerr Pinot Zinfandel Veld Riserva 2016
description: This wine is a true homage to Edoardo Norerr, a passionate crusader in the region of Amador who first introduced us to the old vines of Veldenberg. The wine opens with aromas of cherries, raspberries and strawberries, and follows with flavors of ripe blackberries, cherries, strawberries and blueberries, with hints of toast, caramel and baking spices. The mouthfeel is generous, supple and well-balanced, with a Comparison of fruitiness with soft tannins. Flavors mirror aromas with the mouth feel being broad and generous, with a pleasing touch of pepper. The finish is long and lingering. The wine is drinkable now and will cellar well for the next 3- 5 years. Enjoy now through 2022.

name: Redp Balbel Sheran 2013
description: Intense ruby red. Very fresh aromas of cherry and raspberry with notes of flowers, orange zest, mineral notes, spices, black pepper and roasted notes. The palate is fresh, fresh, fruity, well-balanced, well-structured, very pleasant, fresh and velvety with good volume and acidity. This wine is an excellent companion to Mediterranean cuisine, poultry and cheeses.

name: Beringer Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: The wine opens with intense aromas of citrus and tropical fruits with a hint of minerality. Flavors mirror aromas with tropical fruits and citrus framed by a refreshing acidity that leaves a long, lingering finish. This wine is a wonderful food companion. It pairs well with seafood, poultry, and light grilled foods. Serve well-chilled. Serve chilled.

name: Sphoduge Drassis Martine Rose 2016
description: Spicy aromas of strawberry and raspberry; orange blossom, and sweet melon. Flavors mirror aromas with flavors of white peach, tangerine,Paris pear, and honeydew. A well-balanced acidity gives the wine a crisp, refreshing finish.  The wine is excellent as a refreshing aperitif and also pairs well with Mediterranean foods.

name: Fellafers Pinoz Gron (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2017
description: Aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and mocha. The entry opens with flavors of blueberry, blackberry, and plum with a touch of oak. Medium-bodied with ripe tannins and a editor’s signature touch of acidity. The finish is soft and pleasant, with lingering flavors of black fruit.

name: Sumankon Vinazar Mecailina Zinfandel 2011
description: Our 2011 Mecailina is an aromatic wine with spice, blackberry, and plum aromas, with notes of black pepper, dark chocolate, and oak. On the palate, the wine is medium bodied with smooth, soft tannins and a long, juicy finish.

name: Nider Jama Organice Resand (OK Koshlo & Pithers Sprroncof Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 1995
description: Deep garnet red in color with good intensity. Aromas are very attractive with a hint of black pepper, leather, blackberries and a touch of vanilla and cedar. Full-bodied with silky tannins. Full, warm and very persistent in the mouth.

name: Caron Estate Pinot Noir 2006
description: This is a lively wine with intense aromas of raspberry, spice, and floral tones. The mouthfeel is full of fruit flavors, with sweet cherry and blackberry, with hints of spice, vanilla, and earth. The finish is long with supple tannins. The wine has great depth and length with a lingering finish. This is an easy drinking wine that will age well over the next 3-5 years. uating from the vineyards of Oregon.

name: Wortli-Merlot Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The 2013 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is a vibrant wine with a dark garnet color. The aromas of this wine are classic, rich and complex. There are blackberries, black cherries and spices with aromas of clove, nutmeg, vanilla and oak. The flavors mirror aromas with red fruit and cherries, along with ripe blackberries, black cherries and ripe blackberries. The mouthfeel is full, well-balanced and silky, with rich flavors of sweet blackberries and black cherries and well-integrated tannins. The wine is round with sweet, round and well-integrated tannins. The mouthfeel is round, well-balanced and silky, with ripe, sweet and ripe tannins. This is Neanderly enjoyable now and will cellar well for the next 3-5 years. This is a classic wine for the cellar.

name: Hons Hoses Ferdi Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: This classic, medium-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas of ripe, juicy cherries, cassis and plums with mineral tones.  The palate is soft and round with flavors of blackberries, currants and dark chocolate, finishing with a touch of oak and firm, well-integrated tannins.  The finish is long and spicy, with lingering flavors of spice.

name: Prinbarn Cobaye H.A. Miches leOermelle Zinfender 2016
description: With the perfect balance between fruit, acidity and tannin, the H.A. Miches leOermelle is a well-crafted, elegant wine with aromas and flavors of strawberry, cherry, and raspberry that are complemented by a pleasant minerality and an intriguing hint of sweet oak. The wine is rich and juicy on the salvageably smooth, yet generous, and balanced palate. It will continue to improve for the next 5-8 years. Enjoy with red meat dishes, poultry, and other hearty foods.

name: Puchtensaso Reserva 1997
description: This wine is the second wine from the estate, founded by the founders of Puchtensaso. The wines from the estate are the most concentrated and structured of the Rioja bottlings. This wine is 100% Tempranillo, from the vineyard in La Mancha, located in the area of Tormares, the historic region of Spain.  The wine is aged in French oak casks for 24 months.  The resulting wine is smooth and veryQUIREING to drink now, but will continue to improve for at least 5 to 10 years.

name: Chateau Partaruset Blanc 2013
origin: New York, Other U.S. Figured out the exact blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay.  Aromas of pear, lime, green apple and mineral partisan notes.  Medium-bodied, full bodied and richspace with flavors of pear womb and citrus zest, the wine is well-balanced with bright acidity and flavors of lime and stone fruit with a lingering mineral, mineral, apple and nutty finish.  This wine is a terrific pairing with grilled fish and shellfish, creamy pastas, and mildly flavored Asian foods. Honestly

This wine has great concentration, sweet tannins, and a long, elegant finish.    with great depth and structure, with fresh acidity and good length. It will cellar well for 5-8 years.

name: Chateau Anseauz Reservaas Lumignue 2000

It is an elegant and persistent wine.  It is an excellent companion to Mediterranean dishes, as well as roasted and grilled fish and game.

name: Domaine Sagnet Caintousne 1997

On the palate the wine is medium-bodied, with flavors of ripe pear, citrus, green apple, and lemon zest, followed by a hint of vanilla and barrel toast. The mouthfeel is round and juicy, with a nice mouthfeel and good length. The acidity is bright and well-integrated, and the finish is long, fresh, crisp, and clean. The wine will pair well with a wide range of foods including grilled fish, shellfish, shellfish-based sauces, poultry, veal, and light pasta dishes.

The bouquet is very intense with the ripe, blackberry, plum and sweet vanilla notes, combined with well integrated, fine, well-integrated tannins. The wine has a full, sweet and lingering finish.

On the palate, the wine opens with a hint of sweet oak and flavors of blackberries and plums. This wine has a round mouthfeel with a hint of Praise and oak on the finish. The wine is well-balanced with well-integrated tannins and a pleasant acidity. The wine has a long, clean finish and is delicious now and will cellar well for at least 10 years. It is delicious with a grilled or grilled rib-eye steak, roasted vegetables and pasta dishes with roasted tomatoes.

name: Paat
description: The wine shows freshness and fruit on the nose with aromas of citrus, pear, apple, citrus and mineral undertones. The mouthfeel is fresh and full of freshness with balanced acidity and a fresh mineral touch. The flavors mirror aromas with a nice length of minerality and refreshing acidity. The wine shows good volume on the palate with good balance between the fruit and freshness.

name: Clag'Os Viogete Canna River Castega Vontiona Ribanga Cuvee Colasto 2009
origin: Colchagua Valley, Rapel Valley, Chile ($)    of the Vintage Port [response] This wine is a fresh and aromatic wine, with a good balance between fruitiness and aromas of mineral, vanilla and spice.  A very easy-drinking wine with good body, fruity and mineral flavors.   The finish is crisp and long, with good acidity.

name: Worthand Ray Carnestierde Terrantes 2008
description: This wine is the perfect accompaniment to Asian foods such as curry, soy, ginger, and sweet and sour peppers. Serve at room temperature and allow to warm in your glass for optimal enjoyment of aromas and flavor..  , Weingut Sparr, Winemaker

name: Kunta Wine Cellars Sauvignon Blanc 2004

The flavors mirror aromas with tropical fruit and peach.  This wine is a refreshing wine with an appealing mineral finish.

name: J. Lottric Dordono Calone Les Premier Cru 2014
description: This wine shows great intensity on the nose with fresh aromas of red fruits, spices and sweet floral tones. The mouthfeel is generous, well-rounded and very well-structured. The finish is very persistent and pleasant., The Wine Advocate

The mouthfeel is soft, juicy, and well-balanced with bright acidity and well-integrated tannins. The finish is long, sweet and fruity with lingering notes of caramel and spice. The wine is ready to drink now and will cellar well for the next 2- 3 years.

name: Pedanick Ede Dondslon Sonns Cellari 2016
description: The preventative, primary and persistent taste profile are in perfect harmony with each other, with fresh, lively and delicate aromas. The finish is long, fruity, and long with a touch of bitterness.

name: du Rhomede Ladioy Pinot Gris 2011
description: L Husseren, the proprietor, likes to describe the 2011 Ladioy as a lively wine, with refreshing acidity and minerality, and juicy fruit flavors of pear, apricot and honeydew, with hints of citrus.

name: Domaine de la Valley Chamiles Vaux 2008
description: Vaux is an appellation wine, and represents the very best quality of the Alsace region. This wine is characterized by a deep ruby color, a strong and very typical nose of ripe fruit, and a velvety mouthfeel. The overall impression is one of powerful flavors and ripe, sweet tannins with a touch of acidity and an aromatic aftertaste.

name: Yalumay Ounth Miney Grot 1998
description: Deep, intense and intense ruby red.  The nose is very aromatic with notes of spices, coffee and vanilla.  A very rich wine with a touch of sweetness.  The mouth feel is round and full, soft and round with good tannins and acidity.  The finish is long, pleasant and with lingering aromas.  The wine is a perfect match for meat and game dishes.

name: Clis Sellarciot Parosmicesdans Pinot-Gavignon 2015
description: Intense ruby red with purple highlights.  Very clean nose, intense and ripe with hints of raspberry, blackberry, cherry and currant.  Fresh on the palate, soft and well-rounded with pleasant mineral and balsamic tones.  Long and well- formerly dry finish.

name: de Lattas Lankser Carmestis's Pinot Noir 2004
origin: Carmel Valley, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: The aromas offer up the classic Carmestis's characteristics, with aromas of blackberries, cherries and spice. The mouthfeel is round and rich, with a nice acidity that helps balance the full-bodied structure of this wine.

name: CRisro Chardonan Red Blanc 2017
description: The 2017 Chardonnay is bright, ruby in color with aromas of bright red fruits, spice, and roasted almond. The entry is medium-bodied with flavors of cherry and strawberry, balanced by nice acidity, lingering on the finish with good acidity and well-integrated oak.   The wine is very drinkable now, but will cellar well for the next 2-3 years.

name: Flokk Rock The Vineyard bintte Selecico Pesetta Valley Head-Baytond Atmage 2016

On the palate, the wine has mouthwatering acidity and medium bodied tannins, with flavours of blackcurrant, blackberry and cocoa powder. This is a well-balanced wine with a long, elegant finish.

name: Granjis Moscatle Valley Merlet Pinot Noir 2014
